 nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet śuklāmbaradharaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaśivarṇaṃ caturbhujam prasannavadanaṃ dhyāyet sarvavighnopaśāntaye oṃ vyāsaṃ vasiṣṭhanaptāraṃ śakteḥ pautram akalmaṣam parāśarātmajaṃ vande śukatātaṃ taponidhim vyāsāya viṣṇurūpāya vyāsarūpāya viṣṇave namo vai brahmanidhaye vāsiṣṭhāya namo namaḥ janamejaya uvācaa evaṃ dyūtajitāḥ pārthāḥ kopitāś ca durātmabhiḥc dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ sahāmātyair nikṛtyā dvijasattamaa śrāvitāḥ paruṣā vācaḥ sṛjadbhir vairam uttamamc kim akurvanta kauravyā mama pūrvapitāmahāḥa kathaṃ caiśvaryavibhraṣṭāḥ sahasā duḥkham eyuṣaḥc vane vijahrire pārthāḥ śakrapratimatejasaḥa ke cainān anvavartanta prāptān vyasanam uttamamc kimāhārāḥ kimācārāḥ kva ca vāso mahātmanāma kathaṃ dvādaśa varṣāṇi vane teṣāṃ mahātmanāmc vyatīyur brāhmaṇaśreṣṭha śūrāṇām arighātināma kathaṃ ca rājaputrī sā pravarā sarvayoṣitāmc pativratā mahābhāgā satataṃ satyavādinīe vanavāsam aduḥkhārhā dāruṇaṃ pratyapadyataa etad ācakṣva me sarvaṃ vistareṇa tapodhanac śrotum icchāmi caritaṃ bhūridraviṇatejasāme kathyamānaṃ tvayā vipra paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa evaṃ dyūtajitāḥ pārthāḥ kopitāś ca durātmabhiḥc dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ sahāmātyair niryayur gajasāhvayāta vardhamānapuradvāreṇābhiniṣkramya te tadāc udaṅmukhāḥ śastrabhṛtaḥ prayayuḥ saha kṛṣṇayāa indrasenādayaś cainān bhṛtyāḥ paricaturdaśac rathair anuyayuḥ śīghraiḥ striya ādāya sarvaśaḥd tatas te puruṣavyāghrā rathān āsthāya bhāratad dadṛśur jāhnavītīre pramāṇākhyaṃ mahāvaṭama vrajatas tān viditvā tu paurāḥ śokābhipīḍitāḥc garhayanto sakṛd bhīṣmaviduradroṇagautamāne ūcur vigatasaṃtrāsāḥ samāgamya parasparama nedam asti kulaṃ sarvaṃ na vayaṃ na ca no gṛhāḥc yatra duryodhanaḥ pāpaḥ saubaleyena pālitaḥe karṇaduḥśāsanābhyāṃ ca rājyam etac cikīrṣatia no cet kulaṃ na cācāro na dharmo rthaḥ kutaḥ sukhamc yatra pāpasahāyo yaṃ pāpo rājyaṃ bubhūṣatea duryodhano gurudveṣī tyaktācārasuhṛjjanaḥc arthalubdho bhimānī ca nīcaḥ prakṛtinirghṛṇaḥa neyam asti mahī kṛtsnā yatra duryodhano nṛpaḥc sādhu gacchāmahe sarve yatra gacchanti pāṇḍavāḥa sānukrośā mahātmāno vijitendriyaśatravaḥc hrīmantaḥ kīrtimantaś ca dharmācāraparāyaṇāḥa evam uktvānujagmus tān pāṇḍavāṃs te sametya cac ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve tān kuntīmādrinandanāna kva gamiṣyatha bhadraṃ vas tyaktvāsmān duḥkhabhāginaḥc vayam apy anuyāsyāmo yatra yūyaṃ gamiṣyathaa adharmeṇa jitāñ śrutvā yuṣmāṃs tyaktaghṛṇaiḥ paraiḥc udvignāḥ sma bhṛśaṃ sarve nāsmān hātum ihārhathaa bhaktānuraktāḥ suhṛdaḥ sadā priyahite ratānc kurājādhiṣṭhite rājye na vinaśyema sarvaśaḥa śrūyatāṃ cābhidhāsyāmo guṇadoṣān nararṣabhāḥc śubhāśubhādhivāsena saṃsargaṃ kurute yathāa vastram āpas tilān bhūmiṃ gandho vāsayate yathāc puṣpāṇām adhivāsena tathā saṃsargajā guṇāḥa mohajālasya yonir hi mūḍhair eva samāgamaḥc ahany ahani dharmasya yoniḥ sādhusamāgamaḥa tasmāt prājñaiś ca vṛddhaiś ca susvabhāvais tapasvibhiḥc sadbhiś ca saha saṃsargaḥ kāryaḥ śamaparāyaṇaiḥa yeṣāṃ trīṇy avadātāni yonir vidyā ca karma cac tān sevet taiḥ samāsyā hi śāstrebhyo pi garīyasīa nirārambhā hy api vayaṃ puṇyaśīleṣu sādhuṣuc puṇyam evāpnuyāmeha pāpaṃ pāpopasevanāta asatāṃ darśanāt sparśāt saṃjalpanasahāsanātc dharmācārāḥ prahīyante na ca sidhyanti mānavāḥa buddhiś ca hīyate puṃsāṃ nīcaiḥ saha samāgamātc madhyamair madhyatāṃ yāti śreṣṭhatāṃ yāti cottamaiḥd anīcair nāpy aviṣayair nādharmiṣṭhair viśeṣataḥa ye guṇāḥ kīrtitā loke dharmakāmārthasaṃbhavāḥc lokācārātmasaṃbhūtā vedoktāḥ śiṣṭasaṃmatāḥa te yuṣmāsu samastāś ca vyastāś caiveha sadguṇāḥc icchāmo guṇavan madhye vastuṃ śreyo bhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa dhanyā vayaṃ yad asmākaṃ snehakāruṇyayantritāḥc asato pi guṇān āhur brāhmaṇapramukhāḥ prajāḥa tad ahaṃ bhrātṛsahitaḥ sarvān vijñāpayāmi vaḥc nānyathā tad dhi kartavyam asmatsnehānukampayāa bhīṣmaḥ pitāmaho rājā viduro jananī ca mec suhṛjjanaś ca prāyo me nagare nāgasāhvayea te tv asmaddhitakāmārthaṃ pālanīyāḥ prayatnataḥc yuṣmābhiḥ sahitaiḥ sarvaiḥ śokasaṃtāpavihvalāḥa nivartatāgatā dūraṃ samāgamanaśāpitāḥc svajane nyāsabhūte me kāryā snehānvitā matiḥa etad dhi mama kāryāṇāṃ paramaṃ hṛdi saṃsthitamc sukṛtānena me tuṣṭiḥ satkāraś ca bhaviṣyati vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tathānumantritās tena dharmarājena tāḥ prajāḥc cakrur ārtasvaraṃ ghoraṃ hā rājann iti duḥkhitāḥa guṇān pārthasya saṃsmṛtya duḥkhārtāḥ paramāturāḥc akāmāḥ saṃnyavartanta samāgamyātha pāṇḍavāna nivṛtteṣu tu paureṣu rathān āsthāya pāṇḍavāḥc prajagmur jāhnavītīre pramāṇākhyaṃ mahāvaṭama taṃ te divasaśeṣeṇa vaṭaṃ gatvā tu pāṇḍavāḥc ūṣus tāṃ rajanīṃ vīrāḥ saṃspṛśya salilaṃ śucie udakenaiva tāṃ rātrim ūṣus te duḥkhakarśitāḥa anujagmuś ca tatraitān snehāt ke cid dvijātayaḥc sāgnayo nagnayaś caiva saśiṣyagaṇabāndhavāḥe sa taiḥ parivṛto rājā śuśubhe brahmavādibhiḥa teṣāṃ prāduṣkṛtāgnīnāṃ muhūrte ramyadāruṇec brahmaghoṣapuraskāraḥ saṃjalpaḥ samajāyataa rājānaṃ tu kuruśreṣṭhaṃ te haṃsamadhurasvarāḥc āśvāsayanto viprāgryāḥ kṣapāṃ sarvāṃ vyanodayand rājā tu bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ tathā sarvaiḥ suhṛdgaṇaiḥd aśeta tāṃ niśāṃ rājā duḥkhaśokasamāhataḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ teṣām akliṣṭakarmaṇāmc vanaṃ yiyāsatāṃ viprās tasthur bhikṣābhujo grataḥe tān uvāca tato rājā kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥa vayaṃ hi hṛtasarvasvā hṛtarājyā hṛtaśriyaḥc phalamūlāmiṣāhārā vanaṃ yāsyāma duḥkhitāḥa vanaṃ ca doṣabahulaṃ bahuvyālasarīsṛpamc parikleśaś ca vo manye dhruvaṃ tatra bhaviṣyatia brāhmaṇānāṃ parikleśo daivatāny api sādayetc kiṃ punar mām ito viprā nivartadhvaṃ yatheṣṭataḥ brāhmaṇā ūcuḥa gatir yā bhavatāṃ rājaṃs tāṃ vayaṃ gantum udyatāḥc nārhathāsmān parityaktuṃ bhaktān saddharmadarśinaḥa anukampāṃ hi bhakteṣu daivatāny api kurvatec viśeṣato brāhmaṇeṣu sadācārāvalambiṣu yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa mamāpi paramā bhaktir brāhmaṇeṣu sadā dvijāḥc sahāyaviparibhraṃśas tv ayaṃ sādayatīva māma āhareyur hi me ye pi phalamūlamṛgāṃs tathāc ta ime śokajair duḥkhair bhrātaro me vimohitāḥa draupadyā viprakarṣeṇa rājyāpaharaṇena cac duḥkhānvitān imān kleśair nāhaṃ yoktum ihotsahe brāhmaṇā ūcuḥa asmatpoṣaṇajā cintā mā bhūt te hṛdi pārthivac svayam āhṛtya vanyāni anuyāsyāmahe vayama anudhyānena japyena vidhāsyāmaḥ śivaṃ tavac kathābhiś cānukūlābhiḥ saha raṃsyāmahe vane yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa evam etan na saṃdeho rameyaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ sahac nyūnabhāvāt tu paśyāmi pratyādeśam ivātmanaḥa kathaṃ drakṣyāmi vaḥ sarvān svayam āhṛtabhojanānc madbhaktyā kliśyato narhān dhik pāpān dhṛtarāṣṭrajān vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa ity uktvā sa nṛpaḥ śocan niṣasāda mahītalec tam adhyātmaratir vidvāñ śaunako nāma vai dvijaḥe yoge sāṃkhye ca kuśalo rājānam idam abravīta śokasthānasahasrāṇi bhayasthānaśatāni cac divase divase mūḍham āviśanti na paṇḍitama na hi jñānaviruddheṣu bahudoṣeṣu karmasuc śreyoghātiṣu sajjante buddhimanto bhavadvidhāḥa aṣṭāṅgāṃ buddhim āhur yāṃ sarvāśreyovighātinīmc śrutismṛtisamāyuktāṃ sā rājaṃs tvayy avasthitād śuśrūṣā śravaṇaṃ caiva grahaṇaṃ dhāraṇaṃ tathād ūhāpoho pi vijñānaṃ tattvajñānaṃ ca dhīguṇāḥa arthakṛcchreṣu durgeṣu vyāpatsu svajanasya cac śārīramānasair duḥkhair na sīdanti bhavadvidhāḥa śrūyatāṃ cābhidhāsyāmi janakena yathā purāc ātmavyavasthānakarā gītāḥ ślokā mahātmanāa manodehasamutthābhyāṃ duḥkhābhyām arditaṃ jagatc tayor vyāsasamāsābhyāṃ śamopāyam imaṃ śṛṇud vyādhayo tra śarīre smin vātapittakaphodbhavāḥd ajīrṇaprabhavāḥ sarve duḥkhāḥ pāpodbhavās tathāa vyādher aniṣṭasaṃsparśāc chramād iṣṭavivarjanātc duḥkhaṃ caturbhiḥ śārīraṃ kāraṇaiḥ saṃpravartatea tad āśupratikārāc ca satataṃ cāvicintanātc ādhivyādhipraśamanaṃ kriyāyogadvayena tua matimanto hy ato vaidyāḥ śamaṃ prāg eva kurvatec mānasasya priyākhyānaiḥ saṃbhogopanayair nṛṇāma mānasena hi duḥkhena śarīram upatapyatec ayaḥpiṇḍena taptena kumbhasaṃstham ivodakama mānasaṃ śamayet tasmāj jñānenāgnim ivāmbunāc praśānte mānase duḥkhe śārīram upaśāmyatia manaso duḥkhamūlaṃ tu sneha ity upalabhyatec snehāt tu sajjate jantur duḥkhayogam upaiti caa snehamūlāni duḥkhāni snehajāni bhayāni cac śokaharṣau tathāyāsaḥ sarvaṃ snehāt pravartatea snehāt karaṇarāgaś ca prajajñe vaiṣayas tathāc aśreyaskāv ubhāv etau pūrvas tatra guruḥ smṛtaḥa koṭarāgnir yathāśeṣaṃ samūlaṃ pādapaṃ dahetc dharmārthinaṃ tathālpo pi rāgadoṣo vināśayeta viprayoge na tu tyāgī doṣadarśī samāgamātc virāgaṃ bhajate jantur nirvairo niṣparigrahaḥa tasmāt snehaṃ svapakṣebhyo mitrebhyo dhanasaṃcayātc svaśarīrasamutthaṃ tu jñānena vinivartayeta jñānānviteṣu mukhyeṣu śāstrajñeṣu kṛtātmasuc na teṣu sajjate snehaḥ padmapatreṣv ivodakama rāgābhibhūtaḥ puruṣaḥ kāmena parikṛṣyatec icchā saṃjāyate tasya tatas tṛṣṇā pravartatea tṛṣṇā hi sarvapāpiṣṭhā nityodvegakarī nṛṇāmc adharmabahulā caiva ghorā pāpānubandhinīa yā dustyajā durmatibhir yā na jīryati jīryataḥc yo sau prāṇāntiko rogas tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ tyajataḥ sukhama anādyantā tu sā tṛṣṇā antardehagatā nṛṇāmc vināśayati saṃbhūtā ayonija ivānalaḥa yathaidhaḥ svasamutthena vahninā nāśam ṛcchatic tathākṛtātmā lobhena sahajena vinaśyatia rājataḥ salilād agneś corataḥ svajanād apib arthibhyaḥ kālatas tasmān nityam arthavatāṃ bhayamc bhayam arthavatāṃ nityaṃ mṛtyoḥ prāṇabhṛtām ivaa yathā hy āmiṣam ākāśe pakṣibhiḥ śvāpadair bhuvic bhakṣyate salile matsyais tathā sarveṇa vittavāna artha eva hi keṣāṃ cid anartho bhavitā nṛṇāmc arthaśreyasi cāsakto na śreyo vindate naraḥe tasmād arthāgamāḥ sarve manomohavivardhanāḥa kārpaṇyaṃ darpamānau ca bhayam udvega eva cac arthajāni viduḥ prājñā duḥkhāny etāni dehināma arthasyopārjane duḥkhaṃ pālane ca kṣaye tathāc nāśe duḥkhaṃ vyaye duḥkhaṃ ghnanti caivārthakāraṇāta arthā duḥkhaṃ parityaktuṃ pālitāś cāpi te sukhāḥc duḥkhena cādhigamyante teṣāṃ nāśaṃ na cintayeta asaṃtoṣaparā mūḍhāḥ saṃtoṣaṃ yānti paṇḍitāḥc anto nāsti pipāsāyāḥ saṃtoṣaḥ paramaṃ sukhama tasmāt saṃtoṣam eveha dhanaṃ paśyanti paṇḍitāḥc anityaṃ yauvanaṃ rūpaṃ jīvitaṃ dravyasaṃcayaḥe aiśvaryaṃ priyasaṃvāso gṛdhyed eṣu na paṇḍitaḥa tyajeta saṃcayāṃs tasmāt tajjaṃ kleśaṃ saheta kaḥc na hi saṃcayavān kaś cid dṛśyate nirupadravaḥa ataś ca dharmibhiḥ pumbhir anīhārthaḥ praśasyateb dharmārthaṃ yasya vittehā varaṃ tasya nirīhatāc prakṣālanād dhi paṅkasya dūrād asparśanaṃ varama yudhiṣṭhiraivam artheṣu na spṛhāṃ kartum arhasic dharmeṇa yadi te kāryaṃ vimukteccho bhavārthataḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa nārthopabhogalipsārtham iyam arthepsutā mamac bharaṇārthaṃ tu viprāṇāṃ brahman kāṅkṣe na lobhataḥa kathaṃ hy asmadvidho brahman vartamāno gṛhāśramec bharaṇaṃ pālanaṃ cāpi na kuryād anuyāyināma saṃvibhāgo hi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣām eva śiṣyatec tathaivāpacamānebhyaḥ pradeyaṃ gṛhamedhināa tṛṇāni bhūmir udakaṃ vāk caturthī ca sūnṛtāc satām etāni geheṣu nocchidyante kadā canaa deyam ārtasya śayanaṃ sthitaśrāntasya cāsanamc tṛṣitasya ca pānīyaṃ kṣudhitasya ca bhojanama cakṣur dadyān mano dadyād vācaṃ dadyāc ca sūnṛtāmb utthāya cāsanaṃ dadyād eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥc pratyudgamyābhigamanaṃ kuryān nyāyena cārcanama aghihotram anaḍvāṃś ca jñātayo tithibāndhavāḥc putradārabhṛtāś caiva nirdaheyur apūjitāḥa nātmārthaṃ pācayed annaṃ na vṛthā ghātayet paśūnc na ca tat svayam aśnīyād vidhivad yan na nirvapeta śvabhyaś ca śvapacebhyaś ca vayobhyaś cāvaped bhuvic vaiśvadevaṃ hi nāmaitat sāyaṃprātar vidhīyatea vighasāśī bhavet tasmān nityaṃ cāmṛtabhojanaḥc vighasaṃ bhṛtyaśeṣaṃ tu yajñaśeṣaṃ tathāmṛtamd cakṣur dadyān mano dadyād vācaṃ dadyāc ca sūnṛtāmd anuvrajed upāsīta sa yajñaḥ pañcadakṣiṇaḥd yo dadyād aparikliṣṭam adhvani vartated śrāntāyādṛṣṭapūrvāya tasya puṇyaphalaṃ mahata etāṃ yo vartate vṛttiṃ vartamāno gṛhāśramec tasya dharmaṃ paraṃ prāhuḥ kathaṃ vā vipra manyase śaunaka uvācaa aho bata mahat kaṣṭaṃ viparītam idaṃ jagatc yenāpatrapate sādhur asādhus tena tuṣyatia śiśnodarakṛte prājñaḥ karoti vighasaṃ bahuc moharāgasamākrānta indriyārthavaśānugaḥa hriyate budhyamāno pi naro hāribhir indriyaiḥc vimūḍhasaṃjño duṣṭāśvair udbhrāntair iva sārathiḥa ṣaḍindriyāṇi viṣayaṃ samāgacchanti vai yadāc tadā prādurbhavaty eṣāṃ pūrvasaṃkalpajaṃ manaḥa mano yasyendriyagrāmaviṣayaṃ prati coditamc tasyautsukyaṃ saṃbhavati pravṛttiś copajāyatea tataḥ saṃkalpavīryeṇa kāmena viṣayeṣubhiḥc viddhaḥ patati lobhāgnau jyotir lobhāt pataṃgavata tato vihārair āhārair mohitaś ca viśāṃ patec mahāmohamukhe magno nātmānam avabudhyatea evaṃ patati saṃsāre tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣuc avidyākarmatṛṣṇābhir bhrāmyamāṇo tha cakravata brahmādiṣu tṛṇānteṣu hūteṣu parivartatec jale bhuvi tathākāśe jāyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥa abudhānāṃ gatis tv eṣā budhānām api me śṛṇuc ye dharme śreyasi ratā vimokṣaratayo janāḥa yad idaṃ vedavacanaṃ kuru karma tyajeti cac tasmād dharmān imān sarvān nābhimānāt samācareta ijyādhyayanadānāni tapaḥ satyaṃ kṣamā damaḥc alobha iti mārgo yaṃ dharmasyāṣṭavidhaḥ smṛtaḥa tatra pūrvaś caturvargaḥ pitṛyānapathe sthitaḥc kartavyam iti yat kāryaṃ nābhimānāt samācareta uttaro devayānas tu sadbhir ācaritaḥ sadāc aṣṭāṅgenaiva mārgeṇa viśuddhātmā samācareta samyak saṃkalpasaṃbandhāt samyak cendriyanigrahātc samyag vrataviśeṣāc ca samyak ca gurusevanāta samyag āhārayogāc ca samyak cādhyayanāgamātc samyak karmopasaṃnyāsāt samyak cittanirodhanāte evaṃ karmāṇi kurvanti saṃsāravijigīṣavaḥa rāgadveṣavinirmuktā aiśvaryaṃ devatā gatāḥc rudrāḥ sādhyās tathādityā vasavo thāśvināv apie yogaiśvaryeṇa saṃyuktā dhārayanti prajā imāḥa tathā tvam api kaunteya śamam āsthāya puṣkalamc tapasā siddhim anviccha yogasiddhiṃ ca bhārataa pitṛmātṛmayī siddhiḥ prāptā karmamayī ca tec tapasā siddhim anviccha dvijānāṃ bharaṇāya vaia siddhā hi yad yad icchanti dīpyamānaṃ svatejasāc āgamya ṛṣayaḥ sarve yācantābhayam acyutaa yugānte sarvabhūtāni saṃkṣipya madhusūdanac ātmany evātmasāt kṛtvā jagad āsse paraṃtapad yugādau tava vārṣṇeya nābhipadmād ajāyatad tāv api deveśau tvaccharīrasamudbhavaud tvanniyogakārāv etāv iti me nārado bravītd tathā nārāyaṇa purā kratubhir bhūridakṣiṇaiḥd iṣṭavāṃs tvaṃ mahāsatraṃ kṛṣṇa caitrarathe vanea naivaṃ pūrve nāpare vā kariṣyanti kṛtāni tec karmāṇi yāni deva tvaṃ bāla eva mahādyutea kṛtavān puṇḍarīkākṣa baladevasahāyavānc vairājabhavane cāpi brahmaṇā nyavasaḥ saha vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa evam uktvā tadātmānam ātmā kṛṣṇasya pāṇḍavaḥc tūṣṇīm āsīt tataḥ pārtham ity uvāca janārdanaḥa mamaiva tvaṃ tavaivāhaṃ ye madīyās tavaiva tec yas tvāṃ dveṣṭi sa māṃ dveṣṭi yas tvām anu sa mām anua naras tvam asi durdharṣa harir nārāyaṇo hy ahamc lokāl lokam imaṃ prāptau naranārāyaṇāv ṛṣīa ananyaḥ pārtha mattas tvam ahaṃ tvattaś ca bhāratac nāvayor antaraṃ śakyaṃ vedituṃ bharatarṣabha evam ukte tu vacane keśavena mahātmanā ity uktvā puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ pāṇḍavaṃ supriyaṃ priyam prīyamāṇo hṛṣīkeśas tūṣṇīm āsāṃ babhūva haa tasmin vīrasamāvāye saṃrabdheṣv atha rājasuc dhṛṣṭadyumnamukhair vīrair bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritāa pāñcālī puṇḍarīkākṣam āsīnaṃ yādavaiḥ sahac abhigamyābravīt kṛṣṇā śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaiṣiṇī vāsudeva vasūnāṃ ca vāsavo bahudhācyuta devadevo si lokānāṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyano bravīta pūrve prajānisarge tvām āhur ekaṃ prajāpatimc sraṣṭāraṃ sarvabhūtānām asito devalo bravīta viṣṇus tvam asi durdharṣa tvaṃ yajño madhusūdanac yaṣṭā tvam asi yaṣṭavyo jāmadagnyo yathābravīta ṛṣayas tvāṃ kṣamām āhuḥ satyaṃ ca puruṣottamac satyād yajño si saṃbhūtaḥ kaśyapas tvāṃ yathābravīta sādhyānām api devānāṃ vasūnām īśvareśvaraḥc lokabhāvana lokeśa yathā tvāṃ nārado bravītd brahmaśaṃkaraśakrādyair devavṛndaiḥ punaḥ punaḥd krīḍase tvaṃ naravyāghra bālaḥ krīḍanakair ivaa divaṃ te śirasā vyāptaṃ padbhyāṃ ca pṛthivī vibhoc jaṭharaṃ te ime lokāḥ puruṣo si sanātanaḥa vidyātapo bhitaptānāṃ tapasā bhāvitātmanāmc ātmadarśanasiddhānām ṛṣīṇām ṛṣisattamaa rājarṣīṇāṃ puṇyakṛtām āhaveṣv anivartināmc sarvadharmopapannānāṃ tvaṃ gatiḥ puruṣottamaa tvaṃ prabhus tvaṃ vibhus tvaṃ bhūr ātmabhūs tvaṃ sanātanaḥc lokapālāś ca lokāś ca nakṣatrāṇi diśo daśae nabhaś candraś ca sūryaś ca tvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitama martyatā caiva bhūtānām amaratvaṃ divaukasāmc tvayi sarvaṃ mahābāho lokakāryaṃ pratiṣṭhitama sā te haṃ duḥkham ākhyāsye praṇayān madhusūdanac īśas tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥa kathaṃ nu bhāryā pārthānāṃ tava kṛṣṇa sakhī vibhoc dhṛṣṭadyumnasya bhaginī sabhāṃ kṛṣyeta mādṛśīa strīdharmiṇī vepamānā rudhireṇa samukṣitāc ekavastrā vikṛṣṭāsmi duḥkhitā kurusaṃsadia rājamadhye sabhāyāṃ tu rajasābhisamīritāmc dṛṣṭvā ca māṃ dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ prāhasan pāpacetasaḥd kṛṣyamāṇāṃ tathā dīnām anāthām iva mādhavad āhuś caitān ṣaṇḍatilān pañca caiva tu pāṇḍavānd patim anyaṃ vṛṇīṣveti sarve te madhusūdanaa dāsībhāvena bhoktuṃ mām īṣus te madhusūdanac jīvatsu pāṇḍuputreṣu pāñcāleṣv atha vṛṣṇiṣua nanv ahaṃ kṛṣṇa bhīṣmasya dhṛtarāṣṭrasya cobhayoḥc snuṣā bhavāmi dharmeṇa sāhaṃ dāsīkṛtā balāta garhaye pāṇḍavāṃs tv eva yudhi śreṣṭhān mahābalānc ye kliśyamānāṃ prekṣante dharmapatnīṃ yaśasvinīma dhig balaṃ bhīmasenasya dhik pārthasya dhanuṣmatāmc yau māṃ viprakṛtāṃ kṣudrair marṣayetāṃ janārdanaa śāśvato yaṃ dharmapathaḥ sadbhir ācaritaḥ sadāc yad bhāryāṃ parirakṣanti bhartāro lpabalā apia bhāryāyāṃ rakṣyamāṇāyāṃ prajā bhavati rakṣitāc prajāyāṃ rakṣyamāṇāyām ātmā bhavati rakṣitaḥa ātmā hi jāyate tasyāṃ tasmāj jāyā bhavaty utac bhartā ca bhāryayā rakṣyaḥ kathaṃ jāyān mamodarea nanv ime śaraṇaṃ prāptān na tyajanti kadā canac te māṃ śaraṇam āpannāṃ nānvapadyanta pāṇḍavāḥa pañceme pañcabhir jātāḥ kumārāś cāmitaujasaḥc eteṣām apy avekṣārthaṃ trātavyāsmi janārdanaa prativindhyo yudhiṣṭhirāt sutasomo vṛkodarātc arjunāc chrutakīrtis tu śatānīkas tu nākuliḥa kaniṣṭhāc chrutakarmā tu sarve satyaparākramāḥc pradyumno yādṛśaḥ kṛṣṇa tādṛśās te mahārathāḥa nanv ime dhanuṣi śreṣṭhā ajeyā yudhi śātravaiḥc kimarthaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ sahante durbalīyasāma adharmeṇa hṛtaṃ rājyaṃ sarve dāsāḥ kṛtās tathāc sabhāyāṃ parikṛṣṭāham ekavastrā rajasvalāa nādhijyam api yac chakyaṃ kartum anyena gāṇḍivamc anyatrārjunabhīmābhyāṃ tvayā vā madhusūdanaa dhig bhīmasenasya balaṃ dhik pārthasya ca gāṇḍivamc yatra duryodhanaḥ kṛṣṇa muhūrtam api jīvatid kālaḥ sṛjati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥd tat kālena kṛtaṃ manye na te pauruṣavardhanama ya etān ākṣipad rāṣṭrāt saha mātrāvihiṃsakānc adhīyānān purā bālān vratasthān madhusūdanaa bhojane bhīmasenasya pāpaḥ prākṣepayad viṣamc kālakūṭaṃ navaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ saṃbhṛtaṃ lomaharṣaṇama taj jīrṇam avikāreṇa sahānnena janārdanac saśeṣatvān mahābāho bhīmasya puruṣottamaa pramāṇakoṭyāṃ viśvastaṃ tathā suptaṃ vṛkodaramc baddhvainaṃ kṛṣṇa gaṅgāyāṃ prakṣipya punar āvrajata yadā vibuddhaḥ kaunteyas tadā saṃchidya bandhanamc udatiṣṭhan mahābāhur bhīmaseno mahābalaḥa āśīviṣaiḥ kṛṣṇasarpaiḥ suptaṃ cainam adaṃśayatc sarveṣv evāṅgadeśeṣu na mamāra ca śatruhāa pratibuddhas tu kaunteyaḥ sarvān sarpān apothayatc sārathiṃ cāsya dayitam apahastena jaghnivāna punaḥ suptān upādhākṣīd bālakān vāraṇāvatec śayānān āryayā sārdhaṃ ko nu tat kartum arhatia yatrāryā rudatī bhītā pāṇḍavān idam abravītc mahad vyasanam āpannā śikhinā parivāritāa hā hatāsmi kuto nv adya bhavec chāntir ihānalātc anāthā vinaśiṣyāmi bālakaiḥ putrakaiḥ sahaa tatra bhīmo mahābāhur vāyuvegaparākramaḥc āryām āśvāsayām āsa bhrātṝṃś cāpi vṛkodaraḥa vainateyo yathā pakṣī garuḍaḥ patatāṃ varaḥc tathaivābhipatiṣyāmi bhayaṃ vo neha vidyatea āryām aṅkena vāmena rājānaṃ dakṣiṇena cac aṃsayoś ca yamau kṛtvā pṛṣṭhe bībhatsum eva caa sahasotpatya vegena sarvān ādāya vīryavānc bhrātṝn āryāṃ ca balavān mokṣayām āsa pāvakāta te rātrau prasthitāḥ sarve mātrā saha yaśasvinaḥc abhyagacchan mahāraṇyaṃ hiḍimbavanam antikāta śrāntāḥ prasuptās tatreme mātrā saha suduḥkhitāḥc suptāṃś cainān abhyagacchad dhiḍimbā nāma rākṣasīd sā dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavaṃ tatra śayānaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ sahad hṛcchayenābhibhūtā hi bhīmasenam akāmayata bhīmasya pādau kṛtvā tu sva utsaṅge tato balātc paryamardata saṃhṛṣṭā kalyāṇī mṛdupāṇināa tām abudhyad ameyātmā balavān satyavikramaḥc paryapṛcchac ca tāṃ bhīmaḥ kim ihecchasy anindited saivam uktā tu bhīmena rākṣasī kāmarūpiṇīd bhīmasenaṃ mahātmānam idam āha śucismitād palāyadhvam itaḥ kṣipraṃ mama bhrātā suvīryavānd āgamiṣyati vo hantuṃ tasmād gacchata māciramd atha bhīmo bhyuvācaināṃ sābhimānam idaṃ vacaḥd nodvijeyam ahaṃ tasmān nihaniṣye ham āgatamd āgataṃ pratiyotsyāmi rākṣasaṃ bhrātaraṃ tavaa tayoḥ śrutvā tu kathitam āgacchad rākṣasādhamaḥc bhīmarūpo mahānādān visṛjan bhīmadarśanaḥ athainām abravīt kruddho rākṣasaḥ puruṣādakaḥa kena sārdhaṃ kathayasi ānayainaṃ mamāntikamc hiḍimbe bhakṣayiṣyāvo na ciraṃ kartum arhasia sā kṛpāsaṃgṛhītena hṛdayena manasvinīc nainam aicchat tadākhyātum anukrośād aninditāa sa nādān vinadan ghorān rākṣasaḥ puruṣādakaḥc abhyadravata vegena bhīmasenaṃ tadā kilad tam āgatam abhiprekṣya bhīmaseno mahābalamd utthāya sahasā rakṣo nijagrāha mahābalaḥa tam abhidrutya saṃkruddho vegena mahatā balīc agṛhṇāt pāṇinā pāṇiṃ bhīmasenasya rākṣasaḥa indrāśanisamasparśaṃ vajrasaṃhananaṃ dṛḍhamc saṃhatya bhīmasenāya vyākṣipat sahasā karama gṛhītaṃ pāṇinā pāṇiṃ bhīmaseno tha rakṣasāc nāmṛṣyata mahābāhus tatrākrudhyad vṛkodaraḥa tatrāsīt tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ bhīmasenahiḍimbayoḥc sarvāstraviduṣor ghoraṃ vṛtravāsavayor ivad vikrīḍya suciraṃ bhīmo rākṣasena sahānaghad nijaghāna mahāvīryas taṃ tadā nirbalaṃ balīd talair aśanikalpaiś ca muṣṭibhiś cāhanat tadād tato bhīmo mahābāhū rūpam āsthāya vai mahatd jaghāna rākṣasaṃ kruddho vṛtraṃ devapatir yathāa hatvā hiḍimbaṃ bhīmo tha prasthito bhrātṛbhiḥ sahac hiḍimbām agrataḥ kṛtvā yasyāṃ jāto ghaṭotkacaḥa tataś ca prādravan sarve saha mātrā yaśasvinaḥc ekacakrām abhimukhāḥ saṃvṛtā brāhmaṇavrajaiḥa prasthāne vyāsa eṣāṃ ca mantrī priyahito bhavatc tato gacchann ekacakrāṃ pāṇḍavāḥ saṃśitavratāḥa tatrāpy āsādayām āsur bakaṃ nāma mahābalamc puruṣādaṃ pratibhayaṃ hiḍimbenaiva saṃmitama taṃ cāpi vinihatyograṃ bhīmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥc sahito bhrātṛbhiḥ sarvair drupadasya puraṃ yayaua labdhāham api tatraiva vasatā savyasācināc yathā tvayā jitā kṛṣṇa rukmiṇī bhīṣmakātmajāa evaṃ suyuddhe pārthena jitāhaṃ madhusūdanac svayaṃvare mahat karma kṛtvā nasukaraṃ paraiḥa evaṃ kleśaiḥ subahubhiḥ kliśyamānāḥ suduḥkhitāḥc nivasāmāryayā hīnāḥ kṛṣṇa dhaumyapuraḥsarāḥa ta ime siṃhavikrāntā vīryeṇābhyadhikāḥ paraiḥc vihīnaiḥ parikliśyantīṃ samupekṣanta māṃ kathama etādṛśāni duḥkhāni sahante durbalīyasāmc dīrghakālaṃ pradīptāni pāpānāṃ kṣudrakarmaṇāma kule mahati jātāsmi divyena vidhinā kilac pāṇḍavānāṃ priyā bhāryā snuṣā pāṇḍor mahātmanaḥa kacagraham anuprāptā sāsmi kṛṣṇa varā satīc pañcānām indrakalpānāṃ prekṣatāṃ madhusūdanaa ity uktvā prārudat kṛṣṇā mukhaṃ pracchādya pāṇināc padmakośaprakāśena mṛdunā mṛdubhāṣiṇīa stanāv apatitau pīnau sujātau śubhalakṣaṇauc abhyavarṣata pāñcālī duḥkhajair aśrubindubhiḥa cakṣuṣī parimārjantī niḥśvasantī punaḥ punaḥc bāṣpapūrṇena kaṇṭhena kruddhā vacanam abravīta naiva me patayaḥ santi na putrā madhusūdanac na bhrātaro na ca pitā naiva tvaṃ na ca bāndhavāḥa ye māṃ viprakṛtāṃ kṣudrair upekṣadhvaṃ viśokavatc na hi me śāmyate duḥkhaṃ karṇo yat prāhasat tadād caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ kṛṣṇa tvayā rakṣyāsmi nityaśaḥd saṃbandhād gauravāt sakhyāt prabhutvenaiva keśavaa athainām abravīt kṛṣṇas tasmin vīrasamāgameb draupadyās tad vacaḥ śrutvā krodhāmarṣasamanvitaḥb sāntvayaṃś ca varārohāṃ suvākyair bharatarṣabhac rodiṣyanti striyo hy evaṃ yeṣāṃ kruddhāsi bhāminia bībhatsuśarasaṃchannāñ śoṇitaughapariplutānc nihatāñ jīvitaṃ tyaktvā śayānān vasudhātaled tvaṃ śroṣyasy anavadyāṅgi duryodhanamukhān ripūna yat samarthaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ tat kariṣyāmi mā śucaḥc satyaṃ te pratijānāmi rājñāṃ rājñī bhaviṣyasia pated dyaur himavāñ śīryet pṛthivī śakalībhavetc śuṣyet toyanidhiḥ kṛṣṇe na me moghaṃ vaco bhavetd tac chrutvā draupadī vākyaṃ prativākyam athācyutātd sācīkṛtam avaikṣat sā pāñcālī madhyamaṃ patimd ābabhāṣe mahārāja draupadīm arjunas tadād mā rodīḥ śubhatāmrākṣi yad āha madhusūdanaḥd tathā tad bhavitā devi nānyathā varavarṇini dhṛṣṭadyumna uvācaa ahaṃ droṇaṃ haniṣyāmi śikhaṇḍī tu pitāmahamc duryodhanaṃ bhīmasenaḥ karṇaṃ hantā dhanaṃjayaḥd śakuniṃ tv akṣakitavaṃ mādrīputro haniṣyatia rāmakṛṣṇau vyapāśritya ajeyāḥ sma śucismitec api vṛtrahaṇā yuddhe kiṃ punar dhṛtarāṣṭrajaiḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa ity ukte bhimukhā vīrā vāsudevam upasthitāc teṣāṃ madhye mahābāhuḥ keśavo vākyam abravīt vāsudeva uvācaa nedaṃ kṛcchram anuprāpto bhavān syād vasudhādhipac yady ahaṃ dvārakāyāṃ syāṃ rājan saṃnihitaḥ purāa āgaccheyam ahaṃ dyūtam anāhūto pi kauravaiḥc āmbikeyena durdharṣa rājñā duryodhanena caa vārayeyam ahaṃ dyūtaṃ bahūn doṣān pradarśayanc bhīṣmadroṇau samānāyya kṛpaṃ bāhlīkam eva caa vaicitravīryaṃ rājānam alaṃ dyūtena kauravac putrāṇāṃ tava rājendra tvannimittam iti prabhoa tatra vakṣyāmy ahaṃ doṣān yair bhavān avaropitaḥc vīrasenasuto yaiś ca rājyāt prabhraṃśitaḥ purād puṣkareṇa narendreṇa tāñ ca vakṣyāmi tasya vaia abhakṣitavināśaṃ ca devanena viśāṃ patec sātatyaṃ ca prasaṅgasya varṇayeyaṃ yathātathama striyo kṣā mṛgayā pānam etat kāmasamutthitamc vyasanaṃ catuṣṭayaṃ proktaṃ yai rājan bhraśyate śriyaḥa tatra sarvatra vaktavyaṃ manyante śāstrakovidāḥc viśeṣataś ca vaktavyaṃ dyūte paśyanti tadvidaḥa ekāhnā dravyanāśo tra dhruvaṃ vyasanam eva cac abhuktanāśaś cārthānāṃ vākpāruṣyaṃ ca kevalama etac cānyac ca kauravya prasaṅgi kaṭukodayamc dyūte brūyāṃ mahābāho samāsādyāmbikāsutama evam ukto yadi mayā gṛhṇīyād vacanaṃ mamac anāmayaṃ syād dharmasya kurūṇāṃ kurunandanaa na cet sa mama rājendra gṛhṇīyān madhuraṃ vacaḥc pathyaṃ ca bharataśreṣṭha nigṛhṇīyāṃ balena tama athainān abhinīyaivaṃ suhṛdo nāma durhṛdaḥc sabhāsadaś ca tān sarvān bhedayeyaṃ durodarānd sarvāṃs tān anugṛhṇīma baddhvā pāśais tu vāruṇaiḥa asāṃnidhyaṃ tu kauravya mamānarteṣv abhūt tadāc yenedaṃ vyasanaṃ prāptā bhavanto dyūtakāritama so ham etya kuruśreṣṭha dvārakāṃ pāṇḍunandanac aśrauṣaṃ tvāṃ vyasaninaṃ yuyudhānād yathātathama śrutvaiva cāhaṃ rājendra paramodvignamānasaḥc tūrṇam abhyāgato smi tvāṃ draṣṭukāmo viśāṃ patea aho kṛcchram anuprāptāḥ sarve sma bharatarṣabhac ye vayaṃ tvāṃ vyasaninaṃ paśyāmaḥ saha sodaraiḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa asāṃnidhyaṃ kathaṃ kṛṣṇa tavāsīd vṛṣṇinandanac kva cāsīd vipravāsas te kiṃ vākārṣīḥ pravāsakaḥ kṛṣṇa uvācaa śālvasya nagaraṃ saubhaṃ gato haṃ bharatarṣabhac vinihantuṃ naraśreṣṭha tatra me śṛṇu kāraṇama mahātejā mahābāhur yaḥ sa rājā mahāyaśāḥc damaghoṣātmajo vīraḥ śiśupālo mayā hataḥa yajñe te bharataśreṣṭha rājasūye rhaṇāṃ pratic sa roṣavaśasaṃprāpto nāmṛṣyata durātmavāna śrutvā taṃ nihataṃ śālvas tīvraroṣasamanvitaḥc upāyād dvārakāṃ śūnyām ihasthe mayi bhārataa sa tatra yodhito rājan bālakair vṛṣṇipuṃgavaiḥc āgataḥ kāmagaṃ saubham āruhyaiva nṛśaṃsakṛtd cirajīvī nṛpaḥ so pi prasādāt padmajanmanaḥa tato vṛṣṇipravīrāṃs tān bālān hatvā bahūṃs tadāc purodyānāni sarvāṇi bhedayām āsa durmatiḥa uktavāṃś ca mahābāho kvāsau vṛṣṇikulādhamaḥc vāsudevaḥ sumandātmā vasudevasuto gataḥa tasya yuddhārthino darpaṃ yuddhe nāśayitāsmy ahamc ānartāḥ satyam ākhyāta tatra gantāsmi yatra saḥa taṃ hatvā vinivartiṣye kaṃsakeśiniṣūdanamc ahatvā na nivartiṣye satyenāyudham ālabhea kvāsau kvāsāv iti punas tatra tatra vidhāvatic mayā kila raṇe yuddhaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇaḥ sa saubharāṭa adya taṃ pāpakarmāṇaṃ kṣudraṃ viśvāsaghātinamc śiśupālavadhāmarṣād gamayiṣye yamakṣayama mama pāpasvabhāvena bhrātā yena nipātitaḥc śiśupālo mahīpālas taṃ vadhiṣye mahītalea bhrātā bālaś ca rājā ca na ca saṃgrāmamūrdhanic pramattaś ca hato vīras taṃ haniṣye janārdanama evamādi mahārāja vilapya divam āsthitaḥc kāmagena sa saubhena kṣiptvā māṃ kurunandanad gataḥ kauravya duṣṭātmā mārtikāvatiko nṛpaḥa tam aśrauṣam ahaṃ gatvā yathā vṛttaḥ sudurmatiḥc mayi kauravya duṣṭātmā mārttikāvatako nṛpaḥa tato ham api kauravya roṣavyākulalocanaḥc niścitya manasā rājan vadhāyāsya mano dadhea ānarteṣu vimardaṃ ca kṣepaṃ cātmani kauravac pravṛddham avalepaṃ ca tasya duṣkṛtakarmaṇaḥa tataḥ saubhavadhāyāhaṃ pratasthe pṛthivīpatec sa mayā sāgarāvarte dṛṣṭa āsīt parīpsatāa tataḥ pradhmāpya jalajaṃ pāñcajanyam ahaṃ nṛpac āhūya śālvaṃ samare yuddhāya samavasthitaḥa sumuhūrtam abhūd yuddhaṃ tatra me dānavaiḥ sahac vaśībhūtāś ca me sarve bhūtale ca nipātitāḥa etat kāryaṃ mahābāho yenāhaṃ nāgamaṃ tadāc śrutvaiva hāstinapuraṃ dyūtaṃ cāvinayotthitamd drutam āgatavān yuṣmān draṣṭukāmaḥ suduḥkhitānd śrutvaiva tat kṣaṇaṃ vegād āgato haṃ narādhipa yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa vāsudeva mahābāho vistareṇa mahāmatec saubhasya vadham ācakṣva na hi tṛpyāmi kathyataḥ vāsudeva uvācaa hataṃ śrutvā mahābāho mayā śrautaśravaṃ nṛpamc upāyād bharataśreṣṭha śālvo dvāravatīṃ purīma arundhat tāṃ suduṣṭātmā sarvataḥ pāṇḍunandanac śālvo vaihāyasaṃ cāpi tat puraṃ vyūhya viṣṭhitaḥa tatrastho tha mahīpālo yodhayām āsa tāṃ purīmc abhisāreṇa sarveṇa tatra yuddham avartataa purī samantād vihitā sapatākā satoraṇāc sacakrā sahuḍā caiva sayantrakhanakā tathāa sopatalpapratolīkā sāṭṭāṭṭālakagopurāc sakacagrahaṇī caiva solkālātāvapothikāa soṣṭrikā bharataśreṣṭha sabherīpaṇavānakāc samittṛṇakuśā rājan saśataghnīkalāṅgalāa sabhuśuṇḍyaśmalaguḍā sāyudhā saparaśvadhāc lohacarmavatī cāpi sāgniḥ sahuḍaśṛṅgikāa śāstradṛṣṭena vidhinā saṃyuktā bharatarṣabhac dravyair anekair vividhair gadasāmboddhavādibhiḥa puruṣaiḥ kuruśārdūla samarthaiḥ pratibādhanec abhikhyātakulair vīrair dṛṣṭavīryaiś ca saṃyugea madhyamena ca gulmena rakṣitā sārasaṃjñitāc utkṣiptagulmaiś ca tathā hayaiś caiva padātibhiḥa āghoṣitaṃ ca nagare na pātavyā sureti hac pramādaṃ parirakṣadbhir ugrasenoddhavādibhiḥa pramatteṣv abhighātaṃ hi kuryāc chālvo narādhipaḥc iti kṛtvāpramattās te sarve vṛṣṇyandhakāḥ sthitāḥa ānartāś ca tathā sarve naṭanartakagāyanāḥc bahir vivāsitāḥ sarve rakṣadbhir vittasaṃcayāna saṃkramā bheditāḥ sarve nāvaś ca pratiṣedhitāḥc parikhāś cāpi kauravya kīlaiḥ sunicitāḥ kṛtāḥa udapānāḥ kuruśreṣṭha tathaivāpy ambarīṣakāḥc samantāt krośamātraṃ ca kāritā viṣamā ca bhūḥd saṃkramā bheditāḥ sarve prākārāś ca navīkṛtāḥa prakṛtyā viṣamaṃ durgaṃ prakṛtyā ca surakṣitamc prakṛtyā cāyudhopetaṃ viśeṣeṇa tadānaghaa surakṣitaṃ suguptaṃ ca sarvāyudhasamanvitamc tat puraṃ bharataśreṣṭha yathendrabhavanaṃ tathāa na cāmudro bhiniryāti na cāmudraḥ praveśyatec vṛṣṇyandhakapure rājaṃs tadā saubhasamāgamea anu rathyāsu sarvāsu catvareṣu ca kauravac balaṃ babhūva rājendra prabhūtagajavājimata dattavetanabhaktaṃ ca dattāyudhaparicchadamc kṛtāpadānaṃ ca tadā balam āsīn mahābhujaa na kupyavetanī kaś cin na cātikrāntavetanīc nānugrahabhṛtaḥ kaś cin na cādṛṣṭaparākramaḥa evaṃ suvihitā rājan dvārakā bhūridakṣiṇaiḥc āhukena suguptā ca rājñā rājīvalocana vāsudeva uvācaa tāṃ tūpayātvā rājendra śālvaḥ saubhapatis tadāc prabhūtanaranāgena balenopaviveśa haa same niviṣṭā sā senā prabhūtasalilāśayec caturaṅgabalopetā śālvarājābhipālitāa varjayitvā śmaśānāni devatāyatanāni cac valmīkāṃś caiva caityāṃś ca tanniviṣṭam abhūd balama anīkānāṃ vibhāgena panthānaḥ ṣaṭ kṛtābhavanc pravaṇā nava caivāsañ śālvasya śibire nṛpaa sarvāyudhasamopetaṃ sarvaśastraviśāradamc rathanāgāśvakalilaṃ padātidhvajasaṃkulama tuṣṭapuṣṭajanopetaṃ vīralakṣaṇalakṣitamc vicitradhvajasaṃnāhaṃ vicitrarathakārmukama saṃniveśya ca kauravya dvārakāyāṃ nararṣabhac abhisārayām āsa tadā vegena patagendravata tadāpatantaṃ saṃdṛśya balaṃ śālvapates tadāc niryāya yodhayām āsuḥ kumārā vṛṣṇinandanāḥa asahanto bhiyānaṃ tac chālvarājasya kauravac cārudeṣṇaś ca sāmbaś ca pradyumnaś ca mahārathaḥa te rathair daṃśitāḥ sarve vicitrābharaṇadhvajāḥc saṃsaktāḥ śālvarājasya bahubhir yodhapuṃgavaiḥa gṛhītvā tu dhanuḥ sāmbaḥ śālvasya sacivaṃ raṇec yodhayām āsa saṃhṛṣṭaḥ kṣemavṛddhiṃ camūpatima tasya bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ jāmbavatyāḥ suto mahatc mumoca bharataśreṣṭha yathā varṣaṃ sahasradṛka tad bāṇavarṣaṃ tumulaṃ viṣehe sa camūpatiḥc kṣemavṛddhir mahārāja himavān iva niścalaḥa tataḥ sāmbāya rājendra kṣemavṛddhir api sma hac mumoca māyāvihitaṃ śarajālaṃ mahattarama tato māyāmayaṃ jālaṃ māyayaiva vidārya saḥc sāmbaḥ śarasahasreṇa ratham asyābhyavarṣataa tataḥ sa viddhaḥ sāmbena kṣemavṛddhiś camūpatiḥc apāyāj javanair aśvaiḥ sāmbabāṇaprapīḍitaḥa tasmin vipradrute krūre śālvasyātha camūpatauc vegavān nāma daiteyaḥ sutaṃ me bhyadravad balīa abhipannas tu rājendra sāmbo vṛṣṇikulodvahaḥc vegaṃ vegavato rājaṃs tasthau vīro vidhārayana sa vegavati kaunteya sāmbo vegavatīṃ gadāmc cikṣepa tarasā vīro vyāvidhya satyavikramaḥa tayā tv abhihato rājan vegavān apatad bhuvic vātarugṇa iva kṣuṇṇo jīrṇamūlo vanaspatiḥa tasmin nipatite vīre gadānunne mahāsurec praviśya mahatīṃ senāṃ yodhayām āsa me sutaḥa cārudeṣṇena saṃsakto vivindhyo nāma dānavaḥc mahārathaḥ samājñāto mahārāja mahādhanuḥa tataḥ sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ cārudeṣṇavivindhyayoḥc vṛtravāsavayo rājan yathā pūrvaṃ tathābhavata anyonyasyābhisaṃkruddhāv anyonyaṃ jaghnatuḥ śaraiḥc vinadantau mahārāja siṃhāv iva mahābalaua raukmiṇeyas tato bāṇam agnyarkopamavarcasamc abhimantrya mahāstreṇa saṃdadhe śatrunāśanama sa vivindhyāya sakrodhaḥ samāhūya mahārathaḥc cikṣepa me suto rājan sa gatāsur athāpatata vivindhyaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā tāṃ ca vikṣobhitāṃ camūmc kāmagena sa saubhena śālvaḥ punar upāgamata tato vyākulitaṃ sarvaṃ dvārakāvāsi tad balamc dṛṣṭvā śālvaṃ mahābāho saubhasthaṃ pṛthivīgatama tato niryāya kaunteya vyavasthāpya ca tad balamc ānartānāṃ mahārāja pradyumno vākyam abravīta sarve bhavantas tiṣṭhantu sarve paśyantu māṃ yudhic nivārayantaṃ saṃgrāme balāt saubhaṃ sarājakama ahaṃ saubhapateḥ senām āyasair bhujagair ivac dhanurbhujavinirmuktair nāśayāmy adya yādavāḥa āśvasadhvaṃ na bhīḥ kāryā saubharāḍ adya naśyatic mayābhipanno duṣṭātmā sasaubho vinaśiṣyatia evaṃ bruvati saṃhṛṣṭe pradyumne pāṇḍunandanac viṣṭhitaṃ tad balaṃ vīra yuyudhe ca yathāsukham vāsudeva uvācaa evam uktvā raukmiṇeyo yādavān bharatarṣabhac daṃśitair haribhir yuktaṃ ratham āsthāya kāñcanama ucchritya makaraṃ ketuṃ vyāttānanam alaṃkṛtamc utpatadbhir ivākāśaṃ tair hayair anvayāt parāna vikṣipan nādayaṃś cāpi dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ mahābalaḥc tūṇakhaḍgadharaḥ śūro baddhagodhāṅgulitravāna sa vidyuccalitaṃ cāpaṃ viharan vai talāt talamc mohayām āsa daiteyān sarvān saubhanivāsinaḥa nāsya vikṣipataś cāpaṃ saṃdadhānasya cāsakṛtc antaraṃ dadṛśe kaś cin nighnataḥ śātravān raṇea mukhasya varṇo na vikalpate syaceluś ca gātrāṇi na cāpi tasyac siṃhonnataṃ cāpy abhigarjato syaśuśrāva loko dbhutarūpam agryama jalecaraḥ kāñcanayaṣṭisaṃsthovyāttānanaḥ sarvatimipramāthīc vitrāsayan rājati vāhamukhyeśālvasya senāpramukhe dhvajāgryaḥa tataḥ sa tūrṇaṃ niṣpatya pradyumnaḥ śatrukarśanaḥc śālvam evābhidudrāva vidhāsyan kalahaṃ nṛpaa abhiyānaṃ tu vīreṇa pradyumnena mahāhavec nāmarṣayata saṃkruddhaḥ śālvaḥ kurukulodvahaa sa roṣamadamatto vai kāmagād avaruhya cac pradyumnaṃ yodhayām āsa śālvaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥa tayoḥ sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ śālvavṛṣṇipravīrayoḥc sametā dadṛśur lokā balivāsavayor ivaa tasya māyāmayo vīra ratho hemapariṣkṛtaḥc sadhvajaḥ sapatākaś ca sānukarṣaḥ satūṇavāna sa taṃ rathavaraṃ śrīmān samāruhya kila prabhoc mumoca bāṇān kauravya pradyumnāya mahābalaḥa tato bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ vyasṛjat tarasā raṇec pradyumno bhujavegena śālvaṃ saṃmohayann ivaa sa tair abhihataḥ saṃkhye nāmarṣayata saubharāṭc śarān dīptāgnisaṃkāśān mumoca tanaye mamad tān āpatata sic bāṇaughān sa ciccheda mahābalaḥd tataś cānyāñ śarān dīptān pracikṣepa sute mamaa sa śālvabāṇai rājendra viddho rukmiṇinandanaḥc mumoca bāṇaṃ tvarito marmabhedinam āhavea tasya varma vibhidyāśu sa bāṇo matsuteritaḥc bibheda hṛdayaṃ patrī sa papāta mumoha caa tasmin nipatite vīre śālvarāje vicetasic saṃprādravan dānavendrā dārayanto vasuṃdharāma hāhākṛtam abhūt sainyaṃ śālvasya pṛthivīpatec naṣṭasaṃjñe nipatite tadā saubhapatau nṛpaa tata utthāya kauravya pratilabhya ca cetanāmc mumoca bāṇaṃ tarasā pradyumnāya mahābalaḥa tena viddho mahābāhuḥ pradyumnaḥ samare sthitaḥc jatrudeśe bhṛśaṃ vīro vyavāsīdad rathe tadāa taṃ sa viddhvā mahārāja śālvo rukmiṇinandanamc nanāda siṃhanādaṃ vai nādenāpūrayan mahīma tato mohaṃ samāpanne tanaye mama bhāratac mumoca bāṇāṃs tvaritaḥ punar anyān durāsadāna sa tair abhihato bāṇair bahubhis tena mohitaḥc niśceṣṭaḥ kauravaśreṣṭha pradyumno bhūd raṇājire vāsudeva uvācaa śālvabāṇārdite tasmin pradyumne balināṃ varec vṛṣṇayo bhagnasaṃkalpā vivyathuḥ pṛtanāgatāḥa hāhākṛtam abhūt sārvaṃ vṛṣṇyandhakabalaṃ tadāc pradyumne patite rājan pare ca muditābhavana taṃ tathā mohitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sārathir javanair hayaiḥc raṇād apāharat tūrṇaṃ śikṣito dārukis tataḥa nātidūrāpayāte tu rathe rathavarapraṇutc dhanur gṛhītvā yantāraṃ labdhasaṃjño bravīd idama saute kiṃ te vyavasitaṃ kasmād yāsi parāṅmukhaḥc naiṣa vṛṣṇipravīrāṇām āhave dharma ucyatea kaccit saute na te mohaḥ śālvaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahāhavec viṣādo vā raṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā brūhi me tvaṃ yathātatham sūta uvācaa jānārdane na me moho nāpi me bhayam āviśatc atibhāraṃ tu te manye śālvaṃ keśavanandanaa so payāmi śanair vīra balavān eṣa pāpakṛtc mohitaś ca raṇe śūro rakṣyaḥ sārathinā rathīa āyuṣmaṃs tvaṃ mayā nityaṃ rakṣitavyas tvayāpy ahamc rakṣitavyo rathī nityam iti kṛtvāpayāmy ahama ekaś cāsi mahābāho bahavaś cāpi dānavāḥc nasamaṃ raukmiṇeyāhaṃ raṇaṃ matvāpayāmy aham vāsudeva uvācaa evaṃ bruvati sūte tu tadā makaraketumānc uvāca sūtaṃ kauravya nivartaya rathaṃ punaḥa dārukātmaja maivaṃ tvaṃ punaḥ kārṣīḥ kathaṃ canac vyapayānaṃ raṇāt saute jīvato mama karhi cita na sa vṛṣṇikule jāto yo vai tyajati saṃgaramc yo vā nipatitaṃ hanti tavāsmīti ca vādinama tathā striyaṃ vai yo hanti vṛddhaṃ bālaṃ tathaiva cac virathaṃ viprakīrṇaṃ ca bhagnaśastrāyudhaṃ tathāa tvaṃ ca sūtakule jāto vinītaḥ sūtakarmaṇic dharmajñaś cāsi vṛṣṇīnām āhaveṣv api dārukea sa jānaṃś caritaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ pṛtanāmukhec apayānaṃ punaḥ saute maivaṃ kārṣīḥ kathaṃ canaa apayātaṃ hataṃ pṛṣṭhe bhītaṃ raṇapalāyinamc gadāgrajo durādharṣaḥ kiṃ māṃ vakṣyati mādhavaḥa keśavasyāgrajo vāpi nīlavāsā madotkaṭaḥc kiṃ vakṣyati mahābāhur baladevaḥ samāgataḥa kiṃ vakṣyati śiner naptā narasiṃho mahādhanuḥc apayātaṃ raṇāt saute sāmbaś ca samitiṃjayaḥa cārudeṣṇaś ca durdharṣas tathaiva gadasāraṇauc akrūraś ca mahābāhuḥ kiṃ māṃ vakṣyati sārathea śūraṃ saṃbhāvitaṃ santaṃ nityaṃ puruṣamāninamc striyaś ca vṛṣṇīvīrāṇāṃ kiṃ māṃ vakṣyanti saṃgatāḥa pradyumno yam upāyāti bhītas tyaktvā mahāhavamc dhig enam iti vakṣyanti na tu vakṣyanti sādhv itia dhig vācā parihāso pi mama vā madvidhasya vāc mṛtyunābhyadhikaḥ saute sa tvaṃ mā vyapayāḥ punaḥa bhāraṃ hi mayi saṃnyasya yāto madhunihā hariḥc yajñaṃ bharatasiṃhasya pārthasyāmitatejasaḥa kṛtavarmā mayā vīro niryāsyann eva vāritaḥc śālvaṃ nivārayiṣye haṃ tiṣṭha tvam iti sūtajaa sa ca saṃbhāvayan māṃ vai nivṛtto hṛdikātmajaḥc taṃ sametya raṇaṃ tyaktvā kiṃ vakṣyāmi mahārathama upayātaṃ durādharṣaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharamc puruṣaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ kiṃ vakṣyāmi mahābhujama sātyakiṃ baladevaṃ ca ye cānye ndhakavṛṣṇayaḥc mayā spardhanti satataṃ kiṃ nu vakṣyāmi tān ahama tyaktvā raṇam imaṃ saute pṛṣṭhato bhyāhataḥ śaraiḥc tvayāpanīto vivaśo na jīveyaṃ kathaṃ canaa sa nivarta rathenāśu punar dārukanandanac na caitad evaṃ kartavyam athāpatsu kathaṃ canaa na jīvitam ahaṃ saute bahu manye kadā canac apayāto raṇād bhītaḥ pṛṣṭhato bhyāhataḥ śaraiḥa kadā vā sūtaputra tvaṃ jānīṣe māṃ bhayārditamc apayātaṃ raṇaṃ hitvā yathā kāpuruṣaṃ tathāa na yuktaṃ bhavatā tyaktuṃ saṃgrāmaṃ dārukātmajac mayi yuddhārthini bhṛśaṃ sa tvaṃ yāhi yato raṇam vāsudeva uvācaa evam uktas tu kaunteya sūtaputras tadā mṛdhec pradyumnam abravīc chlakṣṇaṃ madhuraṃ vākyam añjasāa na me bhayaṃ raukmiṇeya saṃgrāme yacchato hayānc yuddhajñaś cāsmi vṛṣṇīnāṃ nātra kiṃ cid ato nyathāa āyuṣmann upadeśas tu sārathye vartatāṃ smṛtaḥc sarvārtheṣu rathī rakṣyas tvaṃ cāpi bhṛśapīḍitaḥa tvaṃ hi śālvaprayuktena patriṇābhihato bhṛśamc kaśmalābhihato vīra tato ham apayātavāna sa tvaṃ sātvatamukhyādya labdhasaṃjño yadṛcchayāc paśya me hayasaṃyāne śikṣāṃ keśavanandanaa dārukeṇāham utpanno yathāvac caiva śikṣitaḥc vītabhīḥ praviśāmy etāṃ śālvasya mahatīṃ camūma evam uktvā tato vīra hayān saṃcodya saṃgarec raśmibhiś ca samudyamya javenābhyapatat tadāa maṇḍalāni vicitrāṇi yamakānītarāṇi cac savyāni ca vicitrāṇi dakṣiṇāni ca sarvaśaḥa pratodenāhatā rājan raśmibhiś ca samudyatāḥc utpatanta ivākāśaṃ vibabhus te hayottamāḥa te hastalāghavopetaṃ vijñāya nṛpa dārukimc dahyamānā iva tadā paspṛśuś caraṇair mahīma so pasavyāṃ camūṃ tasya śālvasya bharatarṣabhac cakāra nātiyatnena tad adbhutam ivābhavata amṛṣyamāṇo pasavyaṃ pradyumnena sa saubharāṭc yantāram asya sahasā tribhir bāṇaiḥ samarpayata dārukasya sutas taṃ tu bāṇavegam acintayanc bhūya eva mahābāho prayayau hayasaṃmataḥa tato bāṇān bahuvidhān punar eva sa saubharāṭc mumoca tanaye vīre mama rukmiṇinandanea tān aprāptāñ śitair bāṇaiś ciccheda paravīrahāc raukmiṇeyaḥ smitaṃ kṛtvā darśayan hastalāghavama chinnān dṛṣṭvā tu tān bāṇān pradyumnena sa saubharāṭc āsurīṃ dāruṇīṃ māyām āsthāya vyasṛjac charāna prayujyamānam ājñāya daiteyāstraṃ mahābalaḥc brahmāstreṇāntarā chittvā mumocānyān patatriṇaḥa te tad astraṃ vidhūyāśu vivyadhū rudhirāśanāḥc śirasy urasi vaktre ca sa mumoha papāta caa tasmin nipatite kṣudre śālve bāṇaprapīḍitec raukmiṇeyo paraṃ bāṇaṃ saṃdadhe śatrunāśanama tam arcitaṃ sarvadāśārhapūgairāśīrbhir arkajvalanaprakāśamc dṛṣṭvā śaraṃ jyām abhinīyamānaṃbabhūva hāhākṛtam antarikṣama tato devagaṇāḥ sarve sendrāḥ saha dhaneśvarāḥc nāradaṃ preṣayām āsuḥ śvasanaṃ ca mahābalama tau raukmiṇeyam āgamya vaco brūtāṃ divaukasāmc naiṣa vadhyas tvayā vīra śālvarājaḥ kathaṃ canaa saṃharasva punar bāṇam avadhyo yaṃ tvayā raṇec etasya hi śarasyājau nāvadhyo sti pumān kva cita mṛtyur asya mahābāho raṇe devakinandanaḥc kṛṣṇaḥ saṃkalpito dhātrā tan na mithyā bhaved itia tataḥ paramasaṃhṛṣṭaḥ pradyumnaḥ śaram uttamamc saṃjahāra dhanuḥśreṣṭhāt tūṇe caiva nyaveśayata tata utthāya rājendra śālvaḥ paramadurmanāḥc vyapāyāt sabalas tūrṇaṃ pradyumnaśarapīḍitaḥa sa dvārakāṃ parityajya krūro vṛṣṇibhir arditaḥc saubham āsthāya rājendra divam ācakrame tadā vāsudeva uvācaa ānartanagaraṃ muktaṃ tato ham agamaṃ tadāc mahākratau rājasūye nivṛtte nṛpate tavaa apaśyaṃ dvārakāṃ cāhaṃ mahārāja hatatviṣamc niḥsvādhyāyavaṣaṭkārāṃ nirbhūṣaṇavarastriyama anabhijñeyarūpāṇi dvārakopavanāni cac dṛṣṭvā śaṅkopapanno ham apṛcchaṃ hṛdikātmajama asvasthanaranārīkam idaṃ vṛṣṇipuraṃ bhṛṣamc kim idaṃ naraśārdūla śrotum icchāmahe vayama evam uktas tu sa mayā vistareṇedam abravītc rodhaṃ mokṣaṃ ca śālvena hārdikyo rājasattamaa tato haṃ kauravaśreṣṭha śrutvā sarvam aśeṣataḥc vināśe śālvarājasya tadaivākaravaṃ matima tato haṃ bharataśreṣṭha samāśvāsya pure janamc rājānam āhukaṃ caiva tathaivānakadundubhime sarvavṛṣṇipravīrāṃś ca harṣayann abruvaṃ tadāa apramādaḥ sadā kāryo nagare yādavarṣabhāḥc śālvarājavināśāya prayātaṃ māṃ nibodhataa nāhatvā taṃ nivartiṣye purīṃ dvāravatīṃ pratic saśālvaṃ saubhanagaraṃ hatvā draṣṭāsmi vaḥ punaḥe trisāmā hanyatām eṣā dundubhiḥ śatrubhīṣaṇīa te mayāśvāsitā vīrā yathāvad bharatarṣabhac sarve mām abruvan hṛṣṭāḥ prayāhi jahi śātravāna taiḥ prahṛṣṭātmabhir vīrair āśīrbhir abhinanditaḥc vācayitvā dvijaśreṣṭhān praṇamya śirasāhukama sainyasugrīvayuktena rathenānādayan diśaḥc pradhmāpya śaṅkhapravaraṃ pāñcajanyam ahaṃ nṛpaa prayāto smi naravyāghra balena mahatā vṛtaḥc kḷptena caturaṅgeṇa balena jitakāśināa samatītya bahūn deśān girīṃś ca bahupādapānc sarāṃsi saritaś caiva mārttikāvatam āsadama tatrāśrauṣaṃ naravyāghra śālvaṃ nagaram antikātc prayātaṃ saubham āsthāya tam ahaṃ pṛṣṭhato nvayāmd dṛṣṭavān asmi rājendra sālvarājam athāntikea tataḥ sāgaram āsādya kukṣau tasya mahormiṇaḥc samudranābhyāṃ śālvo bhūt saubham āsthāya śatruhand sa mām ālokya sahasā senāṃ svāṃ prāhiṇon mṛdhed madbāhunā ca senāyāṃ śiṣṭāyāṃ kiṃ cid eva caa sa samālokya dūrān māṃ smayann iva yudhiṣṭhirac āhvayām āsa duṣṭātmā yuddhāyaiva muhur muhuḥa tasya śārṅgavinirmuktair bahubhir marmabhedibhiḥc puraṃ nāsādyata śarais tato māṃ roṣa āviśata sa cāpi pāpaprakṛtir daiteyāpasado nṛpac mayy avarṣata durdharṣaḥ śaradhārāḥ sahasraśaḥa sainikān mama sūtaṃ ca hayāṃś ca samavākiratc acintayantas tu śarān vayaṃ yudhyāma bhārataa tataḥ śatasahasrāṇi śarāṇāṃ nataparvaṇāmc cikṣipuḥ samare vīrā mayi śālvapadānugāḥa te hayān me rathaṃ caiva tadā dārukam eva cac chādayām āsur asurā bāṇair marmavibhedibhiḥa na hayā na ratho vīra na yantā mama dārukaḥc adṛśyanta śaraiś channās tathāhaṃ sainikāś ca mea tato ham api kauravya śarāṇām ayutān bahūnc abhimantritānāṃ dhanuṣā divyena vidhinākṣipama na tatra viṣayas tv āsīn mama sainyasya bhāratac khe viṣaktaṃ hi tat saubhaṃ krośamātra ivābhavata tatas te prekṣakāḥ sarve raṅgavāṭa iva sthitāḥc harṣayām āsur uccair māṃ siṃhanādatalasvanaiḥa matkārmukavinirmuktā dānavānāṃ mahāraṇec aṅgeṣu rudhirāktās te viviśuḥ śalabhā ivaa tato halahalāśabdaḥ saubhamadhye vyavardhatac vadhyatāṃ viśikhais tīkṣṇaiḥ patatāṃ ca mahārṇavea te nikṛttabhujaskandhāḥ kabandhākṛtidarśanāḥc nadanto bhairavān nādan nipatanti sma dānavāḥd patitās te pi bhakṣyante samudrāmbhonivāsibhiḥa tato gokṣīrakundendumṛṇālarajataprabhamc jalajaṃ pāñcajanyaṃ vai prāṇenāham apūrayama tān dṛṣṭvā patitāṃs tatra śālvaḥ saubhapatis tadāc māyāyuddhena mahatā yodhayām āsa māṃ yudhia tato huḍahuḍāḥ prāsāḥ śaktiśūlaparaśvadhāḥb asayaḥ śaktimuśalapāśārṣṭikaṇapāḥ śarāḥc paṭṭiśāś ca bhuśuṇḍyaś ca prāpatann aniśaṃ mayia tān ahaṃ māyayaivāśu pratigṛhya vyanāśayamc tasyāṃ hatāyāṃ māyāyāṃ giriśṛṅgair ayodhayata tato bhavat tama iva prabhātam iva cābhavatc durdinaṃ sudinaṃ caiva śītam uṣṇaṃ ca bhāratad aṅgārapāṃśuvarṣaṃ ca śastravarṣaṃ ca bhārataa evaṃ māyāṃ vikurvāṇo yodhayām āsa māṃ ripuḥc vijñāya tad ahaṃ sarvaṃ māyayaiva vyanāśayamd sa mohayām āsa tadā māyayā yudhi dānavaḥd tato hatāyāṃ ca mayā māyāyāṃ yudhi dānavaḥe yathākālaṃ tu yuddhena vyadhamaṃ sarvataḥ śaraiḥa tato vyoma mahārāja śatasūryam ivābhavatc śatacandraṃ ca kaunteya sahasrāyutatārakama tato nājñāyata tadā divārātraṃ tathā diśaḥc tato haṃ moham āpannaḥ prajñāstraṃ samayojayame tatas tad astram astreṇa vidhūtaṃ śaratūlavata tathā tad abhavad yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇamc labdhālokaś ca rājendra punaḥ śatrum ayodhayam vāsudeva uvācaa evaṃ sa puruṣavyāghra śālvo rājñāṃ mahāripuḥc yudhyamāno mayā saṃkhye viyad abhyāgamat punaḥa tataḥ śataghnīś ca mahāgadāś cadīptāṃś ca śūlān musalān asīṃś cac cikṣepa roṣān mayi mandabuddhiḥśālvo mahārāja jayābhikāṅkṣīa tān āśugair āpatato ham āśunivārya tūrṇaṃ khagamān kha evac dvidhā tridhā cācchinam āśu muktaistato ntarikṣe ninado babhūvaa tataḥ śatasahasreṇa śarāṇāṃ nataparvaṇāmc dārukaṃ vājinaś caiva rathaṃ ca samavākirata tato mām abravīd vīra dāruko vihvalann ivac sthātavyam iti tiṣṭhāmi śālvabāṇaprapīḍitaḥd avasthātuṃ na śakyāmi aṅgaṃ me vyavasīdatia iti tasya niśamyāhaṃ sāratheḥ karuṇaṃ vacaḥc avekṣamāṇo yantāram apaśyaṃ śarapīḍitama na tasyorasi no mūrdhni na kāye na bhujadvayec antaraṃ pāṇḍavaśreṣṭha paśyāmi nahataṃ śaraiḥa sa tu bāṇavarotpīḍād visravaty asṛg ulbaṇamc abhivṛṣṭo yathā meghair girir gairikadhātumānd śarair nānāvidhākārair divyāstrapratimantritaiḥd astraiḥ śastraiś ca vividhaiḥ khasthā hy antarhitā apia abhīṣuhastaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā sīdantaṃ sārathiṃ raṇec astambhayaṃ mahābāho śālvabāṇaprapīḍitama atha māṃ puruṣaḥ kaś cid dvārakānilayo bravītc tvarito ratham abhyetya sauhṛdād iva bhārataa āhukasya vaco vīra tasyaiva paricārakaḥc viṣaṇṇaḥ sannakaṇṭho vai tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhiraa dvārakādhipatir vīra āha tvām āhuko vacaḥc keśaveha vijānīṣva yat tvāṃ pitṛsakho bravīta upayātvādya śālvena dvārakāṃ vṛṣṇinandanac viṣakte tvayi durdharṣa hataḥ śūrasuto balāta tad alaṃ sādhu yuddhena nivartasva janārdanac dvārakām eva rakṣasva kāryam etan mahat tavaa ity ahaṃ tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā paramadurmanāḥc niścayaṃ nādhigacchāmi kartavyasyetarasya vāa sātyakiṃ baladevaṃ ca pradyumnaṃ ca mahārathamc jagarhe manasā vīra tac chrutvā vipriyaṃ vacaḥa ahaṃ hi dvārakāyāś ca pituś ca kurunandanac teṣu rakṣāṃ samādhāya prayātaḥ saubhapātanea baladevo mahābāhuḥ kaccij jīvati śatruhāc sātyakī raukmiṇeyaś ca cārudeṣṇaś ca vīryavāne sāmbaprabhṛtayaś caivety aham āsaṃ sudurmanāḥa eteṣu hi naravyāghra jīvatsu na kathaṃ canac śakyaḥ śūrasuto hantum api vajrabhṛtā svayama hataḥ śūrasuto vyaktaṃ vyaktaṃ te ca parāsavaḥc baladevamukhāḥ sarve iti me niścitā matiḥa so haṃ sarvavināśaṃ taṃ cintayāno muhur muhuḥc suvihvalo mahārāja punaḥ śālvam ayodhayama tato paśyaṃ mahārāja prapatantam ahaṃ tadāc saubhāc chūrasutaṃ vīra tato māṃ moha āviśata tasya rūpaṃ prapatataḥ pitur mama narādhipac yayāteḥ kṣīṇapuṇyasya svargād iva mahītalama viśīrṇagalitoṣṇīṣaḥ prakīrṇāmbaramūrdhajaḥc prapatan dṛśyate ha sma kṣīṇapuṇya iva grahaḥa tataḥ śārṅgaṃ dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ karāt prapatitaṃ mamac mohāt sannaś ca kaunteya rathopastha upāviśama tato hāhākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ sainyaṃ me gatacetanamc māṃ dṛṣṭvā rathanīḍasthaṃ gatāsum iva bhārataa prasārya bāhū patataḥ prasārya caraṇāv apic rūpaṃ pitur apaśyaṃ tac chakuneḥ patato yathāa taṃ patantaṃ mahābāho śūlapaṭṭiśapāṇayaḥc abhighnanto bhṛśaṃ vīrā mama ceto vyakampayana tato muhūrtāt pratilabhya saṃjñāmahaṃ tadā vīra mahāvimardec na tatra saubhaṃ na ripuṃ na śālvaṃpaśyāmi vṛddhaṃ pitaraṃ na cāpia tato mamāsīn manasi māyeyam iti niścitamc prabuddho smi tato bhūyaḥ śataśo vikirañ śarān vāsudeva uvācaa tato haṃ bharataśreṣṭha pragṛhya ruciraṃ dhanuḥc śarair apātayaṃ saubhāc chirāṃsi vibudhadviṣāma śarāṃś cāśīviṣākārān ūrdhvagāṃs tigmatejasaḥc apraiṣaṃ śālvarājāya śārṅgamuktān suvāsasaḥa tato nādṛśyata tadā saubhaṃ kurukulodvahac antarhitaṃ māyayābhūt tato haṃ vismito bhavama atha dānavasaṃghās te vikṛtānanamūrdhajāḥc udakrośan mahārāja viṣṭhite mayi bhārataa tato straṃ śabdasāhaṃ vai tvaramāṇo mahāhavec ayojayaṃ tadvadhāya tataḥ śabda upāramata hatās te dānavāḥ sarve yaiḥ sa śabda udīritaḥc śarair ādityasaṃkāśair jvalitaiḥ śabdasādhanaiḥa tasminn uparate śabde punar evānyato bhavatc śabdo paro mahārāja tatrāpi prāharaṃ śarāna evaṃ daśa diśaḥ sarvās tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca bhāratac nādayām āsur asurās te cāpi nihatā mayāa tataḥ prāgjyotiṣaṃ gatvā punar eva vyadṛśyatac saubhaṃ kāmagamaṃ vīra mohayan mama cakṣuṣīa tato lokāntakaraṇo dānavo vānarākṛtiḥc śilāvarṣeṇa sahasā mahatā māṃ samāvṛṇota so haṃ parvatavarṣeṇa vadhyamānaḥ samantataḥc valmīka iva rājendra parvatopacito bhavama tato haṃ parvatacitaḥ sahayaḥ sahasārathiḥc aprakhyātim iyāṃ rājan sadhvajaḥ parvataiś citaḥa tato vṛṣṇipravīrā ye mamāsan sainikās tadāc te bhayārtā diśaḥ sarvāḥ sahasā vipradudruvuḥa tato hāhākṛtaṃ sarvam abhūt kila viśāṃ patec dyauś ca bhūmiś ca khaṃ caivādṛśyamāne tathā mayia tato viṣaṇṇamanaso mama rājan suhṛjjanāḥc ruruduś cukruśuś caiva duḥkhaśokasamanvitāḥa dviṣatāṃ ca praharṣo bhūd ārtiś cādviṣatām apic evaṃ vijitavān vīra paścād aśrauṣam acyutaa tato ham astraṃ dayitaṃ sarvapāṣāṇabhedanamc vajram udyamya tān sarvān parvatān samaśātayama tataḥ parvatabhārārtā mandaprāṇaviceṣṭitāḥc hayā mama mahārāja vepamānā ivābhavana meghajālam ivākāśe vidāryābhyuditaṃ ravimc dṛṣṭvā māṃ bāndhavāḥ sarve harṣam āhārayan punaḥa tato mām abravīt sūtaḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇato nṛpac sādhu saṃpaśya vārṣṇeya śālvaṃ saubhapatiṃ sthitama alaṃ kṛṣṇāvamanyainaṃ sādhu yatnaṃ samācarac mārdavaṃ sakhitāṃ caiva śālvād adya vyapāharaa jahi śālvaṃ mahābāho mainaṃ jīvaya keśavac sarvaiḥ parākramair vīra vadhyaḥ śatrur amitrahana na śatrur avamantavyo durbalo pi balīyasāc yo pi syāt pīṭhagaḥ kaś cit kiṃ punaḥ samare sthitaḥa sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla sarvayatnair imaṃ prabhoc jahi vṛṣṇikulaśreṣṭha mā tvāṃ kālo tyagāt punaḥd jitavāñ jāmadagnyaṃ yaḥ koṭivarṣagaṇān bahūnd sa eṣa nānyair vadhyo hi tvām ṛte naiva kaiś canaa naiṣa mārdavasādhyo vai mato nāpi sakhā tavac yena tvaṃ yodhito vīra dvārakā cāvamarditāa evamādi tu kaunteya śrutvāhaṃ sārather vacaḥc tattvam etad iti jñātvā yuddhe matim adhārayama vadhāya śālvarājasya saubhasya ca nipātanec dārukaṃ cābruvaṃ vīra muhūrtaṃ sthīyatām itia tato pratihataṃ divyam abhedyam ativīryavatc āgneyam astraṃ dayitaṃ sarvasāhaṃ mahāprabhamd yojayaṃ tatra dhanuṣā dānavāntakaraṃ raṇea yakṣāṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca dānavānāṃ ca saṃyugec rājñāṃ ca pratilomānāṃ bhasmāntakaraṇaṃ mahata kṣurāntam amalaṃ cakraṃ kālāntakayamopamamc abhimantryāham atulaṃ dviṣatāṃ ca nibarhaṇama jahi saubhaṃ svavīryeṇa ye cātra ripavo mamac ity uktvā bhujavīryeṇa tasmai prāhiṇavaṃ ruṣāa rūpaṃ sudarśanasyāsīd ākāśe patatas tadāc dvitīyasyeva sūryasya yugānte pariviṣyataḥa tat samāsādya nagaraṃ saubhaṃ vyapagatatviṣamc madhyena pāṭayām āsa krakaco dārv ivocchritama dvidhā kṛtaṃ tataḥ saubhaṃ sudarśanabalād dhatamc maheśvaraśaroddhūtaṃ papāta tripuraṃ yathāa tasmin nipatite saubhe cakram āgāt karaṃ mamac punaś coddhūya vegena śālvāyety aham abruvama tataḥ śālvaṃ gadāṃ gurvīm āvidhyantaṃ mahāhavec dvidhā cakāra sahasā prajajvāla ca tejasāa tasmin nipatite vīre dānavās trastacetasaḥc hāhābhūtā diśo jagmur arditā mama sāyakaiḥa tato haṃ samavasthāpya rathaṃ saubhasamīpataḥc śaṅkhaṃ pradhmāpya harṣeṇa suhṛdaḥ paryaharṣayama tan meruśikharākāraṃ vidhvastāṭṭālagopuramc dahyamānam abhiprekṣya striyas tāḥ saṃpradudruvuḥa evaṃ nihatya samare śālvaṃ saubhaṃ nipātya cac ānartān punar āgamya suhṛdāṃ prītim āvahama etasmāt kāraṇād rājan nāgamaṃ nāgasāhvayamc yady agāṃ paravīraghna na hi jīvet suyodhanaḥd mayy āgate thavā vīra dyūtaṃ na bhavitā tathād adyāhaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi bhinnasetur ivodakam vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa evam uktvā mahābāhuḥ kauravaṃ puruṣottamaḥc āmantrya prayayau dhīmān pāṇḍavān madhusūdanaḥa abhivādya mahābāhur dharmarājaṃ yudhiṣṭhiramc rājñā mūrdhany upāghrāto bhīmena ca mahābhujaḥd pariṣvaktaś cārjunena yamābhyāṃ cābhivāditaḥd saṃmānitaś ca dhaumyena draupadyā cārcito śrubhiḥa subhadrām abhimanyuṃ ca ratham āropya kāñcanamc āruroha rathaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pāṇḍavair abhipūjitaḥa sainyasugrīvayuktena rathenādityavarcasāc dvārakāṃ prayayau kṛṣṇaḥ samāśvāsya yudhiṣṭhirama tataḥ prayāte dāśārhe dhṛṣṭadyumno pi pārṣataḥc draupadeyān upādāya prayayau svapuraṃ tadāa dhṛṣṭaketuḥ svasāraṃ ca samādāyātha cedirāṭc jagāma pāṇḍavān dṛṣṭvā ramyāṃ śuktimatīṃ purīma kekayāś cāpy
