arhasi nala uvācaa na me parādhaṃ kṛtavāṃs tvaṃ svalpam api pārthivac kṛte pi ca na me kopaḥ kṣantavyaṃ hi mayā tavaa pūrvaṃ hy asi sakhā me si saṃbandhī ca narādhipac ata ūrdhvaṃ tu bhūyas tvaṃ prītim āhartum arhasid ata ūrdhvaṃ tu bhūyas tvaṃ prītimān kṣantum arhasia sarvakāmaiḥ suvihitaḥ sukham asmy uṣitas tvayic na tathā svagṛhe rājan yathā tava gṛhe sadāa idaṃ caiva hayajñānaṃ tvadīyaṃ mayi tiṣṭhatic tad upākartum icchāmi manyase yadi pārthiva bṛhadaśva uvācaa evam uktvā dadau vidyām ṛtuparṇāya naiṣadhaḥc sa ca tāṃ pratijagrāha vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇāa tato gṛhyāśvahṛdayaṃ tadā bhāṅgasvarir nṛpaḥb niṣadhādhipateś cāpi datvākṣahṛdayaṃ nṛpaḥc sūtam anyam upādāya yayau svapuram eva hia ṛtuparṇe pratigate nalo rājā viśāṃ patec nagare kuṇḍine kālaṃ nātidīrgham ivāvasat bṛhadaśva uvācaa sa māsam uṣya kaunteya bhīmam āmantrya naiṣadhaḥc purād alpaparīvāro jagāma niṣadhān pratia rathenaikena śubhreṇa dantibhiḥ pariṣoḍaśaiḥc pañcāśadbhir hayaiś caiva ṣaṭśataiś ca padātibhiḥa sa kampayann iva mahīṃ tvaramāṇo mahīpatiḥc praviveśātisaṃrabdhas tarasaiva mahāmanāḥa tataḥ puṣkaram āsādya vīrasenasuto nalaḥc uvāca dīvyāva punar bahu vittaṃ mayārjitama damayantī ca yac cānyan mayā vasu samarjitamc eṣa vai mama saṃnyāsas tava rājyaṃ tu puṣkaraa punaḥ pravartatāṃ dyūtam iti me niścitā matiḥc ekapāṇena bhadraṃ te prāṇayoś ca paṇāvahea jitvā parasvam āhṛtya rājyaṃ vā yadi vā vasuc pratipāṇaḥ pradātavyaḥ paraṃ hi dhanam ucyatea na ced vāñchasi tad dyūtaṃ yuddhadyūtaṃ pravartatāmc dvairathenāstu vai śāntis tava vā mama vā nṛpaa vaṃśabhojyam idaṃ rājyaṃ mārgitavyaṃ yathā tathāc yena tenāpy upāyena vṛddhānām iti śāsanama dvayor ekatare buddhiḥ kriyatām adya puṣkarac kaitavenākṣavatyāṃ vā yuddhe vā namyatāṃ dhanuḥa naiṣadhenaivam uktas tu puṣkaraḥ prahasann ivac dhruvam ātmajayaṃ matvā pratyāha pṛthivīpatima diṣṭyā tvayārjitaṃ vittaṃ pratipāṇāya naiṣadhac diṣṭyā ca duṣkṛtaṃ karma damayantyāḥ kṣayaṃ gatame diṣṭyā ca dhriyase rājan sadāro rinibarhaṇaf punar dyūte ca te buddhir diṣṭyā puruṣasattamaa dhanenānena vaidarbhī jitena samalaṃkṛtāc mām upasthāsyati vyaktaṃ divi śakram ivāpsarāḥa nityaśo hi smarāmi tvāṃ pratīkṣāmi ca naiṣadhac devane ca mama prītir na bhavaty asuhṛdgaṇaiḥa jitvā tv adya varārohāṃ damayantīm aninditāmc kṛtakṛtyo bhaviṣyāmi sā hi me nityaśo hṛdia śrutvā tu tasya tā vāco bahvabaddhapralāpinaḥc iyeṣa sa śiraś chettuṃ khaḍgena kupito nalaḥa smayaṃs tu roṣatāmrākṣas tam uvāca tato nṛpaḥc paṇāvaḥ kiṃ vyāharase jitvā vai vyāhariṣyasia tataḥ prāvartata dyūtaṃ puṣkarasya nalasya cac ekapāṇena bhadraṃ te nalena sa parājitaḥe saratnakośanicayaḥ prāṇena paṇito pi caa jitvā ca puṣkaraṃ rājā prahasann idam abravītc mama sarvam idaṃ rājyam avyagraṃ hatakaṇṭakama vaidarbhī na tvayā śakyā rājāpasada vīkṣitumc tasyās tvaṃ saparīvāro mūḍha dāsatvam āgataḥa na tat tvayā kṛtaṃ karma yenāhaṃ nirjitaḥ purāc kalinā tat kṛtaṃ karma tvaṃ tu mūḍha na budhyasee nāhaṃ parakṛtaṃ doṣaṃ tvayy ādhāsye kathaṃ canaa yathāsukhaṃ tvaṃ jīvasva prāṇān abhyutsṛjāmi teb tathaiva sarvasaṃbhāraṃ svam aṃśaṃ vitarāmi tec tathaiva ca mama prītis tvayi vīra na saṃśayaḥa saubhrātraṃ caiva me tvatto na kadā cit prahāsyatic puṣkara tvaṃ hi me bhrātā saṃjīvasva śataṃ samāḥa evaṃ nalaḥ sāntvayitvā bhrātaraṃ satyavikramaḥc svapuraṃ preṣayām āsa pariṣvajya punaḥ punaḥa sāntvito naiṣadhenaivaṃ puṣkaraḥ pratyuvāca tamc puṇyaślokaṃ tadā rājann abhivādya kṛtāñjaliḥa kīrtir astu tavākṣayyā jīva varṣāyutaṃ sukhīc yo me vitarasi prāṇān adhiṣṭhānaṃ ca pārthivaa sa tathā satkṛto rājñā māsam uṣya tadā nṛpaḥc prayayau svapuraṃ hṛṣṭaḥ puṣkaraḥ svajanāvṛtaḥa mahatyā senayā rājan vinītaiḥ paricārakaiḥc bhrājamāna ivādityo vapuṣā puruṣarṣabhaa prasthāpya puṣkaraṃ rājā vittavantam anāmayamc praviveśa puraṃ śrīmān atyartham upaśobhitame praviśya sāntvayām āsa paurāṃś ca niṣadhādhipaḥf paurā jānapadāś cāpi saṃprahṛṣṭatanūruhāḥf ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve sāmātyapramukhā janāḥf adya sma nirvṛtā rājan pure janapade pi caf upāsituṃ punaḥ prāptā devā iva śatakratumf āśvāsayat tadāmātyān sarvāñ jānapadāṃs tadāf hiteṣu caiṣāṃ satataṃ pitevāvahito bhavat bṛhadaśva uvācaa praśānte tu pure hṛṣṭe saṃpravṛtte mahotsavec mahatyā senayā rājā damayantīm upānayatd puṇyaślokaṃ tu rājyasthaṃ śrutvā bhīmo mahīpatiḥd mudā paramayā yukto babhūva bharatarṣabhad atha hṛṣṭamanā rājā mahatyā senayā sahad sutāṃ prasthāpayām āsa puṇyaślokāya dhīmatea damayantīm api pitā satkṛtya paravīrahāc prasthāpayad ameyātmā bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥa āgatāyāṃ tu vaidarbhyāṃ saputrāyāṃ nalo nṛpaḥc vartayām āsa mudito devarāḍ iva nandanea tathā prakāśatāṃ yāto jambūdvīpe tha rājasuc punaḥ sve cāvasad rājye pratyāhṛtya mahāyaśāḥa īje ca vividhair yajñair vidhivat svāptadakṣiṇaiḥc tathā tvam api rājendra sasuhṛd vakṣyase cirāta duḥkham etādṛśaṃ prāpto nalaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥc devanena naraśreṣṭha sabhāryo bharatarṣabhaa ekākinaiva sumahan nalena pṛthivīpatec duḥkham āsāditaṃ ghoraṃ prāptaś cābhyudayaḥ punaḥa tvaṃ punar bhrātṛsahitaḥ kṛṣṇayā caiva pāṇḍavac ramase smin mahāraṇye dharmam evānucintayana brāhmaṇaiś ca mahābhāgair vedavedāṅgapāragaiḥc nityam anvāsyase rājaṃs tatra kā paridevanād akṣāṇāṃ hṛdaye prāpte ṛtuparṇasya saṃnidhaud nalena yācitaṃ rājñā kalinā ca pratiśrutamd karkoṭakasya nāgasya damayantyā nalasya cad ṛtuparṇasya rājarṣeḥ kīrtanaṃ kalināśanama itihāsam imaṃ cāpi kalināśanam ucyateb ya idaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ ya idaṃ śṛṇuyān naraḥb na tasya vidyate rājan bhayaṃ vai kalikārakamb dharmanityasya yuktasya sadārjavaratasya cab dāntasya ca vadānyasya kaliḥ puṃsaḥ karoti kimc śakyam āśvāsituṃ śrutvā tvadvidhena viśāṃ pated idam evānyad atraiva vyāsena parikīrtitamd kalinā ca nṛpe dattaṃ rājan varam anuttamamd akṣāṇāṃ hṛdaye prāpte ṛtuparṇasya saṃnidhaud nalena paṭhitaḥ ślokaḥ kalināśāya bhārataa asthiratvaṃ ca saṃcintya puruṣārthasya nityadāc tasyāye ca vyaye caiva samāśvasihi mā śucaḥc   na cintayitum arhasic śrutvetihāsaṃ nṛpated vyasane tvaṃ mahārāja na viṣīditum arhasid viṣamāvasthite daive pauruṣe phalatāṃ gated viṣādayanti nātmānaṃ sattvāpāśrayiṇo budhāḥa ye cedaṃ kathayiṣyanti nalasya caritaṃ mahatc śroṣyanti cāpy abhīkṣṇaṃ vai nālakṣmīs tān bhajiṣyatie arthās tasyopapatsyante dhanyatāṃ ca gamiṣyatia itihāsam imaṃ śrutvā purāṇaṃ śaśvad uttamamc putrān pautrān paśūṃś caiva vetsyate nṛṣu cāgryatāme arogaḥ prītimāṃś caiva bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥa bhayaṃ paśyasi yac ca tvam āhvayiṣyati māṃ punaḥc akṣajña iti tat te haṃ nāśayiṣyāmi pārthivaa vedākṣahṛdayaṃ kṛtsnam ahaṃ satyaparākramab upapadyati mattaś ca bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥc upapadyasva kaunteya prasanno haṃ bravīmi te vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tato hṛṣṭamanā rājā bṛhadaśvam uvāca hac bhagavann akṣahṛdayaṃ jñātum icchāmi tattvataḥd kaunteyenaivam uktas tu bṛhadaśvo mahāmuniḥa tato kṣahṛdayaṃ prādāt pāṇḍavāya mahātmaneb labdhvā ca pāṇḍavo rājā viśokaḥ samapadyatab kathām evaṃ tathā kṛtvā nalasya caritāśrayāmb āmantrya pāṇḍavān sarvān bṛhadaśvo jagāma hac dattvā cāśvaśiro gacchad upaspraṣṭuṃ mahātapāḥa bṛhadaśve gate pārtham aśrauṣīt savyasācinamc vartamānaṃ tapasy ugre vāyubhakṣaṃ manīṣiṇama brāhmaṇebhyas tapasvibhyaḥ saṃpatadbhyas tatas tataḥc tīrthaśailavarebhyaś ca sametebhyo dṛḍhavrataḥa iti pārtho mahābāhur durāpaṃ tapa āsthitaḥc na tathā dṛṣṭapūrvo nyaḥ kaś cid ugratapā itia yathā dhanaṃjayaḥ pārthas tapasvī niyatavrataḥc munir ekacaraḥ śrīmān dharmo vigrahavān ivaa taṃ śrutvā pāṇḍavo rājaṃs tapyamānaṃ mahāvanec anvaśocata kaunteyaḥ priyaṃ vai bhrātaraṃ jayama dahyamānena tu hṛdā śaraṇārthī mahāvanec brāhmaṇān vividhajñānān paryapṛcchad yudhiṣṭhiraḥd pratigṛhyākṣahṛdayaṃ kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥd āsīd dhṛṣṭamanā rājan bhīmasenādibhir yutaḥd svabhrātṝn sahitān paśyan kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥd apaśyann arjunaṃ tatra babhūvāśrupariplutaḥd saṃtapyamānaḥ kaunteyo bhīmasenam uvāca had kadā drakṣyāmi vai bhīma pārtham atra tavānujamd matkṛte hi kuruśreṣṭhas tapyate duścaraṃ tapaḥd tasyākṣahṛdayajñānam ākhyāsyāmi kadā nv ahamd sa hi śrutvākṣahṛdayaṃ samupāttaṃ mayā vibhod prahṛṣṭaḥ puruṣavyāghro bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ janamejaya uvāca vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca tīrthānāṃ caiva māhātmyaṃ pulastyenābhibhāṣitān kadā cit tīrthayātrāyāṃ nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ tīrthāni paryaṭaṃs tatra yudhiṣṭhiram upāgamat vinayāvanato bhūtvā paryapṛcchad yudhiṣṭhiraḥ nārada uvāca tīrthābhidhānaṃ puṇyaṃ ca nāradāya mahātmane pulastya uvāca tat te haṃ kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu dharmabhṛtāṃ varaa bhagavan kāmyakāt pārthe gate me prapitāmahec pāṇḍavāḥ kim akurvanta tam ṛte savyasācinama sa hi teṣāṃ maheṣvāso gatir āsīd anīkajitc ādityānāṃ yathā viṣṇus tathaiva pratibhāti mec   rudrāṇāṃ caiva śaṃkaraḥc tridaśānāṃ mahendraś caa tenendrasamavīryeṇa saṃgrāmeṣv anivartināc vinābhūtā vane vīrāḥ katham āsan pitāmahāḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa gate tu kāmyakāt tāta pāṇḍave savyasācinic babhūvuḥ kauraveyās te duḥkhaśokaparāyaṇāḥa ākṣiptasūtrā maṇayaś chinnapakṣā iva dvijāḥc aprītamanasaḥ sarve babhūvur atha pāṇḍavāḥa vanaṃ ca tad abhūt tena hīnam akliṣṭakarmaṇāc kubereṇa yathā hīnaṃ vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ tathāa tam ṛte puruṣavyāghraṃ pāṇḍavā janamejayac mudam aprāpnuvanto vai kāmyake nyavasaṃs tadāa brāhmaṇārthe parākrāntāḥ śuddhair bāṇair mahārathāḥc nighnanto bharataśreṣṭha medhyān bahuvidhān mṛgāna nityaṃ hi puruṣavyāghrā vanyāhāram ariṃdamāḥc viprasṛtya samāhṛtya brāhmaṇebhyo nyavedayana evaṃ te nyavasaṃs tatra sotkaṇṭhāḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥc ahṛṣṭamanasaḥ sarve gate rājan dhanaṃjayea atha viproṣitaṃ vīraṃ pāñcālī madhyamaṃ patimc smarantī pāṇḍavaśreṣṭham idaṃ vacanam abravīta yo rjunenārjunas tulyo dvibāhur bahubāhunāc tam ṛte pāṇḍavaśreṣṭhaṃ vanaṃ na pratibhāti mee śūnyām iva ca paśyāmi tatra tatra mahīm imāmf vinā tena mahīnātha śakrapratimatejasāa bahvāścaryam idaṃ cāpi vanaṃ kusumitadrumamc na tathā ramaṇīyaṃ me tam ṛte savyasācinama nīlāmbudasamaprakhyaṃ mattamātaṅgavikramamc tam ṛte puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ kāmyakaṃ nātibhāti mea yasya sma dhanuṣo ghoṣaḥ śrūyate śaninisvanaḥc na labhe śarma taṃ rājan smarantī savyasācinama tathā lālapyamānāṃ tāṃ niśamya paravīrahāc bhīmaseno mahārāja draupadīm idam abravīta manaḥprītikaraṃ bhadre yad bravīṣi sumadhyamec tan me prīṇāti hṛdayam amṛtaprāśanopamama yasya dīrghau samau pīnau bhujau parighasaṃnibhauc maurvīkṛtakiṇau vṛttau khaḍgāyudhagadādharaua niṣkāṅgadakṛtāpīḍau pañcaśīrṣāv ivoragauc tam ṛte puruṣavyāghraṃ naṣṭasūryam idaṃ vanama yam āśritya mahābāhuṃ pāñcālāḥ kuravas tathāc surāṇām api yattānāṃ pṛtanāsu na bibhyatia yasya bāhū samāśritya vayaṃ sarve mahātmanaḥc manyāmahe jitān ājau parān prāptāṃ ca medinīma tam ṛte phalgunaṃ vīraṃ na labhe kāmyake dhṛtimc śūnyām iva ca paśyāmi tatra tatra mahīm imāmd paśyāmi ca diśaḥ sarvās timireṇāvṛtā ivad tato bravīt sāśrukaṇṭho nakulaḥ pāṇḍunandanaḥ nakula uvācaa ya udīcīṃ diśaṃ gatvā jitvā yudhi mahābalānc gandharvamukhyāñ śataśo hayāṃl lebhe sa vāsaviḥd yasmin divyāni karmāṇi kathayanti raṇājired devā api yudhāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tam ṛte kā ratir vanea rājaṃs tittirikalmāṣāñ śrīmān anilaraṃhasaḥc prādād bhrātre priyaḥ premṇā rājasūye mahākrataua tam ṛte bhīmadhanvānaṃ bhīmād avarajaṃ vanec kāmaye kāmyake vāsaṃ nedānīm amaropamam sahadeva uvācaa yo dhanāni ca kanyāś ca yudhi jitvā mahārathānc ājahāra purā rājñe rājasūye mahākrataua yaḥ sametān mṛdhe jitvā yādavān amitadyutiḥc subhadrām ājahāraiko vāsudevasya saṃmated yenārdharājyam ācchidya drupadasya mahātmanaḥd ācāryadakṣiṇā dattā guror droṇasya bhārataa tasya jiṣṇor bṛsīṃ dṛṣṭvā śūnyām upaniveśanec hṛdayaṃ me mahārāja na śāmyati kadā canaa vanād asmād vivāsaṃ tu rocaye ham ariṃdamac na hi nas tam ṛte vīraṃ ramaṇīyam idaṃ vanam vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa dhanaṃjayotsukās te tu vane tasmin mahārathāḥc nyavasanta mahābhāgā draupadyā saha pāṇḍavāḥd dhanaṃjayotsukānāṃ tu bhrātṝṇāṃ kṛṣṇayā sahad śrutvā vākyāni vimanā dharmarājo py ajāyataa athāpaśyan mahātmānaṃ devarṣiṃ tatra nāradamc dīpyamānaṃ śriyā brāhmyā dīptāgnisamatejasamd tam āgatam abhiprekṣya bhrātṛbhiḥ saha dharmarāṭd pratyutthāya yathānyāyaṃ pūjāṃ cakre mahātmanea sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ śrīmān bhrātṛbhiḥ kurusattamaḥc vibabhāv atidīptaujā devair iva śatakratuḥa yathā ca vedān sāvitrī yājñasenī tathā satīc na jahau dharmataḥ pārthān merum arkaprabhā yathād arghyaṃ pādyam athānīya tv abhyavādayad acyutamd nāradas tu mahātejāḥ svasty astv ity abhyabhāṣatad tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā dṛṣṭvā devarṣisattamamd yathārhaṃ pūjayām āsa vidhivat kurunandanaḥa pratigṛhya tu tāṃ pūjāṃ nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥc āśvāsayad dharmasutaṃ yuktarūpam ivānaghaa uvāca ca mahātmānaṃ dharmarājaṃ yudhiṣṭhiramc brūhi dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha kenārthaḥ kiṃ dadāmi tea atha dharmasuto rājā praṇamya bhrātṛbhiḥ sahac uvāca prāñjalir vākyaṃ nāradaṃ devasaṃmitama tvayi tuṣṭe mahābhāga sarvalokābhipūjitec kṛtam ity eva manye haṃ prasādāt tava suvrataa yadi tv aham anugrāhyo bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito naghac saṃdehaṃ me muniśreṣṭha hṛdisthaṃ chettum arhasia pradakṣiṇaṃ yaḥ kurute pṛthivīṃ tīrthatatparaḥc kiṃ phalaṃ tasya kārtsnyena tad brahman vaktum arhasi nārada uvācaa śṛṇu rājann avahito yathā bhīṣmeṇa bhāratac pulastyasya sakāśād vai sarvam etad upaśrutama purā bhāgīrathītīre bhīṣmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥc pitryaṃ vrataṃ samāsthāya nyavasan munivat tadāa śubhe deśe mahārāja puṇye devarṣisevitec gaṅgādvāre mahātejā devagandharvasevitea sa pitṝṃs tarpayām āsa devāṃś ca paramadyutiḥc ṛṣīṃś ca toṣayām āsa vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇāa kasya cit tv atha kālasya japann eva mahātapāḥc dadarśādbhutasaṃkāśaṃ pulastyam ṛṣisattamama sa taṃ dṛṣṭvogratapasaṃ dīpyamānam iva śriyāc praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe vismayaṃ ca paraṃ yayaua upasthitaṃ mahārāja pūjayām āsa bhāratac bhīṣmo dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭho vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇāa śirasā cārghyam ādāya śuciḥ prayatamānasaḥc nāma saṃkīrtayām āsa tasmin brahmarṣisattamea bhīṣmo ham asmi bhadraṃ te dāso smi tava suvratac tava saṃdarśanād eva mukto haṃ sarvakilbiṣaiḥa evam uktvā mahārāja bhīṣmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥc vāgyataḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā tūṣṇīm āsīd yudhiṣṭhiraa taṃ dṛṣṭvā niyamenātha svādhyāyāmnāyakarśitamb tataḥ sa madhureṇātha svareṇa sumahātapāḥb uvāca vākyaṃ dharmajñaḥ pulastyaḥ prītamānasaḥc bhīṣmaṃ kurukulaśreṣṭhaṃ muniḥ prītamanābhavat pulastya uvācaa anena tava dharmajña praśrayeṇa damena cac satyena ca mahābhāga tuṣṭo smi tava sarvaśaḥa yasyedṛśas te dharmo yaṃ pitṛbhaktyāśrito naghac tena paśyasi māṃ putra prītiś cāpi mama tvayia amoghadarśī bhīṣmāhaṃ brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi tec yad vakṣyasi kuruśreṣṭha tasya dātāsmi te nagha bhīṣma uvācaa prīte tvayi mahābhāga sarvalokābhipūjitec kṛtam ity eva manye haṃ yad ahaṃ dṛṣṭavān prabhuma yadi tv aham anugrāhyas tava dharmabhṛtāṃ varac vakṣyāmi hṛtsthaṃ saṃdehaṃ tan me tvaṃ vaktum arhasia asti me bhagavan kaś cit tīrthebhyo dharmasaṃśayaḥc tam ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi pṛthak saṃkīrtitaṃ tvayāa pradakṣiṇaṃ yaḥ pṛthivīṃ karoty amitavikramac kiṃ phalaṃ tasya viprarṣe tan me brūhi tapodhana pulastya uvācaa hanta te haṃ pravakṣyāmi yad ṛṣīṇāṃ parāyaṇamc tad ekāgramanās tāta śṛṇu tīrtheṣu yat phalama yasya hastau ca pādau ca manaś caiva susaṃyatamc vidyā tapaś ca kīrtiś ca sa tīrthaphalam aśnutea pratigrahād upāvṛttaḥ saṃtuṣṭo niyataḥ śuciḥc ahaṃkāranivṛttaś ca sa tīrthaphalam aśnutea akalkako nirārambho laghv āhāro jitendriyaḥc vimuktaḥ sarvadoṣair yaḥ sa tīrthaphalam aśnutea akrodhanaś ca rājendra satyaśīlo dṛḍhavrataḥc ātmopamaś ca bhūteṣu sa tīrthaphalam aśnutea ṛṣibhiḥ kratavaḥ proktā vedeṣv iha yathākramamc phalaṃ caiva yathātattvaṃ pretya ceha ca sarvaśaḥa na te śakyā daridreṇa yajñāḥ prāptuṃ mahīpatec bahūpakaraṇā yajñā nānāsaṃbhāravistarāḥa prāpyante pārthivair ete samṛddhair vā naraiḥ kva citc nārthanyūnopakaraṇair ekātmabhir asaṃhataiḥa yo daridrair api vidhiḥ śakyaḥ prāptuṃ nareśvarac tulyo yajñaphalaiḥ puṇyais taṃ nibodha yudhāṃ varaa ṛṣīṇāṃ paramaṃ guhyam idaṃ bharatasattamac tīrthābhigamanaṃ puṇyaṃ yajñair api viśiṣyatea anupoṣya trirātrāṇi tīrthāny anabhigamya cac adattvā kāñcanaṃ gāś ca daridro nāma jāyatea agniṣṭomādibhir yajñair iṣṭvā vipuladakṣiṇaiḥc na tat phalam avāpnoti tīrthābhigamanena yata nṛloke devadevasya tīrthaṃ trailokyaviśrutamc puṣkaraṃ nāma vikhyātaṃ mahābhāgaḥ samāviśeta daśa koṭisahasrāṇi tīrthānāṃ vai mahīpatec sāṃnidhyaṃ puṣkare yeṣāṃ trisaṃdhyaṃ kurunandanaa ādityā vasavo rudrāḥ sādhyāś ca samarudgaṇāḥc gandharvāpsarasaś caiva nityaṃ saṃnihitā vibhoa yatra devās tapas taptvā daityā brahmarṣayas tathāb tapoviśeṣair bahubhiḥ sthānāny āpur mahaujasaḥc divyayogā mahārāja puṇyena mahatānvitāḥa manasāpy abhikāmasya puṣkarāṇi manasvinaḥc pūyante sarvapāpāni nākapṛṣṭhe ca pūjyatea tasmiṃs tīrthe mahābhāga nityam eva pitāmahaḥc uvāsa paramaprīto devadānavasaṃmataḥa puṣkareṣu mahābhāga devāḥ sarṣipurogamāḥc siddhiṃ samabhisaṃprāptāḥ puṇyena mahatānvitāḥa tatrābhiṣekaṃ yaḥ kuryāt pitṛdevārcane rataḥc aśvamedhaṃ daśaguṇaṃ pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥa apy ekaṃ bhojayed vipraṃ puṣkarāraṇyam āśritaḥc tenāsau karmaṇā bhīṣma pretya ceha ca modatea śākamūlaphalair vāpi yena vartayate svayamc tad vai dadyād brāhmaṇāya śraddhāvān anasūyakaḥe tenaiva prāpnuyāt prājño hayamedhaphalaṃ naraḥf api cāpy udapātreṇa brāhmaṇān svasti vācayetf tenāpi pūjanenāhuḥ pretyānantyāya kalpatea brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdro vā rājasattamac na viyoniṃ vrajanty ete snātās tīrthe mahātmanaḥa kārttikyāṃ tu viśeṣeṇa yo bhigaccheta puṣkaramc phalaṃ tatrākṣayaṃ tasya vardhate bharatarṣabhaa sāyaṃ prātaḥ smared yas tu puṣkarāṇi kṛtāñjaliḥc upaspṛṣṭaṃ bhavet tena sarvatīrtheṣu bhāratae prāpnuyāc ca naro lokān brahmaṇaḥ sadane kṣayāna janmaprabhṛti yat pāpaṃ striyo vā puruṣasya vāc puṣkare snātamātrasya sarvam eva praṇaśyatia yathā surāṇāṃ sarveṣām ādis tu madhusūdanaḥc tathaiva puṣkaraṃ rājaṃs tīrthānām ādir ucyatea uṣya dvādaśa varṣāṇi puṣkare niyataḥ śuciḥc kratūn sarvān avāpnoti brahmalokaṃ ca gacchatia yas tu varṣaśataṃ pūrṇam agnihotram upāsatec kārttikīṃ vā vased ekāṃ puṣkare samam eva tatd trīṇi śṛṅgāṇi śubhrāṇi trīṇi prasravaṇāni cad puṣkarāṇyādisiddhāni na vidmas tatra kāraṇama duṣkaraṃ puṣkaraṃ gantuṃ duṣkaraṃ puṣkare tapaḥc duṣkaraṃ puṣkare dānaṃ vastuṃ caiva suduṣkarama uṣya dvādaśarātraṃ tu niyato niyatāśanaḥc pradakṣiṇam upāvṛtto jambūmārgaṃ samāviśeta jambūmārgaṃ samāviśya devarṣipitṛsevitamc aśvamedham avāpnoti viṣṇulokaṃ ca gacchatia tatroṣya rajanīḥ pañca ṣaṣṭhakālakṣamī naraḥc na durgatim avāpnoti siddhiṃ prāpnoti cottamāma jambūmārgād upāvṛtto gacchet taṇḍulikāśramamc na durgatim avāpnoti svargaloke ca pūjyatea agastyasara āsādya pitṛdevārcane rataḥc trirātropoṣito rājann agniṣṭomaphalaṃ labheta śākavṛttiḥ phalair vāpi kaumāraṃ vindate padamc kaṇvāśramaṃ samāsādya śrījuṣṭaṃ lokapūjitama dharmāraṇyaṃ hi tat puṇyam ādyaṃ ca bharatarṣabhac yatra praviṣṭamātro vai pāpebhyo vipramucyatea arcayitvā pitṝn devān niyato niyatāśanaḥc sarvakāmasamṛddhasya yajñasya phalam aśnutea pradakṣiṇaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā yayātipatanaṃ vrajetc hayamedhasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoti tatra vaia mahākālaṃ tato gacchen niyato niyatāśanaḥc koṭitīrtham upaspṛśya hayamedhaphalaṃ labheta tato gaccheta dharmajña puṇyasthānam umāpateḥc nāmnā bhadravaṭaṃ nāma triṣu lokeṣu viśrutama tatrābhigamya ceśānaṃ gosahasraphalaṃ labhetc mahādevaprasādāc ca gāṇapatyam avāpnuyātd samṛddham asapatnaṃ ca śriyā yuktaṃ narottamad rājñaś caivādhipatyaṃ hi tatra gatvā samāpnuyāta narmadām atha cāsādya nadīṃ trailokyaviśrutāmc tarpayitvā pitṝn devān agniṣṭomaphalaṃ labheta dakṣiṇaṃ sindhum āsādya brahmacārī jitendriyaḥc agniṣṭomam avāpnoti vimānaṃ cādhirohatia carmaṇvatīṃ samāsādya niyato niyatāśanaḥc rantidevābhyanujñāto agniṣṭomaphalaṃ labheta tato gaccheta dharmajña himavatsutam arbudamc pṛthivyāṃ yatra vai chidraṃ pūrvam āsīd yudhiṣṭhiraa tatrāśramo vasiṣṭhasya triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥc tatroṣya rajanīm ekāṃ gosahasraphalaṃ labheta piṅgātīrtham upaspṛśya brahmacārī jitendriyaḥc kapilānāṃ naravyāghra śatasya phalam aśnuted tato gaccheta tad vṛttaṃ tīrthaṃ devaniṣevitamd snātvā tatra naro bhāti vimalaś candramā yathāa tato gaccheta dharmajña prabhāsaṃ lokaviśrutamb tīrthaṃ devagaṇaiḥ pūjyam ṛṣibhiś ca niṣevitamc yatra saṃnihito nityaṃ svayam eva hutāśanaḥe devatānāṃ mukhaṃ vīra analo nilasārathiḥa tasmiṃs tīrthavare snātvā śuciḥ prayatamānasaḥc agniṣṭomātirātrābhyāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥa tato gatvā sarasvatyāḥ sāgarasya ca saṃgamec gosahasraphalaṃ prāpya svargaloke mahīyatee dīpyamāno gnivan nityaṃ prabhayā bharatarṣabhaf tatra snātvā ca rājendra vimalārkasamadyutiḥa trirātram uṣitas tatra tarpayet pitṛdevatāḥc prabhāsate yathā somo aśvamedhaṃ ca vindatia varadānaṃ tato gacchet tīrthaṃ bharatasattamac viṣṇor durvāsasā yatra varo datto yudhiṣṭhiraa varadāne naraḥ snātvā gosahasraphalaṃ labhetc tato dvāravatīṃ gacchen niyato niyatāśanaḥe piṇḍārake naraḥ snātvā labhed bahu suvarṇakama tasmiṃs tīrthe mahābhāga padmalakṣaṇalakṣitāḥc adyāpi mudrā dṛśyante tad adbhutam ariṃdamaa triśūlāṅkāni padmāni dṛśyante kurunandanac mahādevasya sāṃnidhyaṃ tatraiva bharatarṣabhaa sāgarasya ca sindhoś ca saṃgamaṃ prāpya bhāratac tīrthe salilarājasya snātvā prayatamānasaḥa tarpayitvā pitṝn devān ṛṣīṃś ca bharatarṣabhac prāpnoti vāruṇaṃ lokaṃ dīpyamānaḥ svatejasāa śaṅkukarṇeśvaraṃ devam arcayitvā yudhiṣṭhirac aśvamedhaṃ daśaguṇaṃ pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥa pradakṣiṇam upāvṛtya gaccheta bharatarṣabhac tīrthaṃ kuruvaraśreṣṭha triṣu lokeṣu viśrutame dṛmīti nāmnā vikhyātaṃ sarvapāpapramocanama yatra brahmādayo devā upāsante maheśvaramc tatra snātvārcayitvā ca rudraṃ devagaṇair vṛtame janmaprabhṛti pāpāni kṛtāni nudate naraḥa dṛmī cātra naraśreṣṭha sarvadevair abhiṣṭutāc tatra snātvā naravyāghra hayamedham avāpnuyāta jitvā yatra mahāprājña viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunāc purā śaucaṃ kṛtaṃ rājan hatvā daivatakaṇṭakāna tato gaccheta dharmajña vasor dhārām abhiṣṭutāmc gamanād eva tasyāṃ hi hayamedham avāpnuyāta snātvā kuruvaraśreṣṭha prayatātmā tu mānavaḥc tarpya devān pitṝṃś caiva viṣṇuloke mahīyatea tīrthaṃ cātra paraṃ puṇyaṃ vasūnāṃ bharatarṣabhac tatra snātvā ca pītvā ca vasūnāṃ saṃmato bhaveta sindhūttamam iti khyātaṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśanamc tatra snātvā naraśreṣṭha labhed bahu suvarṇakama brahmatuṅgaṃ samāsādya śuciḥ prayatamānasaḥc brahmalokam avāpnoti sukṛtī virajā naraḥa kumārikāṇāṃ śakrasya tīrthaṃ siddhaniṣevitamc tatra snātvā naraḥ kṣipraṃ śakralokam avāpnuyāta reṇukāyāś ca tatraiva tīrthaṃ devaniṣevitamc tatra snātvā bhaved vipro vimalaś candramā yathāa atha pañcanadaṃ gatvā niyato niyatāśanaḥc pañca yajñān avāpnoti kramaśo ye nukīrtitāḥa tato gaccheta dharmajña bhīmāyāḥ sthānam uttamamc tatra snātvā tu yonyāṃ vai naro bharatasattamaa devyāḥ putro bhaved rājaṃs taptakuṇḍalavigrahaḥc gavāṃ śatasahasrasya phalaṃ caivāpnuyān mahata girimuñjaṃ samāsādya triṣu lokeṣu viśrutamc pitāmahaṃ namaskṛtya gosahasraphalaṃ labheta tato gaccheta dharmajña vimalaṃ tīrtham uttamamc adyāpi yatra dṛśyante matsyāḥ sauvarṇarājatāḥa tatra snātvā naraśreṣṭha vājapeyam avāpnuyātc sarvapāpaviśuddhātmā gacchec ca paramāṃ gatimd vitastāṃ ca samāsādya saṃtarpya pitṛdevatāḥd naraḥ phalam avāpnoti vājapeyasya bhāratad kāśmīreṣv eva nāgasya bhavanaṃ takṣakasya cad vitastākhyam iti khyātaṃ sarvapāpapramocanama tato gaccheta maladāṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutāmc paścimāyāṃ tu saṃdhyāyām upaspṛśya yathāvidhia caruṃ narendra saptārcer yathāśakti nivedayetc pitṝṇām akṣayaṃ dānaṃ pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥd ṛṣayaḥ pitaro devā gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥd guhyakāḥ kiṃnarā yakṣāḥ siddhā vidyādharā narāḥd rākṣasā ditijā rudrā brahmā ca manujādhipad niyataḥ paramāṃ dīkṣām āsthāyābdasahasrikīmd viṣṇoḥ prasādanaṃ kurvaṃś caruṃ ca śrapayaṃs tathād saptabhiḥ saptabhiś caiva ṛgbhis tuṣṭāva keśavamd dadāv aṣṭaguṇaiśvaryaṃ teṣāṃ tuṣṭas tu keśavaḥd yathābhilaṣitān anyān kāmān dattvā mahīpated tatraivāntardadhe devo vidyud abhreṣu vai yathād nāmnā saptacaruṃ tena khyātaṃ lokeṣu bhārataa gavāṃ śatasahasreṇa rājasūyaśatena cac aśvamedhasahasreṇa śreyān saptārciṣaś caruḥa tato nivṛtto rājendra vastrāpadam athāviśetc abhigamya mahādevam aśvamedhaphalaṃ labheta maṇimantaṃ samāsādya brahmacārī samāhitaḥc ekarātroṣito rājann agniṣṭomaphalaṃ labheta atha gaccheta rājendra devikāṃ lokaviśrutāmc prasūtir yatra viprāṇāṃ śrūyate bharatarṣabhaa triśūlapāṇeḥ sthānaṃ ca triṣu lokeṣu viśrutamc devikāyāṃ naraḥ snātvā samabhyarcya maheśvarama yathāśakti caruṃ tatra nivedya bharatarṣabhac sarvakāmasamṛddhasya yajñasya labhate phalama kāmākhyaṃ tatra rudrasya tīrthaṃ devarṣisevitamc tatra snātvā naraḥ kṣipraṃ siddhim āpnoti bhārataa yajanaṃ yājanaṃ gatvā tathaiva brahmavālukāmc puṣpanyāsa upaspṛśya na śocen maraṇaṃ tataḥa ardhayojanavistārāṃ pañcayojanam āyatāmc etāvad devikām āhuḥ puṇyāṃ devarṣisevitāma tato gaccheta dharmajña dīrghasatraṃ yathākramamc yatra brahmādayo devāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥe dīrghasatram upāsante dakṣiṇābhir yatavratāḥa gamanād eva rājendra dīrghasatram ariṃdamac rājasūyāśvamedhābhyāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥa tato vinaśanaṃ gacchen niyato niyatāśanaḥc gacchaty antarhitā yatra marupṛṣṭhe sarasvatīe camase ca śivodbhede nāgodbhede ca dṛśyatea snātvā ca camasodbhede agniṣṭomaphalaṃ labhetc śivodbhede naraḥ snātvā gosahasraphalaṃ labheta nāgodbhede naraḥ snātvā nāgalokam avāpnuyātc śaśayānaṃ ca rājendra tīrtham āsādya durlabhame śaśarūpapraticchannāḥ puṣkarā yatra bhārataa sarasvatyāṃ mahārāja anu saṃvatsaraṃ hi tec snāyante bharataśreṣṭha vṛttāṃ vai kārttikīṃ sadāa tatra snātvā naravyāghra dyotate śaśivat sadāc gosahasraphalaṃ caiva prāpnuyād bharatarṣabhaa kumārakoṭim āsādya niyataḥ kurunandanac tatrābhiṣekaṃ kurvīta pitṛdevārcane rataḥe gavāmayam avāpnoti kulaṃ caiva samuddhareta tato gaccheta dharmajña rudrakoṭiṃ samāhitaḥc purā yatra mahārāja ṛṣikoṭiḥ samāhitāe praharṣeṇa ca saṃviṣṭā devadarśanakāṅkṣayāa ahaṃ pūrvam ahaṃ pūrvaṃ drakṣyāmi vṛṣabhadhvajamc evaṃ saṃprasthitā rājann ṛṣayaḥ kila bhārataa tato yogeṣvareṇāpi yogam āsthāya bhūpatec teṣāṃ manyupraṇāśārtham ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanāma sṛṣṭā koṭis tu rudrāṇām ṛṣīṇām agrataḥ sthitāc mayā pūrvataraṃ dṛṣṭa iti te menire pṛthaka teṣāṃ tuṣṭo mahādeva ṛṣīṇām ugratejasāmc bhaktyā paramayā rājan varaṃ teṣāṃ pradiṣṭavāne adya prabhṛti yuṣmākaṃ dharmavṛddhir bhaviṣyatia tatra snātvā naravyāghra rudrakoṭyāṃ naraḥ śuciḥc aśvamedham avāpnoti kulaṃ caiva samuddhareta tato gaccheta rājendra saṃgamaṃ lokaviśrutamc sarasvatyā mahāpuṇyam upāsante janārdanama yatra brahmādayo devā ṛṣayaḥ siddhacāraṇāḥc abhigacchanti rājendra caitraśuklacaturdaśīma tatra snātvā naravyāghra vinded bahu suvarṇakamc sarvapāpaviśuddhātmā brahmalokaṃ ca gacchatia ṛṣīṇāṃ yatra satrāṇi samāptāni narādhipac satrāvasānam āsādya gosahasraphalaṃ labhet pulastya uvācaa tato gaccheta rājendra kurukṣetram abhiṣṭutamc pāpebhyo vipramucyante tadgatāḥ sarvajantavaḥa kurukṣetraṃ gamiṣyāmi kurukṣetre vasāmy ahamc ya evaṃ satataṃ brūyāt so pi pāpaiḥ pramucyated pāṃsavo pi kurukṣetre vāyunā samudīritāḥd api duṣkṛtakarmāṇaṃ nayanti paramāṃ gatimd dakṣiṇena sarasvatyā dṛṣadvatyuttareṇa cad ye vasanti kurukṣetre te vasanti triviṣṭapea tatra māsaṃ vased vīra sarasvatyāṃ yudhiṣṭhirac yatra brahmādayo devā ṛṣayaḥ siddhacāraṇāḥa gandharvāpsaraso yakṣāḥ pannagāś ca mahīpatec brahmakṣetraṃ mahāpuṇyam abhigacchanti bhārataa manasāpy abhikāmasya kurukṣetraṃ yudhiṣṭhirac pāpāni vipraṇaśyanti brahmalokaṃ ca gacchatia gatvā hi śraddhayā yuktaḥ kurukṣetraṃ kurūdvahac rājasūyāśvamedhābhyāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥa tato macakrukaṃ rājan dvārapālaṃ mahābalamc yakṣaṃ samabhivādyaiva gosahasraphalaṃ labheta tato gaccheta dharmajña viṣṇoḥ sthānam anuttamamc satataṃ nāma rājendra yatra saṃnihito hariḥa tatra snātvārcayitvā ca trilokaprabhavaṃ harimc aśvamedham avāpnoti viṣṇulokaṃ ca gacchatia tataḥ pāriplavaṃ gacchet tīrthaṃ trailokyaviśrutamc agniṣṭomātirātrābhyāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥa pṛthivyās tīrtham āsādya gosahasraphalaṃ labhetc tataḥ śālūkinīṃ gatvā tīrthasevī narādhipae daśāśvamedhike snātvā tad eva labhate phalama sarpadarvīṃ samāsādya nāgānāṃ tīrtham uttamamc agniṣṭomam avāpnoti nāgalokaṃ ca vindatia tato gaccheta dharmajña dvārapālaṃ tarantukamc tatroṣya rajanīm ekāṃ gosahasraphalaṃ labheta tataḥ pañcanadaṃ gatvā niyato niyatāśanaḥc koṭitīrtham upaspṛśya hayamedhaphalaṃ labhete aśvinos tīrtham āsādya rūpavān abhijāyatea tato gaccheta dharmajña vārāhaṃ tīrtham uttamamc viṣṇur vārāharūpeṇa pūrvaṃ yatra sthito bhavate tatra snātvā naravyāghra agniṣṭomaphalaṃ labheta tato jayantyā rājendra somatīrthaṃ samāviśetc snātvā phalam avāpnoti rājasūyasya mānavaḥa ekahaṃse naraḥ snātvā gosahasraphalaṃ labhetc kṛtaśaucaṃ samāsādya tīrthasevī kurūdvahae puṇḍarīkam avāpnoti kṛtaśauco bhaven naraḥa tato muñjavaṭaṃ nāma mahādevasya dhīmataḥc tatroṣya rajanīm ekāṃ gāṇapatyam avāpnuyāta tatraiva ca mahārāja yakṣī lokapariśrutāc tāṃ cābhigamya rājendra puṇyāṃl lokān avāpnuyāta kurukṣetrasya tad dvāraṃ viśrutaṃ bharatarṣabhac pradakṣiṇam upāvṛtya tīrthasevī samāhitaḥa saṃmite puṣkarāṇāṃ ca snātvārcya pitṛdevatāḥc jāmadagnyena rāmeṇa āhṛte vai mahātmanāe kṛtakṛtyo bhaved rājann aśvamedhaṃ ca vindatia tato rāmahradān gacchet tīrthasevī narādhipac yatra rāmeṇa rājendra tarasā dīptatejasāe kṣatram utsādya vīryeṇa hradāḥ pañca niveśitāḥa pūrayitvā naravyāghra rudhireṇeti naḥ śrutamc pitaras tarpitāḥ sarve tathaiva ca pitāmahāḥe tatas te pitaraḥ prītā rāmam ūcur mahīpatea rāma rāma mahābhāga prītāḥ sma tava bhārgavac anayā pitṛbhaktyā ca vikrameṇa ca te vibhoe varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te kim icchasi mahādyutea evam uktaḥ sa rājendra rāmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥc abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ pitṝn sa gagane sthitāna bhavanto yadi me prītā yady anugrāhyatā mayic pitṛprasādād iccheyaṃ tapasāpyāyanaṃ punaḥa yac ca roṣābhibhūtena kṣatram utsāditaṃ mayāc tataś ca pāpān mucyeyaṃ yuṣmākaṃ tejasā hy ahame hradāś ca tīrthabhūtā me bhaveyur bhuvi viśrutāḥa etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ rāmasya pitaras tadāc pratyūcuḥ paramaprītā rāmaṃ harṣasamanvitāḥa tapas te vardhatāṃ bhūyaḥ pitṛbhaktyā viśeṣataḥc yac ca roṣābhibhūtena kṣatram utsāditaṃ tvayāa tataś ca pāpān muktas tvaṃ karmabhis te ca pātitāḥc hradāś ca tava tīrthatvaṃ gamiṣyanti na saṃśayaḥa hradeṣv eteṣu yaḥ snātvā pitṝn saṃtarpayiṣyatic pitaras tasya vai prītā dāsyanti bhuvi durlabhame īpsitaṃ manasaḥ kāmaṃ svargalokaṃ ca śāśvatama evaṃ dattvā varān rājan rāmasya pitaras tadāc āmantrya bhārgavaṃ prītās tatraivāntardadhus tadāa evaṃ rāmahradāḥ puṇyā bhārgavasya mahātmanaḥc snātvā hradeṣu rāmasya brahmacārī śubhavrataḥe rāmam abhyarcya rājendra labhed bahu suvarṇakama vaṃśamūlakam āsādya tīrthasevī kurūdvahac svavaṃśam uddhared rājan snātvā vai vaṃśamūlakea kāyaśodhanam āsādya tīrthaṃ bharatasattamac śarīraśuddhiḥ snātasya tasmiṃs tīrthe na saṃśayaḥe śuddhadehaś ca saṃyāti śubhāṃl lokān anuttamāna tato gaccheta rājendra tīrthaṃ trailokyaviśrutamc lokā yatroddhṛtāḥ pūrvaṃ viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunāa lokoddhāraṃ samāsādya tīrthaṃ trailokyaviśrutamc snātvā tīrthavare rājaṃl lokān uddharate svakāne śrītīrthaṃ ca samāsādya vindate śriyam uttamāme   snātvā niyatamānasaḥe arcayitvā pitṝn devāna kapilātīrtham āsādya brahmacārī samāhitaḥc tatra snātvārcayitvā ca daivatāni pitṝṃs tathāe kapilānāṃ sahasrasya phalaṃ vindati mānavaḥa sūryatīrthaṃ samāsādya snātvā niyatamānasaḥc arcayitvā pitṝn devān upavāsaparāyaṇaḥe agniṣṭomam avāpnoti sūryalokaṃ ca gacchatia gavāṃbhavanam āsādya tīrthasevī yathākramamc tatrābhiṣekaṃ kurvāṇo gosahasraphalaṃ labheta śaṅkhinīṃ tatra āsādya tīrthasevī kurūdvahac devyās tīrthe naraḥ snātvā labhate rūpam uttamama tato gaccheta rājendra dvārapālam arantukamc tasya tīrthaṃ sarasvatyāṃ yakṣendrasya mahātmanaḥe tatra snātvā naro rājann agniṣṭomaphalaṃ labheta tato gaccheta dharmajña brahmāvartaṃ narādhipac brahmāvarte naraḥ snātvā brahmalokam avāpnuyāta tato gaccheta dharmajña sutīrthakam anuttamamc yatra saṃnihitā nityaṃ pitaro daivataiḥ sahaa tatrābhiṣekaṃ kurvīta pitṛdevārcane rataḥc aśvamedham avāpnoti pitṛlokaṃ ca gacchatia tato mbuvaśyaṃ dharmajña samāsādya yathākramamc kośeśvarasya tīrtheṣu snātvā bharatasattamae sarvavyādhivinirmukto brahmaloke mahīyatea mātṛtīrthaṃ ca tatraiva yatra snātasya bhāratac prajā vivardhate rājann anantāṃ cāśnute śriyama tataḥ śītavanaṃ gacchen niyato niyatāśanaḥc tīrthaṃ tatra mahārāja mahad anyatra durlabhama punāti darśanād eva daṇḍenaikaṃ narādhipac keśān abhyukṣya vai tasmin pūto bhavati bhārataa tīrthaṃ tatra mahārāja śvānalomāpahaṃ smṛtamc yatra viprā naravyāghra vidvāṃsas tīrthatatparāḥd gatiṃ gacchanti paramāṃ snātvā bharatasattamaa śvānalomāpanayane tīrthe bharatasattamac prāṇāyāmair nirharanti śvalomāni dvijottamāḥa pūtātmānaś ca rājendra prayānti paramāṃ gatimc daśāśvamedhikaṃ caiva tasmiṃs tīrthe mahīpatee tatra snātvā naravyāghra gaccheta paramāṃ gatima tato gaccheta rājendra mānuṣaṃ lokaviśrutamc yatra kṛṣṇamṛgā rājan vyādhena paripīḍitāḥe avagāhya tasmin sarasi mānuṣatvam upāgatāḥa tasmiṃs tīrthe naraḥ snātvā brahmacārī jitendriyaḥc sarvapāpaviśuddhātmā svargaloke mahīyatea mānuṣasya tu pūrveṇa krośamātre mahīpatec āpagā nāma vikhyātā nadī siddhaniṣevitāa śyāmākabhojanaṃ tatra yaḥ prayacchati mānavaḥc devān pitṝṃś ca uddiśya tasya dharmaphalaṃ mahate ekasmin bhojite vipre koṭir bhavati bhojitāa tatra snātvārcayitvā ca daivatāni pitṝṃs tathāc uṣitvā rajanīm ekām agniṣṭomaphalaṃ labheta tato gaccheta rājendra brahmaṇaḥ sthānam uttamamc brahmodumbaram ity eva prakāśaṃ bhuvi bhārataa tatra saptarṣikuṇḍeṣu snātasya kurupuṃgavac kedāre caiva rājendra kapiṣṭhalamahātmanaḥa brahmāṇam ilāspadaṃ ca tatraiva tīrthaṃ bharatasattamaa tatra snātvārcayitvā ca pitṝn devāṃś ca bhāratac na durgatim avāpnoti vājapeyaṃ ca vindatia kiṃdāne ca naraḥ snātvā kiṃjapye ca mahīpatec aprameyam puṇḍarīkaphalaṃ labheta tatas triviṣṭapaṃ gacchet triṣu lokeṣu viśrutamc tatra vaitaraṇī puṇyā nadī pāpapramocanīa tatra snātvārcayitvā ca śūlapāṇiṃ vṛṣadhvajamc sarvapāpaviśuddhātmā gaccheta paramāṃ gatima tato gaccheta rājendra phalakīvanam uttamamc yatra devāḥ sadā rājan phalakīvanam āśritāḥe tapaś caranti vipulaṃ bahuvarṣasahasrakamf tatra snātvā naro rājan sarvayajñaphalaṃ labheta dṛṣadvatyāṃ naraḥ snātvā tarpayitvā ca devatāḥc agniṣṭomātirātrābhyāṃ phalaṃ vindati bhārataa tīrthe ca sarvadevānāṃ snātvā bharatasattamac gosahasrasya rājendra phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥa pāṇikhāte naraḥ snātvā tarpayitvā ca devatāḥc rājasūyam avāpnoti ṛṣilokaṃ ca gacchatia tato gaccheta rājendra miśrakaṃ tīrtham uttamamc tatra tīrthāni rājendra miśritāni mahātmanāa vyāsena nṛpaśārdūla dvijārtham iti naḥ śrutamc sarvatīrtheṣu sa snāti miśrake snāti yo naraḥd sa vai snātvārcayitvā ca miśrake pitṛdevatāḥa tato vyāsavanaṃ gacchen niyato niyatāśanaḥc manojave naraḥ snātvā gosahasraphalaṃ labheta gatvā gaccheta paramāṃ gatima tato gacchen naraśreṣṭha somatīrtham anuttamamc tatra snātvā naro rājan somalokam avāpnuyāta saptasārasvataṃ tīrthaṃ tato gacchen narādhipac yatra maṅkaṇakaḥ siddho maharṣir lokaviśrutaḥa purā maṅkaṇako rājan kuśāgreṇeti naḥ śrutamc kṣataḥ kila kare rājaṃs tasya śākaraso sravata sa vai śākarasaṃ dṛṣṭvā harṣāviṣṭo mahātapāḥc pranṛttaḥ kila viprarṣir vismayotphullalocanaḥa tatas tasmin pranṛtte vai sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca yatc pranṛttam ubhayaṃ vīra tejasā tasya mohitama brahmādibhiḥ surai rājann ṛṣibhiś ca tapodhanaiḥc vijñapto vai mahādeva ṛṣer arthe narādhipae nāyaṃ nṛtyed yathā deva tathā tvaṃ kartum arhasia tataḥ pranṛttam āsādya harṣāviṣṭena cetasāc surāṇāṃ hitakāmārtham ṛṣiṃ devo bhyabhāṣataa aho maharṣe dharmajña kimarthaṃ nṛtyate bhavānc harṣasthānaṃ kimarthaṃ vā tavādya munipuṃgava ṛṣir uvāca tapasvino dharmapathe sthitasya dvijasattamaa kiṃ na paśyasi me deva karāc chākarasaṃ srutamc yaṃ dṛṣṭvāhaṃ pranṛtto vai harṣeṇa mahatānvitaḥ pulastya uvācaa taṃ prahasyābravīd devo muniṃ rāgeṇa mohitamc ahaṃ vai vismayaṃ vipra na gacchāmīti paśya māma evam uktvā naraśreṣṭha mahādevena dhīmatāc aṅgulyagreṇa rājendra svāṅguṣṭhas tāḍito naghaa tato bhasma kṣatād rājan nirgataṃ himasaṃnibhamc tad dṛṣṭvā vrīḍito rājan sa muniḥ pādayor gataḥa nānyaṃ devam ahaṃ manye rudrāt parataraṃ mahatc surāsurasya jagato gatis tvam asi śūladhṛka tvayā sṛṣṭam idaṃ viśvaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaramc tvām eva bhagavan sarve praviśanti yugakṣayea devair api na śakyas tvaṃ parijñātuṃ kuto mayāc tvayi sarve ca dṛśyante surā brahmādayo naghaa sarvas tvam asi lokānāṃ kartā kārayitā ca hac tvatprasādāt surāḥ sarve modantīhākutobhayāḥe evaṃ stutvā mahādevaṃ sa ṛṣiḥ praṇato bhavat ṛṣir uvācaa tvatprasādān mahādeva tapo me na kṣareta vai pulastya uvācaa tato devaḥ prahṛṣṭātmā brahmarṣim idam abravītc tapas te vardhatāṃ vipra matprasādāt sahasradhāa āśrame ceha vatsyāmi tvayā sārdhaṃ mahāmunec saptasārasvate snātvā arcayiṣyanti ye tu māma na teṣāṃ durlabhaṃ kiṃ cid iha loke paratra cac sārasvataṃ ca te lokaṃ gamiṣyanti na saṃśayaḥd evam uktvā mahādevas tatraivāntaradhīyataa tatas tv auśanasaṃ gacchet triṣu lokeṣu viśrutamc yatra brahmādayo devā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥa kārttikeyaś ca bhagavāṃs trisaṃdhyaṃ kila bhāratac sāṃnidhyam akarot tatra bhārgavapriyakāmyayāa kapālamocanaṃ tīrthaṃ sarvapāpapramocanamc tatra snātvā naravyāghra sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyatea agnitīrthaṃ tato gacchet tatra snātvā nararṣabhac agnilokam avāpnoti kulaṃ caiva samuddhareta viśvāmitrasya tatraiva tīrthaṃ bharatasattamac tatra snātvā mahārāja brāhmaṇyam abhijāyatea brahmayoniṃ samāsādya śuciḥ prayatamānasaḥc tatra snātvā naravyāghra brahmalokaṃ prapadyatee punāty āsaptamaṃ caiva kulaṃ nāsty atra saṃśayaḥa tato gaccheta rājendra tīrthaṃ trailokyaviśrutamc pṛthūdakam iti khyātaṃ kārttikeyasya vai nṛpad pāpaṃ praṇaśyate tatra snātamātrasya bhāratae tatrābhiṣekaṃ kurvīta pitṛdevārcane rataḥa ajñānāj jñānato vāpi striyā vā puruṣeṇa vāc yat kiṃ cid aśubhaṃ karma kṛtaṃ mānuṣabuddhināa tat sarvaṃ naśyate tasya snātamātrasya bhāratac aśvamedhaphalaṃ cāpi svargalokaṃ ca gacchatia puṇyam āhuḥ kurukṣetraṃ kurukṣetrāt sarasvatīmc sarasvatyāś ca tīrthāni tīrthebhyaś ca pṛthūdakama uttame sarvatīrthānāṃ yas tyajed ātmanas tanumc pṛthūdake japyaparo nainaṃ śvomaraṇaṃ tapeta gītaṃ sanatkumāreṇa vyāsena ca mahātmanāc vede ca niyataṃ rājan abhigacchet pṛthūdakama pṛthūdakāt puṇyatamaṃ nānyat tīrthaṃ narottamac etan medhyaṃ pavitraṃ ca pāvanaṃ ca na saṃśayaḥa tatra snātvā divaṃ yānti api pāpakṛto janāḥc pṛthūdake naraśreṣṭha prāhur evaṃ manīṣiṇaḥa madhusravaṃ ca tatraiva tīrthaṃ bharatasattamac tatra snātvā naro rājan gosahasraphalaṃ labheta tato gacchen naraśreṣṭha tīrthaṃ devyā yathākramamc sarasvatyāruṇāyāś ca saṃgamaṃ lokaviśrutama trirātropoṣitaḥ snātvā mucyate brahmahatyayāc agniṣṭomātirātrābhyāṃ phalaṃ vindati mānavaḥa āsaptamaṃ kulaṃ caiva punāti bharatarṣabhac avatīrṇaṃ ca tatraiva tīrthaṃ kurukulodvahae viprāṇām anukampārthaṃ darbhiṇā brahmādibhir devair ṛṣibhiś ca tapodhanaiḥe senāpatyena devānām abhiṣikto guhas tadāa aujasasya tu pūrveṇa kurutīrthaṃ kurūdvahac kurutīrthe naraḥ snātvā brahmacārī jitendriyaḥe sarvapāpaviśuddhātmā avāpnuyāta tatra brahmā svayaṃ nityaṃ devaiḥ saha mahīpatec anvāsyate naraśreṣṭha nārāyaṇapurogamaiḥa sāṃnidhyaṃ caiva rājendra rudrapatnyāḥ kurūdvahac abhigamya ca tāṃ devīṃ na durgatim avāpnuyāta tatraiva ca mahārāja viśveśvaram umāpatimc abhigamya mahādevaṃ mucyate sarvakilbiṣaiḥa nārāyaṇaṃ cābhigamya padmanābham ariṃdamamc śobhamāno mahārāja viṣṇulokaṃ prapadyatea tīrthe tu sarvadevānāṃ snātaḥ sa puruṣarṣabhac sarvaduḥkhaiḥ parityakto dyotate śaśivat sadāa tataḥ svastipuraṃ gacchet tīrthasevī narādhipab pradakṣiṇam upāvṛtya gosahasraphalaṃ labhetc pāvanaṃ tīrtham āsādya tarpayet badarīpācanaṃ gacched vasiṣṭhasyāśramaṃ tataḥc badaraṃ bhakṣayet tatra trirātropoṣito naraḥa samyag dvādaśa varṣāṇi badarān bhakṣayet tu yaḥc trirātropoṣitaś caiva bhavet tulyo narādhipaa indramārgaṃ trailokyaviśrutamc ādityasyāśramo yatra tejorāśer mahātmanaḥd tasmiṃs tīrthe naraḥ snātvā sthānaṃ mahad avāpnuyāta tasmiṃs tīrthe naraḥ snātvā pūjayitvā vibhāvasumc ādityalokaṃ vrajati kulaṃ caiva yatra sārasvato rājan so ṅgirās tapaso nidhiḥc tasmiṃs tīrthe naraḥ snātvā vājapeyaphalaṃ labhete sārasvatīṃ gatiṃ caiva labhate nātra saṃśayaḥa tataḥ kanyāśramaṃ gacchen niyato brahmacaryavānc trirātropoṣito rājann upavāsaparāyaṇaḥe labhet kanyāśataṃ divyaṃ brahmalokaṃ ca gacchatia tato gaccheta dharmajña tīrthaṃ saṃnihitīm apic yatra brahmādayo devā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥe māsi māsi amāvāsyāṃ tu tatraiva rāhugraste divākareb yaḥ śrāddhaṃ kurute martyas tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇub aśvamedhasahasrasya samyag iṣṭasya yat phalamb snāta eva tad āpnoti kṛtvā śrāddhaṃ ca mānavaḥc māsi māsi samāyānti saṃnihityāṃ na saṃśayaḥa yat kiṃ cid duṣkṛtaṃ karma striyā vā puruṣasya vāc snātamātrasya tat sarvaṃ naśyate nātra saṃśayaḥe padmavarṇena yānena brahmalokaṃ sa gacchatia abhivādya tato brahmacārī jitendriyaḥc aśvamedham avāpnoti gamanād eva bhārataa tatrākṣayavaṭo nāma triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥc pitṝṇāṃ tatra vai dattam akṣayaṃ bhavati prabhoa mahānadyām upaspṛśya tarpayet pitṛdevatāḥc pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā vājapeyaphalaṃ labheta tato gaccheta rājendra dhenukāṃ lokaviśrutāmc ekarātroṣito rājan prayacchet tiladhenukāme sarvapāpaviśuddhātmā somalokaṃ vrajed dhruvama tatra cihnaṃ mahārāja adyāpi hi na saṃśayaḥc kapilā saha vatsena parvate vicaraty utae savatsāyāḥ padāni sma dṛśyante dyāpi bhārataa teṣūpaspṛśya rājendra padeṣu nṛpasattamac yat kiṃ cid aśubhaṃ karma tat praṇaśyati bhārataa tato gṛdhravaṭaṃ gacchet sthānaṃ devasya dhīmataḥc snāyīta bhasmanā tatra abhigamya vṛṣadhvajama brāhmaṇena bhavec cīrṇaṃ vrataṃ dvādaśavārṣikamc itareṣāṃ tu varṇānāṃ sarvapāpaṃ praṇaśyatia gaccheta tata udyantaṃ parvataṃ gītanāditamc sāvitraṃ tu padaṃ tatra dṛśyate bharatarṣabhaa tatra saṃdhyām upāsīta brāhmaṇaḥ saṃśitavrataḥc upāstā ca bhavet saṃdhyā tena dvādaśavārṣikīa yonidvāraṃ ca tatraiva viśrutaṃ bharatarṣabhac tatrābhigamya mucyeta puruṣo yonisaṃkarāta kṛṣṇaśuklāv ubhau pakṣau gayāyāṃ yo vasen naraḥc punāty āsaptamaṃ rājan kulaṃ nāsty atra saṃśayaḥa eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ putrā yady eko pi gayāṃ vrajetb yāvajjīvakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ māsenaikena śudhyatib tato gayāṃ samāsādya brahmacārī samāhitaḥc yajeta vāśvamedhena nīlaṃ vā vṛṣam utsṛjeta tataḥ phalguṃ vrajed rājaṃs tīrthasevī narādhipac aśvamedham avāpnoti siddhiṃ ca mahatīṃ vrajeta tato gaccheta rājendra dharmapṛṣṭhaṃ samāhitaḥc yatra dharmo mahārāja nityam āste yudhiṣṭhirad tatra kūpodakaṃ pītvā tena snātaḥ śucis tathād pitṝn devāṃs tu saṃtarpya muktapāpaṃ divaṃ vrajetd mataṅgasyāśramas tatra maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥd taṃ praviśyāśramaṃ śrīmac chramaśokavināśanamd gavāmayasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥd aṣṭau yasya tu śuklāni lāṅgūlakakudaḥ śiraḥd uraḥ śiraś ca catvāraḥ sa vṛṣo nīḍa ucyated gatvā ca tatra dharmātmann aśvamedhaphalaṃ labhete abhigamya tatas tatra vājimedhaphalaṃ labheta tato gaccheta kākṣīvān iva modatea yakṣiṇyā naityakaṃ tatra prāśnīta puruṣaḥ śuciḥc yakṣiṇyās tu prasādena mucyate bhrūṇahatyayāa maṇināgaṃ tato gatvā gosahasraphalaṃ labhetc naityakaṃ bhuñjate yas tu maṇināgasya śaśīa tatra kūpo mahārāja viśruto bharatarṣabhac samudrās tatra catvāro nivasanti yudhiṣṭhiraa tatropaspṛśya rājendra kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇamc niyatātmā naraḥ pūto gaccheta paramāṃ gatima tato gacchet kuruśreṣṭha śṛṅgaverapuraṃ mahatc yatra tīrṇo mahārāja rāmo dāśarathiḥ purād tasmiṃs tīrthe mahābāho snātvā pāpaiḥ pramucyatea gaṅgāyāṃ tu naraḥ snātvā brahmacārī samāhitaḥc vidhūtapāpmā bhavati vājapeyaṃ ca vindatid tato muñjavaṭaṃ gacchet sthānaṃ devasya dhīmataḥa abhigamya mahādevam abhyarcya ca narādhipac pradakṣiṇam upāvṛtya gāṇapatyam avāpnuyātd tasmiṃs tīrthe tu jāhnavyāṃ snātvā pāpaiḥ pramucyatea tato gaccheta rājendra prayāgam ṛṣisaṃstutamc yatra brahmādayo devā diśaś ca sadigīśvarāḥa lokapālāś ca sādhyāś ca nairṛtāḥ pitaras tathāc sanatkumārapramukhās tathaiva paramarṣayaḥa aṅgiraḥpramukhāś caiva tathā brahmarṣayo parec tathā nāgāḥ suparṇāś ca siddhāś cakracarās tathāa saritaḥ sāgarāś caiva gandharvāpsarasas tathāc hariś ca bhagavān āste prajāpatipuraskṛtaḥa tatra trīṇy agnikuṇḍāni yeṣāṃ madhye ca jāhnavīc prayāgād abhiniṣkrāntā sarvatīrthapuraskṛtāa tapanasya sutā tatra triṣu lokeṣu viśrutāc yamunā gaṅgayā sārdhaṃ saṃgatā lokapāvanīa gaṅgāyamunayor madhyaṃ pṛthivyā yudhiṣṭhirac prajāpatim upāsante ṛṣayaś ca mahāvratāḥe yajante kratubhir devās tathā cakracarā nṛpaa tataḥ puṇyatamaṃ nāsti triṣu lokeṣu bhāratac prayāgaḥ sarvatīrthebhyaḥ prabhavaty adhikaṃ vibhoa śravaṇāt tasya tīrthasya nāmasaṃkīrtanād apic mṛttikālambhanād vāpi naraḥ pāpāt pramucyatea tatrābhiṣekaṃ yaḥ kuryāt saṃgame saṃśitavrataḥc puṇyaṃ sa phalam āpnoti rājasūyāśvamedhayoḥa eṣā yajanabhūmir hi devānām api satkṛtāc tatra dattaṃ sūkṣmam api mahad bhavati bhārataa na vedavacanāt tāta na lokavacanād apic matir utkramaṇīyā te prayāgamaraṇaṃ pratia daśa tīrthasahasrāṇi sapatnaśamanaṃ śivamd medhājananam agryaṃ vai tīrthavaṃśānukīrtanamd aputro labhate putram adhano dhanam āpnuyātd mahīṃ vijayate rājā vaiśyo dhanam avāpnuyātd śūdro yathepsitān kāmān brāhmaṇaḥ pāragaḥ paṭhana yaś cedaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ tīrthapuṇyaṃ sadā śuciḥc jātīḥ sa smarate bahvīr nākapṛṣṭhe ca modatea gamyāny api ca tīrthāni kīrtitāny agamāni cac manasā tāni gaccheta sarvatīrthasamīkṣayāa etāni vasubhiḥ sādhyair ādityair marudaśvibhiḥc ṛṣibhir devakalpaiś ca śritāni sukṛtaiṣibhiḥa evaṃ tvam api kauravya vidhinānena suvratac vraja tīrthāni niyataḥ puṇyaṃ puṇyena vardhatea bhāvitaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pūrvam āstikyāc chrutidarśanātc prāpyante tāni tīrthāni sadbhiḥ śiṣṭānudarśibhiḥd sadbhiḥ śāstrārthatattvajñair brāhmaṇaiḥ saha gamyatāma nāvrato nākṛtātmā ca nāśucir na ca taskaraḥc snāti tīrtheṣu mama sainyamayaṃ kakṣaṃ pradhakṣyati na saṃśayaḥa taṃ sa kṛṣṇāniloddhūto divyāstrajalado mahānc śvetavājibalākābhṛd gāṇḍīvendrāyudhojjvalaḥa satataṃ śaradhārābhiḥ pradīptaṃ karṇapāvakamc udīrṇo gayaśiro naghac yatrāsau kīrtyate viprair akṣayyakaraṇo vaṭaḥe yatra dattaṃ pitṛbhyo nnam akṣayyaṃ bhavati prabhoa sā ca puṇyajalā yatra phalgunāmā mahānadīc bahumūlaphalā cāpi kauśikī bharatarṣabhae viśvāmitro bhyagād yatra brāhmaṇatvaṃ tapodhanaḥa gaṅgā yatra nadī puṇyā yasyās tīre bhagīrathaḥc ayajat tāta bahubhiḥ kratubhir bhūridakṣiṇaiḥa pāñcāleṣu ca kauravya kathayanty utpalāvatamc mahendro nāma kauravya bhārgavasya mahātmanaḥa ayajad yatra kaunteya pūrvam eva pitāmahaḥc yatra bhāgīrathī puṇyā sadasyāsīd yudhiṣṭhiraa yatrāsau brahmaśāleti puṇyā khyātā viśāṃ patec dhūtapāpmabhir ākīrṇā puṇyaṃ tasyāś ca darśanama pavitro maṅgalīyaś ca khyāto loke sanātanaḥc kedāraś ca mataṅgasya mahān āśrama uttamaḥa kuṇḍodaḥ parvato ramyo bahumūlaphalodakaḥc naiṣadhas tṛṣito yatra jalaṃ śarma ca labdhavāna yatra devavanaṃ ramyaṃ tāpasair upaśobhitamc bāhudā ca nadī yatra nandā ca girimūrdhania tīrthāni saritaḥ śailāḥ puṇyāny āyatanāni cac prācyāṃ diśi mahārāja kīrtitāni mayā tavaa tisṛṣv anyāsu puṇyāni dikṣu tīrthāni me śṛṇub vistāreṇa yathābuddhi dikṣu tīrthāni me śṛṇuc saritaḥ parvatāṃś caiva puṇyāny āyatanāni ca dhaumya uvācaa dakṣiṇasyāṃ tu puṇyāni śṛṇu tīrthāni bhāratac vistareṇa yathābuddhi kīrtyamānāni bhārataa yasyām ākhyāyate puṇyā diśi godāvarī nadīc bahvārāmā bahujalā tāpasācaritā śubhāa veṇṇā bhīmarathī cobhe nadyau pāpabhayāpahec mṛgadvijasamākīrṇe tāpasālayabhūṣitea pratyakṣam iti naḥ śrutamc amādyad indraḥ somena dakṣiṇābhir dvijātayaḥd payoṣṇyāṃ yajamānasya vārāhe tīrtha uttamed uddhṛtaṃ bhūtalasthaṃ vā vāyunā samudīritamd payoṣṇyā harate toyaṃ pāpam mamad marutaḥ pariveṣṭāraḥ sadasyāś ca divaukasaḥa māṭharasya vanaṃ puṇyaṃ bahumūlaphalaṃ śivamc yūpaś ca bharataśreṣṭha varuṇasrotase giraua praveṇyuttarapārśve tu puṇye kaṇvāśrame tathāc tāpasānām yudhiṣṭhiraa kumāryaḥ kathitāḥ puṇyāḥ pāṇḍyeṣv eva nararṣabhac tāmraparṇīṃ tu kaunteya kīrtayiṣyāmi tāṃ śṛṇua yatra devais tapas taptaṃ mahad icchadbhir āśramec gokarṇam iti vikhyātaṃ triṣu lokeṣu bhārataa śītatoyo bahujalaḥ puṇyas tāta śivaś ca saḥc hradaḥ paramaduṣprāpo mānuṣair akṛtātmabhiḥa tatraiva tṛṇasomāgneḥ saṃpannaphalamūlavānc āśramo gastyaśiṣyasya puṇyo devasabhe giraua vaiḍūryaparvatas tatra śrīmān maṇimayaḥ śivaḥc agastyasyāśramaś caiva bahumūlaphalodakaḥa surāṣṭreṣv api vakṣyāmi puṇyāny āyatanāni cac āśramān saritaḥ śailān sarāṃsi ca narādhipaa camasonmajjanaṃ viprās tatrāpi kathayanty utac prabhāsaṃ codadhau tīrthaṃ tridaśānāṃ yudhiṣṭhiraa tatra piṇḍārakaṃ nāma tāpasācaritaṃ śubhamc ujjayantaś ca śikharī kṣipraṃ siddhikaro mahāna tatra devarṣivaryeṇa nāradenānukīrtitaḥc purāṇaḥ śrūyate ślokas taṃ nibodha yudhiṣṭhiraa puṇye girau surāṣṭreṣu mṛgapakṣiniṣevitec ujjayante sma taptāṅgo nākapṛṣṭhe mahīyated eṣa nārāyaṇaḥ śrīmān kṣīrārṇavaniketanaḥd nāgaparyaṅkam utsṛjya hy āgato mathurāṃ purīma puṇyā dvāravatī tatra yatrāste madhusūdanaḥc sākṣād devaḥ purāṇo sau sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥa ye ca vedavido viprā ye cādhyātmavido janāḥc te vadanti mahātmānaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ dharmaṃ sanātanama pavitrāṇāṃ hi govindaḥ pavitraṃ param ucyateb maṅgaḷaṃ bhagavān viṣṇur maṅgaḷaṃ madhusūdanaḥb maṅgaḷaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣo maṅgaḷaṃ garuḍadhvajaḥc puṇyānām api puṇyo sau maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalama trailokyaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣo devadevaḥ sanātanaḥb avyayātmā mahātmā ca kṣetrajñaḥ parameśvaraḥc āste harir acintyātmā tatraiva madhusūdanaḥ dhaumya uvācaa avantiṣu pratīcyāṃ vai kīrtayiṣyāmi te diśic yāni tatra pavitrāṇi puṇyāny āyatanāni caa priyaṅgvāmravanopetā vānīravanamālinīc pratyaksrotā nadī puṇyā narmadā tatra bhāratad trailokye yāni tīrthāni puṇyāny āyatanāni cad saridvanāni śailendrā devāś ca sapitāmahāḥd narmadāyāṃ kuruśreṣṭha saha siddharṣicāraṇaiḥd snātum āyānti puṇyaughaiḥ sadā vāriṣu bhārataa niketaḥ khyāyate puṇyo yatra viśravaso muneḥc jajñe dhanapatir yatra kubero naravāhanaḥa vaiḍūryaśikharo nāma puṇyo girivaraḥ śubhaḥc divyapuṣpaphalās tatra pādapā haritacchadāḥa tasya śailasya śikhare saras tatra ca dhīmataḥc praphullanalinaṃ rājan devagandharvasevitama bahvāścaryaṃ mahārāja dṛśyate tatra parvatec puṇye svargopame divye nityaṃ devarṣisevitea hradinī puṇyatīrthā ca rājarṣes tatra vai saritc viśvāmitranadī pārā puṇyā parapuraṃjayaa yasyās tīre satāṃ madhye yayātir nahuṣātmajaḥc papāta sa punar lokāṃl lebhe dharmān sanātanāna tatra puṇyahradas tāta mainākaś caiva parvataḥc bahumūlaphalo vīra asito nāma parvataḥa āśramaḥ kakṣasenasya puṇyas tatra yudhiṣṭhirac cyavanasyāśramaś caiva khyātaḥ sarvatra pāṇḍavae tatrālpenaiva sidhyanti mānavās tapasā vibhoa jambūmārgo mahārāja ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanāmc āśramaḥ śāmyatāṃ śreṣṭha mṛgadvijagaṇāyutaḥa tataḥ puṇyatamā rājan satataṃ tāpasāyutāc ketumālā ca medhyā ca gaṅgāraṇyaṃ ca bhūmipae khyātaṃ ca saindhavāraṇyaṃ puṇyaṃ dvijaniṣevitama pitāmahasaraḥ puṇyaṃ puṣkaraṃ nāma bhāratac vaikhānasānāṃ siddhānām ṛṣīṇām āśramaḥ priyaḥa apy atra saṃstavārthāya prajāpatir atho jagauc puṣkareṣu kuruśreṣṭha gāthāṃ sukṛtināṃ varaa manasāpy abhikāmasya puṣkarāṇi manasvinaḥc pāpāṇi vipraṇaśyanti nākapṛṣṭhe ca modate dhaumya uvācaa udīcyāṃ rājaśārdūla diśi puṇyāni yāni vaic tāni te kīrtayiṣyāmi puṇyāny āyatanāni cad śṛṇuṣvāvahito bhūtvā mama mantrayataḥ prabhod kathāpratigraho vīra śraddhāṃ janayate śubhāma sarasvatī puṇyavahā hradinī vanamālinīc samudragā mahāvegā yamunā yatra pāṇḍavaa tatra puṇyatamaṃ tīrthaṃ plakṣāvataraṇaṃ śivamc yatra sārasvatair iṣṭvā gacchanty avabhṛthaṃ dvijāḥa puṇyaṃ cākhyāyate divyaṃ śivam agniśiro naghac sahadevo yajad yatra śamyākṣepeṇa bhārataa etasminn eva cārtheyam indragītā yudhiṣṭhirac gāthā carati loke smin gīyamānā dvijātibhiḥa agnayaḥ sahadevena ye citā yamunām anuc śataṃ śatasahasrāṇi sahasraśatadakṣiṇāḥa tatraiva bharato rājā cakravartī mahāyaśāḥc viṃśatiṃ sapta cāṣṭau ca hayamedhān upāharata kāmakṛd yo dvijātīnāṃ śrutas tāta mayā purāc atyantam āśramaḥ puṇyaḥ sarakas tasya viśrutaḥa sarasvatī nadī sadbhiḥ satataṃ pārtha pūjitāc vālakhilyair mahārāja yatreṣṭam ṛṣibhiḥ purāa dṛṣadvatī puṇyatamā tatra khyātā yudhiṣṭhirab nyagrodhākhyas tu puṇyākhyaḥ pāñcālyo dvipadāṃ varab dālbhyaghoṣaś ca dālbhyaś ca dharaṇīstho mahātmanaḥb kaunteyānantayaśasaḥ suvratasyāmitaujasaḥb āśramaḥ khyāyate puṇyas triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥc tatra vaivarṇyavarṇau ca supuṇyau manujādhipaa vedajñau vedaviditau vidyāvedavidāv ubhauc yajantau kratubhir nityaṃ puṇyair bharatasattamaa sametya bahuśo devāḥ sendrāḥ savaruṇāḥ purāc viśākhayūpe tapyanta tasmāt puṇyatamaḥ sa vaia ṛṣir mahān mahābhāgo jamadagnir mahāyaśāḥc palāśakeṣu puṇyeṣu ramyeṣv ayajatābhibhūḥa yatra sarvāḥ saricchreṣṭhāḥ sākṣāt tam ṛṣisattamamc svaṃ svaṃ toyam upādāya parivāryopatasthirea api cātra mahārāja svayaṃ viśvāvasur jagauc imaṃ ślokaṃ tadā vīra prekṣya vīryaṃ mahātmanaḥa yajamānasya vai devāñ jamadagner mahātmanaḥc āgamya saritaḥ sarvā madhunā samatarpayana gandharvayakṣarakṣobhir apsarobhiś ca śobhitamc kirātakiṃnarāvāsaṃ śailaṃ śikhariṇāṃ varama bibheda tarasā gaṅgā gaṅgādvāre yudhiṣṭhirac puṇyaṃ tat khyāyate rājan brahmarṣigaṇasevitama sanatkumāraḥ kauravya puṇyaṃ kanakhalaṃ tathāc parvataś ca purur nāma yatra jātaḥ purūravāḥa bhṛgur yatra tapas tepe maharṣigaṇasevitaḥc sa rājann āśramaḥ khyāto bhṛgutuṅgo mahāgiriḥa yac ca bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyac ca bhavac ca puruṣarṣabhac nārāyaṇaḥ prabhur viṣṇuḥ śāśvataḥ puruṣottamaḥa tasyātiyaśasaḥ puṇyāṃ viśālāṃ badarīm anuc āśramaḥ khyāyate puṇyas triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥa uṣṇatoyavahā gaṅga śītatoyavahāparāc suvarṇasikatā rājan viśālāṃ badarīm anua ṛṣayo yatra devāś ca mahābhāgā mahaujasaḥc prāpya nityaṃ namasyanti devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ vibhuma yatra nārāyaṇo devaḥ paramātmā sanātanaḥc tatra kṛtsnaṃ jagat pārtha tīrthāny āyatanāni caa tat puṇyaṃ tat paraṃ brahma tat tīrthaṃ tat tapovanamb tat paraṃ paramaṃ devaṃ bhūtānām īśvareśvaramb śāśvataṃ paramaṃ caiva dhātāraṃ paramaṃ padamb yaṃ viditvā na śocanti vidvāṃsaḥ śāstradṛṣṭayaḥc tatra devarṣayaḥ siddhāḥ sarve caiva tapodhanāḥa ādidevo mahāyogī yatrāste madhusūdanaḥc puṇyānām api tat puṇyaṃ tatra te saṃśayo stu māa etāni rājan puṇyāni pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīpatec kīrtitāni naraśreṣṭha tīrthāny āyatanāni caa etāni vasubhiḥ sādhyair ādityair marudaśvibhiḥc ṛṣibhir brahmakalpaiś ca sevitāni mahātmabhiḥa caran etāni kaunteya sahito brāhmaṇarṣabhaiḥc bhrātṛbhiś ca mahābhāgair utkaṇṭhāṃ vijahiṣyasi vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa evaṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇe tu dhaumye kauravanandanac lomaśaḥ sumahātejā ṛṣis tatrājagāma haa taṃ pāṇḍavāgrajo rājā sagaṇo brāhmaṇāś ca tec udatiṣṭhan mahābhāgaṃ divi śakram ivāmarāḥa tam abhyarcya yathānyāyaṃ dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥc papracchāgamane hetum aṭane ca prayojanama sa pṛṣṭaḥ pāṇḍuputreṇa prīyamāṇo mahāmanāḥc uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā harṣayann iva pāṇḍavāna saṃcarann asmi kaunteya sarvalokān yadṛcchayāc gataḥ śakrasya sadanaṃ tatrāpaśyaṃ sureśvarama tava ca bhrātaraṃ vīram apaśyaṃ savyasācinamc śakrasyārdhāsanagataṃ tatra me vismayo mahāne āsīt puruṣaśārdūla dṛṣṭvā pārthaṃ tathāgatama āha māṃ tatra deveśo gaccha pāṇḍusutān itic so ham abhyāgataḥ kṣipraṃ didṛkṣus tvāṃ sahānujama vacanāt puruhūtasya pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥc ākhyāsye te priyaṃ tāta mahat pāṇḍavanandanaa bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito rājan kṛṣṇayā caiva tac chṛṇuc yat tvayokto mahābāhur astrārthaṃ pāṇḍavarṣabhaa tad astram āptaṃ pārthena rudrād apratimaṃ mahatc yat tad brahmaśiro nāma tapasā rudram āgatama amṛtād utthitaṃ raudraṃ tal labdhaṃ savyasācināc tat samantraṃ sasaṃhāraṃ saprāyaścittamaṅgalama vajraṃ cānyāni cāstrāṇi daṇḍādīni yudhiṣṭhirac yamāt kuberād varuṇād indrāc ca kurunandanae astrāṇy adhītavān pārtho divyāny amitavikramaḥa viśvāvasoś ca tanayād gītaṃ nṛttaṃ ca sāma cac vāditraṃ ca yathānyāyaṃ pratyavindad yathāvidhia evaṃ kṛtāstraḥ kaunteyo gāndharvaṃ vedam āptavānc sukhaṃ vasati bībhatsur anujasyānujas tavaa yadarthaṃ māṃ suraśreṣṭha idaṃ vacanam abravītc tac ca te kathayiṣyāmi yudhiṣṭhira nibodha mea bhavān manuṣyalokāya gamiṣyati na saṃśayaḥc brūyād yudhiṣṭhiraṃ tatra vacanān me dvijottamaa āgamiṣyati te bhrātā kṛtāstraḥ kṣipram arjunaḥc surakāryaṃ mahat kṛtvā yad āśakyaṃ divaukasaiḥa tapasā tu tvam ātmānaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha yojayac tapaso hi paraṃ nāsti tapasā vindate mahata ahaṃ ca karṇaṃ jānāmi yathāvad bharatarṣabhab satyasaṃdhaṃ mahotsāhaṃ mahāvīryaṃ mahābalamb mahāhaveṣv apratimaṃ mahāyuddhaviśāradamb mahādhanurdharaṃ vīraṃ mahāstraṃ varavarṇinamb maheśvarasutaprakhyam ādityatanayaṃ prabhumb tathā jñānagatiṃ skandhaṃ sahajolbaṇapauruṣamc na sa pārthasya saṃgrāme kalām arhati ṣoḍaśīma yac cāpi te bhayaṃ tasmān manasistham ariṃdamac tac cāpy apahariṣyāmi savyasācāv ihāgatea yac ca te mānasaṃ vīra tīrthayātrām imāṃ pratic tac ca te lomaśaḥ sarvaṃ kathayiṣyaty asaṃśayama yac ca kiṃ cit tapoyuktaṃ phalaṃ tīrtheṣu bhāratac maharṣir eṣa yad brūyāt tac chraddheyam ananyathā lomaśa uvācaa dhanaṃjayena cāpy uktaṃ yat tac chṛṇu yudhiṣṭhirac yudhiṣṭhiraṃ bhrātaraṃ me yojayer dharmyayā śriyāa tvaṃ hi dharmān parān vettha tapāṃsi ca tapodhanac śrīmatāṃ cāpi jānāsi rājñāṃ dharmaṃ sanātanama sa bhavān yat paraṃ veda pāvanaṃ puruṣān pratic tena saṃyojayethās tvaṃ tīrthapuṇyena pāṇḍavama yathā tīrthāni gaccheta gāś ca dadyāt sa pārthivaḥc tathā sarvātmanā kāryam iti māṃ vijayo bravīta bhavatā cānugupto sau caret tīrthāni sarvaśaḥc rakṣobhyo rakṣitavyaś ca durgeṣu viṣameṣu caa dadhīca iva devendraṃ yathā cāpy aṅgirā ravimc tathā rakṣasva kaunteyaṃ rākṣasebhyo dvijottamaa yātudhānā hi bahavo rākṣasāḥ parvatopamāḥc tvayābhiguptān kaunteyān nātivarteyur antikāta so ham indrasya vacanān niyogād arjunasya cab āgatas tvāṃ mahābāho kuru puṇyaṃ yudhiṣṭhirac rakṣamāṇo bhayebhyas tvāṃ cariṣyāmi tvayā sahaa dvis tīrthāni mayā pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭāni kurunandanac idaṃ tṛtīyaṃ drakṣyāmi tāny eva bhavatā sahaa iyaṃ rājarṣibhir yātā puṇyakṛdbhir yudhiṣṭhirac manvādibhir mahārāja tīrthayātrā bhayāpahāa nānṛjur nākṛtātmā ca nāvaidyo na ca pāpakṛtc snāti tīrtheṣu kauravya na ca vakramatir naraḥa tvaṃ tu dharmamatir nityaṃ dharmajñaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥc vimuktaḥ sarvapāpebhyo bhūya eva bhaviṣyasia yathā bhagīratho rājā rājānaś ca gayādayaḥc yathā yayātiḥ kaunteya tathā tvam api pāṇḍava yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa na harṣāt saṃprapaśyāmi vākyasyāsyottaraṃ kva citc smared dhi devarājo yaṃ kiṃ nāmābhyadhikaṃ tataḥa bhavatā saṃgamo yasya bhrātā yasya dhanaṃjayaḥc vāsavaḥ smarate yasya ko nāmābhyadhikas tataḥa yac ca māṃ bhagavān āha tīrthānāṃ darśanaṃ pratic dhaumyasya vacanād eṣā buddhiḥ pūrvaṃ kṛtaiva mea tad yadā manyase brahman gamanaṃ tīrthadarśanec tadaiva gantāsmi dṛḍham eṣa me niścayaḥ paraḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa gamane kṛtabuddhiṃ taṃ pāṇḍavaṃ lomaśo bravītc laghur bhava mahārāja laghuḥ svairaṃ gamiṣyasi yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa bikṣābhujo nivartantāṃ brāhmaṇā yatayaś ca yeb kṣuttṛṣṇādhvaśramāyāsaśītārtim asahiṣṇavaḥb te sarve vinivartantāṃ ye ca miṣṭabhujo dvijāḥb pakvānnalehyapānānāṃ māṃsānāṃ ca vikalpakāḥb te pi sarve nivartantāṃ ye ca sūdānuyāyinaḥb mayā yathocitā jīvyaiḥ saṃvibhaktāś ca vṛttibhiḥc ye cāpy anugatāḥ paurā rājabhaktipuraskṛtāḥa dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ mahārājam abhigacchantu caiva tec sa dāsyati yathākālam ucitā yasya yā bhṛtiḥa sa ced yathocitāṃ vṛttiṃ na dadyān manujeśvaraḥc asmatpriyahitārthāya pāñcālyo vaḥ pradāsyati vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tato bhūyiṣṭhaśaḥ paurā gurubhārasamāhitāḥc viprāś ca yatayo yuktā jagmur nāgapuraṃ pratia tān sarvān dharmarājasya premṇā rājāmbikāsutaḥc pratijagrāha vidhivad dhanaiś ca samatarpayata tataḥ kuntīsuto rājā laghubhir brāhmaṇaiḥ sahac lomaśena ca suprītas trirātraṃ kāmyake vasat vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tataḥ prayāntaṃ kaunteyaṃ brāhmaṇā vanavāsinaḥc abhigamya tadā rājann idaṃ vacanam abruvana rājaṃs tīrthāni gantāsi puṇyāni bhrātṛbhiḥ sahac devarṣiṇā ca sahito lomaśena mahātmanāa asmān api mahārāja netum arhasi pāṇḍavac asmābhir hi na śakyāni tvad ṛte tāni kauravaa śvāpadair upasṛṣṭāni durgāṇi viṣamāṇi cac agamyāni narair alpais tīrthāni manujeśvaraa bhavanto bhrātaraḥ śūrā dhanurdharavarāḥ sadāc bhavadbhiḥ pālitāḥ śūrair gacchema vayam apy utaa bhavatprasādād dhi vayaṃ prāpnuyāma phalaṃ śubhamc tīrthānāṃ pṛthivīpāla vratānāṃ ca viśāṃ patea tava vīryaparitrātāḥ śuddhās tīrthapariplutāḥc bhavema dhūtapāpmānas tīrthasaṃdarśanān nṛpaa bhavān api narendrasya kārtavīryasya bhāratac aṣṭakasya ca rājarṣer lomapādasya caiva haa bharatasya ca vīrasya sārvabhaumasya pārthivac dhruvaṃ prāpsyasi duṣprāpāṃl lokāṃs tīrthapariplutaḥa prabhāsādīni tīrthāni mahendrādīṃś ca parvatānc gaṅgādyāḥ saritaś caiva plakṣādīṃś ca vanaspatīne tvayā saha mahīpāla draṣṭum icchāmahe vayamf bhavadbhiḥ pālitāḥ śūrais tīrthāny āyatanāni caa yadi te brāhmaṇeṣv asti kā cit prītir janādhipac kuru kṣipraṃ vaco smākaṃ tataḥ śreyo bhipatsyasea tīrthāni hi mahābāho tapovighnakaraiḥ sadāc anukīrṇāni rakṣobhis tebhyo nas trātum arhasia tīrthāny uktāni dhaumyena nāradena ca dhīmatāb nāradasya ca rājendra devarṣeḥ parvatasya cac yāny uvāca ca devarṣir lomaśaḥ sumahātapāḥa vidhivat tāni sarvāṇi paryaṭasva narādhipab ṛṣikulyāś ca kārtsnyena loḍayasva yudhiṣṭhirac dhūtapāpmā sahāsmābhir lomaśena ca pālitaḥa sa tathā pūjyamānas tair harṣād aśrupariplutaḥc bhīmasenādibhir vīrair bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritaḥe bāḍham ity abravīt sarvāṃs tān ṛṣīn pāṇḍavarṣabhaḥa lomaśaṃ samanujñāpya dhaumyaṃ caiva purohitamc tataḥ sa pāṇḍavaśreṣṭho bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito vaśīe draupadyā cānavadyāṅgyā gamanāya mano dadhea atha vyāso mahābhāgas tathā nāradaparvatauc kāmyake pāṇḍavaṃ draṣṭuṃ samājagmur manīṣiṇaḥa teṣāṃ yudhiṣṭhiro rājā pūjāṃ cakre yathāvidhic satkṛtās te mahābhāgā yudhiṣṭhiram athābruvana yudhiṣṭhira yamau bhīma saṃskṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā meṣabhūtaṃ mahāsurama athābravīd agastyas tān rājarṣīn ṛṣisattamaḥc viṣādo vo na kartavyo ahaṃ bhokṣye mahāsurama dhuryāsanam athāsādya niṣasāda mahāmuniḥc taṃ paryaveṣad daityendra ilvalaḥ prahasann ivaa agastya eva kṛtsnaṃ tu vātāpiṃ bubhuje tataḥb bahvannāśāpi te me stīty avadad bhakṣayan smayanb vātāpe pratibudhyasva darśayan balatejasīb tapasā durjayo yāvad eṣa tvāṃ nātivartateb tatas tasyodaraṃ bhettuṃ vātāpir vegam āharatb tam abudhyata tejasvī kumbhayonir mahātapāḥb sa vīryāt tapasogras tu nanarda bhagavān ṛṣiḥb eṣa jīrṇo si vātāpe mayā lokasya śāntayeb ity uktvā svakarāgreṇa udaraṃ samatāḍayatb trir evaṃ pratisaṃrabdhas tejasā prajvalann ivac bhuktavaty asuro hvānam akarot tasya ilvalaḥa tato vāyuḥ prādurabhūd agastyasya mahātmanaḥb śabdena mahatā tāta garjann iva yathā ghanaḥb vātāpe niṣkramasveti punaḥ punar uvāca hab taṃ prahasyābravīd rājann agastyo munisattamaḥb kuto niṣkramituṃ śakto mayā jīrṇas tu so suraḥc ilvalaś ca viṣaṇṇo bhūd dṛṣṭvā jīrṇaṃ mahāsurama prāñjaliś ca sahāmātyair idaṃ vacanam abravītc kimartham upayātāḥ stha brūta kiṃ karavāṇi vaḥa pratyuvāca tato gastyaḥ prahasann ilvalaṃ tadāc īśaṃ hy asura vidmas tvāṃ vayaṃ sarve dhaneśvarama ime ca nātidhanino dhanārthaś ca mahān mamac yathāśakty avihiṃsyānyān saṃvibhāgaṃ prayaccha naḥa tato bhivādya tam ṛṣim ilvalo vākyam abravītc ditsitaṃ yadi vetsi tvaṃ tato dāsyāmi te vasu agastya uvācaa gavāṃ daśa sahasrāṇi rājñām ekaikaśo surac tāvad eva suvarṇasya ditsitaṃ te mahāsuraa mahyaṃ tato vai dviguṇaṃ rathaś caiva hiraṇmayaḥc manojavau vājinau ca ditsitaṃ te mahāsurad lomaśaḥd ilvalas tu muniṃ prāha sarvam asti yathāttha māmd agastyaḥd rathaṃ tu yam avoco māṃ nainaṃ vidma hiraṇmayamd na me vāg anṛtā kā cid uktapūrvā mahāsurad sarvam etat pradāsyāmi hiraṇyaṃ gāś ca yad dhaname jijñāsyatāṃ rathaḥ sadyo vyaktam eṣa hiraṇmayaḥ lomaśa uvācaa jijñāsyamānaḥ sa rathaḥ kaunteyāsīd dhiraṇmayaḥc tataḥ pravyathito daityo dadāv abhyadhikaṃ vasua vivājaś ca suvājaś ca tasmin yuktau rathe hayauc ūhatus tau vasūny āśu tāny agastyāśramaṃ pratie sarvān rājñaḥ sahāgastyān nimeṣād iva bhārataf ilvalas tv anugamyainam agastyaṃ hantum aicchataf bhasma cakre mahātejā huṃkāreṇa mahāsuramf muner āśramam aśvau tau ninyatur vātaraṃhasaua agastyenābhyanujñātā jagmū rājarṣayas tadāc kṛtavāṃś ca muniḥ sarvaṃ lopāmudrācikīrṣitam lopāmudrovācaa kṛtavān asi tat sarvaṃ bhagavan mama kāṅkṣitamc utpādaya sakṛn mahyam apatyaṃ vīryavattaram agastya uvācaa tuṣṭo ham asmi kalyāṇi tava vṛttena śobhanec vicāraṇām apatye tu tava vakṣyāmi tāṃ śṛṇua sahasraṃ te stu putrāṇāṃ śataṃ vā daśasaṃmitamc daśa vā śatatulyāḥ syur eko vāpi sahasravat lopāmudrovācaa sahasrasaṃmitaḥ putra eko me stu tapodhanac eko hi bahubhiḥ śreyān vidvān sādhur asādhubhiḥ lomaśa uvācaa sa tatheti pratijñāya tayā samabhavan muniḥc samaye samaśīlinyā śraddhāvāñ śraddadhānayāa tata ādhāya garbhaṃ tam agamad vanam eva saḥc tasmin vanagate garbho vavṛdhe sapta śāradāna saptame bde gate cāpi prācyavat sa mahākaviḥc jvalann iva prabhāvena dṛḍhasyur nāma bhāratae sāṅgopaniṣadān vedāñ japann eva mahāyaśāḥa tasya putro bhavad ṛṣeḥ sa tejasvī mahān ṛṣiḥc sa bāla eva tejasvī pitus tasya niveśanee idhmānāṃ bhāram ājahre idhmavāhas tato bhavata tathāyuktaṃ ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā mumude sa munis tadāb evaṃ sa janayām āsa bhāratāpatyam uttamamc lebhire pitaraś cāsya lokān rājan yathepsitāna agastyasyāśramaḥ khyātaḥ sarvartukusumānvitaḥb khyāto bhuvi mahārāja tejasā tasya dhīmataḥc prāhrādir evaṃ vātāpir agastyena vināśitaḥc   brahmaghno duṣṭacetanaḥc evaṃ vināśito rājana tasyāyam āśramo rājan ramaṇīyo guṇair yutaḥc eṣā bhāgīrathī puṇyā yatheṣṭam avagāhyatāmd vāteritā patākeva virājati nabhastaled pratāryamāṇā kūṭeṣu yathā nimneṣu nityaśaḥd śilātaleṣu saṃtrastā pannagendravadhūr ivad dakṣiṇāṃ vai diśaṃ sarvāṃ plāvayantī ca mātṛvatd pūrvaṃ śambhor jaṭābhraṣṭā samudramahiṣī priyād lomaśa uvācad asyāṃ nadyāṃ supuṇyāyāṃ yatheṣṭam avagāhyatāmd yudhiṣṭhira nibodhedaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutamd bhṛgos tīrthaṃ mahārāja maharṣigaṇasevitamd yatropaspṛṣṭavān rāmo hṛtaṃ tejas tadāptavānd atra tvaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ kṛṣṇayā caiva pāṇḍavad duryodhanahṛtaṃ tejaḥ punar ādātum arhasid kṛtavaireṇa rāmeṇa yathā copahṛtaṃ punaḥd vaiśaṃpāyana uvācad sa tatra bhrātṛbhiś caiva kṛṣṇayā caiva pāṇḍavaḥd snātvā devān pitṝṃś caiva tarpayām āsa bhāratad tasya tīrthasya rūpaṃ vai dīptād dīptataraṃ babhaud apradhṛṣyataraś cāsīc chātravāṇāṃ nararṣabhad apṛcchac caiva rājendra lomaśaṃ pāṇḍunandanaḥd bhagavan kimarthaṃ rāmasya hṛtam āsīd vapuḥ prabhod lomaśa uvācad kathaṃ pratyāhṛtaṃ caiva etad ācakṣva pṛcchataḥd śṛṇu rāmasya rājendra bhārgavasya ca dhīmataḥd jāto daśarathasyāsīt putro rāmo mahātmanaḥd viṣṇuḥ svena śarīreṇa rāvaṇasya vadhāya vaid paśyāmas tam ayodhyāyāṃ jātaṃ dāśarathiṃ tataḥd ṛcīkanandano rāmo bhārgavo reṇukāsutaḥd tasya dāśaratheḥ śrutvā rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥd kautūhalānvito rāmas tv ayodhyām agamat punaḥd dhanur ādāya tad divyaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ nibarhaṇamd jijñāsamāno rāmasya vīryaṃ dāśarathes tadād taṃ vai daśarathaḥ śrutvā viṣayāntam upāgamatd preṣayām āsa rāmasya rāmaṃ putraṃ puraskṛtamd sa tam abhyāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā udyatāstram avasthitamd prahasann iva kaunteya rāmo vacanam abravītd kṛtakālaṃ hi rājendra dhanur etan mayā vibhod samāropaya yatnena yadi śaknoṣi pārthivad ity uktas tv āha bhagavaṃs tvaṃ nādhikṣeptum arhasid nāham apy adhamo dharme kṣatriyāṇāṃ dvijātiṣud ikṣvākūṇāṃ viśeṣeṇa bāhuvīrye na katthanamd tam evaṃvādinaṃ tatra rāmo vacanam abravītd alaṃ vai vyapadeśena dhanur āyaccha rāghavad tato jagrāha roṣeṇa kṣatriyarṣabhasūdanamd rāmo dāśarathir divyaṃ hastād rāmasya kārmukamd dhanur āropayām āsa salīla iva bhāratad jyāśabdam akaroc caiva smayamānaḥ sa vīryavānd tasya śabdasya bhūtāni vitrasanty aśaner ivad athābravīt tadā rāmo rāmaṃ dāśarathis tadād idam āropitaṃ brahman kim anyat karavāṇi ted tasya rāmo dadau divyaṃ jāmadagnyo mahātmanaḥd śaram ākarṇadeśāntam ayam ākṛṣyatām itid etac chrutvābravīd rāmaḥ pradīpta iva manyunād śrūyate kṣamyate caiva darpapūrṇo si bhārgavad tvayā hy adhigataṃ tejaḥ kṣatriyebhyo viśeṣataḥd pitāmahaprasādena tena māṃ kṣipasi dhruvamd paśya māṃ svena rūpeṇa cakṣus te vitarāmy ahamd tato rāmaśarīre vai rāmaḥ paśyati bhārgavaḥd ādityān savasūn rudrān sādhyāṃś ca samarudgaṇānd pitaro hutāśanaś caiva nakṣatrāṇi grahās tathād gandharvā rākṣasā yakṣā nadyas tīrthāni yāni cad ṛṣayo vālakhilyāś ca brahmabhūtāḥ sanātanāḥd devarṣayaś ca kārtsnyena samudrāḥ parvatās tathād vedāś ca sopaniṣado vaṣaṭkāraiḥ sahādhvaraiḥd cetomanti ca sāmāni dhanurvedaś ca bhāratad meghavṛndāni varṣāṇi vidyutaś ca yudhiṣṭhirad tataḥ sa bhagavān viṣṇus taṃ vai bāṇaṃ mumoca had śuṣkāśanisamākīrṇaṃ maholkābhiś ca bhāratad pāṃsuvarṣeṇa mahatā meghavarṣaiś ca bhūtalamd bhūmikampaiś ca nirghātair nādaiś ca vipulair apid sa rāmaṃ vihvalaṃ kṛtvā tejaś cākṣipya kevalamd āgacchaj jvalito bāṇo rāmabāhupracoditaḥd sa tu vihvalatāṃ gatvā pratilabhya ca cetanāmd rāmaḥ pratyāgataprāṇaḥ prāṇamad viṣṇutejasamd viṣṇunā so bhyanujñāto mahendram agamat punaḥd bhītas tu tatra nyavasad vrīḍitas tu mahātapāḥd tataḥ saṃvatsare tīte hṛtaujasam avasthitamd nirmadaṃ duḥkhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā pitaro rāmam abruvand na vai samyag idaṃ putra viṣṇum āsādya vai kṛtamd sa hi pūjyaś ca mānyaś ca triṣu lokeṣu sarvadād gaccha putra nadīṃ puṇyāṃ vadhūsarakṛtāhvayāmd tatropaspṛśya tīrtheṣu punar vapur avāpsyasid dīptodaṃ nāma tat tīrthaṃ yatra te prapitāmahaḥd bhṛgur devayuge rāma taptavān uttamaṃ tapaḥd tat tathā kṛtavān rāmaḥ kaunteya vacanāt pituḥd prāptavāṃś ca punatejas tīrthe smin pāṇḍunandanad etad īdṛśakaṃ tāta rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇād prāptam āsīn mahārāja viṣṇum āsādya vai purā yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa bhūya evāham icchāmi maharṣes tasya dhīmataḥc karmaṇāṃ vistaraṃ śrotum agastyasya dvijottama lomaśa uvācaa śṛṇu rājan kathāṃ divyām adbhutām atimānuṣīmc agastyasya mahārāja prabhāvam amitātmanaḥa āsan kṛtayuge ghorā dānavā yuddhadurmadāḥc kāleyā iti vikhyātā gaṇāḥ paramadāruṇāḥa te tu vṛtraṃ samāśritya nānāpraharaṇodyatāḥc samantāt paryadhāvanta mahendrapramukhān surāna tato vṛtravadhe yatnam akurvaṃs tridaśāḥ purāc puraṃdaraṃ puraskṛtya brahmāṇam upatasthirea kṛtāñjalīṃs tu tān sarvān parameṣṭhī uvāca hac viditaṃ me surāḥ sarvaṃ yad vaḥ kāryaṃ cikīrṣitama tam upāyaṃ pravakṣyāmi yathā vṛtraṃ vadhiṣyathac dadhīca iti vikhyāto mahān ṛṣir udāradhīḥa taṃ gatvā sahitāḥ sarve varaṃ vai saṃprayācatac sa vo dāsyati dharmātmā suprītenāntarātmanāa sa vācyaḥ sahitaiḥ sarvair bhavadbhir jayakāṅkṣibhiḥc svāny asthīni prayaccheti trailokyasya hitāya vaie sa śarīraṃ samutsṛjya svāny asthīni pradāsyatia tasyāsthibhir mahāghoraṃ vajraṃ saṃbhriyatāṃ dṛḍhamc mahac chatruhaṇaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ ṣaḍaśraṃ bhīmanisvanama tena vajreṇa vai vṛtraṃ vadhiṣyati śatakratuḥc etad vaḥ sarvam ākhyātaṃ tasmāc chīghraṃ vidhīyatāma evam uktās tato devā anujñāpya pitāmahamc nārāyaṇaṃ puraskṛtya dadhīcasyāśramaṃ yayuḥa sarasvatyāḥ pare pāre nānādrumalatāvṛtamc ṣaṭpadodgītaninadair vighuṣṭaṃ sāmagair ivae puṃskokilaravonmiśraṃ jīvaṃjīvakanāditama mahiṣaiś ca varāhaiś ca sṛmaraiś camarair apic tatra tatrānucaritaṃ śārdūlabhayavarjitaiḥa kareṇubhir vāraṇaiś ca prabhinnakaraṭāmukhaiḥc saro vagāḍhaiḥ krīḍadbhiḥ samantād anunāditama siṃhavyāghrair mahānādān nadadbhir anunāditamc aparaiś cāpi saṃlīnair guhākandaravāsibhiḥa teṣu teṣv avakāśeṣu śobhitaṃ sumanoramamc triviṣṭapasamaprakhyaṃ dadhīcāśramam āgamana tatrāpaśyan dadhīcaṃ te divākarasamadyutimc jājvalyamānaṃ vapuṣā yathā lakṣmyā pitāmahama tasya pādau surā rājann abhivādya praṇamya cac ayācanta varaṃ sarve yathoktaṃ parameṣṭhināa tato dadhīcaḥ paramapratītaḥsurottamāṃs tān idam abhyuvācac karomi yad vo hitam adya devāḥsvaṃ cāpi dehaṃ tv aham utsṛjāmia sa evam uktvā dvipadāṃ variṣṭhaḥprāṇān vaśī svān sahasotsasarjac tataḥ surās te jagṛhuḥ parāsorasthīni tasyātha yathopadeśama prahṛṣṭarūpāś ca jayāya devāstvaṣṭāram āgamya tam artham ūcuḥc tvaṣṭā tu teṣāṃ vacanaṃ niśamyaprahṛṣṭarūpaḥ prayataḥ prayatnāta cakāra vajraṃ bhṛśam ugrarūpaṃkṛtvā ca śakraṃ sa uvāca hṛṣṭaḥc anena vajrapravareṇa devabhasmīkuruṣvādya surārim ugrama tato hatāriḥ sagaṇaḥ sukhaṃ vaipraśādhi kṛtsnaṃ tridivaṃ diviṣṭhaḥc tvaṣṭrā tathoktaḥ sa puraṃdaras tuvajraṃ prahṛṣṭaḥ prayato bhyagṛhṇāt lomaśa uvācaa tataḥ sa vajrī balibhir daivatair abhirakṣitaḥc āsasāda tato vṛtraṃ sthitam āvṛtya rodasīa kālakeyair mahākāyaiḥ samantād abhirakṣitamc samudyatapraharaṇaiḥ saśṛṅgair iva parvataiḥa tato yuddhaṃ samabhavad devānāṃ saha dānavaiḥc muhūrtaṃ bharataśreṣṭha lokatrāsakaraṃ mahata udyatapratipiṣṭānāṃ khaḍgānāṃ vīrabāhubhiḥc āsīt sutumulaḥ śabdaḥ śarīreṣv abhipātyatāma śirobhiḥ prapatadbhiś ca antarikṣān mahītalamc tālair iva mahīpāla vṛntād bhraṣṭair adṛśyataa te hemakavacā bhūtvā kāleyāḥ parighāyudhāḥc tridaśān abhyavartanta dāvadagdhā ivādrayaḥa teṣāṃ vegavatāṃ vegaṃ sahitānāṃ pradhāvatāmc na śekus tridaśāḥ soḍhuṃ te bhagnāḥ prādravan bhayāta tān dṛṣṭvā dravato bhītān sahasrākṣaḥ puraṃdaraḥc vṛtre vivardhamāne ca kaśmalaṃ mahad āviśatd kāleyabhayasaṃtrasto devaḥ sākṣāt puraṃdaraḥd jagāma śaraṇaṃ śīghraṃ taṃ tu nārāyaṇaṃ prabhuma taṃ śakraṃ kaśmalāviṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥc svatejo vyadadhāc chakre balam asya vivardhayana viṣṇunāpyāyitaṃ śakraṃ dṛṣṭvā devagaṇās tataḥc svaṃ svaṃ tejaḥ samādadhyus tathā brahmarṣayo malāḥa sa samāpyāyitaḥ śakro viṣṇunā daivataiḥ sahac ṛṣibhiś ca mahābhāgair balavān samapadyataa jñātvā balasthaṃ tridaśādhipaṃ tunanāda vṛtro mahato ninādānc tasya praṇādena dharā diśaś cakhaṃ dyaur nagāś cāpi cacāla sarvama tato mahendraḥ paramābhitaptaḥśrutvā ravaṃ ghorarūpaṃ mahāntamc bhaye nimagnas tvaritaṃ mumocavajraṃ mahat tasya vadhāya rājana sa śakravajrābhihataḥ papātamahāsuraḥ kāñcanamālyadhārīc yathā mahāñ śailavaraḥ purastātsa mandaro viṣṇukarāt pramuktaḥa tasmin hate daityavare bhayārtaḥśakraḥ pradudrāva saraḥ praveṣṭumc vajraṃ na mene svakarāt pramuktaṃvṛtraṃ hataṃ cāpi bhayān na menea sarve ca devā muditāḥ prahṛṣṭāmaharṣayaś cendram abhiṣṭuvantaḥb vṛtraṃ hataṃ saṃdadṛśuḥ pṛthivyāṃb vajrāhataṃ śailam ivāvakīrṇamc sarvāṃś ca daityāṃs tvaritāḥ sametyajaghnuḥ surā vṛtravadhābhitaptāna te vadhyamānās tridaśais tadānīṃsamudram evāviviśur bhayārtāḥc praviśya caivodadhim aprameyaṃjhaṣākulaṃ ratnasamākulaṃ caa tadā sma mantraṃ sahitāḥ pracakrustrailokyanāśārtham abhismayantaḥc tatra sma ke cin matiniścayajñāstāṃs tān upāyān anuvarṇayantia teṣāṃ tu tatra kramakālayogādghorā matiś cintayatāṃ babhūvac ye santi vidyātapasopapannāsteṣāṃ vināśaḥ prathamaṃ tu kāryaḥa lokā hi sarve tapasā dhriyantetasmāt tvaradhvaṃ tapasaḥ kṣayāyac ye santi ke cid dhi vasuṃdharāyāṃtapasvino dharmavidaś ca tajjñāḥe teṣāṃ vadhaḥ kriyatāṃ kṣipram evateṣu pranaṣṭeṣu jagat pranaṣṭama evaṃ hi sarve gatabuddhibhāvājagadvināśe paramaprahṛṣṭāḥc durgaṃ samāśritya mahormimantaṃratnākaraṃ varuṇasyālayaṃ sma lomaśa uvācaa samudraṃ te samāśritya vāruṇaṃ nidhim ambhasāmc kāleyāḥ saṃpravartanta trailokyasya vināśanea te rātrau samabhikruddhā bhakṣayanti sadā munīnc āśrameṣu ca ye santi punyeṣv āyataneṣu caa vasiṣṭhasyāśrame viprā bhakṣitās tair durātmabhiḥc aśītiśatam aṣṭau ca nava cānye tapasvinaḥa cyavanasyāśramaṃ gatvā puṇyaṃ dvijaniṣevitamc phalamūlāśanānāṃ hi munīnāṃ bhakṣitaṃ śatama evaṃ rātrau sma kurvanti viviśuś cārṇavaṃ divāb kāleyās te durātmāno bhakṣayantas tapodhanānc bharadvājāśrame caiva niyatā brahmacāriṇaḥe vāyvāhārāmbubhakṣāś ca viṃśatiḥ saṃnipātitāḥa evaṃ krameṇa sarvāṃs tān āśramān dānavās tadāc niśāyāṃ paridhāvanti mattā bhujabalāśrayāte kālopasṛṣṭāḥ kāleyā ghnanto dvijagaṇān bahūna na cainān anvabudhyanta manujā manujottamac evaṃ pravṛttān daityāṃs tāṃs tāpaseṣu tapasviṣud kṣayāya jagataḥ krūrāḥ paryaṭanti sma medinīma prabhāte samadṛśyanta niyatāhārakarśitāḥc mahītalasthā munayaḥ sarve babhūvuḥ sāgarās tadā lomaśa uvācaa te taṃ dṛṣṭvā hayaṃ rājan saṃprahṛṣṭatanūruhāḥc anādṛtya mahātmānaṃ kapilaṃ kālacoditāḥe saṃkruddhāḥ samadhāvanta aśvagrahaṇakāṅkṣiṇaḥa tataḥ kruddho mahārāja kapilo munisattamaḥc vāsudeveti yaṃ prāhuḥ kapilaṃ munisattamama sa cakṣur vivṛtaṃ kṛtvā tejas teṣu samutsṛjanc dadāha sumahātejā mandabuddhīn sa sāgarānd ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrāṇi tadā yugapan munisattamaḥa tān dṛṣṭvā bhasmasād bhūtān nāradaḥ sumahātapāḥc sagarāntikam āgacchat tac ca tasmai nyavedayata sa tac chrutvā vaco ghoraṃ rājā munimukhodgatamc muhūrtaṃ vimanā bhūtvā sthāṇor vākyam acintayatd sa putranidhanotthena duḥkhena samabhiplutaḥe ātmānam ātmanāśvāsya hayam evānvacintayata aṃśumantaṃ samāhūya asamajñaḥsutaṃ tadāc pautraṃ bharataśārdūla idaṃ vacanam abravīta ṣaṣṭis tāni sahasrāṇi putrāṇām amitaujasāmc kāpilaṃ teja āsādya matkṛte nidhanaṃ gatāḥa tava cāpi pitā tāta parityakto mayānaghac dharmaṃ saṃrakṣamāṇena paurāṇāṃ hitam icchatā yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kimarthaṃ rājaśārdūlaḥ sagaraḥ putram ātmajamc tyaktavān dustyajaṃ vīraṃ tan me brūhi tapodhana lomaśa uvācaa asamañjā iti khyātaḥ sagarasya suto hy abhūtc yaṃ śaibyā janayām āsa paurāṇāṃ sa hi dārakānd krīḍataḥ sahasāsādya tatra tatra mahīpatee khureṣu krośato gṛhya nadyāṃ cikṣepa durbalāna tataḥ paurāḥ samājagmur bhayaśokapariplutāḥc sagaraṃ cābhyayācanta sarve prāñjalayaḥ sthitāḥa tvaṃ nas trātā mahārāja paracakrādibhir bhayaiḥc asamañjobhayād ghorāt tato nas trātum arhasia paurāṇāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā ghoraṃ nṛpatisattamaḥc muhūrtaṃ vimanā bhūtvā sacivān idam abravīta asamañjāḥ purād adya suto me mahātmanāc paurāṇāṃ hitakāmena sagareṇa vivāsitaḥa aṃśumāṃs tu maheṣvāso yad uktaḥ sagareṇa hac tat te sarvaṃ pravakṣyāmi kīrtyamānaṃ nibodha me sagara uvācaa pituś ca te haṃ tyāgena putrāṇāṃ nidhanena cac alābhena tathāśvasya paritapyāmi putrakaa tasmād duḥkhābhisaṃtaptaṃ yajñavighnāc ca mohitamc hayasyānayanāt pautra narakān māṃ samuddhara lomaśa uvācaa aṃśumān evam uktas tu sagareṇa mahātmanāc jagāma duḥkhāt taṃ deśaṃ yatra vai dāritā mahīa sa tu tenaiva mārgeṇa samudraṃ praviveśa hac apaśyac ca mahātmānaṃ kapilaṃ turagaṃ ca tama sa dṛṣṭvā tejaso rāśiṃ purāṇam ṛṣisattamamc praṇamya śirasā bhūmau kāryam asmai nyavedayata tataḥ prīto mahātejāḥ kalipo ṃśumato bhavatc uvāca cainaṃ dharmātmā varado smīti bhārataa sa vavre turagaṃ tatra prathamaṃ yajñakāraṇātc dvitīyam udakaṃ vavre pitṝṇāṃ pāvanepsayāa tam uvāca mahātejāḥ kapilo munipuṃgavaḥc dadāni tava bhadraṃ te yad yat prārthayase naghaa tvayi kṣamā ca dharmaś ca satyaṃ cāpi pratiṣṭhitamc tvayā kṛtārthaḥ sagaraḥ putravāṃś ca tvayā pitāa tava caiva prabhāvena svargaṃ yāsyanti sāgarāḥb śalabhatvaṃ gatā ete mama krodhahutāśanec pautraś ca te tripathagāṃ tridivād ānayiṣyatie pāvanārthaṃ sāgarāṇāṃ toṣayitvā tataḥ pādau sagarasya mahātmanaḥc mūrdhni tenāpy upāghrātas tasmai sarvaṃ nyavedayata yathā dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ cāpi sāgarāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ tathāc taṃ cāsmai hayam ācaṣṭa yajñavāṭam upāgatama tac chrutvā sagaro babhūva sarvalokasya manonayananandanaḥa sa śuśrāva mahābāhuḥ kapilena mahātmanāc pitṝṇāṃ nidhanaṃ ghoram aprāptiṃ tridivasya caa sa rājyaṃ sacive nyasya hṛdayena vidūyatāc jagāma himavatpārśvaṃ tapas
