dhātavo haritālasya kva cid dhiṅgulakasya caa manaḥśilāguhāś caiva saṃdhyābhranikaropamāḥc śaśalohitavarṇābhāḥ kva cid gairikadhātavaḥa sitāsitābhrapratimā bālasūryasamaprabhāḥc ete bahuvidhāḥ śailaṃ śobhayanti mahāprabhāḥa gandharvāḥ saha kāntābhir yathoktaṃ vṛṣaparvaṇāc dṛśyante śailaśṛṅgeṣu pārtha kiṃpuruṣaiḥ sahaa gītānāṃ talatālānāṃ yathā sāmnāṃ ca nisvanaḥc śrūyate bahudhā bhīma sarvabhūtamanoharaḥa mahāgaṅgām udīkṣasva puṇyāṃ devanadīṃ śubhāmc kalahaṃsagaṇair juṣṭām ṛṣikiṃnarasevitāma dhātubhiś ca saridbhiś ca kiṃnarair mṛgapakṣibhiḥc gandharvair apsarobhiś ca kānanaiś ca manoramaiḥa vyālaiś ca vividhākāraiḥ śataśīrṣaiḥ samantataḥc upetaṃ paśya kaunteya śailarājam ariṃdamaa te prītamanasaḥ śūrāḥ prāptā gatim anuttamāmc nātṛpyan parvatendrasya darśanena paraṃtapāḥd draupadyā sahitā vīrās taiś ca viprair mahātmabhiḥa upetam atha mālyaiś ca phalavadbhiś ca pādapaiḥc ārṣṭiṣeṇasya rājarṣer āśramaṃ dadṛśus tadāa tatas taṃ tīvratapasaṃ kṛśaṃ dhamanisaṃtatamc pāragaṃ sarvadharmāṇām ārṣṭiṣeṇam upāgaman vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa yudhiṣṭhiras tam āsādya tapasā dagdhakilbiṣamc abhyavādayata prītaḥ śirasā nāma kīrtayana tataḥ kṛṣṇā ca bhīmaś ca yamau cāpi yaśasvinauc śirobhiḥ prāpya rājarṣiṃ parivāryopatasthirea tathaiva dhaumyo dharmajñaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ purohitaḥc yathānyāyam upākrāntas tam ṛṣiṃ saṃśitavratama anvajānāt sa dharmajño munir divyena cakṣuṣāc pāṇḍoḥ putrān kuruśreṣṭhān āsyatām iti cābravīta kurūṇām ṛṣabhaṃ prājñaṃ pūjayitvā mahātapāḥc saha bhrātṛbhir āsīnaṃ paryapṛcchad anāmayama nānṛte kuruṣe bhāvaṃ kaccid dharme ca vartasec matāpitroś ca te vṛttiḥ kaccit pārtha na sīdatia kaccit te guravaḥ sarve vṛddhā vaidyāś ca pūjitāḥc kaccin na kuruṣe bhāvaṃ pārtha pāpeṣu karmasua sukṛtaṃ pratikartuṃ ca kaccid dhātuṃ ca duṣkṛtamc yathānyāyaṃ kuruśreṣṭha jānāsi na ca katthasea yathārhaṃ mānitāḥ kaccit tvayā nandanti sādhavaḥc vaneṣv api vasan kaccid dharmam evānuvartasea kaccid dhaumyas tvadācārair na pārtha paritapyatec dānadharmatapaḥśaucair ārjavena titikṣayāa pitṛpaitāmahaṃ vṛttaṃ kaccit pārthānuvartasec kaccid rājarṣiyātena pathā gacchasi pāṇḍavaa sve sve kila kule jāte putre naptari vā punaḥc pitaraḥ pitṛlokasthāḥ śocanti ca hasanti caa kiṃ nv asya duṣkṛte smābhiḥ saṃprāptavyaṃ bhaviṣyatic kiṃ cāsya sukṛte smābhiḥ prāptavyam iti śobhanama pitā mātā tathaivāgnir gurur ātmā ca pañcamaḥc yasyaite pūjitāḥ pārtha tasya lokāv ubhau jitauda yudhiṣṭhira uvācada bhagavan nyāyyam āhaitad yathāvad dharmaniścayamda yathāśakti yathānyāyaṃ kriyate yaṃ vidhir mayāa abbhakṣā vāyubhakṣāś ca plavamānā vihāyasāc juṣante parvataśreṣṭham ṛṣayaḥ parvasaṃdhiṣua kāminaḥ saha kāntābhiḥ parasparam anuvratāḥc dṛśyante śailaśṛṅgasthās tathā kiṃpuruṣā nṛpaa arajāṃsi ca vāsāṃsi vasānāḥ kauśikāni cac dṛśyante bahavaḥ pārtha gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥa vidyādharagaṇāś caiva sragviṇaḥ priyadarśanāḥc mahoragagaṇāś caiva suparṇāś coragādayaḥa asya copari śailasya śrūyate parvasaṃdhiṣuc bherīpaṇavaśaṅkhānāṃ mṛdaṅgānāṃ ca nisvanaḥa ihasthair eva tat sarvaṃ śrotavyaṃ bharatarṣabhāḥc na kāryā vaḥ kathaṃ cit syāt tatrābhisaraṇe matiḥa na cāpy ataḥ paraṃ śakyaṃ gantuṃ bharatasattamāḥc vihāro hy atra devānām amānuṣagatis tu sāa īṣaccapalakarmāṇaṃ manuṣyam iha bhāratac dviṣanti sarvabhūtāni tāḍayanti ca rākṣasāḥa abhyatikramya śikharaṃ śailasyāsya yudhiṣṭhirac gatiḥ paramasiddhānāṃ devarṣīṇāṃ prakāśatea cāpalād iha gacchantaṃ pārtha yānam ataḥ paramc ayaḥśūlādibhir ghnanti rākṣasāḥ śatrusūdanaa apsarobhiḥ parivṛtaḥ samṛddhyā naravāhanaḥc iha vaiśravaṇas tāta parvasaṃdhiṣu dṛśyatea śikhare taṃ samāsīnam adhipaṃ sarvarakṣasāmc prekṣante sarvabhūtāni bhānumantam ivoditama devadānavasiddhānāṃ tathā vaiśravaṇasya cac gireḥ śikharam udyānam idaṃ bharatasattamaa upāsīnasya dhanadaṃ tumburoḥ parvasaṃdhiṣuc gītasāmasvanas tāta śrūyate gandhamādanea etad evaṃvidhaṃ citram iha tāta yudhiṣṭhirac prekṣante sarvabhūtāni bahuśaḥ parvasaṃdhiṣua bhuñjānāḥ sarvabhojyāni rasavanti phalāni cac vasadhvaṃ pāṇḍavaśreṣṭhā yāvad arjunadarśanama na tāta capalair bhāvyam iha prāptaiḥ kathaṃ canabb capalaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ dveṣyo bhavati mānavaḥc uṣitveha yathākāmaṃ yathāśraddhaṃ vihṛtya cae tataḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha pṛthivīṃ pālayiṣyasi janamejaya uvāca ārṣṭiṣeṇāśrame tasmin mama pūrvapitāmahāḥa pāṇḍoḥ putrā mahātmānaḥ sarve divyaparākramāḥc kiyantaṃ kālam avasan parvate gandhamādaned kiṃ cakrus tatra te vīrāḥ sarve tibalapauruṣāḥa kāni cābhyavahāryāṇi tatra teṣāṃ mahātmanāmc vasatāṃ lokavīrāṇām āsaṃs tad brūhi sattamaa vistareṇa ca me śaṃsa bhīmasenaparākramamc yad yac cakre mahābāhus tasmin haimavate giraue na khalv āsīt punar yuddhaṃ tasya yakṣair dvijottamaf dhanadādhyuṣite nityaṃ vasatas tasya parvatea kaccit samāgamas teṣām āsīd vaiśravaṇena cac tatra hy āyāti dhanada ārṣṭiṣeṇo yathābravīta etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ vistareṇa tapodhanac na hi me śṛṇvatas tṛptir asti teṣāṃ viceṣṭitam vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa etad ātmahitaṃ śrutvā tasyāpratimatejasaḥc śāsanaṃ satataṃ cakrus tathaiva bharatarṣabhāḥa bhuñjānā munibhojyāni rasavanti phalāni cac śuddhabāṇahatānāṃ ca mṛgāṇāṃ piśitāny apia medhyāni himavatpṛṣṭhe madhūni vividhāni cac evaṃ te nyavasaṃs tatra pāṇḍavā bharatarṣabhāḥa tathā nivasatāṃ teṣāṃ pañcamaṃ varṣam abhyagātc śṛṇvatāṃ lomaśoktāni vākyāni vividhāni caa kṛtyakāla upasthāsya iti coktvā ghaṭotkacaḥc rākṣasaiḥ sahitaḥ sarvaiḥ pūrvam eva gataḥ prabhoa ārṣṭiṣeṇāśrame teṣāṃ vasatāṃ vai mahātmanāmc agacchan bahavo māsāḥ paśyatāṃ mahad adbhutama tais tatra ramamāṇaiś ca viharadbhiś ca pāṇḍavaiḥc prītimanto mahābhāgā munayaś cāraṇās tathāa ājagmuḥ pāṇḍavān draṣṭuṃ siddhātmāno yatavratāḥc tais taiḥ saha kathāś cakrur divyā bharatasattamāḥa tataḥ katipayāhasya mahāhradanivāsinamc ṛddhimantaṃ mahānāgaṃ suparṇaḥ sahasāharata prākampata mahāśailaḥ prāmṛdyanta mahādrumāḥc dadṛśuḥ sarvabhūtāni pāṇḍavāś ca tad adbhutama tataḥ śailottamasyāgrāt pāṇḍavān prati mārutaḥc avahat sarvamālyāni gandhavanti śubhāni caa tatra puṣpāṇi divyāni suhṛdbhiḥ saha pāṇḍavāḥc dadṛśuḥ pañca varṇāni draupadī ca yaśasvinīa bhīmasenaṃ tataḥ kṛṣṇā kāle vacanam abravītc vivikte parvatoddeśe sukhāsīnaṃ mahābhujama suparṇānilavegena śvasanena mahābalātc pañcavarṇāni pātyante puṣpāṇi bharatarṣabhad divyavarṇāni divyāni divyagandhavahāni cad madayantīva gandhena mano me bharatarṣabhad yeṣāṃ tu darśanāt sparśāt saurabhyāc ca tathaiva cad naśyatīva manoduḥkhaṃ mamedaṃ śatrutāpanad īdṛśaiḥ kusumair divyair divyagandhavahaiḥ śubhaiḥd devatāny arcayitvāham iccheyaṃ saṃgamaṃ tvayād idaṃ tu puruṣavyāghra viśeṣeṇāmbujaṃ śubhamd gandhasaṃsthānasaṃpannaṃ mama mānasavardhaname pratyakṣaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ nadīm aśvarathāṃ pratif vāsudevasahāyena vāsudevapriyeṇa caa khāṇḍave satyasaṃdhena bhrātrā tava nareśvarac gandharvoragarakṣāṃsi vāsavaś ca nivāritaḥe hatā māyāvinaś cogrā dhanuḥ prāptaṃ ca gāṇḍivama tavāpi sumahat tejo mahad bāhubalaṃ ca tec aviṣahyam anādhṛṣyaṃ śatakratubalopamama tvadbāhubalavegena trāsitāḥ sarvarākṣasāḥc hitvā śailaṃ prapadyantāṃ bhīmasena diśo daśaa tataḥ śailottamasyāgraṃ citramālyadharaṃ śivamc vyapetabhayasaṃmohāḥ paśyantu suhṛdas tavad sāśanaṃ satataṃ kuryus tathaiva bharatarṣabhaa evaṃ praṇihitaṃ bhīma cirāt prabhṛti me manaḥc draṣṭum icchāmi śailāgraṃ tvadbāhubalam āśritād icchāmi ca naravyāghra puṣpaṃ pratyakṣam īdṛśamd ānīyamānaṃ kṣipraṃ vai tvayā bharatasattamaa tataḥ kṣiptam ivātmānaṃ draupadyā sa paraṃtapaḥc nāmṛṣyata mahābāhuḥ prahāram iva sadgavaḥa siṃharṣabhagatiḥ śrīmān udāraḥ kanakaprabhaḥc manasvī balavān dṛpto mānī śūraś ca pāṇḍavaḥa lohitākṣaḥ pṛthuvyaṃso mattavāraṇavikramaḥc siṃhadaṃṣṭro bṛhatskandhaḥ śālapota ivodgataḥa mahātmā cārusarvāṅgaḥ kambugrīvo mahābhujaḥc rukmapṛṣṭhaṃ dhanuḥ khaḍgaṃ tūṇāṃś cāpi parāmṛśata kesarīva yathotsiktaḥ prabhinna iva vāraṇaḥc vyapetabhayasaṃmohaḥ śailam abhyapatad balīa taṃ mṛgendram ivāyāntaṃ prabhinnam iva vāraṇamc dadṛśuḥ sarvabhūtāni bāṇakhaḍgadhanurdharama draupadyā vardhayan harṣaṃ gadām ādāya pāṇḍavaḥc vyapetabhayasaṃmohaḥ śailarājaṃ samāviśata na glānir na ca kātaryaṃ na vaiklavyaṃ na matsaraḥc kadā cij juṣate pārtham ātmajaṃ mātariśvanaḥa tad ekāyanam āsādya viṣamaṃ bhīmadarśanamc bahutālocchrayaṃ śṛṅgam āruroha mahābalaḥa sa kiṃnaramahānāgamunigandharvarākṣasānc harṣayan parvatasyāgram āsasāda mahābalaḥa tatra vaiśravaṇāvāsaṃ dadarśa bharatarṣabhaḥc kāñcanaiḥ sphāṭikākārair veśmabhiḥ samalaṃkṛtamd prākāreṇa parikṣiptaṃ sauvarṇena samantataḥd sarvaratnadyutimatā sarvodyānavatā tathād śailād abhyucchrayavatā cayāṭṭālakaśobhinād dvāratoraṇanirvyūhadhvajasaṃvāhaśobhinād vilāsinībhir atyarthaṃ nṛtyantībhiḥ samantataḥd vāyunā dhūyamānābhiḥ patākābhir alaṃkṛtamd dhanuṣkoṭim avaṣṭabhya vakrabhāvena bāhunād paśyamānaḥ sa khedena draviṇādhipateḥ purama modayan sarvabhūtāni gandhamādanasaṃbhavaḥc sarvagandhavahas tatra mārutaḥ susukho vavaua citrā vividhavarṇābhāś citramañjaridhāriṇaḥc acintyā vividhās tatra drumāḥ paramaśobhanāḥa ratnajālaparikṣiptaṃ citramālyadharaṃ śivamc rākṣasādhipateḥ sthānaṃ dadarśa bharatarṣabhaḥa gadākhaḍgadhanuṣpāṇiḥ samabhityaktajīvitaḥc bhīmaseno mahābāhus tasthau girir ivācalaḥa tataḥ śaṅkham upādhmāsīd dviṣatāṃ lomaharṣaṇamc jyāghoṣatalaghoṣaṃ ca kṛtvā bhūtāny amohayata tataḥ saṃhṛṣṭaromāṇaḥ śabdaṃ tam abhidudruvuḥc yakṣarākṣasagandharvāḥ pāṇḍavasya samīpataḥa gadāparighanistriṃśaśaktiśūlaparaśvadhāḥc pragṛhītā vyarocanta yakṣarākṣasabāhubhiḥa tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ teṣāṃ tasya ca bhāratab saṃrabdhānāṃ mahāghoṣaṃ siṃhānām iva nardatāmc taiḥ prayuktān mahākāyaiḥ śaktiśūlaparaśvadhāne bhallair bhīmaḥ praciccheda bhīmavegatarais tataḥa antarikṣacarāṇāṃ ca bhūmiṣṭhānāṃ ca garjatāmc śarair vivyādha gātrāṇi rākṣasānāṃ mahābalaḥd śoṇitasya tataḥ petur ghanānām iva bhārataa sā lohitamahāvṛṣṭir abhyavarṣan mahābalamc kāyebhyaḥ pracyutā dhārā rākṣasānāṃ samantataḥd gadāparighapāṇīnāṃ rakṣasāṃ kāyasaṃbhavāḥa bhīmabāhubalotsṛṣṭair bahudhā yakṣarakṣasāmc vinikṛttāny adṛśyanta śarīrāṇi śirāṃsi caa pracchādyamānaṃ rakṣobhiḥ pāṇḍavaṃ priyadarśanamc dadṛśuḥ sarvabhūtāni sūryam abhragaṇair ivaa sa raśmibhir ivādityaḥ śarair arinighātibhiḥc sarvān ārchan mahābāhur balavān satyavikramaḥa abhitarjayamānāś ca ruvantaś ca mahāravānc na mohaṃ bhīmasenasya dadṛśuḥ sarvarākṣasāḥa te śaraiḥ kṣatasarvāṅgā bhīmasenabhayārditāḥc bhīmam ārtasvaraṃ cakrur viprakīrṇamahāyudhāḥa utsṛjya te gadāśūlān asiśaktiparaśvadhānc dakṣiṇāṃ diśam ājagmus trāsitā dṛḍhadhanvanāa tatra śūlagadāpāṇir vyūḍhorasko mahābhujaḥc sakhā vaiśravaṇasyāsīn maṇimān nāma rākṣasaḥa adarśayad adhīkāraṃ pauruṣaṃ ca mahābalaḥc sa tān dṛṣṭvā parāvṛttān smayamāna ivābravīta ekena bahavaḥ saṃkhye mānuṣeṇa parājitāḥc prāpya vaiśravaṇāvāsaṃ kiṃ vakṣyatha dhaneśvarama evam ābhāṣya tān sarvān nyavartata sa rākṣasaḥc śaktiśūlagadāpāṇir abhyadhāvac ca pāṇḍavama tam āpatantaṃ vegena prabhinnam iva vāraṇamc vatsadantais tribhiḥ pārśve bhīmasenaḥ samarpayata maṇimān api saṃkruddhaḥ pragṛhya mahatīṃ gadāmc prāhiṇod bhīmasenāya parikṣipya mahābalaḥa vidyudrūpāṃ mahāghorām ākāśe mahatīṃ gadāmc śarair bahubhir abhyarchad bhīmasenaḥ śilāśitaiḥa pratyahanyanta te sarve gadām āsādya sāyakāḥc na vegaṃ dhārayām āsur gadāvegasya vegitāḥa gadāyuddhasamācāraṃ budhyamānaḥ sa vīryavānc vyaṃsayām āsa taṃ tasya prahāraṃ bhīmavikramaḥa tataḥ śaktiṃ mahāghorāṃ rukmadaṇḍām ayasmayīmc tasminn evāntare dhīmān prajahārātha rākṣasaḥa sā bhujaṃ bhīmanirhrādā bhittvā bhīmasya dakṣiṇamc sāgnijvālā mahāraudrā papāta sahasā bhuvia so tividdho maheṣvāsaḥ śaktyāmitaparākramaḥc gadāṃ jagrāha kauravyo gadāyuddhaviśāradaḥd rukmapaṭṭapinaddhāṃ tāṃ śatrūṇāṃ bhayavardhinīma tāṃ pragṛhyonnadan bhīmaḥ sarvaśaikyāyasīṃ gadāmc tarasā so bhidudrāva maṇimantaṃ mahābalama dīpyamānaṃ mahāśūlaṃ pragṛhya maṇimān apic prāhiṇod bhīmasenāya vegena mahatā nadana bhaṅktvā śūlaṃ gadāgreṇa gadāyuddhaviśāradaḥc abhidudrāva taṃ tūrṇaṃ garutmān iva pannagama so ntarikṣam abhiplutya vidhūya sahasā gadāmc pracikṣepa mahābāhur vinadya raṇamūrdhanid tatas taṃ gadayā bhīmo maṇimantaṃ niśācaraḥd jaghāna sahasā mūrdhni sa papāta mamāra caa sendrāśanir ivendreṇa visṛṣṭā vātaraṃhasāc hatvā rakṣaḥ kṣitiṃ prāpya kṛtyeva nipapāta haa taṃ rākṣasaṃ bhīmabalaṃ bhīmasenena pātitamc dadṛśuḥ sarvabhūtāni siṃheneva gavāṃ patima taṃ prekṣya nihataṃ bhūmau hataśeṣā niśācarāḥc bhīmam ārtasvaraṃ kṛtvā jagmuḥ prācīṃ diśaṃ prati vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa śrutvā bahuvidhaiḥ śabdair nādyamānā girer guhāḥc ajātaśatruḥ kaunteyo mādrīputrāv ubhāv apia dhaumyaḥ kṛṣṇā ca viprāś ca sarve ca suhṛdas tathāc bhīmasenam apaśyantaḥ sarve vimanaso bhavana draupadīm ārṣṭiṣeṇāya pradāya tu mahārathāḥc sahitāḥ sāyudhāḥ śūrāḥ śailam āruruhus tadāa tataḥ saṃprāpya śailāgraṃ vīkṣamāṇā mahārathāḥc dadṛśus te maheṣvāsā bhīmasenam ariṃdamama sphurataś ca mahākāyān gatasattvāṃś ca rākṣasānc mahābalān mahāghorān bhīmasenena pātitāna śuśubhe sa mahābāhur gadākhaḍgadhanurdharaḥc nihatya samare sarvān dānavān maghavān ivaa tatas te samatikramya pariṣvajya vṛkodaramc tatropaviviśuḥ pārthāḥ prāptā gatim anuttamāma taiś caturbhir maheṣvāsair giriśṛṅgam aśobhatac lokapālair mahābhāgair divaṃ devavarair ivaa kuberasadanaṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasāṃś ca nipātitānc bhrātā bhrātaram āsīnam abhyabhāṣata pāṇḍavama sāhasād yadi vā mohād bhīma pāpam idaṃ kṛtamc naitat te sadṛśaṃ vīra muner iva mṛṣāvacaḥa rājadviṣṭaṃ na kartavyam iti dharmavido viduḥc tridaśānām idaṃ dviṣṭaṃ bhīmasena tvayā kṛtama arthadharmāv anādṛtya yaḥ pāpe kurute manaḥc karmaṇāṃ pārtha pāpānāṃ sa phalaṃ vindate dhruvamd karmaṇāṃ pārtha sarveṣāṃ na pāpāt parimucyated sāhasaṃ bata bhadraṃ te devānām api cāpriyame punar evaṃ na kartavyaṃ mama ced icchasi priyama evam uktvā sa dharmātmā bhrātā bhrātaram acyutamb bhīmasenaṃ mahābāhum apradhṛṣyaparākramamc arthatattvavibhāgajñaḥ kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥe virarāma mahātejās tam evārthaṃ vicintayana tatas tu hataśiṣṭā ye bhīmasenena rākṣasāḥc sahitāḥ pratyapadyanta kuberasadanaṃ pratia te javena mahāvegāḥ prāpya vaiśravaṇālayamc bhīmam ārtasvaraṃ cakrur bhīmasenabhayārditāḥa nyastaśastrāyudhāḥ śrāntāḥ śoṇitāktaparicchadāḥc prakīrṇamūrdhajā rājan yakṣādhipatim abruvana gadāparighanistriṃśatomaraprāsayodhinaḥc rākṣasā nihatāḥ sarve tava deva puraḥsarāḥa pramṛdya tarasā śailaṃ mānuṣeṇa dhaneśvarac ekena sahitāḥ saṃkhye hatāḥ krodhavaśā gaṇāḥa pravarā rakṣasendrāṇāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ ca dhanādhipac śerate nihatā deva gatasattvāḥ parāsavaḥa labdhaḥ śailo vayaṃ muktā maṇimāṃs te sakhā hataḥc mānuṣeṇa kṛtaṃ karma vidhatsva yad anantarama sa tac chrutvā tu saṃkruddhaḥ sarvayakṣagaṇādhipaḥc kopasaṃraktanayanaḥ katham ity abravīd vacaḥa dvitīyam aparādhyantaṃ bhīmaṃ śrutvā dhaneśvaraḥc cukrodha yakṣādhipatir yujyatām iti cābravīta athābhraghanasaṃkāśaṃ girikūṭam ivocchritamc hayaiḥ saṃyojayām āsur gāndharvair uttamaṃ rathama tasya sarvaguṇopetā vimalākṣā hayottamāḥc tejobalajavopetā nānāratnavibhūṣitāḥa śobhamānā rathe yuktās tariṣyanta ivāśugāḥb tatas te tu mahāyakṣāḥ kruddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhaneśvaramc harṣayām āsur anyonyam iṅgitair vijayāvahaiḥa sa tam āsthāya bhagavān rājarājo mahārathamc prayayau devagandharvaiḥ stūyamāno mahādyutiḥa taṃ prayāntaṃ mahātmānaṃ sarvayakṣadhanādhipamb anujagmur mahātmānaṃ dhanadaṃ ghoradarśanāḥc raktākṣā hemasaṃkāśā mahākāyā mahābalāḥa sāyudhā baddhanistriṃśā yakṣā daśaśatāyutāḥc javena mahatā vīrāḥ parivāryopatasthired gandhamādanam ājagmuḥ prakarṣantam ivāmbaramd tat kesarimahājālaṃ dhanādhipatipālitamd ramyaṃ caiva gireḥ śṛṅgam āsedur yatra pāṇḍavāḥa taṃ mahāntam upāyāntaṃ dhaneśvaram upāntikec dadṛśur hṛṣṭaromāṇaḥ pāṇḍavāḥ priyadarśanama kuberas tu mahāsattvān pāṇḍoḥ putrān mahārathānc āttakārmukanistriṃśān dṛṣṭvā prīto bhavat tadād sarve ceme naravyāghrāḥ puraṃdarasamaujasaḥd devakāryaṃ cikīrṣan sa hṛdayena tutoṣa haa te pakṣiṇa ivotpatya gireḥ śṛṅgaṃ mahājavāḥc tasthus teṣāṃ samabhyāśe dhaneśvarapuraḥsarāḥa tatas taṃ hṛṣṭamanasaṃ pāṇḍavān prati bhāratac samīkṣya yakṣagandharvā nirvikārā vyavasthitāḥa pāṇḍavāś ca mahātmānaḥ praṇamya dhanadaṃ prabhumc nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca dharmaputraś ca dharmavita aparāddham ivātmānaṃ manyamānā mahārathāḥc tasthuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve parivārya dhaneśvarama śayyāsanavaraṃ śrīmat puṣpakaṃ viśvakarmaṇāc vihitaṃ citraparyantam ātiṣṭhata dhanādhipaḥa tam āsīnaṃ mahākāyāḥ śaṅkukarṇā mahājavāḥc upopaviviśur yakṣā rākṣasāś ca sahasraśaḥa śataśaś cāpi gandharvās tathaivāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥc parivāryopatiṣṭhanta yathā devāḥ śatakratuma kāñcanīṃ śirasā bibhrad bhīmasenaḥ srajaṃ śubhāmc bāṇakhaḍgadhanuṣpāṇir udaikṣata dhanādhipama na bhīr bhīmasya na glānir vikṣatasyāpi rākṣasaiḥc āsīt tasyām avasthāyāṃ kuberam api paśyataḥa ādadānaṃ śitān bāṇān yoddhukāmam avasthitamc dṛṣṭvā bhīmaṃ dharmasutam abravīn naravāhanaḥa vidus tvāṃ sarvabhūtāni pārtha bhūtahite ratamc nirbhayaś cāpi śailāgre vasa tvaṃ saha bandhubhiḥa na ca manyus tvayā kāryo bhīmasenasya pāṇḍavac kālenaite hatāḥ pūrvaṃ nimittam anujas tavaa vrīḍā cātra na kartavyā sāhasaṃ yad idaṃ kṛtamc dṛṣṭaś cāpi suraiḥ pūrvaṃ vināśo yakṣarakṣasāma na bhīmasene kopo me prīto smi bharatarṣabhac karmaṇānena bhīmasya mama tuṣṭir abhūt purāa evam uktvā tu rājānaṃ bhīmasenam abhāṣatac naitan manasi me tāta vartate kurusattamae yad idaṃ sāhasaṃ bhīma kṛṣṇārthe kṛtavān asia mām anādṛtya devāṃś ca vināśaṃ yakṣarakṣasāmc svabāhubalam āśritya tenāhaṃ prītimāṃs tvayie śāpād asmi vinirmukto ghorād adya vṛkodaraa ahaṃ pūrvam agastyena kruddhena paramarṣiṇāc śapto parādhe kasmiṃś cit tasyaiṣā niṣkṛtiḥ kṛtāa dṛṣṭo hi mama saṃkleśaḥ purā pāṇḍavanandanac na tavātrāparādho sti kathaṃ cid api śatruhan yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kathaṃ śapto si bhagavann agastyena mahātmanāc śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ deva tavaitac chāpakāraṇama idaṃ cāścaryabhūtaṃ me yat krodhāt tasya dhīmataḥc tadaiva tvaṃ na nirdagdhaḥ sabalaḥ sapadānugaḥ vaiśravaṇa uvācaa devatānām abhūn mantraḥ kuśavatyāṃ nareśvarac vṛtas tatrāham agamaṃ mahāpadmaśatais tribhiḥe yakṣāṇāṃ ghorarūpāṇāṃ vividhāyudhadhāriṇāma adhvany aham athāpaśyam agastyam ṛṣisattamamc ugraṃ tapas tapasyantaṃ yamunātīram āśritame nānāpakṣigaṇākīrṇaṃ puṣpitadrumaśobhitama tam ūrdhvabāhuṃ dṛṣṭvā tu sūryasyābhimukhaṃ sthitamc tejorāśiṃ dīpyamānaṃ hutāśanam ivaidhitama rākṣasādhipatiḥ śrīmān maṇimān nāma me sakhāc maurkhyād ajñānabhāvāc ca darpān mohāc ca bhāratae nyaṣṭhīvad ākāśagato maharṣes tasya mūrdhania sa kopān mām uvācedaṃ diśaḥ sarvā dahann ivac mām avajñāya duṣṭātmā yasmād eṣa sakhā tavaa dharṣaṇāṃ kṛtavān etāṃ paśyatas te dhaneśvarac tasmāt sahaibhiḥ sainyais te vadhaṃ prāpsyati mānuṣāta tvaṃ cāpy dhṛtimantaś ca dakṣāś ca sve sve karmaṇi bhāratac parākramavidhānajñā narāḥ kṛtayuge bhavana dhṛtimān deśakālajñaḥ sarvadharmavidhānavitc kṣatriyaḥ kṣatriyaśreṣṭha pṛthivīm anuśāsti vaia ya evaṃ kevalasaṃrambhāt prapātaṃ na nirīkṣatea pāpātmā pāpabuddhir yaḥ pāpam evānuvartatec karmaṇām avibhāgajñaḥ pretya ceha ca naśyatia akālajñaḥ sudurmedhāḥ kāryāṇām aviśeṣavitc vṛthācārasamārambhaḥ pretya ceha ca naśyatia sāhase vartamānānāṃ nikṛtīnāṃ durātmanāmc sarvasāmarthyalipsūnāṃ pāpo bhavati niścayaḥa adharmajño valiptaś ca bālabuddhir amarṣaṇaḥc nirbhayo bhīmaseno yaṃ taṃ śādhi puruṣarṣabhad tac chrutvā dhanado vākyaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ samāgamamd utthāya sa ha taiḥ sārdhaṃ calitas tatkṣaṇād vṛtamd kuberaḥ prāpya rājānaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram abhāṣataa ārṣṭiṣeṇasya rājarṣeḥ prāpya bhūyas tvam āśramamc tāmisraṃ prathamaṃ pakṣaṃ vītaśokabhayo vasaa alakāḥ saha gandharvair yakṣaiś ca saha rākṣasaiḥc manniyuktā manuṣyendra sarve ca girivāsinaḥe rakṣantu tvā mahābāho sahitaṃ dvijasattamaiḥa sāhaseṣu ca paramasaṃpadaḥc janmaprabhṛti tāḥ sarvāḥ sthitās tāta dhanaṃjayea damo dānaṃ balaṃ buddhir hrīr dhṛtis teja uttamamc etāny api mahāsattve sthitāny amitatejasia na mohāt kurute jiṣṇuḥ karma pāṇḍava bhava śatrūṇāṃ suhṛdāṃ nandivardhanaḥd vibhavas tāta śailāgre vasānaḥ saha bandhubhiḥd suparṇapitṛdevānāṃ satataṃ mānakṛd bhavad ṛjuṃ paśyata mā vakraṃ satyaṃ vadata mānṛtamd dīrghaṃ paśyata mā hrasvaṃ paraṃ paśyata māparama sveṣu veśmasu ramyeṣu vasatāmitratāpanāḥc kāmān upahariṣyanti yakṣā vo bharatarṣabhāḥa śīghram eva guḍākeśaḥ kṛtāstraḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥc sākṣān maghavatā sṛṣṭaḥ tejomayaṃ śivama atyarkānaladīptaṃ tat sthānaṃ viṣṇor mahātmanaḥc svayaiva prabhayā rājan duṣprekṣyaṃ devadānavaiḥd prācyāṃ nārāyaṇasthānaṃ merāvativirājated yatra bhūteśvaras tāta sarvaprakṛtir svayaṃ vibhur adīnātmā tatra hy abhivirājatea yatayas tatra gacchanti bhaktyā nārāyaṇaṃ harimc pareṇa tapasā yuktā bhāvitāḥ karmabhiḥ śubhaiḥa yogasiddhā mahātmānas tamomohavivarjitāḥc tatra gatvā apic kurute vitamaskarmā ādityo bhipradakṣiṇama astaṃ prāpya tataḥ saṃdhyām atikramya divākaraḥc udīcīṃ bhajate kāṣṭhāṃ diśam eṣa vibhāvasuḥa sa merum anuvṛttaḥ san punar gacchati pāṇḍavac prāṅmukhaḥ savitā devaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥa sa māsaṃ vibhajan kālaṃ bahudhā parvasaṃdhiṣuc tathaiva bhagavān somo nakṣatraiḥ saha gacchatia evam eṣa parikramya mahāmerum atandritaḥb somaś ca vibhajan kālaṃ bahudhā parvasaṃdhiṣuc bhāvayan sarvabhūtāni punar gacchati mandarama tathā tamisrahā devo mayūkhair bhāvayañ jagatc mārgam etad asaṃbādham ādityaḥ parivartatea sisṛkṣuḥ śiśirāṇy eṣa dakṣiṇāṃ bhajate visṛjate punaḥa vibhajan sarvabhūtānām āyuḥ karma ca bhāratac ahorātrān kalāḥ kāṣṭhāḥ sṛjaty eṣa sadā vibhuḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tasmin nagendre vasatāṃ tu teṣāṃmahātmanāṃ sadvratam āsthitānāmc ratiḥ pramodaś ca babhūva teṣāmākāṅkṣatāṃ darśanam arjunasyaa tān vīryayuktān suviśuddhasattvāṃstejasvinaḥ satyadhṛtipradhānānc saṃprīyamāṇā bahavo bhijagmurgandharvasaṃghāś ca maharṣayaś caa taṃ pādapaiḥ puṣpadharair upetaṃnagottamaṃ prāpya mahārathānāmc manaḥprasādaḥ paramo babhūvayathā divaṃ prāpya marudgaṇānāma mayūrahaṃsasvananāditānipuṣpopakīrṇāni mahācalasyac śṛṅgāṇi sānūni ca paśyamānāgireḥ paraṃ harṣam avāpya tasthuḥa sākṣāt kubereṇa kṛtāś ca tasminnagottame saṃvṛtakūlarodhasaḥc kādambakāraṇḍavahaṃsajuṣṭāḥpadmākulāḥ puṣkariṇīr apaśyana krīḍāpradeśāṃś ca samṛddharūpānsucitramālyāvṛtajātaśobhānc maṇipravekān sumanoharāṃś cayathā bhaveyur dhanadasya rājñaḥa anekavarṇaiś ca sugandhibhiś camahādrumaiḥ saṃtatam abhramālibhiḥc tapaḥpradhānāḥ satataṃ carantaḥśṛṅgaṃ gireś cintayituṃ na śekuḥa svatejasā tasya nagottamasyamahauṣadhīnāṃ ca tathā prabhāvātc vibhaktabhāvo na babhūva kaś cidaharniśānāṃ puruṣapravīraa yam āsthitaḥ sthāvarajaṅgamānivibhāvasur bhāvayate mitaujāḥc tasyodayaṃ cāstamayaṃ ca vīrāstatra sthitās te dadṛśur nṛsiṃhāḥa raves tamisrāgamanirgamāṃs tetathodayaṃ cāstamayaṃ ca vīrāḥc samāvṛtāḥ prekṣya teṣāṃsaṃvatsareṇaiva samānarūpaḥa yadaiva dhaumyānumate mahātmākṛtvā jaṭāḥ pravrajitaḥ sa jiṣṇuḥc tadaiva teṣāṃ na babhūva harṣaḥkuto ratis tadgatamānasānāma bhrātur niyogāt tu yudhiṣṭhirasyavanād asau vāraṇamattagāmīc yat kāmyakāt pravrajitaḥ sa jiṣṇustadaiva te śokahatā babhūvuḥd saṃtyajya kāmān pravrajitās tadaivad pārthās tadā śokaparā babhūvuḥa tathā tu taṃ cintayatāṃ sitāśvamastrārthinaṃ vāsavam abhyupetamc māso tha kṛcchreṇa tadā vyatītastasmin nage bhārata bhāratānāmd uṣitvā pañca varṣāṇi sahasrākṣaniveśaned avāpya divyāny astrāṇi sarvāṇi vibudheśvarātd āgneyaṃ vāruṇaṃ saumyaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa etasminn eva kāle tu sarvavāditranisvanaḥc babhūva tumulaḥ śabdas tv antarikṣe divaukasāma rathanemisvanaś caiva ghaṇṭāśabdaś ca bhāratac pṛthag vyālamṛgāṇāṃ ca dṛṣṭavān asmi yaṃ purāa tasmai cāhaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ sarvam eva nyavedayamc bhagavantaṃ mahādevaṃ sameto smīti bhārataa sa mām uvāca rājendra prīyamāṇo dvijottamaḥc dṛṣṭas tvayā mahādevo yathā nānyena kena cita sametya lokapālais tu sarvair vaivasvatādibhiḥc draṣṭāsy anagha devendraṃ sa ca te strāṇi dāsyatia evam uktvā sa māṃ rājann āśliṣya ca punaḥ punaḥc agacchat sa yathākāmaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ vāditrāṇi ca divyāni sughoṣāṇi samantataḥc stutayaś cendrasaṃyuktā aśrūyanta manoharāḥa gaṇāś cāpsarasāṃ tatra gandharvāṇāṃ tathaiva cac purastād devadevasya jagur gītāni sarvaśaḥa marutāṃ ca gaṇās tatra devayānair upāgamanc mahendrānucarā ye ca devasadmanivāsinaḥa tato marutvān haribhir yuktair vāhaiḥ svalaṃkṛtaiḥc śacīsahāyas tatrāyāt saha sarvais tadāmaraiḥa etasminn eva kāle tu kubero naravāhanaḥc darśayām āsa māṃ rājaṃl lakṣmyā paramayā yutaḥa dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi yamaṃ pratyapaśyaṃ vyavasthitamc varuṇaṃ devarājaṃ ca yathāsthānam avasthitama te mām ūcur mahārāja sāntvayitvā surarṣabhāḥc savyasācin samīkṣasva lokapālān avasthitāna surakāryārthasiddhyarthaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi śaṃkaramc asmatto pi gṛhāṇa tvam astrāṇīti samantataḥa tato haṃ prayato bhūtvā praṇipatya surarṣabhānc pratyagṛhṇaṃ tadāstrāṇi mahānti vidhivat prabhoa gṛhītāstras tato devair anujñāto smi bhāratac atha devā yayuḥ sarve yathāgatam ariṃdamaa maghavān api deveśo ratham āruhya suprabhamc uvāca bhagavān vākyaṃ smayann iva surārihāa puraivāgamanād asmād vedāhaṃ tvāṃ dhanaṃjayac ataḥ paraṃ tv ahaṃ vai tvāṃ darśaye bharatarṣabhaa tvayā hi tīrtheṣu purā samāplāvaḥ kṛto sakṛtc tapaś cedaṃ purā taptaṃ svargaṃ gantāsi pāṇḍavaa bhūyaś caiva tu taptavyaṃ tapaḥ paramadāruṇamb duścaraṃ ghoram astrāṇāṃ tapasaś copadarśanamc uvāca bhagavān sarvaṃ tapasaś copapādanamd svargas tv avaśyaṃ gantavyas tvayā śatruniṣūdanaa mātalir manniyogāt tvāṃ tridivaṃ prāpayiṣyatic viditas tvaṃ hi devānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanāmd ihasthaḥ pāṇḍavaśreṣṭha tapaḥ kurvan suduṣkarama tato ham abruvaṃ śakraṃ prasīda bhagavan mamac ācāryaṃ varaye tvāham astrārthaṃ tridaśeśvara indra uvācaa krūraṃ karmāstravit tāta kariṣyasi paraṃtapac yadartham astrāṇīpsus tvaṃ taṃ kāmaṃ pāṇḍavāpnuhi arjuna uvācaa tato ham abruvaṃ nāhaṃ divyāny astrāṇi śatruhanc mānuṣeṣu prayokṣyāmi vināstrapratighātanama tāni divyāni me strāṇi prayaccha vibudhādhipac lokāṃś cāstrajitān paścāl labheyaṃ surapuṃgava indra uvācaa parīkṣārthaṃ mayaitat te vākyam uktaṃ dhanaṃjayac mamātmajasya vacanaṃ sūpapannam idaṃ tavaa śikṣa me bhavanaṃ gatvā sarvāṇy astrāṇi bhāratac vāyor agner vasubhyo tha varuṇāt samarudgaṇāta sādhyaṃ paitāmahaṃ caiva gandharvoragarakṣasāmc vaiṣṇavāni ca sarvāṇi nairṛtāni tathaiva cae madgatāni ca yānīha sarvāstrāṇi kurūdvaha arjuna uvācaa evam uktvā tu māṃ śakras tatraivāntaradhīyatac athāpaśyaṃ hariyujaṃ ratham aindram upasthitame divyaṃ māyāmayaṃ puṇyaṃ yattaṃ mātalinā nṛpaa lokapāleṣu yāteṣu mām uvācātha mātaliḥc draṣṭum icchati śakras tvāṃ devarājo mahādyutea saṃsiddhas tvaṃ mahābāho kuru kāryam anuttamamc paśya puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān saśarīro divaṃ vrajad devarājaḥ sahasrākṣas tvāṃ didṛkṣati bhārataa ity ukto haṃ mātalinā girim āmantrya śaiśiramc pradakṣiṇam upāvṛtya samārohaṃ rathottamama codayām āsa sa hayān manomārutaraṃhasaḥc mātalir hayaśāstrajño yathāvad bhūridakṣiṇaḥa avaikṣata ca me vaktraṃ sthitasyātha sa sārathiḥc tathā bhrānte rathe rājan vismitaś cedam abravīta atyadbhutam idaṃ me dya vicitraṃ pratibhāti māmc yad āsthito rathaṃ divyaṃ padā na calito bhavāna devarājo pi hi mayā nityam atropalakṣitaḥc vicalan prathamotpāte hayānāṃ bharatarṣabhaa tvaṃ punaḥ sthita evātra rathe bhrānte kurūdvahac atiśakram idaṃ sattvaṃ taveti pratibhāti mea ity uktvākāśam āviśya mātalir vibudhālayānc darśayām āsa me rājan vimānāni ca bhāratad sa ratho haribhir yukto hy ūrdhvam ācakrame tataḥd ṛṣayo devatāś caiva pūjayanti narottamad tataḥ kāmagamāṃl lokān apaśyaṃ vai surarṣiṇāmd gandharvāpsarasāṃ caiva prabhāvam amitaujasāma nandanādīni devānāṃ vanāni bahulāny utac darśayām āsa me prītyā mātaliḥ śakrasārathiḥa tataḥ śakrasya bhavanam apaśyam amarāvatīmc divyaiḥ kāmaphalair vṛkṣai ratnaiś ca samalaṃkṛtāma na tāṃ bhāsayate sūryo na śītoṣṇe na ca klamaḥc rajaḥ paṅko na ca tamas tatrāsti na jarā nṛpaa na tatra śoko dainyaṃ vā vaivarṇyaṃ copalakṣyatec divaukasāṃ mahārāja na ca glānir ariṃdamaa na krodhalobhau tatrāstām aśubhaṃ ca viśāṃ patec nityatuṣṭāś ca hṛṣṭāś ca prāṇinaḥ suraveśmania nityapuṣpaphalās tatra pādapā haritacchadāḥc puṣkariṇyaś ca vividhāḥ padmasaugandhikāyutāḥa śītas tatra vavau vāyuḥ sugandho jīvanaḥ śuciḥc sarvaratnavicitrā ca bhūmiḥ puṣpavibhūṣitāa mṛgadvijāś ca bahavo rucirā madhurasvarāḥc vimānayāyinaś cātra dṛśyante bahavo marāḥa tato paśyaṃ vasūn rudrān sādhyāṃś ca samarudgaṇānc ādityān aśvinau caiva tān sarvān pratyapūjayama te māṃ vīryeṇa yaśasā tejasā ca balena cac astraiś cāpy anvajānanta saṃgrāmavijayena caa praviśya tāṃ purīṃ ramyāṃ devagandharvasevitāmc devarājaṃ sahasrākṣam upātiṣṭhaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥa dadāv ardhāsanaṃ prītaḥ śakro me dadatāṃ varaḥc bahumānāc ca gātrāṇi pasparśa mama vāsavaḥa tatrāhaṃ devagandharvaiḥ sahito bhuridakṣiṇac astrārtham avasaṃ svarge kurvāṇo strāṇi bhārataa viśvāvasoś ca me putraś citraseno bhavat sakhāc sa ca gāndharvam akhilaṃ grāhayām āsa māṃ nṛpaa tato ham avasaṃ rājan gṛhītāstraḥ supūjitaḥc sukhaṃ śakrasya bhavane sarvakāmasamanvitaḥa śṛṇvan vai gītaśabdaṃ ca tūryaśabdaṃ ca puṣkalamc paśyaṃś cāpsarasaḥ śreṣṭhā nṛtyamānāḥ paraṃtapaa tat sarvam anavajñāya tathyaṃ vijjñāya bhāratac atyarthaṃ pratigṛhyāham astreṣv eva vyavasthitaḥa tato tuṣyat sahasrākṣas tena kāmena me vibhuḥc evaṃ me vasato rājann eṣa kālo tyagād divi arjuna uvācaa kṛtāstram abhiviśvastam atha māṃ harivāhanaḥc saṃspṛśya mūrdhni pāṇibhyām idaṃ vacanam abravīta na tvam adya yudhā jetuṃ śakyaḥ suragaṇair apic kiṃ punar mānuṣe loke mānuṣair akṛtātmabhiḥe aprameyo pradhṛṣyaś ca yuddheṣv apratimas tathāf ajeyas tvaṃ hi saṃgrāme sarvair api surāsuraiḥa athābravīt punar devaḥ saṃprahṛṣṭatanūruhaḥc astrayuddhe samo vīra na te kaś cid bhaviṣyatia apramattaḥ sadā dakṣaḥ satyavādī jitendriyaḥc brahmaṇyaś cāstravic cāsi śūraś cāsi kurūdvahaa astrāṇi samavāptāni tvayā daśa ca pañca cac pañcabhir vidhibhiḥ pārtha na tvayā vidyate samaḥa prayogam upasaṃhāram āvṛttiṃ ca dhanaṃjayac prāyaścittaṃ ca vettha tvaṃ pratighātaṃ ca sarvaśaḥa tava gurvarthakālo yam upapannaḥ paraṃtapac pratijānīṣva taṃ kartum ato vetsyāmy ahaṃ parama tato ham abruvaṃ rājan devarājam idaṃ vacaḥc viṣahyaṃ cen mayā kartuṃ kṛtam eva nibodha tata tato mām abravīd rājan prahasya balavṛtrahāc nāviṣahyaṃ tavādyāsti triṣu lokeṣu kiṃ canaa nivātakavacā nāma dānavā mama śatravaḥc samudrakukṣim āśritya durge prativasanty utaa tisraḥ koṭyaḥ samākhyātās tulyarūpabalaprabhāḥc tāṃs tatra jahi kaunteya gurvarthas te bhaviṣyatia tato mātalisaṃyuktaṃ mayūrasamaromabhiḥc hayair upetaṃ prādān me rathaṃ divyaṃ mahāprabhama babandha caiva me mūrdhni kirīṭam idam uttamamc svarūpasadṛśaṃ caiva prādād aṅgavibhūṣaṇama abhedyaṃ kavacaṃ cedaṃ sparśarūpavad uttamamc ajarāṃ jyām imāṃ cāpi gāṇḍīve samayojayata tataḥ prāyām ahaṃ tena syandanena virājatāc yenājayad devapatir baliṃ vairocaniṃ purāa tato devāḥ sarva eva tena ghoṣeṇa bodhitaḥc manvānā devarājaṃ māṃ samājagmur viśāṃ patee dṛṣṭvā ca mām apṛcchanta kiṃ kariṣyasi phalgunaa tān abruvaṃ yathābhūtam idaṃ kartāsmi saṃyugec nivātakavacānāṃ tu prasthitaṃ māṃ vadhaiṣiṇame nibodhata mahābhāgāḥ śivaṃ cāśāsta me naghāḥf tato vāgbhiḥ praśastābhis tridaśāḥ pṛthivīpatea tuṣṭuvur māṃ prasannās te yathā devaṃ puraṃdaramc rathenānena maghavā jitavāñ śambaraṃ yudhie namuciṃ balavṛtrau ca prahlādanarakāv apia bahūni ca sahasrāṇi prayutāny arbudāni cac rathenānena daityānāṃ jitavān maghavān yudhia tvam apy etena kaunteya nivātakavacān raṇec vijetā yudhi vikramya pureva maghavān vaśīa ayaṃ ca śaṅkhapravaro yena jetāsi dānavānc anena vijitā lokāḥ śakreṇāpi mahātmanāa pradīyamānaṃ devais tu devadattaṃ jalodbhavamc pratyagṛhṇaṃ jayāyainaṃ stūyamānas tadāmaraiḥa sa śaṅkhī kavacī bāṇī pragṛhītaśarāsanaḥc dānavālayam atyugraṃ prayāto smi yuyutsayā arjuna uvācaa tato haṃ stūyamānas tu tatra tatra maharṣibhiḥc apaśyam udadhiṃ bhīmam apāṃpatim athāvyayama phenavatyaḥ prakīrṇāś ca saṃhatāś ca samucchritāḥc ūrmayaś cātra dṛśyante calanta iva parvatāḥe nāvaḥ sahasraśas tatra ratnapūrṇāḥ samantataḥf nabhasīva vimānāni vicarantyo virejirea timiṃgilāḥ kacchapāś ca tathā timitimiṃgilāḥc makarāś cātra dṛśyante jale magnā ivādrayaḥa śaṅkhānāṃ ca sahasrāṇi magnāny apsu samantataḥc dṛśyante sma yathā rātrau tārās tanv abhrasaṃvṛtāḥa tathā sahasraśas tatra ratnasaṃghāḥ plavanty utac vāyuś ca ghūrṇate bhīmas tad adbhutam ivābhavata tam atītya mahāvegaṃ sarvāmbhonidhim uttamamc apaśyaṃ dānavākīrṇaṃ tad daityapuram antikāta tatraiva mātalis tūrṇaṃ nipatya pṛthivītaleb rathaṃ taṃ tu samāśliṣya prādravad rathayogavitc nādayan rathaghoṣeṇa tat puraṃ samupādravata rathaghoṣaṃ tu taṃ śrutvā stanayitnor ivāmbarec manvānā devarājaṃ māṃ saṃvignā dānavābhavana sarve saṃbhrāntamanasaḥ śaracāpadharāḥ sthitāḥc tathā śūlāsiparaśugadāmusalapāṇayaḥa tato dvārāṇi pidadhur dānavās trastacetasaḥc saṃvidhāya pure rakṣāṃ na sma kaś cana dṛśyatea tataḥ śaṅkham upādāya devadattaṃ mahāsvanamc puram āsuram āśliṣya prādhamaṃ taṃ śanair ahama sa tu śabdo divaṃ stabdhvā pratiśabdam ajījanatc vitresuś ca nililyuś ca bhūtāni sumahānty apia tato nivātakavacāḥ sarva eva samantataḥc daṃśitā vividhais trāṇair vividhāyudhapāṇayaḥa āyasaiś ca mahāśūlair gadābhir musalair apic paṭṭiśaiḥ karavālaiś ca rathacakraiś ca bhārataa śataghnībhir bhuśuṇḍībhiḥ khaḍgaiś citraiḥ svalaṃkṛtaiḥc pragṛhītair diteḥ putrāḥ prādurāsan sahasraśaḥa tato vicārya bahudhā rathamārgeṣu tān hayānc prācodayat same deśe mātalir bharatarṣabhaa tena teṣāṃ praṇunnānām āśutvāc chīghragāmināmc nānvapaśyaṃ tadā kiṃ cit tan me dbhutam ivābhavata tatas te dānavās tatra yodhavrātāny anekaśaḥc vikṛtasvararūpāṇi bhṛśaṃ sarvāṇy acodayana tena śabdena mahatā samudre parvatopamāḥc āplavanta gataiḥ sattvair matsyāḥ śatasahasraśaḥa tato vegena mahatā dānavā mām upādravanc vimuñcantaḥ śitān bāṇāñ śataśo tha sahasraśaḥa sa saṃprahāras tumulas teṣāṃ mama ca bhāratac avartata mahāghoro nivātakavacāntakaḥa tato devarṣayaś caiva dānavarṣigaṇāś ca yec brahmarṣayaś ca siddhāś ca samājagmur mahāmṛdhea te vai mām anurūpābhir madhurābhir jayaiṣiṇaḥc astuvan munayo vāgbhir yathendraṃ tārakāmaye arjuna uvācaa tato nivātakavacāḥ sarve vegena bhāratac abhyadravan māṃ sahitāḥ pragṛhītāyudhā raṇea ācchidya rathapanthānam utkrośanto mahārathāḥc āvṛtya sarvatas te māṃ śaravarṣair avākirana tato pare mahāvīryāḥ śūlapaṭṭiśapāṇayaḥc śūlāni ca bhuśuṇḍīś ca mumucur dānavā mayia tac chūlavarṣaṃ sumahad gadāśaktisamākulamc aniśaṃ sṛjyamānaṃ tair apatan madrathoparia anye mām abhyadhāvanta nivātakavacā yudhic śitaśastrāyudhā raudrāḥ kālarūpāḥ prahāriṇaḥa tān ahaṃ vividhair bāṇair vegavadbhir ajihmagaiḥc gāṇḍīvamuktair abhyaghnam ekaikaṃ daśabhir mṛdhee te kṛtā vimukhāḥ sarve matprayuktaiḥ śilāśitaiḥa tato mātalinā tūrṇaṃ hayās te saṃpracoditāḥc rathamārgād bahūṃs tatra vicerur vātaraṃhasaḥe susaṃyatā mātalinā prāmathnanta diteḥ sutāna śataṃ śatās te harayas tasmin yuktā mahārathec tadā mātalinā yattā vyacarann alpakā ivaa teṣāṃ caraṇapātena rathanemisvanena cac mama bāṇanipātaiś ca hatās te śataśo surāḥa gatāsavas tathā cānye pragṛhītaśarāsanāḥc hatasārathayas tatra vyakṛṣyanta turaṃgamaiḥa te diśo vidiśaḥ sarvāḥ pratirudhya prahāriṇaḥc nighnanti vividhaiḥ śastrais tato me vyathitaṃ manaḥa tato haṃ mātaler vīryam apaśyaṃ paramādbhutamc aśvāṃs tathā vegavato yad ayatnād adhārayata tato haṃ laghubhiś citrair astrais tān asurān raṇec sāyudhān acchinaṃ rājañ śataśo tha sahasraśaḥa evaṃ me caratas tatra sarvayatnena śatruhanc prītimān abhavad vīro mātaliḥ śakrasārathiḥa vadhyamānās tatas te tu hayais tena rathena cac agaman prakṣayaṃ ke cin nyavartanta tathāparea spardhamānā ivāsmābhir nivātakavacā raṇec śaravarṣair mahadbhir māṃ samantāt pratyavārayand śaravegair nihatyāham astraiḥ śaravighātibhiḥd jvaladbhiḥ paramaiḥ śīghrais tān avidhyaṃ sahasraśaḥa tato haṃ laghubhiś citrair brahmāstraparimantritaiḥc vyadhamaṃ sāyakair āśu śataśo tha sahasraśaḥa tataḥ saṃpīḍyamānās te krodhāviṣṭā mahāsurāḥc apīḍayan māṃ sahitāḥ śaraśūlāsivṛṣṭibhiḥa tato ham astram ātiṣṭhaṃ paramaṃ tigmatejasamc dayitaṃ devarājasya mādhavaṃ nāma bhārataa tataḥ khaḍgāṃs triśūlāṃś ca tomarāṃś ca sahasraśaḥc astravīryeṇa śatadhā tair muktān aham acchinama chittvā praharaṇāny eṣāṃ tatas tān api sarvaśaḥc pratyavidhyam ahaṃ roṣād daśabhir daśabhiḥ śaraiḥa gāṇḍīvād dhi tadā saṃkhye yathā bhramarapaṅktayaḥc niṣpatanti tathā bāṇās tan mātalir apūjayata teṣām api tu bāṇās te bahutvāc chalabhā ivac avākiran māṃ balavat tān ahaṃ vyadhamaṃ śaraiḥa vadhyamānās tatas te tu nivātakavacāḥ punaḥc śaravarṣair mahadbhir māṃ samantāt paryavārayana śaravegān nihatyāham astraiḥ śaravighātibhiḥc jvaladbhiḥ paramaiḥ śīghrais tān avidhyaṃ sahasraśaḥa teṣāṃ chinnāni gātrāṇi visṛjanti sma śoṇitamc prāvṛṣīvātivṛṣṭāni śṛṅgāṇīva dharābhṛtāma indrāśanisamasparśair vegavadbhir ajihmagaiḥc madbāṇair vadhyamānās te samudvignāḥ sma dānavāḥa śatadhā bhinnadehāntrāḥ kṣīṇapraharaṇaujasaḥc tato nivātakavacā mām ayudhyanta māyayā arjuna uvācaa tato śmavarṣaṃ sumahat prādurāsīt samantataḥc nagamātrair mahāghorais tan māṃ dṛḍham apīḍayata tad ahaṃ vajrasaṃkāśaiḥ śarair indrāstracoditaiḥc acūrṇayaṃ vegavadbhiḥ śatadhaikaikam āhavea cūrṇyamāne śmavarṣe tu pāvakaḥ samajāyatac tatrāśmacūrṇam apatat pāvakaprakarā ivad tato haṃ vāruṇāstreṇa aśmavarṣaṃ viśātavāna tato śmavarṣe nihate jalavarṣaṃ mahattaramc dhārābhir akṣamātrābhiḥ prādurāsīn mamāntikea nabhasaḥ pracyutā dhārās tigmavīryāḥ sahasraśaḥc āvṛṇvan sarvato vyoma diśaś copadiśas tathāa dhārāṇāṃ ca nipātena vāyor visphūrjitena cac garjitena ca daityānāṃ na prājñāyata kiṃ canaa dhārā divi ca saṃbaddhā vasudhāyāṃ ca sarvaśaḥc vyāmohayanta māṃ tatra nipatantyo niśaṃ bhuvia tatropadiṣṭam indreṇa divyam astraṃ viśoṣaṇamc dīptaṃ prāhiṇavaṃ ghoram aśuṣyat tena taj jalama hate śmavarṣe tu mayā jalavarṣe ca śoṣitec mumucur dānavā māyām agniṃ vāyuṃ ca mānadaa tato ham agniṃ vyadhamaṃ salilāstreṇa sarvaśaḥc śailena ca mahāstreṇa vāyor vegam adhārayama tasyāṃ pratihatāyāṃ tu dānavā yuddhadurmadāḥc prākurvan vividhā māyā yaugapadyena bhārataa tato varṣaṃ prādurabhūt sumahal lomaharṣaṇamc astrāṇāṃ ghorarūpāṇām agner vāyos tathāśmanāma sā tu māyāmayī vṛṣṭiḥ pīḍayām āsa māṃ yudhic atha ghoraṃ tamas tīvraṃ prādurāsīt samantataḥa tamasā saṃvṛte loke ghoreṇa paruṣeṇa cac turagā vimukhāś cāsan prāskhalac cāpi mātaliḥa hastād dhiraṇmayaś cāsya pratodaḥ prāpatad bhuvic asakṛc cāha māṃ bhītaḥ kvāsīti bharatarṣabhaa māṃ ca bhīr āviśat tīvrā tasmin vigatacetasic sa ca māṃ vigatajñānaḥ saṃtrasta idam abravīta surāṇām asurāṇāṃ ca saṃgrāmaḥ sumahān abhūtc amṛtārthe purā pārtha sa ca dṛṣṭo mayānaghaa śambarasya vadhe cāpi saṃgrāmaḥ sumahān abhūtc sārathyaṃ devarājasya tatrāpi kṛtavān ahama tathaiva vṛtrasya vadhe saṃgṛhītā hayā mayāc vairocaner mayā yuddhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ cāpi sudāruṇamd balaprajñādayaś cāpi tathānyeṣāṃ ca pāṇḍavaa ete mayā mahāghorāḥ saṃgrāmāḥ paryupāsitāḥc na cāpi vigatajñāno bhūtapūrvo smi pāṇḍavaa pitāmahena saṃhāraḥ prajānāṃ vihito dhruvamc na hi yuddham idaṃ yuktam anyatra jagataḥ kṣayāta tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā saṃstabhyātmānam ātmanāc mohayiṣyan dānavānām ahaṃ māyāmayaṃ balama abruvaṃ mātaliṃ bhītaṃ paśya me bhujayor balamc astrāṇāṃ ca prabhāvaṃ me dhanuṣo gāṇḍivasya caa adyāstramāyayaiteṣāṃ māyām etāṃ sudāruṇāmc vinihanmi tamaś cograṃ mā bhaiḥ sūta sthiro bhavaa evam uktvāham asṛjam astramāyāṃ narādhipac mohanīṃ sarvaśatrūṇāṃ hitāya tridivaukasāma pīḍyamānāsu māyāsu tāsu tāsv asureśvarāḥc punar bahuvidhā māyāḥ prākurvann amitaujasaḥa punaḥ prakāśam abhavat tamasā grasyate punaḥc vrajaty adarśanaṃ lokaḥ punar apsu nimajjatia susaṃgṛhītair haribhiḥ prakāśe sati mātaliḥc vyacarat syandanāgryeṇa saṃgrāme lomaharṣaṇea tataḥ paryapatann ugrā nivātakavacā mayic tān ahaṃ vivaraṃ dṛṣṭvā prāhiṇvaṃ yamasādanamd tathā devair avadhyatvaṃ purasyābhedyatvam eva tud manuṣyāṇāṃ durbalatvād upekṣyaiva mahāsuraiḥa vartamāne tathā yuddhe nivātakavacāntakec nāpaśyaṃ sahasā sarvān dānavān māyayāvṛtān arjuna uvācaa adṛśyamānās te daityā yodhayanti sma māyayāc adṛśyān astravīryeṇa tān apy aham ayodhayama gāṇḍīvamuktā viśikhāḥ samyag astrapracoditāḥc acchindann uttamāṅgāni yatra yatra sma te bhavana tato nivātakavacā vadhyamānā mayā yudhic saṃhṛtya māyāṃ sahasā prāviśan puram ātmanaḥa vyapayāteṣu daityeṣu prādurbhūte ca darśanec apaśyaṃ dānavāṃs tatra hatāñ śatasahasraśaḥa viniṣpiṣṭāni tatraiṣāṃ śastrāṇy ābharaṇāni cac kūṭaśaḥ sma pradṛśyante gātrāṇi kavacāni caa hayānāṃ nāntaraṃ hy āsīt padād vicalituṃ padamc utpatya sahasā tasthur antarikṣagamās tataḥa tato nivātakavacā vyoma saṃchādya kevalamc adṛśyā hy abhyavartanta visṛjantaḥ śiloccayāna antarbhūmigatāś cānye hayānāṃ caraṇāny athac nyagṛhṇan dānavā ghorā rathacakre ca bhārataa vinigṛhya harīn aśvān rathaṃ ca mama yudhyataḥc sarvato mām acinvanta sarathaṃ dharaṇīdharaiḥa parvatair upacīyadbhiḥ patamānais tathāparaiḥc sa deśo yatra vartāma guheva samapadyataa parvataiś chādyamāno haṃ nigṛhītaiś ca vājibhiḥc agacchaṃ paramām ārtiṃ mātalis tad alakṣayata lakṣayitvā tu māṃ bhītam idaṃ vacanam abravītc arjunārjuna mā bhais tvaṃ vajram astram udīrayaa tato haṃ tasya tad vākyaṃ śrutvā vajram udīrayamc devarājasya dayitaṃ vajram astraṃ narādhipaa acalaṃ sthānam āsādya gāṇḍīvam anumantrya cac amuñcaṃ vajrasaṃsparśān āyasān niśitāñ śarāna tato māyāś ca tāḥ sarvā nivātakavacāṃś ca tānc te vajracoditā bāṇā vajrabhūtāḥ samāviśana te vajravegābhihatā dānavāḥ parvatopamāḥc itaretaram āśliṣya nyapatan pṛthivītalea antarbhūmau tu ye gṛhṇan dānavā rathavājinaḥc anupraviśya tān bāṇāḥ prāhiṇvan yamasādanama hatair nivātakavacair nirastaiḥ parvatopamaiḥc samācchādyata deśaḥ sa vikīrṇair iva parvataiḥa na hayānāṃ kṣatiḥ kā cin na rathasya na mātaleḥc mama cādṛśyata tadā tad adbhutam ivābhavata tato māṃ prahasan rājan mātaliḥ pratyabhāṣatac naitad arjuna deveṣu tvayi vīryaṃ yadīkṣyatea hateṣv asurasaṃgheṣu dārās teṣāṃ tu sarvaśaḥc prākrośan nagare tasmin yathā śaradi lakṣmaṇāḥa tato mātalinā sārdham ahaṃ tat puram abhyayāmc trāsayan rathaghoṣeṇa nivātakavacastriyaḥa tān dṛṣṭvā daśasāhasrān mayūrasadṛśān hayānc rathaṃ ca ravisaṃkāśaṃ prādravan gaṇaśaḥ striyaḥa tābhir ābharaṇaiḥ śabdas trāsitābhiḥ samīritaḥc śilānām iva śaileṣu patantīnām abhūt tadāa vitrastā daityanāryas tāḥ svāni veśmāny athāviśanc bahuratnavicitrāṇi śātakumbhamayāni caa tad adbhutākāram ahaṃ dṛṣṭvā nagaram uttamamc viśiṣṭaṃ devanagarād apṛcchaṃ mātaliṃ tataḥa idam evaṃvidhaṃ kasmād devatā nāviśanty utac puraṃdarapurād dhīdaṃ viśiṣṭam iti lakṣaye mātalir uvācaa āsīd idaṃ purā pārtha devarājasya naḥ puramc tato nivātakavacair itaḥ pracyāvitāḥ surāḥa tapas taptvā mahat tīvraṃ prasādya ca pitāmahamc idaṃ vṛtaṃ nivāsāya devebhyaś cābhayaṃ yudhia tataḥ śakreṇa bhagavān svayambhūr abhicoditaḥc vidhattāṃ bhagavān atrety ātmano hitakāmyayāa tata ukto bhagavatā diṣṭam atreti vāsavaḥc bhavitāntas tvam evaiṣāṃ dehenānyena vṛtrahana tata eṣāṃ vadhārthāya śakro strāṇi dadau tavac na hi śakyāḥ surair hantuṃ ya ete nihatās tvayāa kālasya pariṇāmena tatas tvam iha bhāratac eṣām antakaraḥ prāptas tat tvayā ca kṛtaṃ tathāa dānavānāṃ vināśārthaṃ mahāstrāṇāṃ mahad balamc grāhitas tvaṃ mahendreṇa puruṣendra tad uttamam arjuna uvācaa tataḥ praviśya nagaraṃ dānavāṃś ca nihatya tānc punar mātalinā sārdham agacchaṃ devasadma tat arjuna uvācaa nivartamānena mayā mahad dṛṣṭaṃ tato paramc puraṃ kāmacaraṃ divyaṃ pāvakārkasamaprabhama drumai ratnamayaiś caitrair bhāsvaraiś ca patatribhiḥc paulomaiḥ kālakeyaiś ca nityahṛṣṭair adhiṣṭhitama gopurāṭṭālakopetaṃ caturdvāraṃ durāsadamc sarvaratnamayaṃ divyam adbhutopamadarśaname drumaiḥ puṣpaphalopetair divyaratnamayair vṛtama tathā patatribhir divyair upetaṃ sumanoharaiḥc asurair nityamuditaiḥ śūlarṣṭimusalāyudhaiḥe cāpamudgarahastaiś ca sragvibhiḥ sarvato vṛtama tad ahaṃ prekṣya daityānāṃ puram adbhutadarśanamc apṛcchaṃ mātaliṃ rājan kim idaṃ dṛśyateti vai mātalir uvācaa pulomā nāma daiteyī kālakā ca mahāsurīc divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ te ceratuḥ paramaṃ tapaḥe tapaso nte tatas tābhyāṃ svayambhūr adadād varama agṛhṇītāṃ varaṃ te tu sutānām alpaduḥkhatāmc avadhyatāṃ ca rājendra surarākṣasapannagaiḥa ramaṇīyaṃ puraṃ cedaṃ khacaraṃ sukṛtaprabhamc sarvaratnaiḥ samuditaṃ durdharṣam amarair apie sayakṣagandharvagaṇaiḥ pannagāsurarākṣasaiḥa sarvakāmaguṇopetaṃ vītaśokam anāmayamc brahmaṇā bharataśreṣṭha kālakeyakṛte kṛtama tad etat khacaraṃ divyaṃ caraty amaravarjitamc paulomādhyuṣitaṃ vīra kālakeyaiś ca dānavaiḥa hiraṇyapuram ity etat khyāyate nagaraṃ mahatc rakṣitaṃ kālakeyaiś ca paulomaiś ca mahāsuraiḥa ta ete muditā nityam avadhyāḥ sarvadaivataiḥc nivasanty atra rājendra gatodvegā nirutsukāḥd surāsurair avadhyānāṃ dānavānāṃ dhanaṃjayae mānuṣo mṛtyur eteṣāṃ nirdiṣṭo brahmaṇā purāf etān api raṇe pārtha kālakañjān durāsadānf vajrāstreṇa nayasvāśu vināśaṃ sumahābalān arjuna uvācaa surāsurair avadhyāṃs tān ahaṃ jñātvā tataḥ prabhoc abruvaṃ mātaliṃ hṛṣṭo yāhy etat puram añjasāa tridaśeśadviṣo yāvat kṣayam astrair nayāmy ahamc na kathaṃ cid dhi me pāpā na vadhyā ye suradviṣaḥa uvāha māṃ tataḥ śīghraṃ hiraṇyapuram antikātc rathena tena divyena hariyuktena mātaliḥa te mām ālakṣya daiteyā vicitrābharaṇāmbarāḥc samutpetur mahāvegā rathān āsthāya daṃśitāḥa tato nālīkanārācair bhallaśaktyṛṣṭitomaraiḥc abhyaghnan dānavendrā māṃ kruddhās tīvraparākramāḥa tad ahaṃ cāstravarṣeṇa mahatā pratyavārayamc śastravarṣaṃ mahad rājan vidyābalam upāśritaḥa vyāmohayaṃ ca tān sarvān rathamārgaiś caran raṇec te nyonyam abhisaṃmūḍhāḥ pātayanti sma dānavāḥa teṣām ahaṃ vimūḍhānām anyonyam abhidhāvatāmc śirāṃsi viśikhair dīptair vyaharaṃ śatasaṃghaśaḥa te vadhyamānā daiteyāḥ puram āsthāya tat punaḥc kham utpetuḥ sanagarā māyām āsthāya dānavīma tato haṃ śaravarṣeṇa mahatā pratyavārayamc mārgam āvṛtya daityānāṃ gatiṃ caiṣām avārayama tat puraṃ khacaraṃ divyaṃ kāmagaṃ divyavarcasamc daiteyair varadānena dhāryate sma yathāsukhama antarbhūmau nipatitaṃ punar ūrdhvaṃ pratiṣṭhatec punas tiryak prayāty āśu punar apsu nimajjatia amarāvatisaṃkāśaṃ puraṃ kāmagamaṃ tu tatc aham astrair bahuvidhaiḥ pratyagṛhṇaṃ narādhipaa tato haṃ śarajālena divyāstramuditena cac nyagṛhṇaṃ saha daiteyais tat puraṃ bharatarṣabhaa vikṣataṃ cāyasair bāṇair matprayuktair ajihmagaiḥc mahīm abhyapatad rājan prabhagnaṃ puram āsurama te vadhyamānā madbāṇair vajravegair ayasmayaiḥc paryabhramanta vai rājann asurāḥ kālacoditāḥa tato mātalir apy āśu purastān nipatann ivac mahīm avātarat kṣipraṃ rathenādityavarcasāa tato rathasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭis teṣām amarṣiṇāmc yuyutsūnāṃ mayā sārdhaṃ paryavartanta bhārataa tān ahaṃ niśitair bāṇair vyadhamaṃ gārdhravājitaiḥc te yuddhe saṃnyavartanta samudrasya yathormayaḥa neme śakyā mānuṣeṇa yuddheneti pracintya vaic tato ham ānupūrvyeṇa sarvāṇy astrāṇy ayojayama tatas tāni sahasrāṇi rathānāṃ citrayodhināmc astrāṇi mama divyāni pratyaghnañ śanakair ivaa rathamārgān vicitrāṃs te vicaranto mahārathāḥc pratyadṛśyanta saṃgrāme śataśo tha sahasraśaḥa vicitramukuṭāpīḍā vicitrakavacadhvajāḥc vicitrābharaṇāś caiva nandayantīva me manaḥa ahaṃ tu śaravarṣais tān astrapramuditai raṇec nāśaknuvaṃ pīḍayituṃ te tu māṃ paryapīḍayana taiḥ pīḍyamāno bahubhiḥ kṛtāstraiḥ kuśalair yudhic vyathito smi mahāyuddhe bhayaṃ cāgān mahan mamad tato haṃ paramāyasto mātaliṃ paripṛṣṭavānd kim ete mama bāṇaughair divyāstraparimantritaiḥd na vadhyante mahāghorais tattvam ākhyāhi pṛcchataḥd sa mām uvāca paryāptas tvam eṣāṃ bharatarṣabhad tān uddiśyātha marmāṇi pratighātaṃ tadācarad etac chrutvā tu rājendra saṃprahṛṣṭas tam ūcivānd nivartaya rathaṃ śīghraṃ paśya caitān nipātitānd evam ukto rathaṃ tatra mātaliḥ paryavartayatd tato matvā raṇe bhagnaṃ dānavāḥ pratiharṣitāḥd vicukruśur mahārāja svareṇa mahatā tadād abhagnaḥ kaiś cid apy eṣa pāṇḍavo raṇamūrdhanid asmābhiḥ samare bhagna ity evaṃ saṃghaśas tadāa tato haṃ devadevāya rudrāya praṇato raṇeb prayataḥ praṇato bhūtvā namaskṛtya mahātmanec svasti bhūtebhya ity uktvā mahāstraṃ samayojayame yat tad raudram iti khyātaṃ sarvāmitravināśanamf ahaṃ pāśupataṃ divyaṃ sarvalokanamaskṛtama tato paśyaṃ triśirasaṃ puruṣaṃ navalocanamc trimukhaṃ ṣaḍbhujaṃ dīptam arkajvalanamūrdhajame lelihānair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtaśīrṣam amitrahanf bhaktānukampinaṃ devaṃ nāgayajñopavītinama vibhīs tatas tad astraṃ tu ghoraṃ raudraṃ sanātanamc dṛṣṭvā gāṇḍīvasaṃyogam ānīya bharatarṣabhaa namaskṛtvā trinetrāya śarvāyāmitatejasec muktavān dānavendrāṇāṃ parābhāvāya bhārataa muktamātre tatas tasmin rūpāṇy āsan sahasraśaḥc mṛgāṇām atha siṃhānāṃ vyāghrāṇāṃ ca viśāṃ patee ṛkṣāṇāṃ mahiṣāṇāṃ ca pannagānāṃ tathā gavāma gajānāṃ sṛmarāṇāṃ ca śarabhāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥc ṛṣabhāṇāṃ varāhāṇāṃ mārjārāṇāṃ tathaiva cad ṛkṣāśvameṣavaktrāṇām ulūkānāṃ tathaiva cad mīnavāyasarūpāṇāṃ nānāvaktrapracāriṇāme śālāvṛkāṇāṃ pretānāṃ bhuruṇḍānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥf śārdūlānāṃ varāhāṇāṃ śarabhāṇāṃ pravalgatāma gṛdhrāṇāṃ garuḍānāṃ ca makarāṇāṃ tathaiva cab vṛkṣāṇāṃ parvatānāṃ ca samudrāṇāṃ tathaiva cab devānāṃ ca ṛṣīṇāṃ ca gandharvāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥc piśācānāṃ sayakṣāṇāṃ tathaiva ca suradviṣāma guhyakānāṃ ca saṃgrāme nairṛtānāṃ tathaiva cac jhaṣāṇāṃ gajavaktrāṇām ulūkānāṃ tathaiva caa mīnakūrmasamūhānāṃ nānāśastrāsipāṇināmc tathaiva yātu dhānānāṃ gadāmudgaradhāriṇāma etaiś cānyaiś ca bahubhir nānārūpadharais tathāc sarvam āsīj jagad vyāptaṃ tasminn astre visarjitea triṣirobhiś caturdaṃṣṭraiś caturāsyaiś caturbhujaiḥc anekarūpasaṃyuktair māṃsamedovasāśibhiḥe abhīkṣṇaṃ vadhyamānās te dānavā ye samāgatāḥa arkajvalanatejobhir vajrāśanisamaprabhaiḥc adrisāramayaiś cānyair bāṇair arividāraṇaiḥe nyahanaṃ dānavān sarvān muhūrtenaiva bhārataa gāṇḍīvāstrapraṇunnāṃs tān gatāsūn nabhasaś cyutānc dṛṣṭvāhaṃ prāṇamaṃ bhūyas tripuraghnāya vedhasea tathā raudrāstraniṣpiṣṭān divyābharaṇabhūṣitānc niśāmya paramaṃ harṣam agamad devasārathiḥa tad asahyaṃ kṛtaṃ karma devair api durāsadamc dṛṣṭvā māṃ pūjayām āsa mātaliḥ śakrasārathiḥa uvāca cedaṃ vacanaṃ prīyamāṇaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥb hatāṃs tān dānavān dṛṣṭvā mayā saṃkhye sahasraśaḥc surāsurair asahyaṃ hi karma yat sādhitaṃ tvayāe na hy etat saṃyuge kartum api śaktaḥ sureśvaraḥf dhruvaṃ dhanaṃjaya prītas tvayi śakraḥ purārdanaa surāsurair avadhyaṃ hi puram etat khagaṃ mahatc tvayā vimathitaṃ vīra svavīryāstratapobalāta vidhvaste tha pure tasmin dānaveṣu hateṣu cac vinadantyaḥ striyaḥ sarvā niṣpetur nagarād bahiḥa prakīrṇakeśyo vyathitāḥ kurarya iva duḥkhitāḥb kurarya iva vāśantyo duḥkhitāś ca muhur muhuḥc petuḥ putrān pitṝn bhrātṝñ śocamānā mahītalea rudantyo dīnakaṇṭhyas tā vinadantyo hateśvarāḥc urāṃsi pāṇibhir ghnantyaḥ prasrastasragvibhūṣaṇāḥa tac chokayuktam aśrīkaṃ duḥkhadainyasamāhatamc na babhau dānavapuraṃ hatatviṭkaṃ hateśvarama gandharvanagarākāraṃ hatanāgam iva hradamc śuṣkavṛkṣam ivāraṇyam adṛśyam abhavat purama māṃ tu saṃhṛṣṭamanasaṃ kṣipraṃ mātalir ānayatc devarājasya bhavanaṃ kṛtakarmāṇam āhavāta hiraṇyapuram ārujya nihatya ca mahāsurānc nivātakavacāṃś caiva tato haṃ śakram āgamama mama karma ca devendraṃ mātalir vistareṇa tatc sarvaṃ viśrāvayām āsa yathā bhūtaṃ mahādyutea hiraṇyapuraghātaṃ ca māyānāṃ ca nivāraṇamc nivātakavacānāṃ ca vadhaṃ saṃkhye mahaujasāmd kālakeyavadhaṃ caiva adbhutaṃ romaharṣaṇama tac chrutvā bhagavān prītaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ puraṃdaraḥc marudbhiḥ sahitaḥ śrīmān sādhu sādhv ity athābravītd pariṣvajya ca māṃ premṇā mūrdhny upāghrāya sasmitama tato māṃ devarājo vai samāśvāsya punaḥ punaḥc abravīd vibudhaiḥ sārdham idaṃ sumadhuraṃ vacaḥa atidevāsuraṃ karma kṛtam etat tvayā raṇec gurvarthaś ca mahān pārtha kṛtaḥ śatrūn ghnatā mamaa evam eva sadā bhāvyaṃ sthireṇājau dhanaṃjayac asaṃmūḍhena cāstrāṇāṃ kartavyaṃ pratipādanama aviṣahyo raṇe hi tvaṃ devadānavarākṣasaiḥc sayakṣāsuragandharvaiḥ sapakṣigaṇapannagaiḥa vasudhāṃ cāpi kaunteya tvadbāhubalanirjitāmc pālayiṣyati dharmātmā kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ arjuna uvācaa tato mām abhiviśvastaṃ saṃrūḍhaśaravikṣatamc devarājo nugṛhyedaṃ kāle vacanam abravīta divyāny astrāṇi sarvāṇi tvayi tiṣṭhanti bhāratac na tvābhibhavituṃ śakto mānuṣo bhuvi kaś canaa bhīṣmo droṇaḥ kṛpaḥ karṇaḥ śakuniḥ saha rājabhiḥc saṃgrāmasthasya te putra kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīma idaṃ ca me tanutrāṇaṃ prāyacchan maghavān prabhuḥc abhedyaṃ kavacaṃ divyaṃ srajaṃ caiva hiraṇmayīma devadattaṃ ca me śaṅkhaṃ devaḥ prādān mahāravamc divyaṃ cedaṃ kirīṭaṃ me svayam indro yuyoja haa tato divyāni vastrāṇi divyāny ābharaṇāni cac prādāc chakro mamaitāni rucirāṇi bṛhanti caa evaṃ saṃpūjitas tatra sukham asmy uṣito nṛpac indrasya bhavane puṇye gandharvaśiśubhiḥ sahaa tato mām abravīc chakraḥ prītimān amaraiḥ sahac samayo rjuna gantuṃ te bhrātaro hi smaranti tea evam indrasya bhavane pañca varṣāṇi bhāratac uṣitāni mayā rājan smaratā dyūtajaṃ kalima tato bhavantam adrākṣaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritamc gandhamādanam āsādya parvatasyāsya mūrdhani yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa diṣṭyā dhanaṃjayāstrāṇi tvayā prāptāni bhāratac diṣṭyā cārādhito rājā devānām īśvaraḥ prabhuḥa diṣṭyā ca bhagavān sthāṇur devyā saha paraṃtapac sākṣād dṛṣṭaḥ suyuddhena toṣitaś ca tvayānaghaa diṣṭyā ca putrān api vaśīkṛtāna tāni tv icchāmi te draṣṭuṃ divyāny astrāṇi bhāratac yais tathā vīryavantas te nivātakavacā hatād mahābalā mahāmāyā ekena nihitā yudhi arjuna uvācaa śvaḥ prabhāte bhavān draṣṭā divyāny astrāṇi sarvaśaḥc nivātakavacā ghorā yair mayā vinipātitāḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa evam āgamanaṃ tatra kathayitvā dhanaṃjayaḥc bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ sarvai rajanīṃ tām uvāsa ha vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tasyāṃ rajanyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥc utthāyāvaśyakāryāṇi kṛtavān bhratṛbhiḥ sahaa tataḥ saṃcodayām āsa so rjunaṃ bhrātṛnandanamc darśayāstrāṇi kaunteya yair jitā dānavās tvayāa tato dhanaṃjayo rājan devair dattāni pāṇḍavaḥc astrāṇi tāni divyāni darśayām āsa bhārataa yathānyāyaṃ mahātejāḥ śaucaṃ paramam āsthitaḥb namaskṛtya triṇetrāya vāsavāya ca pāṇḍavaḥc girikūbaraṃ pādapāṅgaṃ śubhaveṇu triveṇukame pārthivaṃ ratham āsthāya śobhamāno dhanaṃjayaḥa tataḥ sudaṃśitas tena kavacena suvarcasāc dhanur ādāya gāṇḍīvaṃ devadattaṃ ca vārijama śośubhyamānaḥ kaunteya ānupūrvyān mahābhujaḥc astrāṇi tāni divyāni darśanāyopacakramea atha prayokṣyamāṇena divyāny astrāṇi tena vaic samākrāntā mahī padbhyāṃ samakampata sadrumāa kṣubhitāḥ saritaś caiva tathaiva ca mahodadhiḥc śailāś cāpi vyaśīryanta na vavau ca samīraṇaḥa na babhāse sahasrāṃśur na jajvāla ca pāvakaḥc na vedāḥ pratibhānti sma dvijātīnāṃ kathaṃ canaa antarbhūmigatā ye ca prāṇino janamejayac pīḍyamānāḥ samutthāya pāṇḍavaṃ paryavārayana vepamānāḥ prāñjalayas te sarve pihitānanāḥc dahyamānās tadāstrais tair yācanti sma dhanaṃjayama tato brahmarṣayaś caiva siddhāś caiva surarṣayaḥc jaṅgamāni ca bhūtāni sarvāṇy evāvatasthirea rājarṣayaś ca pravarās tathaiva ca divaukasaḥc yakṣarākṣasagandharvās tathaiva ca patatriṇaḥd khecarāṇi ca bhūtāni sarvāṇy evāvatasthirea tataḥ pitāmahaś caiva lokapālāś ca sarvaśaḥc bhagavāṃś ca mahādevaḥ sagaṇo bhyāyayau tadāa tato vāyur mahārāja divyair mālyaiḥ sugandhibhiḥc abhitaḥ pāṇḍavāṃś citrair avacakre samantataḥa jaguś ca gāthā vividhā gandharvāḥ suracoditāḥc nanṛtuḥ saṃghaśaś caiva rājann apsarasāṃ gaṇāḥd devatūryāṇy avādyanta ramyāṇi madhurāṇi caa tasmiṃs tu tumule kāle nāradaḥ suracoditaḥc āgamyāha vacaḥ pārthaṃ śravaṇīyam idaṃ nṛpaa arjunārjuna mā yuṅkṣva kṛthāḥ kva cita ajātaśatro tvaṃ caiva drakṣyase tāni saṃyugec yojyamānāni pārthena dviṣatām avamardanea nivāryātha tataḥ pārthaṃ sarve devā yathāgatamc jagmur anye ca ye tatra samājagmur nararṣabhaa prasravaṇair upetaṃdiśāṃ gajaiḥ kiṃnarapakṣibhiś cac sukhaṃ nivāsaṃ jahatāṃ hi teṣāṃna prītir āsīd bharatarṣabhāṇāma tatas tu teṣāṃ punar eva harṣaḥkailāsam ālokya mahān babhūvac kuberakāntaṃ janamejaya uvācaa kathaṃ nāgāyutaprāṇo bhīmaseno mahābalaḥc bhayam āhārayat tīvraṃ tasmād ajagarān munea paulastyaṃ yo hvayad yuddhe dhanadaṃ baladarpitaḥc nalinyāṃ kadanaṃ kṛtvā varāṇāṃ savarāhāṇāṃ mahiṣāṇāṃ mahābhujaḥd vinighnaṃs tatra tatraiva bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥd sa mātaṅgaśataprāṇo manuṣyaśatavāraṇaḥd siṃhaśārdūlavikrānto vane tasmin mahābalaḥd vṛkṣān utpāṭayām āsa tarasā vai babhañja cad pṛthivyāś ca pradeśān vai nādayaṃs tu vanāni cad parvatāgrāṇi vai mṛdnan nādayānaś ca vijvaraḥd prakṣipan pādapāṃś cāpi nādenāpūrayan mahīmd vegena nyapatad bhīmo nirbhayaś ca punaḥ mahāraṇye nādān nadati cādbhutānd trāsayan sarvabhūtāni mahāsattvaparākramaḥd tato bhīmasya śabdena bhītāḥ sarpā guhāśayāḥd atikrāntās tu vegena jagāmānusṛtaḥ śanaiḥd tato maravaraprakhyo bhīmaseno mahābalaḥa sa dadarśa mahākāyaṃ bhujaṅgaṃ lomaharṣaṇamc giridurge samāpannaṃ kāyenāvṛtya kandarama parvatābhogavarṣmāṇaṃ bhogaiś candrārkamaṇḍalaiḥc citrāṅgam ajinaiś citrair haridrāsadṛśacchavima
