sahasābhyetya pṛdākuḥ kṣudhito bhṛśamc jagrāhājagaro grāho bhujayor ubhayor balāta tena saṃspṛṣṭamātrasya bhimasenasya vai tadāc saṃjñā mumoha sahasā varadānena tasya haa daśa nāgasahasrāṇi dhārayanti hi yad balamc tad balaṃ bhīmasenasya bhujayor asamaṃ paraiḥa sa tejasvī tathā tena bhujagena vaśīkṛtaḥc visphurañ śanakair bhīmo na śaśāka viceṣṭituma nāgāyutasamaprāṇaḥ siṃhaskandho mahābhujaḥc gṛhīto vyajahāt sattvaṃ varadānena mohitaḥa sa hi prayatnam akarot tīvram ātmavimokṣaṇec na cainam aśakad vīraḥ kathaṃ cit pratibādhitum vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa sa bhīmasenas tejasvī tathā sarpavaśaṃ gataḥc cintayām āsa sarpasya vīryam atyadbhutaṃ mahata uvāca ca mahāsarpaṃ kāmayā brūhi pannagac kas tvaṃ bho bhujagaśreṣṭha kiṃ mayā ca kariṣyasia pāṇḍavo bhimaseno haṃ dharmarājād anantaraḥc nāgāyutasamaprāṇas tvayā nītaḥ kathaṃ vaśama siṃhāḥ kesariṇo vyāghrā mahiṣā vāraṇās tathāc samāgatāś ca bahuśo nihatāś ca mayā mṛdhea dānavāś ca piśācāś ca rākṣasāś ca mahābalāḥc bhujavegam aśaktā me soḍhuṃ pannagasattamaa kiṃ nu vidyābalaṃ kiṃ vā varadānam atho tavac udyogam api kurvāṇo vaśago smi kṛtas tvayāa asatyo vikramo nṝṇām iti me niścitā matiḥc yathedaṃ me tvayā nāga balaṃ pratihataṃ mahata ity evaṃvādinaṃ vīraṃ bhīmam akliṣṭakāriṇamc bhogena mahatā sarpaḥ samantāt paryaveṣṭayata nigṛhya taṃ mahābāhuṃ tataḥ sa bhujagas tadāc vimucyāsya bhujau pīnāv idaṃ vacanam abravīta diṣṭyā tvaṃ kṣudhitasyādya devair bhakṣo mahābhujac diṣṭyā kālasya mahataḥ priyāḥ prāṇā hi dehināma yathā tv idaṃ mayā prāptaṃ bhujaṃgatvam ariṃdamac tad avaśyaṃ mayā khyāpyaṃ tavādya śṛṇu sattamaa imām avasthāṃ saṃprāpto hy ahaṃ kopān manīṣiṇāmc śāpasyāntaṃ pariprepsuḥ sarpasya kathayāmi tata nahuṣo nāma rājarṣir vyaktaṃ te śrotram āgataḥc tavaiva pūrvaḥ pūrveṣām āyor vaṃśakaraḥ sutaḥd tapobhiḥ kratubhiś caiva vidyayābhijanena cad trailokyaiśvaryam atulaṃ prāptaṃ me vikrameṇa cad atha sarvanṛponmāthī mado māṃ samupāviśatd sahasraṃ munimukhyānām uvāha śibikāṃ mamad tato vibhraṃśitaś cāham agastyena mahātmanād imām avasthāṃ saṃprāptaḥ paśya daivam idaṃ mamad na daivaṃ prajñayā tāta na balotsāhaśaktibhiḥd na sahāyabalaiś cāpi kaś cid apy ativartated atha prajñā ca śauryaṃ ca saṃpadaḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavetd prajñāvatāṃ ca śūrāṇāṃ na kadā cid asaṃpadaḥd yathā prājñāś ca śūrāś ca dṛśyante duḥkhajīvinaḥd bhīrumūrkhāś ca sukhinas tasmād daivaṃ hi kāraṇama so haṃ śāpād agastyasya brāhmaṇān avamanya cac imām avasthām āpannaḥ paśya daivam idaṃ mamad patito hi vimānāgryāt sa muniḥ prārthito mayād kuru śāpāntam ity evaṃ provācedaṃ dayānvitaḥd yas tu te vyāhṛtān praśnān prativakṣyati dharmataḥd sa tvāṃ mokṣayitā śāpāt kasmiṃś cit kālaparyayed na ca te matprasādena smṛtibhraṃśo bhaviṣyatid balavān api jantus te gṛhīto vaśyam eṣyatia tvāṃ ced avadhyam āyāntam atīva priyadarśanamc aham adyopayokṣyāmi vidhānaṃ paśya yādṛśama na hi me mucyate kaś cit kathaṃ cid grahaṇaṃ gataḥc gajo vā mahiṣo vāpi ṣaṣṭhe kāle narottamaa nāsi kevalasarpeṇa tiryagyoniṣu vartatāc gṛhītaḥ kauravaśreṣṭha varadānam idaṃ mamaa patatā hi vimānāgrān mayā śakrāsanād drutamc kuru śāpāntam ity ukto bhagavān munisattamaḥa sa mām uvāca tejasvī kṛpayābhipariplutaḥb yas tvayā veṣṭito rājan moham eti mahābalaḥc mokṣas te bhavitā rājan kasmāc cit kālaparyayāta tato smi patito bhūmau na ca mām ajahāt smṛtiḥc smārtam asti purāṇaṃ me yathaivādhigataṃ tathāa yas tu te vyāhṛtān praśnān pratibrūyād viśeṣavitc sa tvāṃ mokṣayitā śāpād iti mām abravīd ṛṣiḥa gṛhītasya tvayā rājan prāṇino pi balīyasaḥc sattvabhraṃśo dhikasyāpi sarvasyāśu bhaviṣyatia iti cāpy aham aśrauṣaṃ vacas teṣāṃ dayāvatāmc mayi saṃjātahārdānām atha te ntarhitā dvijāḥa so haṃ paramaduṣkarmā vasāmi niraye śucauc sarpayonim imāṃ prāpya kālākāṅkṣī mahādyutea tam uvāca mahābāhur bhīmaseno bhujaṃgamamc na te kupye mahāsarpa na cātmānaṃ vigarhayea yasmād abhāvī bhāvī vā manuṣyaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥc āgame yadi vāpāye na tatra glapayen manaḥa daivaṃ puruṣakāreṇa ko nivartitum arhatic daivam eva paraṃ manye puruṣārtho nirarthakaḥa paśya daivopaghātād dhi bhujavīryavyapāśrayamc imām avasthāṃ saṃprāptam animittam ihādya māma kiṃ tu nādyānuśocāmi tathātmānaṃ vināśitamc yathā tu vipine nyastān bhrātṝn rājyaparicyutāna himavāṃś ca sudurgo yaṃ yakṣarākṣasasaṃkulaḥc māṃ ca te samudīkṣantaḥ prapatiṣyanti vihvalāḥa vinaṣṭam atha vā śrutvā bhaviṣyanti nirudyamāḥc dharmaśīlā mayā te hi bādhyante rājyagṛddhināa atha vā nārjuno dhīmān viṣādam upayāsyatic sarvāstravid anādhṛṣyo devagandharvarākṣasaiḥa samarthaḥ sa mahābāhur ekāhnā sumahābalaḥc devarājam api sthānāt pracyāvayitum ojasāa kiṃ punar dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putraṃ durdyūtadevinamc vidviṣṭaṃ sarvalokasya dambhalobhaparāyaṇama mātaraṃ caiva śocāmi kṛpaṇāṃ putragṛddhinīmc yāsmākaṃ nityam āśāste mahattvam adhikaṃ paraiḥa kathaṃ nu tasyānāthāyā madvināśād bhujaṃgamac aphalās te bhaviṣyanti mayi sarve manorathāḥa nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca yamajau guruvartinauc madbāhubalasaṃstabdhau nityaṃ puruṣamāninaua nirutsāhau bhaviṣyete bhraṣṭavīryaparākramauc madvināśāt paridyūnāv iti me vartate matiḥa evaṃvidhaṃ bahu tadā vilalāpa vṛkodaraḥc bhujaṃgabhogasaṃruddho nāśakac ca viceṣṭituma yudhiṣṭhiras tu kaunteya babhūvāsvasthacetanaḥc aniṣṭadarśanān ghorān utpātān paricintayana dāruṇaṃ hy aśivaṃ nādaṃ śivā dakṣiṇataḥ sthitāc dīptāyāṃ diśi vitrastā rauti tasyāśramasya haa ekapakṣākṣicaraṇā vartikā ghoradarśanāc rudhiraṃ vamantī dadṛśe pratyādityam apasvarāa pravavāv anilo rūkṣaś caṇḍaḥ śarkarakarṣaṇaḥc apasavyāni sarvāṇi mṛgapakṣirutāni caa pṛṣṭhato vāyasaḥ kṛṣṇo yāhi yāhīti vāśatic muhur muhuḥ prasphurati dakṣiṇo sya bhujas tathāa hṛdayaṃ caraṇaś cāpi vāmo sya parivartatec savyasyākṣṇo vikāraś cāpy aniṣṭaḥ samapadyataa sa dharmarājo medhāvī śaṅkamāno mahad bhayamc draupadīṃ paripapraccha kva bhīma iti bhārataa śaśaṃsa tasmai pāñcālī cirayātaṃ vṛkodaramb kathayām āsa tat sarvaṃ mṛgān hantum ito gatamb tac chrutvā tvarito rājā bhṛśam udvignamānasaḥc sa pratasthe mahābāhur dhaumyena sahito nṛpaḥa draupadyā rakṣaṇaṃ kāryam ity uvāca dhanaṃjayamc nakulaṃ sahadevaṃ ca vyādideśa dvijān pratia sa tasya padam unnīya tasmād evāśramāt prabhuḥb mṛgayām āsa kaunteya bhīmasenaṃ mahāvaneb sa prācīṃ diśam āsthāya mahato gajayūthapānc dadarśa pṛthivīṃ cihnair bhīmasya paricihnitāmd tato mṛgasahasrāṇi mṛgendrāṇāṃ śatāni cad patitāni vane dṛṣṭvā mārgaṃ tasyāviśan nṛpaḥa dhāvatas tasya vīrasya mṛgārthe vātaraṃhasaḥc ūruvātavinirbhagnān drumān vyāvarjitān pathia sa gatvā tais tadā cihnair dadarśa girigahvareb rūkṣamārutabhūyiṣṭhe niṣpatradrumasaṃkaṭeb īriṇe nirjale deśe kaṇṭakidrumasaṃkuleb aśmasthāṇukṣupākīrṇe sudurge viṣamotkaṭec gṛhītaṃ bhujagendreṇa niśceṣṭam anujaṃ tathā vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa yudhiṣṭhiras tam āsādya sarpabhogābhiveṣṭitamc dayitaṃ bhrātaraṃ vīram idaṃ vacanam abravīta kuntīmātaḥ katham imām āpadaṃ tvam avāptavānc kaś cāyaṃ parvatābhogapratimaḥ pannagottamaḥa sa dharmarājam ālakṣya bhrātā bhrātaram agrajamc kathayām āsa tat sarvaṃ grahaṇādi viceṣṭitamd bhīma uvācad ayam ārya mahāsattvo bhakṣārthaṃ māṃ gṛhītavānd nahuṣo nāma rājarṣiḥ prāṇavān iva saṃsthitaḥd yudhiṣṭhira uvācad mucyatām ayam āyuṣman bhrātā me mitavikramaḥd sarpa uvācad vayam āhāramanyaṃ te dāsyāmaḥ kṣunnivāraṇamd āhāro rājaputro yaṃ mayā prāpto mukhāgataḥd gamyatāṃ neha sthātavyaṃ śvo bhavān api me bhavetd vratam etan mahābāho viṣayaṃ mama yo vrajetd sa me bhakṣo bhavet tāta tvaṃ cāpi viṣaye mamad cireṇādya mayāhāraḥ prāpto yam anujas tavad nāham enaṃ vimokṣyāmi na cānyam abhikāṅkṣaye yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa devo vā yadi vā daitya urago vā bhavān yadic satyaṃ sarpa vaco brūhi pṛcchati tvāṃ yudhiṣṭhiraḥd kimarthaṃ ca tvayā grasto bhīmaseno bhujaṃgamaa kim āhṛtya viditvā vā prītis te syād bhujaṃgamac kim āhāraṃ prayacchāmi kathaṃ muñced bhavān imam sarpa uvācaa nahuṣo nāma rājāham āsaṃ pūrvas tavānaghac prathitaḥ pañcamaḥ somād āyoḥ putro narādhipaa kratubhis tapasā caiva svādhyāyena damena cac trailokyaiśvaryam avyagraṃ prāpto vikramaṇena caa tad aiśvaryaṃ samāsādya darpo mām agamat tadāc sahasraṃ hi dvijātīnām uvāha śibikāṃ mamaa aiśvaryamadamatto ham avamanya tato dvijānc imām agastyena daśām ānītaḥ pṛthivīpatea na tu mām ajahāt prajñā yāvad adyeti pāṇḍavac tasyaivānugrahād rājann agastyasya mahātmanaḥa ṣaṣṭhe kāle mamāhāraḥ prāpto yam anujas tavac nāham enaṃ vimokṣyāmi na cānyam abhikāmayea praśnān uccāritāṃs tu tvaṃ vyāhariṣyasi cen mamac atha paścād vimokṣyāmi bhrātaraṃ te vṛkodaram yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa brūhi sarpa yathākāmaṃ prativakṣyāmi te vacaḥc api cec chaknuyāṃ prītim āhartuṃ te bhujaṃgamaa vedyaṃ yad brāhmaṇeneha tad bhavān vetti kevalamb brūhi yat te mayā vācyaṃ tattvaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varac sarparāja tataḥ śrutvā prativakṣyāmi te vacaḥd sarpa uvācad dharmaṃ sarve praśaṃsanti devā brahmarṣayas tathād tasmāt samāsato dharmaṃ kathayasva mamānaghad yudhiṣṭhira uvācad satyaṃ damas tapaḥ śaucaṃ saṃtoṣo hrīḥ kṣamārjavamd sarpa uvācad jñānaṃ śamo dayā dhyānam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥd kiṃ satyaṃ procyate rājan ko damaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥd yudhiṣṭhira uvācad tapaso lakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ syāt kiṃ tac chaucam udāhṛtamd satyaṃ bhūtahitaṃ proktaṃ manaso damanaṃ damaḥd tapaḥ svadharmavartitvaṃ śaucaṃ saṃkaravarjanamd sarpa uvācad saṃtoṣaḥ kaḥ paraḥ proktaḥ kā ca hrīḥ parikīrtitād yudhiṣṭhira uvācad kṣamā ca kā parā proktā kiṃ cārjavam udāhṛtamd saṃtoṣo viṣayatyāgo hrīr akāryanivartanamd sarpa uvācad kṣamā dvaṃdvasahiṣṇutvam ārjavaṃ samacittatād kiṃ jñānaṃ procyate rājan kaḥ śamaś ca prakīrtitaḥd dayā ca kā parā proktā kiṃ ca dhyānam udāhṛtamd yudhiṣṭhira uvācad jñānaṃ tattvārthasaṃbodhaḥ śamaś cittapraśāntatād sarpa uvācad dayā bhūtahitaiṣitvaṃ dhyānaṃ nirviṣayaṃ manaḥd kaḥ śatrur durjayaḥ puṃsāṃ kaś ca vyādhir anantakaḥd yudhiṣṭhira uvācad kīdṛśaś ca smṛtaḥ sādhur asādhuḥ kīdṛśaḥ smṛtaḥd krodhas tu durjayaḥ śatrur lobho vyādhir anantakaḥd sarvabhūtahitaḥ sādhur asādhur nirdayaḥ smṛtaḥd sarpa uvācad ko mohaḥ procyate rājan kaś ca mānaḥ prakīrtitaḥd yudhiṣṭhira uvācad kim ālasyaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ kaś ca śoka ihocyated moho dharmavimūḍhatvaṃ mānas tv ātmābhimānitād sarpa uvācad dharmaniṣkriyatālasyaṃ śokas tv ajñānam ucyated kiṃ sthairyaṃ munibhiḥ proktaṃ kiṃ tad dhairyam udāhṛtamd snānaṃ ca kiṃ paraṃ proktaṃ kiṃ tad dānam ihocyated yudhiṣṭhira uvācad svadharme sthiratā sthairyaṃ dhairyam indriyanigrahaḥd sarpa uvācad snānaṃ manomalatyāgo dānaṃ tv abhayadakṣiṇād kaḥ paṇḍitaḥ pumāñ jñeyaḥ kaś ca mūrkho janeśvarad yudhiṣṭhira uvācad saṃsārahetuḥ kaś cāsya hṛttāpaḥ kaḥ paras tathād dharmātmā paṇḍito jñeyo nāstiko mūrkha ucyated kāmaḥ saṃsārahetuś ca hṛttāpo matsaraḥ paraḥd sarpa uvācad ko haṃkāra iti proktaḥ kaś cid dambho janeśvarad yudhiṣṭhira uvācad abhyasūyā ca kā proktā kiṃ tat paiśunyam ucyated mohajñānam ahaṃkāro dambho dharmadhvajocchrayaḥd sarpa uvācad dharmadveṣo hy asūyā ca paiśunyaṃ paradūṣaṇamd dharmaś cārthaś ca kāmaś ca parasparavirodhinaḥd teṣāṃ nityavirodhitvāt kva nu syāt saṃgataṃ nṛpad yudhiṣṭhira uvācad saṃtuṣṭo bhāryayā bhartā bhartrā bhāryā tathaiva cad yasminn etat kule nityaṃ kalyāṇaṃ tatra vai dhruvamd yadā bhartā ca bhāryā ca parasparavaśānugaud sarpa uvācad tadā dharmārthakāmānāṃ trayāṇām api saṃgamaḥd jātyā kulena vṛttena svādhyāyena śrutena cad brāhmaṇyaṃ kena bhavati prabrūhy etad viniścayamd yudhiṣṭhira uvācad na jātir na kulaṃ tāta na svādhyāyaḥ śrutaṃ na cad kāraṇāni dvijatvasya vṛttam eva tu kāraṇamd aneke munayas tāta tiryagyonisamāśritāḥd svadharmācāraniratā brahmalokam ito gatāḥd bahunā kim adhītena naṭasyeva durātmanaḥd tenādhītaṃ śrutaṃ tena yo vṛttam anutiṣṭhatid kapālasthaṃ yathā toyaṃ śvadṛtau ca yathā payaḥd duṣṭaṃ syāt sthānadoṣeṇa vṛttahīne tathā śrutamd vṛttaṃ yatnena rakṣyaṃ syād vittam eti ca yāti cad akṣīṇo vittataḥ kṣīṇo vṛttatas tu hato hataḥd kiṃ kulenopadiṣṭena vipulena durātmanaḥd kṛmayaḥ kiṃ na jāyante kusumeṣu sugandhiṣud tasmād viddhi mahārāja vṛttaṃ brāhmaṇalakṣaṇamd caturvedo pi durvṛttaḥ śūdrāt pāpataraḥ smṛtaḥd yo gnihotraparo dāntaḥ saṃtoṣaniyataḥ śuciḥd tapaḥsvādhyāyaśīlaś ca taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥd sarvadvaṃdvasaho dhīraḥ sarvasaṅgavivarjitaḥd sarvabhūtahito maitras taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥd yena kena cid ācchanno yena kena cid āsitaḥd yatrakvacanaśāyī ca taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥd yo her iva gaṇād bhīto sanmānān maraṇād ivad kuṇapād iva ca strībhyas taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ sarpa uvācaa brāhmaṇaḥ ko bhaved rājan vedyaṃ kiṃ ca yudhiṣṭhirac bravīhy atimatiṃ tvāṃ hi vākyair anumimīmahe yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa satyaṃ dānaṃ kṣamā śīlam ānṛśaṃsyaṃ damo ghṛṇāc dṛśyante yatra nāgendra sa brāhmaṇa iti smṛtaḥd pareṣāṃ ca guṇānveṣī satataṃ puruṣarṣabhad sato pi doṣān rājendra na gṛhṇāti kadā canad dīnānukampī satataṃ satataṃ sādhuvatsalaḥd sarpa uvācad nityaṃ dānarataś caiva taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥd yatnena brūhi rājendra kaḥ kālaḥ śrāddhadānayoḥd yudhiṣṭhira uvācad praśnaṃ praśnavidāṃ śreṣṭha sarvavit tvaṃ mato si med yatra vai brāhmaṇaṃ paśyec chrotriyaṃ dhyānatatparamd sarpa uvācad dhanaṃ manyed viśiṣṭaṃ tu sa kālaḥ śrāddhadānayoḥd kiṃ vedyaṃ paramaṃ rājañ śaṃsa me tvaṃ yudhiṣṭhirad sarvajño si mahābāho vākyair anumimīmahea vedyaṃ sarpa paraṃ brahma nirduḥkham asukhaṃ ca yatc yatra gatvā na śocanti bhavataḥ kiṃ vivakṣitam sarpa uvācaa cāturvarṇyaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca satyaṃ ca brahma caiva hac śūdreṣv api ca satyaṃ ca dānam akrodha eva cae ānṛśaṃsyam ahiṃsā ca ghṛṇā caiva yudhiṣṭhiraa vedyaṃ yac cāttha nirduḥkham asukhaṃ ca narādhipac tābhyāṃ hīnaṃ padaṃ cānyan na tad astīti lakṣayed tāṃś ca sarvān aśeṣeṇa kathayasva narādhipa yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa śūdre caitad bhavel lakṣyaṃ dvije tac ca na vidyatec na vai śūdro bhavec chūdro brāhmaṇo na ca brāhmaṇaḥa yatraital lakṣyate sarpa vṛttaṃ sa brāhmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥc yatraitan na bhavet sarpa taṃ śūdram iti nirdiśeta yat punar bhavatā proktaṃ na vedyaṃ vidyateti hac tābhyāṃ hīnam atītyātra padaṃ nāstīti ced apia evam etan mataṃ sarpa tābhyāṃ hīnaṃ na vidyatec yathā śītoṣṇayor madhye bhaven noṣṇaṃ na śītatāa evaṃ vai sukhaduḥkhābhyāṃ hīnam asti padaṃ kva citc eṣā mama matiḥ sarpa yathā vā manyate bhavān sarpa uvācaa yadi te vṛttato rājan brāhmaṇaḥ prasamīkṣitaḥc vyarthā jātis tadāyuṣman kṛtir yāvan na dṛśyate yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa jātir atra mahāsarpa manuṣyatve mahāmatec saṃkarāt sarvavarṇānāṃ duṣparīkṣyeti me matiḥa sarve sarvāsv apatyāni janayanti yadā narāḥc vāṅ maithunam atho janma maraṇaṃ ca samaṃ nṛṇāma idam ārṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca ye yajāmaha ity apic tasmāc chīlaṃ pradhāneṣṭaṃ vidur ye tattvadarśinaḥa prāṅ nābhivardhanāt puṃso jātakarma vidhīyateb tatas tu nāmakaraṇaṃ tataś caulaṃ vidhīyateb tatopanayanaṃ proktaṃ dvijātīnāṃ yathāvidhic tatrāsya mātā sāvitrī pitā tv ācārya ucyatea vṛttyā śūdrasamo hy eṣa yāvad vede na jāyatec asminn evaṃ matidvaidhe manuḥ svāyambhuvo bravīta kṛtakṛtyāḥ punar varṇā yadi vṛttaṃ na vidyatec saṃkaras tatra nāgendra balavān prasamīkṣitaḥa yatredānīṃ mahāsarpa saṃskṛtaṃ vṛttam iṣyatec taṃ brāhmaṇam ahaṃ pūrvam uktavān bhujagottama sarpa uvācaa śrutaṃ viditavedyasya tava vākyaṃ yudhiṣṭhirac bhakṣayeyam ahaṃ kasmād bhrātaraṃ te vṛkodaram yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa bhavān etādṛśo loke vedavedāṅgapāragaḥc brūhi kiṃ kurvataḥ karma bhaved gatir anuttamā sarpa uvācaa pātre dattvā priyāṇy uktvā satyam uktvā ca bhāratac ahiṃsānirataḥ svargaṃ gacched iti matir mama yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa dānād vā sarpa satyād vā kim ato guru dṛśyatec ahiṃsāpriyayoś caiva gurulāghavam ucyatām sarpa uvācaa dāne ratatvaṃ satyaṃ ca ahiṃsā priyam eva cac eṣāṃ kāryagarīyastvād dṛśyate gurulāghavama kasmāc cid dānayogād dhi satyam eva viśiṣyatec satyavākyāc ca rājendra kiṃ cid dānaṃ viśiṣyatea evam eva maheṣvāsa priyavākyān mahīpatec ahiṃsā dṛśyate gurvī tataś ca priyam iṣyatea evam etad bhaved rājan kāryāpekṣam anantaramc yad abhipretam anyat te brūhi yāvad bravīmy aham yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kathaṃ svarge gatiḥ sarpa karmaṇāṃ ca phalaṃ dhruvamc aśarīrasya dṛśyeta viṣayāṃś ca bravīhi me sarpa uvācaa tisro vai gatayo rājan paridṛṣṭāḥ svakarmabhiḥc mānuṣyaṃ svargavāsaś ca tiryagyoniś ca tat tridhāa tatra vai mānuṣāl lokād dānādibhir atandritaḥc ahiṃsārthasamāyuktaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ svargam aśnutea viparītaiś ca rājendra kāraṇair mānuṣo bhavetc tiryagyonis tathā tāta viśeṣaś cātra vakṣyatea kāmakrodhasamāyukto hiṃsālobhasamanvitaḥc manuṣyatvāt paribhraṣṭas tiryagyonau prasūyatea tiryagyonyāṃ pṛthagbhāvo manuṣyatve vidhīyatec gavādibhyas tathāśvebhyo devatvam api dṛśyatea so yam etā gatīḥ sarvā jantuś carati kāryavānc nitye mahati cātmānam avasthāpayate nṛpaa jāto jātaś ca balavān bhuṅkte cātmā sa dehavānc phalārthas tāta niṣpṛktaḥ prajālakṣaṇabhāvanaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa śabde sparśe ca rūpe ca tathaiva rasagandhayoḥc tasyādhiṣṭhānam avyagraṃ brūhi sarpa yathātathama kiṃ na gṛhṇāsi viṣayān yugapat tvaṃ mahāmatec etāvad ucyatāṃ coktaṃ sarvaṃ pannagasattama sarpa uvācaa yad ātmadravyam āyuṣman dehasaṃśrayaṇānvitamc karaṇādhiṣṭhitaṃ bhogān upabhuṅkte yathāvidhia jñānaṃ caivātra buddhiś ca manaś ca bharatarṣabhac tasya bhogādhikaraṇe karaṇāni nibodha mea manasā tāta paryeti kramaśo viṣayān imānc viṣayāyatanasthena bhūtātmā kṣetraniḥsṛtaḥa atra cāpi naravyāghra mano jantor vidhīyatec tasmād yugapad asyātra grahaṇaṃ nopapadyatea sa ātmā puruṣavyāghra bhruvor antaram āśritaḥc dravyeṣu sṛjate buddhiṃ vividheṣu parāvarāma buddher uttarakālaṃ ca vedanā dṛśyate budhaiḥc eṣa vai rājaśārdūla vidhiḥ kṣetrajñabhāvanaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa manasaś cāpi buddheś ca brūhi me lakṣaṇaṃ paramc etad adhyātmaviduṣāṃ paraṃ kāryaṃ vidhīyate sarpa uvācaa buddhir ātmānugā tāta utpātena vidhīyatec tadāśritā hi saṃjñaiṣā vidhis tasyaiṣaṇe bhaveta buddher guṇavidhir nāsti manas tu guṇavad bhavetc buddhir utpadyate kārye manas tūtpannam eva hia etad viśeṣaṇaṃ tāta manobuddhyor mayeritamc tvam apy atrābhisaṃbuddhaḥ kathaṃ vā manyate bhavān yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa aho buddhimatāṃ śreṣṭha śubhā buddhir iyaṃ tavac viditaṃ veditavyaṃ te kasmān mām anupṛcchasid sarpa uvācad uktās te sarvaśas tāta praśnāḥ praśnavidāṃ varad vaiśaṃpāyana uvācad idānīm eṣa muñcāmi bhrātaraṃ te vṛkodaramd nahuṣeṇa tato muktaṃ bhīmam āśliṣya sodaramd yudhiṣṭhiro pi dharmātmā nahuṣaṃ pratyapūjayatd nahuṣo pi muneḥ śāpād vimuktaḥ prītamānasaḥd divyarūpadharaḥ śrīmān pratyuvāca yudhiṣṭhiramd saṃbhāṣyaṃ sādhubhiḥ puṇyam iti vai vaidikī śrutiḥd sarpatvāt paśya mukto haṃ tvayā saṃbhāṣya sādhunād dharmaṃ kila narāḥ kṛtvā labhante satsutān ihad dharmeṇa kaḥ kṛto dharmo yena labdho bhavān sutaḥd na kevalaṃ prajā dhanyā yāsāṃ rājan nṛpo bhavānd dharmo pi dhanyo dharmajña yasya putras tvam īdṛśaḥd dṛṣṭāḥ śrutāś ca bahavo nṛpā dharmaparāyaṇāḥd yudhiṣṭhira uvācad na śruto na ca dṛṣṭo me dharmajñas tvādṛśo nṛpaḥd sabhāgyo haṃ mahābhāga yasya tuṣṭo bhavān guṇaiḥd nāsabhāgyasya tuṣyanti devakalpā bhavādṛśāḥd kiṃ tu kautūhalaṃ tāta mama pārthivasattamad ataḥ pṛcchāmi sauhārdāt tvām ahaṃ nābhyasūyayād sarvaśāstrārthatattvajñaṃ trailokyeśvarapūjitamd nahuṣa uvācad kathaṃ tvām āviśan mohaḥ prākṛtaṃ puruṣaṃ yathād śrutaśīlādibhir yuktaṃ dhārmikaṃ tapasi sthitamd suprājñam api kaunteya ṛddhir mohayate naramd hīnābhijanavṛtto pi na sa rājāsti kaś canad yasya cetasi rājendra karoti na madaḥ padamd yathāgnau dhruvam uṣṇatvam anile calanaṃ yathād yathā śaśini śītatvaṃ tathaiśvarye dhruvo madaḥd aiśvaryatimiraṃ cakṣur na tat paśyati nirmalamd paścād vimalatāṃ yāti vinipātāñjanāñjitamd vartamānaḥ sukhe svarge nāvaitīti matir mamad so ham aiśvaryamohena yadāviṣṭo yudhiṣṭhirad patitaḥ pratisaṃbuddhaḥ sāṃprataṃ bodhayāmi vaḥd lokadvayahitaṃ vaktuṃ jñātuṃ ko vā na paṇḍitaḥd tatkriyānuvidhānatve munayo pi na paṇḍitāḥd tasmāl lokadvayasyeṣṭaṃ kartavyaṃ te narādhipad guhyam etan mahābāho kathitaṃ te mayākhilamd dvijāś ca nāvamantavyās trailokyeśvarapūjitāḥd devavat pūjanīyāś ca dānamānārcanādibhiḥd yaiḥ kṛtaḥ sarvabhakṣo gnir apeyaś ca mahodadhiḥd kṣayī cāpāditaś candraḥ ko na naśyet prakopya tānd lokān anyān sṛjeyur ye lokapālāṃś ca kopitāḥd devān kuryur adevāṃś ca kaḥ kṣuṇvaṃs tān samṛdhnuyātd yān upāśritya tiṣṭhanti lokā devāś ca sarvadād brahma caiva dhanaṃ yeṣāṃ ko hiṃsyāt tāñ jijīviṣuḥd praṇītaś cāpraṇītaś ca yathāgnir daivataṃ mahatd evaṃ vidvān avidvāṃś ca brāhmaṇo daivataṃ parama sarvajñaṃ tvāṃ kathaṃ moha āviśat svargavāsinamb kathaṃ ca sarpatāṃ yāto bhavān vyākhyātum arhatic evam adbhutakarmāṇam iti me saṃśayo mahān sarpa uvācaa suprajñam api cec chūram ṛddhir mohayate naramc vartamānaḥ sukhe sarvo nāvaitīti matir mamaa so ham aiśvaryamohena madāviṣṭo yudhiṣṭhirac patitaḥ pratisaṃbuddhas tvāṃ tu saṃbodhayāmy ahama kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ mahārāja tvayā mama paraṃtapac kṣīṇaḥ śāpaḥ sukṛcchro me tvayā saṃbhāṣya sādhunāa ahaṃ hi divi divyena vimānena caran purāc abhimānena mattaḥ san kaṃ cin nānyam acintayama brahmarṣidevagandharvayakṣarākṣasakiṃnarāḥc karān mama prayacchanti sarve trailokyavāsinaḥa cakṣuṣā yaṃ prapaśyāmi prāṇinaṃ pṛthivīpatec tasya tejo harāmy āśu tad dhi dṛṣṭibalaṃ mamaa brahmarṣīṇāṃ sahasraṃ hi uvāha śibikāṃ mamac sa mām apanayo rājan bhraṃśayām āsa vai śriyaḥa tatra hy agastyaḥ pādena vahan spṛṣṭo mayā muniḥc adṛṣṭena tato smy ukto dhvaṃsa sarpeti vai ruṣāa tatas tasmād vimānāgrāt pracyutaś cyutabhūṣaṇaḥc prapatan bubudhe tmānaṃ vyālībhūtam adhomukhama ayācaṃ tam ahaṃ vipraṃ śāpasyānto bhaved itic ajñānāt saṃpravṛttasya bhagavan kṣantum arhasia tataḥ sa mām uvācedaṃ prapatantaṃ kṛpānvitaḥc yudhiṣṭhiro dharmarājaḥ śāpāt tvāṃ mokṣayiṣyatia abhimānasya ghorasya balasya ca narādhipac phale kṣīṇe mahārāja phalaṃ puṇyam avāpsyasia tato me vismayo jātas tad dṛṣṭvā tapaso balamc brahma ca brāhmaṇatvaṃ ca yena tvāham acūcudama satyaṃ damas tapo yogam ahiṃsā dānanityatāc sādhakāni sadā puṃsāṃ na jātir na kulaṃ nṛpaa ariṣṭa eṣa te bhrātā bhīmo mukto mahābhujaḥc svasti te stu mahārāja gamiṣyāmi divaṃ punaḥd sa cāyaṃ puruṣavyāghra kālaḥ puṇya upasthitaḥd tad asmāt kāraṇāt pārtha kāryaṃ mama mahat kṛtam vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca tatas tasmin muhūrte tu vimānaṃ kāmagāmi vai avapātena mahatā tatrāvāpatad uttamama ity uktvājagaraṃ dehaṃ tyaktvā sa nahuṣo nṛpaḥc divyaṃ vapuḥ samāsthāya gatas tridivam eva haa yudhiṣṭhiro pi dharmātmā bhrātrā bhīmena saṃgataḥc dhaumyena sahitaḥ śrīmān āśramaṃ punar abhyagāta tato dvijebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ sametebhyo yathātathamc kathayām āsa tat sarvaṃ dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥa tac chrutvā te dvijāḥ sarve bhrātaraś cāsya te trayaḥc āsan suvrīḍitā rājan draupadī ca yaśasvinīa te tu sarve dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ hitepsayāc maivam ity abruvan bhīmaṃ garhayanto sya sāhasama pāṇḍavās tu bhayān muktaṃ prekṣya bhīmaṃ mahābalamc harṣam āhārayāṃ cakrur vijahruś ca mudā yutāḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa nidāghāntakaraḥ kālaḥ sarvabhūtasukhāvahaḥc tatraiva vasatāṃ teṣāṃ prāvṛṭ samabhipadyataa chādayanto mahāghoṣāḥ khaṃ diśaś ca balāhakāḥc pravavarṣur divārātram asitāḥ satataṃ tadāa tapātyayaniketāś ca śataśo tha sahasraśaḥc apetārkaprabhājālāḥ savidyudvimalaprabhāḥa virūḍhaśaṣpā pṛthivī mattadaṃśasarīsṛpāc babhūva payasā siktā śāntadhūmarajo ruṇāa na sma prajñāyate kiṃ cid ambhasā samavastṛtec samaṃ vā viṣamaṃ vāpi nadyo vā sthāvarāṇi vāa kṣubdhatoyā mahāghoṣāḥ śvasamānā ivāśugāḥc sindhavaḥ śobhayāṃ cakruḥ kānanāni tapātyayea nadatāṃ kānanānteṣu śrūyante vividhāḥ svanāḥc vṛṣṭibhis tāḍyamānānāṃ varāhamṛgapakṣiṇāma stokakāḥ śikhinaś caiva puṃskokilagaṇaiḥ sahac mattāḥ paripatanti sma dardurāś caiva darpitāḥa tathā bahuvidhākārā prāvṛṇ meghānunāditāc abhyatītā śivā teṣāṃ caratāṃ marudhanvasua krauñcahaṃsagaṇākīrṇā śarat praṇihitābhavatc rūḍhakakṣavanaprasthā prasannajalanimnagāa vimalākāśanakṣatrā śarat teṣāṃ śivābhavatc mṛgadvijasamākīrṇā pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanāma paśyantaḥ śāntarajasaḥ kṣapā jaladaśītalāḥc grahanakṣatrasaṃghaiś ca somena ca virājitāḥa kumudaiḥ puṇḍarīkaiś ca śītavāridharāḥ śivāḥc nadīḥ puṣkariṇīś caiva dadṛśuḥ samalaṃkṛtāḥa ākāśanīkāśataṭāṃ nīpanīvārasaṃkulāmc babhūva caratāṃ harṣaḥ puṇyatīrthāṃ sarasvatīma te vai mumudire vīrāḥ prasannasalilāṃ śivāmc paśyanto dṛḍhadhanvānaḥ paripūrṇāṃ sarasvatīma teṣāṃ puṇyatamā rātriḥ parvasaṃdhau sma śāradīc tatraiva vasatām āsīt kārttikī janamejayaa puṇyakṛdbhir mahāsattvais tāpasaiḥ saha pāṇḍavāḥc tat sarvaṃ bharataśreṣṭhāḥ samūhur yogam uttamama tamisrābhyudaye tasmin dhaumyena saha pāṇḍavāḥc sūtaiḥ paurogavaiś caiva kāmyakaṃ prayayur vanam vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa kāmyakaṃ prāpya kaunteyā yudhiṣṭhirapurogamāḥc kṛtātithyā munigaṇair niṣeduḥ saha kṛṣṇayāa tatas tān pariviśvastān vasataḥ pāṇḍunandanānc brāhmaṇā bahavas tatra samantāt paryavārayana athābravīd dvijaḥ kaś cid arjunasya priyaḥ sakhāc eṣyatīha mahābāhur vaśī śaurir udāradhīḥa viditā hi harer yūyam ihāyātāḥ kurūdvahāḥc sadā hi darśanākāṅkṣī śreyo nveṣī ca vo hariḥa bahuvatsarajīvī ca mārkaṇḍeyo mahātapāḥc svādhyāyatapasā yuktaḥ kṣipraṃ yuṣmān sameṣyatia tathaiva tasya bruvataḥ pratyadṛṣyata keśavaḥc sainyasugrīvayuktena rathena rathināṃ varaḥa maghavān iva paulomyā sahitaḥ satyabhāmayāc upāyād devakīputro didṛkṣuḥ kurusattamāna avatīrya rathāt kṛṣṇo dharmarājaṃ yathāvidhic vavande mudito dhīmān bhīmaṃ ca balināṃ varama pūjayām āsa dhaumyaṃ ca yamābhyām abhivāditaḥc pariṣvajya guḍākeśaṃ draupadīṃ paryasāntvayata sa dṛṣṭvā phalgunaṃ vīraṃ cirasya priyam āgatamc paryaṣvajata dāśārhaḥ punaḥ punar ariṃdamama tathaiva satyabhāmāpi draupadīṃ pariṣasvajec pāṇḍavānāṃ priyāṃ bhāryāṃ kṛṣṇasya mahiṣī priyāa tatas te pāṇḍavāḥ sarve sabhāryāḥ sapurohitāḥc ānarcuḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ parivavruś ca sarvaśaḥa kṛṣṇas tu pārthena sametya vidvāndhanaṃjayenāsuratarjanenac babhau yathā bhūtapatir mahātmāsametya sākṣād bhagavān guhenaa tataḥ samastāni kirīṭamālīvaneṣu vṛttāni gadāgrajāyac uktvā yathāvat punar anvapṛcchatkathaṃ subhadrā ca tathābhimanyuḥa sa pūjayitvā madhuhā yathāvatpārthāṃś ca kṛṣṇāṃ ca purohitaṃ cac uvāca rājānam abhipraśaṃsanyudhiṣṭhiraṃ tatra sahopaviśyaa dharmaḥ paraḥ pāṇḍava rājyalābhāttasyārtham āhus tapa eva rājanc satyārjavābhyāṃ caratā svadharmaṃjitas tavāyaṃ ca paraś ca lokaḥa adhītam agre caratā vratānisamyag dhanurvedam avāpya kṛtsnamc kṣātreṇa dharmeṇa vasūni apetadharmavyavahāravṛttaṃsaheta tat pāṇḍava kas tvad anyaḥa asaṃśayaṃ sarvasamṛddhakāmaḥkṣipraṃ prajāḥ pālayitāsi samyakc ime vayaṃ nigrahaṇe kurūṇāṃyadi pratijñā bhavataḥ samāptāa dhaumyaṃ ca kṛṣṇāṃ ca yudhiṣṭhiraṃ cayamau ca bhīmaṃ ca daśārhasiṃhaḥc uvāca diṣṭyā bhavatāṃ śivenaprāptaḥ kirīṭī muditaḥ kṛtāstraḥa provāca kṛṣṇām api yājñasenīṃdaśārhabhartā sahitaḥ suhṛdbhiḥb diṣṭyā samagrāsi dhanaṃjayenab samāgatety evam uvāca kṛṣṇaḥc kṛṣṇe dhanurvedaratipradhānāḥsatyavratās te śiśavaḥ suśīlāḥe sadbhiḥ sadaivācaritaṃ samādhiṃcaranti putrās tava yājñasenia rājyena rāṣṭraiś ca nimantryamāṇāḥpitrā ca kṛṣṇe tava sodaraiś cac na yajñasenasya na mātulānāṃgṛheṣu bālā ratim āpnuvantia ānartam evābhimukhāḥ śivenagatvā dhanurvedaratipradhānāḥc tavātmajā vṛṣṇipuraṃ praviśyana daivatebhyaḥ spṛhayanti kṛṣṇea yathā tvam evārhasi teṣu vṛttiṃprayoktum āryā ca yathaiva kuntīc teṣv apramādena sadā karotitathā ca bhūyaś ca tathā subhadrāa yathāniruddhasya yathābhimanyoryathā sunīthasya yathaiva bhānoḥc tathā vinetā ca gatiś ca kṛṣṇetavātmajānām api raukmiṇeyaḥa gadāsicarmagrahaṇeṣu śūrānastreṣu śikṣāsu rathāśvayānec samyag vinetā vinayaty atandrīstāṃś cābhimanyuḥ satataṃ kumāraḥa sa cāpi samyak praṇidhāya śikṣāmastrāṇi caiṣāṃ guruvat pradāyac tavātmajānāṃ ca tathābhimanyoḥparākramais tuṣyati raukmiṇeyaḥa yadā vihāraṃ prasamīkṣamāṇāḥprayānti putrās tava yājñasenic te tu dṛṣṭvaiva tam ṛṣiṃ vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatāḥc mahad āścaryam iti vai vibruvāṇā mahīpatea mṛto hy ayam ato dṛṣṭaḥ kathaṃ jīvitam āptavānc kim etat tapaso vīryaṃ yenāyaṃ jīvitaḥ punaḥe śrotum icchāma kathayāmahec naiṣāṃ duścaritaṃ brūmas tasmān mṛtyubhayaṃ na naḥa atithīn annapānena bhṛtyān atyaśanena cab saṃbhojya śeṣam aśnīmas tasmān mṛtyubhayaṃ na naḥb kṣāntā dāntāḥ kṣamāśīlās uvāca haa prāpsyāmaḥ phalam atyantaṃ bahulaṃ nirupadravamc araṇyagamanaṃ kṣipraṃ rocatāṃ vo guṇādhikama taṃ bhāryā pratyuvācedaṃ dharmam evānurudhyatīc vainyaṃ gatvā mahātmānam arthayasva dhanaṃ bahue sa te dāsyati rājarṣir yajamāno rthine dhanama tata ādāya viprarṣe pratigṛhya dhanaṃ bahuc bhṛtyān sutān saṃvibhajya tato vraja yathepsitame eṣa vai paramo dharmo dharmavidbhir udāhṛtaḥ atrir uvācaa kathito me mahābhāge gautamena mahātmanāc vainyo dharmārthasaṃyuktaḥ satyavratasamanvitaḥa kiṃ tv asti tatra dveṣṭāro nivasanti hi me dvijāḥc yathā me gautamaḥ prāha tato na vyavasāmy ahama tatra sma vācaṃ kalyāṇīṃ dharmakāmārthasaṃhitāmc mayoktām anyathā brūyus tatas te vai nirarthakāma gamiṣyāmi mahāprājñe rocate me vacas tavac gāś ca me dāsyate vainyaḥ prabhūtaṃ cārthasaṃcayam mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa evam uktvā jagāmāśu vainyayajñaṃ mahātapāḥc gatvā ca yajñāyatanam atris tuṣṭāva taṃ nṛpamd vākyair maṅgalasaṃyuktaiḥ pūjayāno bravīd vacaḥa rājan vainya tvam īśaś ca bhuvi tvaṃ prathamo nṛpaḥc stuvanti tvāṃ munigaṇās tvad anyo nāsti dharmavita tam abravīd ṛṣis tatra vacaḥ kruddho mahātapāḥc maivam atre punar brūyā na te prajñā samāhitāe atra naḥ prathamaṃ sthātā mahendro vai prajāpatiḥa athātrir api rājendra gautamaṃ pratyabhāṣatac ayam eva vidhātā ca yathaivendraḥ prajāpatiḥe tvam eva muhyase mohān na prajñānaṃ tavāsti ha gautama uvācaa jānāmi nāhaṃ muhyāmi tvaṃ vivakṣur vimuhyasec stoṣyase bhyudayaprepsus tasya darśanasaṃśrayāta na vettha paramaṃ dharmaṃ na cāvaiṣi prayojanamc bālas tvam asi mūḍhaś ca vṛddhaḥ kenāpi hetunā mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa vivadantau tathā tau tu munīnāṃ darśane sthitauc ye tasya yajñe saṃvṛttās te pṛcchanta kathaṃ tv imaua praveśaḥ kena datto yam anayor vainyasaṃsadic uccaiḥ samabhibhāṣantau kena kāryeṇa viṣṭhitaua tataḥ paramadharmātmā kāśyapaḥ sarvadharmavitc vivādināv anuprāptau tāv ubhau pratyavedayata athābravīt sadasyāṃs tu gautamo munisattamānc āvayor vyāhṛtaṃ praśnaṃ śṛṇuta dvijapuṃgavāḥe vainyo vidhātety āhātrir atra naḥ saṃśayo mahānf tatas tad gautamenoktaṃ vākyaṃ vainyasya saṃsadia śrutvaiva tu mahātmāno munayo bhyadravan drutamc sanatkumāraṃ dharmajñaṃ saṃśayacchedanāya vaid papracchuḥ praṇatāḥ sarve brahmāṇam iva somapāḥa sa ca teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā yathātattvaṃ mahātapāḥc pratyuvācātha tān evaṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ vacaḥ sanatkumāra uvācaa brahma kṣatreṇa sahitaṃ kṣatraṃ ca brahmaṇā sahab saṃyuktau dahataḥ śatrūn vanānīvāgnimārutauc rājā vai prathamo dharmaḥ prajānāṃ patir eva cae sa eva śakraḥ śukraś ca sa dhātā sa bṛhaspatiḥa prajāpatir virāṭ samrāṭ kṣatriyo bhūpatir nṛpaḥc ya ebhiḥ stūyate śabdaiḥ kas taṃ nārcitum arhatia purāyonir yudhājic ca abhiyā mudito bhavaḥc svarṇetā sahajid babhrur iti rājābhidhīyatea satyamanyur yudhājīvaḥ satyadharmapravartakaḥc adharmād ṛṣayo bhītā balaṃ kṣatre samādadhand purā yo brahmaṇā sṛṣṭaḥ prajānāṃ paripālaned duṣṭānāṃ nigrahaṃ kartā sa ca rājābhidhīyated satyaṃ manyur dayā rakṣā dharmādharmavilokanamd vidyante yasya cārāś ca sa rājety abhidhīyated asmābhir brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatraṃ kṣatreṇa brahma cāvyayama ādityo divi deveṣu tamo nudati tejasāc tathaiva nṛpatir bhūmāv adharmaṃ nudate bhṛśama ato rājñaḥ pradhānatvaṃ śāstraprāmāṇyadarśanātc uttaraḥ sidhyate pakṣo yena rājeti bhāṣitamd atriṇā vyāhṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ tat tathaiva na cānyathā mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa tataḥ sa rājā saṃhṛṣṭaḥ siddhe pakṣe mahāmanāḥc tam atrim abravīt prītaḥ pūrvaṃ yenābhisaṃstutaḥa yasmāt putrebhyaḥ prayatātmavānc tapaḥ samabhisaṃdhāya vanam evānvapadyata mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa atraiva ca sarasvatyā gītaṃ parapuraṃjayac pṛṣṭayā muninā vīra śṛṇu tārkṣyeṇa dhīmatā tārkṣya uvācaa kiṃ nu śreyaḥ āpnoti puraṃdarasyaa yaḥ sapta varṣāṇi juhoti tārkṣyahavyaṃ tv agnau suvrataḥ sādhuśīlaḥc saptāvarān sapta pūrvān punātipitāmahān ātmanaḥ karmabhiḥ svaiḥ tārkṣya uvācaa kim agnihotrasya vrataṃ hi devānāśraddadhānād dhi havir juṣantia nāśrotriyaṃ devahavye niyuñjyānmoghaṃ parā siñcati tādṛśo hic apūrṇam aśrotriyam āha tārkṣyana vai tādṛg juhuyād agnihotrama kṛśānuṃ ye juhvati tārkṣya uvācaa na hi tvayā sadṛśī kā cid astivibhrājase hy atimātraṃ yathā śrīḥc rūpaṃ ca te divyam atyantakāntaṃprajñāṃ ca devīṃ subhage bibharṣi sarasvaty uvācaa śreṣṭhāni yāni dvipadāṃ variṣṭhayajñeṣu vidvann upapādayantic tair evāhaṃ saṃpravṛddhā bhavāmiāpyāyitā rūpavatī ca vipraa yac cāpi dravyam upayujyate havānaspatyam āyasaṃ pārthivaṃ vāc divyena rūpeṇa ca prajñayā catenaiva siddhir iti viddhi vidvan tārkṣya uvācaa idaṃ śreyaḥ paramaṃ manyamānāvyāyacchante munayaḥ saṃpratītāḥc ācakṣva me taṃ paramaṃ viśokaṃmokṣaṃ paraṃ yaṃ praviśanti dhīrāḥd sāṃkhyā yogāḥ paramaṃ yaṃ vadantid paraṃ purāṇaṃ tam ahaṃ na vedmi sarasvaty uvācaa taṃ vai paraṃ vedavidaḥ prapannāḥparaṃ parebhyaḥ prathitaṃ purāṇamc svādhyāyadānavratapuṇyayogaistapodhanā vītaśokā vimuktāḥa tasyātha madhye vetasaḥ puṇyagandhaḥsahasraśākho vimalo vibhātic tasya mūlāt saritaḥ prasravantimadhūdakaprasravaṇā ramaṇyaḥa śākhāṃ śākhāṃ mahānadyaḥ saṃyānti sikatāsamāḥc dhānāpūpā māṃsaśākāḥ sadā pāyasakardamāḥa yasminn agnimukhā devāḥ sendrāḥ saha marudgaṇaiḥc ījire kratubhiḥ śreṣṭhais tat padaṃ paramaṃ mune vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tataḥ sa pāṇḍavo bhūyo mārkaṇḍeyam uvāca hac kathayasveha caritaṃ manor vaivasvatasya me mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa vivasvataḥ suto rājan paramarṣiḥ pratāpavānc babhūva naraśārdūla prajāpatisamadyutiḥa ojasā tejasā lakṣmyā tapasā ca viśeṣataḥc aticakrāma pitaraṃ manuḥ svaṃ ca pitāmahama ūrdhvabāhur viśālāyāṃ badaryāṃ sa narādhipaḥc ekapādasthitas tīvraṃ cacāra sumahat tapaḥa avākśirās tathā cāpi netrair animiṣair dṛḍhamc so tapyata tapo ghoraṃ varṣāṇām ayutaṃ tadāa taṃ kadā cit tapasyantam ārdracīrajaṭādharamc vīriṇītīram āgamya matsyo vacanam abravīta bhagavan kṣudramatsyo smi balavadbhyo bhayaṃ mamac matsyebhyo hi tato māṃ tvaṃ trātum arhasi suvrataa durbalaṃ balavanto hi matsyaṃ matsyā viśeṣataḥc bhakṣayanti yathā vṛttir vihitā naḥ sanātanīa tasmād bhayaughān mahato majjantaṃ māṃ viśeṣataḥc trātum arhasi kartāsmi kṛte pratikṛtaṃ tavaa sa matsyavacanaṃ śrutvā kṛpayābhipariplutaḥc manur vaivasvato gṛhṇāt taṃ matsyaṃ pāṇinā svayama udakāntam upānīya matsyaṃ vaivasvato manuḥc aliñjare prākṣipat sa candrāṃśusadṛśaprabhama sa tatra vavṛdhe rājan matsyaḥ paramasatkṛtaḥc putravac cākarot tasmin manur bhāvaṃ viśeṣataḥa atha kālena mahatā sa matsyaḥ sumahān abhūtc aliñjare jale caiva nāsau samabhavat kilaa atha matsyo manuṃ dṛṣṭvā punar evābhyabhāṣatac bhagavan sādhu me dyānyat sthānaṃ saṃpratipādayaa uddhṛtyāliñjarāt tasmāt tataḥ sa bhagavān muniḥc taṃ matsyam anayad vāpīṃ mahatīṃ sa manus tadāa tatra taṃ prākṣipac cāpi manuḥ parapuraṃjayac athāvardhata matsyaḥ sa punar varṣagaṇān bahūna dviyojanāyatā vāpī vistṛtā cāpi yojanamc tasyāṃ nāsau samabhavan matsyo rājīvalocanae viceṣṭituṃ vā kaunteya matsyo vāpyāṃ viśāṃ patea manuṃ matsyas tato dṛṣṭvā punar evābhyabhāṣatac naya māṃ bhagavan sādho samudramahiṣīṃ prabhoe gaṅgāṃ tatra nivatsyāmi yathā vā tāta manyasef nideśe hi mayā tubhyaṃ sthātavyam anasūyatāf vṛddhir hi paramā prāptā tvatkṛte hi mayānaghaa evam ukto manur matsyam anayad bhagavān vaśīc nadīṃ gaṅgāṃ tatra cainaṃ svayaṃ prākṣipad acyutaḥa sa tatra vavṛdhe matsyaḥ kiṃ cit kālam ariṃdamac tataḥ punar manuṃ dṛṣṭvā matsyo vacanam abravīta gaṅgāyāṃ hi na śaknomi bṛhattvāc ceṣṭituṃ prabhoc samudraṃ naya mām āśu prasīda bhagavann itia uddhṛtya gaṅgāsalilāt tato matsyaṃ manuḥ svayamc samudram anayat pārtha tatra cainam avāsṛjata sumahān api matsyaḥ san sa manor manasas tadāc āsīd yatheṣṭahāryaś ca sparśagandhasukhaś ca vaia yadā samudre prakṣiptaḥ sa matsyo manunā tadāc tata enam idaṃ vākyaṃ smayamāna ivābravīta bhagavan kṛtā hi me rakṣā tvayā sarvā viśeṣataḥc prāptakālaṃ tu yat kāryaṃ tvayā tac chrūyatāṃ mamaa acirād bhagavan bhaumam idaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamamc sarvam eva mahābhāga pralayaṃ vai gamiṣyatia saṃprakṣālanakālo yaṃ lokānāṃ samupasthitaḥc tasmāt tvāṃ bodhayāmy adya yat te hitam anuttamama trasānāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ ca yac ceṅgaṃ yac ca neṅgatic tasya sarvasya saṃprāptaḥ kālaḥ paramadāruṇaḥa nauś ca kārayitavyā te dṛḍhā yuktavaṭākarāc tatra saptarṣibhiḥ sārdham āruhethā mahāmunea bījāni caiva sarvāṇi yathoktāni mayā purāc tasyām ārohayer nāvi susaṃguptāni bhāgaśaḥa nausthaś ca māṃ pratīkṣethās tadā munijanapriyac āgamiṣyāmy ahaṃ śṛṅgī vijñeyas tena tāpasaa evam etat tvayā kāryam āpṛṣṭo si vrajāmy ahamb tā na śakyā mahatyo vai āpas tartuṃ mayā vināc nātiśaṅkyam idaṃ cāpi vacanaṃ te mamābhibhoa evaṃ kariṣya iti taṃ sa matsyaṃ pratyabhāṣatac jagmatuś ca yathākāmam anujñāpya parasparama tato manur mahārāja yathoktaṃ matsyakena hac bījāny ādāya sarvāṇi sāgaraṃ pupluve tadāe nāvā tu śubhayā vīra mahormiṇam ariṃdamaa cintayām āsa ca manus taṃ matsyaṃ pṛthivīpatec sa ca tac cintitaṃ jñātvā matsyaḥ parapuraṃjayae śṛṅgī tatrājagāmāśu tadā bharatasattamaa taṃ dṛṣṭvā manujendrendra manur matsyaṃ jalārṇavec śṛṅgiṇaṃ taṃ yathoktena rūpeṇādrim ivocchritama vaṭākaramayaṃ pāśam atha matsyasya mūrdhanic manur manujaśārdūla tasmiñ śṛṅge nyaveśayata saṃyatas tena pāśena matsyaḥ parapuraṃjayac vegena mahatā nāvaṃ prākarṣal lavaṇāmbhasia sa tatāra tayā nāvā samudraṃ manujeśvarac nṛtyamānam ivormībhir garjamānam ivāmbhasāa kṣobhyamāṇā mahāvātaiḥ sā naus tasmin mahodadhauc ghūrṇate capaleva strī mattā parapuraṃjayaa naiva bhūmir na ca diśaḥ pradiśo vā cakāśirec sarvam āmbhasam evāsīt khaṃ dyauś ca narapuṃgavaa evaṃbhūte tadā loke saṃkule bharatarṣabhac adṛśyanta saptarṣayo manur matsyaḥ sahaiva haa evaṃ bahūn varṣagaṇāṃs tāṃ nāvaṃ so tha matsyakaḥc cakarṣātandrito rājaṃs tasmin salilasaṃcayea tato himavataḥ śṛṅgaṃ yat paraṃ puruṣarṣabhac tatrākarṣat tato nāvaṃ sa matsyaḥ kurunandanaa tato bravīt tadā matsyas tān ṛṣīn prahasañ śanaiḥc asmin himavataḥ śṛṅge nāvaṃ badhnīta mācirama sā baddhā tatra tais tūrṇam ṛṣibhir bharatarṣabhac naur matsyasya vacaḥ śrutvā śṛṅge himavatas tadāa tac ca naubandhanaṃ nāma śṛṅgaṃ himavataḥ paramc khyātam adyāpi kaunteya tad viddhi bharatarṣabhaa athābravīd animiṣas tān ṛṣīn sahitāṃs tadāc ahaṃ prajāpatir brahmā matparaṃ nādhigamyatee matsyarūpeṇa yūyaṃ ca mayāsmān mokṣitā bhayāta manunā ca prajāḥ sarvāḥ sadevāsuramānavāḥc sraṣṭavyāḥ sarvalokāś ca yac ceṅgaṃ yac ca neṅgatia tapasā cātitīvreṇa pratibhāsya bhaviṣyatic matprasādāt prajāsarge na ca mohaṃ gamiṣyatia ity uktvā vacanaṃ matsyaḥ kṣaṇenādarśanaṃ gataḥc sraṣṭukāmaḥ prajāś cāpi manur vaivasvataḥ svayame pramūḍho bhūt prajāsarge tapas tepe mahat tataḥa tapasā mahatā yuktaḥ so tha sraṣṭuṃ pracakramec sarvāḥ prajā manuḥ sākṣād yathāvad bharatarṣabhaa ity etan mātsyakaṃ nāma purāṇaṃ parikīrtitamc ākhyānam idam ākhyātaṃ sarvapāpaharaṃ mayāa ya idaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ manoś caritam āditaḥc sa sukhī sarvasiddhārthaḥ svargalokam iyān naraḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tataḥ sa punar evātha mārkaṇḍeyaṃ yaśasvinamc papraccha vinayopeto dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥa naike yugasahasrāntās tvayā dṛṣṭā mahāmunec na cāpīha samaḥ kaś cid āyuṣā tava vidyatee varjayitvā mahātmānaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ parameṣṭhinamf na te sti sadṛśaḥ kaś cid āyuṣā brahmavittamaa anantarikṣe loke smin devadānavavarjitec tvam eva pralaye vipra brahmāṇam upatiṣṭhasia pralaye cāpi nirvṛtte prabuddhe ca pitāmahec tvam eva sṛjyamānāni bhūtānīha prapaśyasia caturvidhāni viprarṣe ghoreṇāviśya tapasā vedhaso nirjitās tvayād nārāyaṇāṅkaprakhyas tvaṃ sāṃparāye tipaṭhyased bhagavān ekaśaḥ kṛtvā tvayā viṣṇoś ca viśvakṛtd karṇikoddharaṇaṃ divyaṃ brahmaṇaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥd naivāntarikṣaṃ naivorvī śeṣaṃ bhavati kiṃ canaa tasminn ekārṇave loke naṣṭe sthāvarajaṅgamec naṣṭe devāsuragaṇe samutsannamahoragea śayānam amitātmānaṃ padme padmaniketanamc tvam ekaḥ sarvabhūteśaṃ saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaś ca tataḥ parama trīṇi varṣasahasrāṇi tretāyugam ihocyatec tasya tāvac chatī saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaś ca tataḥ parama tathā varṣasahasre dve dvāparaṃ parimāṇataḥc tasyāpi dviśatī saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaś ca tataḥ parama sahasram ekaṃ varṣāṇāṃ tataḥ kaliyugaṃ smṛtamc tasya varṣaśataṃ saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaś ca tataḥ parame saṃdhyāsaṃdhyāṃśayos tulyaṃ pramāṇam upadhārayaa kṣīṇe kaliyuge caiva pravartati kṛtaṃ yugamc eṣā dvādaśasāhasrī yugākhyā parikīrtitāa etat sahasraparyantam aho brāhmam udāhṛtamc viśvaṃ hi brahmabhavane sarvaśaḥ parivartatee lokānāṃ manujavyāghra pralayaṃ taṃ vidur budhāḥa alpāvaśiṣṭe tu tadā yugānte bharatarṣabhac sahasrānte narāḥ sarve prāyaśo nṛtavādinaḥa yajñapratinidhiḥ pārtha dānapratinidhis tathāc vratapratinidhiś caiva tasmin kāle pravartatea brāhmaṇāḥ śūdrakarmāṇas tathā śūdrā dhanārjakāḥc kṣatradharmeṇa vāpy atra vartayanti gate yugea nivṛttayajñasvādhyāyāḥ piṇḍodakavivarjitāḥc brāhmaṇāḥ sarvabhakṣāś ca bhaviṣyanti kalau yugea ajapā brāhmaṇās tāta śūdrā japaparāyaṇāḥc viparīte tadā loke pūrvarūpaṃ kṣayasya tata bahavo mleccharājānaḥ pṛthivyāṃ manujādhipac mithyānuśāsinaḥ pāpā mṛṣāvādaparāyaṇāḥa āndhrāḥ śakāḥ pulindāś ca yavanāś ca narādhipāḥc kāmbojā aurṇikāḥ śūdrās tathābhīrā narottamad yugānte manujavyāghra tathākārāś ca bhārataa na tadā brāhmaṇaḥ kaś cit svadharmam upajīvatic kṣatriyā api vaiśyāś ca vikarmasthā narādhipaa alpāyuṣaḥ svalpabalā alpatejaḥparākramāḥc alpadehālpasārāś ca tathā satyālpabhāṣiṇaḥa bahuśūnyā janapadā mṛgavyālāvṛtā diśaḥc yugānte samanuprāpte vṛthā ca brahmacāriṇaḥe bhovādinas tathā śūdrā brāhmaṇāś cāryavādinaḥa yugānte manujavyāghra bhavanti bahujantavaḥc na tathā ghrāṇayuktāś ca sarvagandhā viśāṃ patee rasāś ca manujavyāghra na tathā svāduyoginaḥa bahuprajā hrasvadehāḥ śīlācāravivarjitāḥc mukhebhagāḥ striyo rājan bhaviṣyanti yugakṣayea aṭṭaśūlā janapadāḥ śivaśūlāś catuṣpathāḥc keśaśūlāḥ striyo rājan bhaviṣyanti yugakṣayed aṭṭam annam iti prāhuḥ śūlaṃ vikrayam ucyated vedaḥ śivam iti proktaṃ brāhmaṇāś ca catuṣpathāḥd keśo bhaga iti proktas taṃ vikrīyaiva bhuñjatea alpakṣīrās tathā gāvo bhaviṣyanti janādhipac alpapuṣpaphalāś cāpi pādapā bahuvāyasāḥa brahmavadhyāvaliptānāṃ tathā mithyābhiśaṃsināmc nṛpāṇāṃ pṛthivīpāla pratigṛhṇanti vai dvijāḥa lobhamohaparītāś ca mithyādharmadhvajāvṛtāḥc bhikṣārthaṃ pṛthivīpāla cañcūryante dvijair diśaḥa karabhārabhayāt puṃso gṛhasthāḥ parimoṣakāḥc municchadmākṛticchannā vāṇijyam upajīvatea mithyā ca nakharomāṇi dhārayanti narās tadāc arthalobhān naravyāghra vṛthā ca brahmacāriṇaḥa āśrameṣu vṛthācārāḥ pānapā gurutalpagāḥc aihalaukikam īhante māṃsaśoṇitavardhanamd pāralaukikakāryeṣu pramattā bhṛśanāstikāḥa bahupāṣaṇḍasaṃkīrṇāḥ parānnaguṇavādinaḥc āśramā manujavyāghra na bhavanti yugakṣayea yathartuvarṣī bhagavān na tathā pākaśāsanaḥc na tadā sarvabījāni samyag rohanti bhāratad hiṃsābhirāmaś ca janas tathā saṃpadyate śuciḥe adharmaphalam atyarthaṃ tadā bhavati cānaghaf phalaṃ dharmasya rājendra sarvatra parihīyatea tathā ca pṛthivīpāla yo bhaved dharmasaṃyutaḥc alpāyuḥ sa hi mantavyo na hi dharmo sti kaś canaa bhūyiṣṭhaṃ kūṭamānaiś ca paṇyaṃ vikrīṇate janāḥc vaṇijaś ca naravyāghra bahumāyā bhavanty utaa dharmiṣṭhāḥ parihīyante pāpīyān vardhate janaḥc dharmasya balahāniḥ syād adharmaś ca balī tathāa alpāyuṣo daridrāś ca dharmiṣṭhā mānavās tadāc dīrghāyuṣaḥ samṛddhāś ca vidharmāṇo yugakṣayed nagarāṇāṃ vihāreṣu vidharmāṇo yugakṣayea adharmiṣṭhair upāyaiś ca prajā vyavaharanty utac saṃcayenāpi cālpena bhavanty āḍhyā madānvitāḥa dhanaṃ viśvāsato nyastaṃ mitho bhūyiṣṭhaśo narāḥc hartuṃ taruṇānāṃ ca yac chīlaṃ tad vṛddheṣu prajāyatea viparītās tadā nāryo vañcayitvā rahaḥ patīnc vyuccaranty api duḥśīlā dāsaiḥ paśubhir eva cad vīrapatnyas tathā nāryaḥ saṃśrayanti narān nṛpad bhartāram cāpi loke smin yadotpatsyanti dāruṇāḥa tadāhaṃ saṃprasūyāmi gṛheṣu śubhakarmaṇāmc praviṣṭo mānuṣaṃ dehaṃ sarvaṃ praśamayāmy ahama sṛṣṭvā devamanuṣyāṃś ca gandharvoragarākṣasānc sthāvarāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃharāmy ātmamāyayāa karmakāle punar deham anucintya sṛjāmy ahamc praviśya mānuṣaṃ dehaṃ maryādābandhakāraṇāta śvetaḥ kṛtayuge varṇaḥ pītas tretāyuge mamac rakto dvāparam āsādya kṛṣṇaḥ kaliyuge tathāa trayo bhāgā hy adharmasya tasmin kāle bhavanty utab yadā bhavati me varṇaḥ kṛṣṇo vai munisattamac antakāle ca saṃprāpte kālo bhūtvātidāruṇaḥe trailokyaṃ nāśayāmy ekaḥ kṛtsnaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamama ahaṃ trivartmā sarvātmā sarvalokasukhāvahaḥc abhibhūḥ sarvago nanto hṛṣīkeśa urukramaḥa kālacakraṃ nayāmy eko brahmann aham arūpi vaic śamanaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvalokakṛtodyamamd sarvaloke ca māṃ bhaktāḥ pūjayanti ca sarvaśaḥa evaṃ praṇihitaḥ samyaṅ mayātmā munisattamac sarvabhūteṣu viprendra na ca māṃ vetti kaś canaa yac ca kiṃ cit tvayā prāptaṃ mayi kleṣātmakaṃ dvijac sukhodayāya tat sarvaṃ śreyase ca tavānaghaa yac ca kiṃ cit tvayā loke dṛṣṭaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamamc vihitaḥ sarvathaivāsau mamātmā munisattamaa ardhaṃ mama śarīrasya sarvalokapitāmahaḥc ahaṃ nārāyaṇo nāma śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥa yāvad yugānāṃ viprarṣe sahasraparivartanamc tāvat svapimi viśvātmā sarvalokapitāmahaḥa evaṃ sarvam ahaṃ kālam ihāse munisattamac aśiśuḥ śiśurūpeṇa yāvad brahmā na budhyatea mayā ca vipra datto yaṃ varas te brahmarūpiṇāc asakṛt parituṣṭena viprarṣigaṇapūjitaa sarvam ekārṇavaṃ dṛṣṭvā naṣṭaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamamc viklavo si mayā jñātas tatas te darśitaṃ jagata abhyantaraṃ śarīrasya praviṣṭo si yadā mamac dṛṣṭvā lokaṃ samastaṃ ca vismito nāvabudhyasea tato si vaktrād viprarṣe drutaṃ niḥsārito mayāc ākhyātas te mayā cātmā durjñeyo pi surāsuraiḥa yāvat sa bhagavān brahmā na budhyati mahātapāḥc tāvat tvam iha viprarṣe viśrabdhaś cara vai sukhama tato vibuddhe tasmiṃs tu sarvalokapitāmahec ekībhūto hi srakṣyāmi śarīrād dvijasattamaa ākāśaṃ pṛthivīṃ jyotir vāyuṃ salilam eva cac loke yac ca bhavec cheṣam iha sthāvarajaṅgamam mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa ity uktvāntarhitas tāta sa devaḥ paramādbhutaḥc prajāś cemāḥ prapaśyāmi vicitrā bahudhākṛtāḥa etad dṛṣṭaṃ mayā rājaṃs tasmin prāpte yugakṣayec āścaryaṃ bharataśreṣṭha sarvadharmabhṛtāṃ varad sūtātmānaṃ samāhṛta caturddaśavidhānataḥd paramātmānam āviśya supityamittadhī  a yaḥ sa devo mayā dṛṣṭaḥ purā padmanibhekṣaṇaḥc sa eṣa puruṣavyāghra saṃbandhī te janārdanaḥa asyaiva varadānād dhi smṛtir na prajahāti māmc dīrgham āyuś ca kaunteya svacchandamaraṇaṃ tathāa sa eṣa kṛṣṇo vārṣṇeyaḥ purāṇapuruṣo vibhuḥc āste harir acintyātmā krīḍann iva mahābhujaḥa eṣa dhātā vidhātā ca saṃhartā caiva sātvataḥc śrīvatsavakṣā govindaḥ prajāpatipatiḥ prabhuḥa dṛṣṭvemaṃ vṛṣṇiśārdūlaṃ smṛtir mām iyam āgatāc ādidevam ajaṃ viṣṇuṃ puruṣaṃ pītavāsasama sarveṣām eva bhūtānāṃ pitā mātā ca mādhavaḥc gacchadhvam enaṃ śaraṇaṃ śaraṇyaṃ kauravarṣabhāḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa evam uktās tu te pārthā yamau ca puruṣarṣabhauc draupadyā kṛṣṇayā sārdhaṃ namaścakrur janārdanama sa caitān puruṣavyāghra sāmnā paramavalgunāc sāntvayām āsa mānārhān manyamāno yathāvidhia yudhiṣṭhiras tu kaunteyo mārkaṇḍeyaṃ mahāmunimc punaḥ papraccha sāmrājye bhaviṣyāṃ jagato gatima āścaryabhūtaṃ bhavataḥ śrutaṃ no vadatāṃ varac mune bhārgava yad vṛttaṃ yugādau prabhavāpyayaua asmin kaliyuge py asti punaḥ kautūhalaṃ mamac samākuleṣu dharmeṣu kiṃ nu śeṣaṃ bhaviṣyatia kiṃvīryā mānavās tatra kimāhāravihāriṇaḥc kimāyuṣaḥ kiṃvasanā bhaviṣyanti yugakṣayea kāṃ ca kāṣṭhāṃ samāsādya punaḥ saṃpatsyate kṛtamc vistareṇa mune brūhi vicitrāṇīha bhāṣasea ity uktaḥ sa muniśreṣṭhaḥ punar evābhyabhāṣatac ramayan vṛṣṇiśārdūlaṃ pāṇḍavāṃś ca mahāmuniḥ mārkaṇḍeya uvāca śṛṇu rājan mayā dṛṣṭaṃ yat purā śrutam eva ca anubhūtaṃ ca rājendra devadevaprasādajama bhaviṣyaṃ sarvalokasya vṛttāntaṃ bharatarṣabhac kaluṣaṃ kālam āsādya kathyamānaṃ nibodha mea kṛte catuṣpāt sakalo nirvyājopādhivarjitaḥc vṛṣaḥ pratiṣṭhito dharmo manuṣyeṣv abhavat purāa adharmapādaviddhas tu tribhir aṃśaiḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥc tretāyāṃ dvāpare rdhena vyāmiśro dharma ucyatea tribhir aṃśair adharmas tu lokān ākramya tiṣṭhatib tāmasaṃ yugam āsādya tadā bharatasattamac caturthāṃśena dharmas tu manuṣyān upatiṣṭhatia āyur vīryam atho buddhir balaṃ tejaś ca pāṇḍavac manuṣyāṇām anuyugaṃ hrasatīti nibodha mea rājāno brāhmaṇā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś caiva yudhiṣṭhirac vyājair dharmaṃ cariṣyanti dharmavaitaṃsikā narāḥa satyaṃ saṃkṣepsyate loke naraiḥ paṇḍitamānibhiḥc satyahānyā tatas teṣām āyur alpaṃ bhaviṣyatia āyuṣaḥ prakṣayād vidyāṃ na śakṣyanty upaśikṣitumc vidyāhīnān avijñānāl lobho py abhibhaviṣyatia lobhakrodhaparā mūḍhāḥ kāmasaktāś ca mānavāḥc vairabaddhā bhaviṣyanti parasparavadhepsavaḥa brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ saṃkīryantaḥ parasparamc śūdratulyā bhaviṣyanti tapaḥsatyavivarjitāḥa antyā madhyā bhaviṣyanti madhyāś cāntāvasāyinaḥc īdṛśo bhavitā loko yugānte paryupasthitea vastrāṇāṃ pravarā śāṇī dhānyānāṃ koradūṣakāḥc bhāryāmitrāś ca puruṣā bhaviṣyanti yugakṣayea matsyāmiṣeṇa jīvanto duhantaś cāpy ajaiḍakamc goṣu naṣṭāsu puruṣā bhaviṣyanti yugakṣayec   ye pi nityaṃ dhṛtavratāḥc te pi lobhasamāyuktāa anyonyaṃ parimuṣṇanto hiṃsayantaś ca mānavāḥc ajapā nāstikāḥ stenā bhaviṣyanti yugakṣayea sarittīreṣu kuddālair vāpayiṣyanti cauṣadhīḥc tāś cāpy alpaphalās teṣāṃ bhaviṣyanti yugakṣayea śrāddhe daive ca puruṣā ye ca nityaṃ dhṛtavratāḥc te pi lobhasamāyuktā bhokṣyantīha parasparama pitā putrasya bhoktā ca pituḥ putras tathaiva cac atikrāntāni bhojyāni bhaviṣyanti yugakṣayed rātrau bhokṣyanti vratino gṛhiṇo pi yugakṣayed evaṃvidhaṃ kariṣyanti kalau śāstravimohitāḥa na vratāni cariṣyanti brāhmaṇā vedanindakāḥc na yakṣyanti na hoṣyanti hetuvādavilobhitāḥd nimneṣv īhāṃ kariṣyanti hetuvādavimohitāḥa nimne kṛṣiṃ kariṣyanti yokṣyanti dhuri dhenukāḥc ekahāyanavatsāṃś ca vāhayiṣyanti mānavāḥa putraḥ pitṛvadhaṃ kṛtvā pitā putravadhaṃ tathāc nirudvego bṛhadvādī na nindām upalapsyatea mlecchabhūtaṃ jagat sarvaṃ niśkriyaṃ yajñavarjitamc bhaviṣyati nirānandam anutsavam atho tathāa prāyaśaḥ kṛpaṇānāṃ hi tathā bandhumatām apic vidhavānāṃ ca vittāni hariṣyantīha mānavāḥa alpavīryabalāḥ stabdhā lobhamohaparāyaṇāḥc tatkathādānasaṃtuṣṭā duṣṭānām api mānavāḥe parigrahaṃ kariṣyanti pāpācāraparigrahāḥa saṃghātayantaḥ kaunteya rājānaḥ pāpabuddhayaḥc parasparavadhodyuktā mūrkhāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥe bhaviṣyanti yugasyānte kṣatriyā lokakaṇṭakāḥa arakṣitāro lubdhāś ca mānāhaṃkāradarpitāḥc kevalaṃ daṇḍarucayo bhaviṣyanti yugakṣayea ākramyākramya sādhūnāṃ dārāṃś caiva dhanāni cac bhokṣyante niranukrośā rudatām api bhārataa na kanyāṃ yācate kaś cin nāpi kanyā pradīyatec svayaṃgrāhā bhaviṣyanti yugānte paryupasthitea rājānaś cāpy asaṃtuṣṭāḥ parārthān mūḍhacetasaḥc sarvopāyair hariṣyanti yugānte paryupasthitea mlecchībhūtaṃ jagat sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati ca bhāratac hasto hastaṃ parimuṣed yugānte paryupasthitea satyaṃ saṃkṣipyate loke naraiḥ paṇḍitamānibhiḥc sthavirā bālamatayo bālāḥ sthavirabuddhayaḥa bhīravaḥ śūramānīnaḥ śūrā bhīruviṣādinaḥc na viśvasanti cānyonyaṃ yugānte paryupasthitea ekāhāryaṃ jagat sarvaṃ lobhamohavyavasthitamc adharmo vardhati mahān na ca dharmaḥ pravartatea brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā na śiṣyanti janādhipac ekavarṇas tadā loko bhaviṣyati yugakṣayea na kṣaṃsyati pitā putraṃ putraś ca pitaraṃ tathāc bhāryā ca patiśuśrūṣāṃ na kariṣyati kā canaa ye yavānnā janapadā godhūmānnās tathaiva cac tān deśān saṃśrayiṣyanti yugānte paryupasthitea svairāhārāś ca puruṣā yoṣitaś ca viśāṃ patec anyonyaṃ na sahiṣyanti yugānte paryupasthitea mlecchabhūtaṃ jagat sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati yudhiṣṭhirac na śrāddhair hi pitṝṃś cāpi tarpayiṣyanti mānavāḥa na kaś cit kasya cic chrotā na kaś cit kasya cid guruḥc tamograstas tadā loko bhaviṣyati narādhipaa paramāyuś ca bhavitā tadā varṣāṇi ṣoḍaśac tataḥ prāṇān vimokṣyanti yugānte paryupasthitea pañcame vātha ṣaṣṭhe vā varṣe kanyā prasūyatec saptavarṣāṣṭavarṣāś ca prajāsyanti narās tadāa patyau strī tu tadā rājan puruṣo vā striyaṃ pratic yugānte rājaśārdūla na toṣam upayāsyatia alpadravyā vṛthāliṅgā hiṃsā ca prabhaviṣyatic na kaś cit kasya cid dātā bhaviṣyati yugakṣayea aṭṭaśūlā janapadāḥ śivaśūlāś catuṣpathāḥc keśaśūlāḥ striyaś cāpi bhaviṣyanti yugakṣayea mlecchāḥ krūrāḥ sarvabhakṣā dāruṇāḥ sarvakarmasuc bhāvinaḥ paścime kāle manuṣyā nātra saṃśayaḥa krayavikrayakāle ca sarvaḥ sarvasya vañcanamc yugānte bharataśreṣṭha vṛttilobhāt kariṣyatia jñānāni cāpy avijñāya kariṣyanti kriyās tathāc ātmacchandena vartante yugānte paryupasthitea svabhāvāt krūrakarmāṇaś cānyonyam abhiśaṅkinaḥc bhavitāro janāḥ sarve saṃprāpte yugasaṃkṣayea ārāmāṃś caiva vṛkṣāṃś ca nāśayiṣyanti nirvyathāḥc bhavitā saṃkṣayo loke jīvitasya ca dehināma tathā lobhābhibhūtāś ca cariṣyanti mahīm imāmc brāhmaṇāś ca bhaviṣyanti brahmasvāni ca bhuñjatea hāhākṛtā dvijāś caiva bhayārtā vṛṣalārditāḥc trātāram alabhanto vai bhramiṣyanti mahīm imāma jīvitāntakarā raudrāḥ krūrāḥ prāṇivihiṃsakāḥc yadā bhaviṣyanti narās tadā saṃkṣepsyate yugama āśrayiṣyanti ca nadīḥ parvatān viṣamāṇi cac pradhāvamānā vitrastā dvijāḥ kurukulodvahaa dasyuprapīḍitā rājan kākā iva dvijottamāḥc kurājabhiś ca satataṃ karabhāraprapīḍitāḥa dhairyaṃ tyaktvā mahīpāla dāruṇe yugasaṃkṣayec vikarmāṇi kariṣyanti śūdrāṇāṃ paricārakāḥa śūdrā dharmaṃ pravakṣyanti brāhmaṇāḥ paryupāsakāḥc śrotāraś ca bhaviṣyanti prāmāṇyena vyavasthitāḥa viparītaś ca loko yaṃ bhaviṣyaty adharottaraḥb dharmācāraparibhraṣṭā lobhamohasamanvitāḥc eḍūkān pūjayiṣyanti varjayiṣyanti devatāḥe śūdrāḥ paricariṣyanti na dvijān yugasaṃkṣayea āśrameṣu maharṣīṇāṃ brāhmaṇāvasatheṣu cac devasthāneṣu caityeṣu nāgānām ālayeṣu caa eḍūkacihnā pṛthivī na devagṛhabhūṣitāc bhaviṣyati yuge kṣīṇe tad yugāntasya lakṣaṇama yadā raudrā dharmahīnā māṃsādāḥ pānapās tathāc bhaviṣyanti narā nityaṃ tadā saṃkṣepsyate yugama puṣpe puṣpaṃ yadā rājan phale phalam upāśritamc prajāsyati mahārāja tadā saṃkṣepsyate yugama akālavarṣī parjanyo bhaviṣyati gate yugec akrameṇa manuṣyāṇāṃ bhaviṣyati tadā kriyāe virodham atha yāsyanti vṛṣalā brāhmaṇaiḥ sahaa mahī mlecchasamākīrṇā bhaviṣyati tato cirātc karabhārabhayād viprā bhajiṣyanti diśo daśad anyāyavartinaś cāpi bhaviṣyanti narādhipāḥa nirviśeṣā janapadā narāvṛṣṭibhir arditāḥc āśramān abhipatsyanti phalamūlopajīvinaḥa evaṃ paryākule loke maryādā na bhaviṣyatib brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ parityakṣyanti satkriyāmc na sthāsyanty upadeśe ca śiṣyā vipriyakāriṇaḥa ācāryopanidhiś caiva vatsyate tadanantaramc arthayuktyā pravatsyanti mitrasaṃbandhibāndhavāḥe abhāvaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yugānte ca bhaviṣyatia diśaḥ prajvalitāḥ sarvā nakṣatrāṇi calāni cac jyotīṃṣi pratikūlāni vātāḥ paryākulās tathāe ulkāpātāś ca bahavo mahābhayanidarśakāḥa ṣaḍbhir anyaiś ca sahito bhāskaraḥ pratapiṣyatic tumulāś cāpi nirhrādā digdāhāś cāpi sarvaśaḥe kabandhāntarhito bhānur udayāstamaye tadāa akālavarṣī ca tadā bhaviṣyati sahasradṛkc sasyāni ca na rokṣyanti yugānte paryupasthitea abhīkṣṇaṃ krūravādinyaḥ paruṣā ruditapriyāḥc bhartṝṇāṃ vacane caiva na sthāsyanti tadā striyaḥa putrāś ca mātāpitarau haniṣyanti yugakṣayec sūdayiṣyanti ca patīn striyaḥ putrān apāśritāḥa aparvaṇi mahārāja sūryaṃ rāhur upaiṣyatic yugānte hutabhuk cāpi sarvataḥ prajvaliṣyatia pānīyaṃ bhojanaṃ caiva yācamānās tadādhvagāḥc na lapsyante nivāsaṃ ca nirastāḥ pathi śeratea nirghātavāyasā nāgāḥ śakunāḥ samṛgadvijāḥc rūkṣā vāco vimokṣyanti yugānte paryupasthitea mitrasaṃbandhinaś cāpi saṃtyakṣyanti narās tadāc janaṃ parijanaṃ cāpi yugānte paryupasthitea atha deśān diśaś cāpi pattanāni purāṇi cac kramaśaḥ saṃśrayiṣyanti yugānte paryupasthitea hā tāta hā sutety evaṃ tadā vācaḥ sudāruṇāḥc vikrośamānaś cānyonyaṃ jano gāṃ paryaṭiṣyatid bhovādinas tathā śūdrā brāhmaṇāḥ prākṛtapriyāḥd pāṣaṇḍajanasaṃkīrṇā bhaviṣyanti yugakṣayea tatas tumulasaṃghāte vartamāne yugakṣayec dvijātipūrvako lokaḥ krameṇa prabhaviṣyatia tataḥ kālāntare nyasmin punar lokavivṛddhayec bhaviṣyati punar daivam anukūlaṃ yadṛcchayāa yadā candraś ca sūryaś ca tathā tiṣyabṛhaspatīc ekarāśau sameṣyanti prapatsyati tadā kṛtama kālavarṣī ca parjanyo nakṣatrāṇi śubhāni cac pradakṣiṇā grahāś cāpi bhaviṣyanty anulomagāḥd dakṣiṇāni bhaviṣyanti grahāś cāpy anulomagāḥd pradakṣiṇā bhaviṣyanti pūjayantaḥ parasparame kṣemaṃ subhikṣam ārogyaṃ bhaviṣyati nirāmayama kalkir viṣṇuyaśā nāma dvijaḥ kālapracoditaḥc utpatsyate mahāvīryo mahābuddhiparākramaḥa saṃbhūtaḥ saṃbhalagrāme brāhmaṇāvasathe śubhec manasā tasya sarvāṇi vāhanāny āyudhāni cae upasthāsyanti yodhāś ca śastrāṇi kavacāni caa sa dharmavijayī rājā cakravartī bhaviṣyatic sa cemaṃ saṃkulaṃ lokaṃ prasādam upaneṣyatia utthito brāhmaṇo dīptaḥ kṣayāntakṛd udāradhīḥc sa saṃkṣepo hi sarvasya yugasya parivartakaḥa sa sarvatra gatān kṣudrān brāhmaṇaiḥ parivāritaḥc utsādayiṣyati tadā sarvān mlecchagaṇān dvijaḥb mahātmā vṛttasaṃpannaḥ prajānāṃ hitakṛn nṛpa mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa tataś corakṣayaṃ kṛtvā dvijebhyaḥ pṛthivīm imāmc vājimedhe mahāyajñe vidhivat kalpayiṣyatia sthāpayitvā sa maryādāḥ svayambhuvihitāḥ śubhāḥc vanaṃ puṇyayaśaḥkarmā jarāvān saṃśrayiṣyatia tacchīlam anuvartsyante manuṣyā lokavāsinaḥc vipraiś corakśaye caiva kṛte kṣemaṃ bhaviṣyatia kṛṣṇājināni śaktīś ca triśūlāny āyudhāni cac sthāpayan vipraśārdūlo deśeṣu vijiteṣu caa saṃstūyamāno viprendrair mānayāno dvijottamānc kalkiś cariṣyati mahīṃ sadā dasyuvadhe rataḥa hā tāta hā sutety evaṃ tās tā vācaḥ sudāruṇāḥc vikrośamānān subhṛśaṃ dasyūn neṣyati saṃkṣayama tato dharmavināśo vai dharmavṛddhiś ca bhāratac bhaviṣyati kṛte prāpte kriyāvāṃś ca janas tathāa ārāmāś caiva caityāś ca taṭākāny avaṭās tathāb puṣkariṇyaś ca vividhā devatāyatāni cac yajñakriyāś ca vividhā bhaviṣyanti kṛte yugea brāhmaṇāḥ sādhavaś caiva munayaś ca tapasvinaḥc āśramāḥ sahapāṣaṇḍāḥ sthitāḥ satye janāḥ prajāḥa jāsyanti sarvabījāni upyamānāni caiva hac sarveṣv ṛtuṣu rājendra sarvaṃ sasyaṃ bhaviṣyatia narā dāneṣu niratā vrateṣu niyameṣu cac japayajñaparā viprā dharmakāmā mudā yutāḥe pālayiṣyanti rājāno dharmeṇemāṃ vasuṃdharāma vyavahāraratā vaiśyā bhaviṣyanti kṛte yugec ṣaṭkarmaniratā viprāḥ kṣatriyā rakṣaṇe ratāḥa śuśrūṣāyāṃ ratāḥ śūdrās tathā varṇatrayasya cac eṣa dharmaḥ kṛtayuge tretāyāṃ dvāpare tathāe paścime yugakāle ca yaḥ sa te saṃprakīrtitaḥa sarvalokasya viditā yugasaṃkhyā ca pāṇḍavac etat te sarvam ākhyātam atītānāgataṃ mayāe vāyuproktam anusmṛtya purāṇam ṛṣisaṃstutama evaṃ saṃsāramārgā me bahuśaś cirajīvināc dṛṣṭāś caivānubhūtāś ca tāṃs te kathitavān ahama idaṃ caivāparaṃ bhūyaḥ saha bhrātṛbhir acyutab sarvam etad yathātattvaṃ kathitaṃ tava sarvaśaḥc dharmasaṃśayamokṣārthaṃ nibodha vacanaṃ mamaa dharme tvayātmā saṃyojyo nityaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varac dharmātmā hi sukhaṃ rājā pretya ceha ca nandatia nibodha ca śubhāṃ vāṇīṃ yāṃ pravakṣyāmi te naghac na brāhmaṇe paribhavaḥ kartavyas te kadā canae brāhmaṇo ruṣito hanyād api lokān pratijñayā vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa mārkaṇḍeyavacaḥ śrutvā kurūṇāṃ pravaro nṛpaḥc uvāca vacanaṃ dhīmān paramaṃ paramadyutiḥa kasmin dharme mayā stheyaṃ prajāḥ saṃrakṣatā munec kathaṃ ca vartamāno vai na cyaveyaṃ svadharmataḥd yudhiṣṭhiraḥd etac chrutvā mayā kiṃ syāt kartavyaṃ munisattamad kathaṃ cāyaṃ jito loko rakṣitavyo bhaviṣyati mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa dayāvān sarvabhūteṣu hito rakto nasūyakaḥc apatyānām iva sveṣāṃ prajānāṃ rakṣaṇe rataḥe cara dharmaṃ tyajādharmaṃ pitṝn devāṃś ca pūjayaa pramādād yat kṛtaṃ te bhūt saṃyag dānena taj jayac alaṃ te mānam āśritya satataṃ paravān bhavaa vijitya pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ modamānaḥ sukhī bhavac eṣa bhūto bhaviṣyaś ca dharmas te samudīritaḥa na te sty aviditaṃ kiṃ cid atītānāgataṃ bhuvic tasmād imaṃ parikleśaṃ tvaṃ tāta hṛdi mā kṛthāḥd prājñās tāta na muhyanti kālenābhiprapīḍitāḥa eṣa kālo mahābāho api sarvadivaukasāmc muhyanti hi prajās tāta kālenābhipracoditāḥa mā ca te tra vicāro bhūd yan mayoktaṃ tavānaghac atiśaṅkya vaco hy etad dharmalopo bhavet tavaa jāto si prathite vaṃśe kurūṇāṃ bharatarṣabhac karmaṇā manasā vācā sarvam etat samācara yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa yat tvayoktaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha vākyaṃ śrutimanoharamc tathā kariṣye yatnena bhavataḥ śāsanaṃ vibhoa na me lobho sti viprendra na bhayaṃ na ca matsaraḥc kariṣyāmi hi tat sarvam uktaṃ yat te mayi prabho vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥc prahṛṣṭāḥ pāṇḍavā rājan sahitāḥ śārṅgadhanvanād viprarṣabhāś ca te sarve ye tatrāsan samāgatāḥa tathā kathāṃ śubhāṃ śrutvā mārkaṇḍeyasya dhīmataḥc vismitāḥ samapadyanta purāṇasya nivedanāt janamejaya uvāca bhūya eva brāhmaṇānāṃ māhātmyaṃ vaktum arhasi pāṇḍavānāṃ yathācaṣṭa mārkaṇḍeyo mahātapāḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaA bhūya eva brāhmaṇamahābhāgyaṃ vaktum arhasīty abravīt pāṇḍaveyo mārkaṇḍeyamA athācaṣṭa mārkaṇḍeyaḥ evam ukte vāmadevena rājansamuttasthū rākṣasā ghorarūpāḥc taiḥ śūlahastair vadhyamānaḥ sa rājāprovācedaṃ vākyam uccais tadānīma ikṣvākavo yadi brahman dalo vāvidheyā me yadi vānye viśo pic notsrakṣye gatvā sa vipraḥprovācedaṃ vacanaṃ vāmadevaḥc dalaṃ rājānaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ hi deyamevaṃ rājan sarvadharmeṣu dṛṣṭama bibheṣi cet tvam adharmān narendraprayaccha me śīghram evādya vāmyauc etac chrutvā uvācaa yaṃ tvam enaṃ sāyakaṃ ghorarūpaṃviṣeṇa digdhaṃ mama saṃdadhāsic na tvam enaṃ śaravaryaṃ vimoktuṃsaṃdhātuṃ vā śakṣyasi mānavendra rājovācaa ikṣvākavaḥ paśyata māṃ gṛhītaṃna vai śaknomy eṣa śaraṃ vimoktumc na cāsya kartuṃ nāśam abhyutsahāmiāyuṣmān vai jīvatu vāmadevaḥ vāmadeva uvācaa saṃspṛśaināṃ mahiṣīṃ sāyakenatatas tasmād enaso mokṣyase tvam mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa tatas tathā kṛtavān pārthivas papraccha bharatarṣabhac mārkaṇḍeyaṃ tapovṛddhaṃ dīrghāyuṣam akalmaṣama viditās tava dharmajña devadānavarākṣasāḥc rājavaṃśāś ca vividhā ṛṣivaṃśāś ca śāśvatāḥe na te sty aviditaṃ kiṃ cid asmiṃl loke kathaṃ nāma viparyāsād dhundhumāratvam āgataḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca yudhiṣṭhireṇaivam ukto mārkaṇḍeyo mahāmuniḥ dhaundhumāram upākhyānaṃ kathayām āsa bhārataa etad icchāmi tattvena jñātuṃ bhārgavasattamac viparyastaṃ yathā nāma kuvalāśvasya dhīmataḥ mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu rājan yudhiṣṭhirac dharmiṣṭham idam ākhyānaṃ dhundhumārasya tac chṛṇua yathā sa rājā ikṣvākuḥ kuvalāśvo mahīpatiḥc dhundhumāratvam agamat tac chṛṇuṣva mahīpatea maharṣir viśrutas tāta uttaṅka iti bhāratac marudhanvasu ramyeṣu āśramas tasya kauravaa uttaṅkas tu mahārāja tapo tapyat suduścaramc ārirādhayiṣur viṣṇuṃ bahūn varṣagaṇān vibhoa tasya prītaḥ sa bhagavān sākṣād darśanam eyivānc dṛṣṭvaiva carṣiḥ prahvas taṃ tuṣṭāva vividhaiḥ stavaiḥa tvayā deva prajāḥ sarvāḥ sadevāsuramānavāḥc
