bahubhir vṛtāmc hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇāṃ nityotsavasamākulāma so paśyad bahuvṛttāntāṃ brāhmaṇaḥ samatikramanc dharmavyādham apṛcchac ca sa cāsya kathito dvijaiḥa apaśyat tatra gatvā taṃ sūnāmadhye vyavasthitamc mārgamāhiṣamāṃsāni vikrīṇantaṃ tapasviname ākulatvāt tu kretṝṇām ekānte saṃsthito dvijaḥa sa tu jñātvā dvijaṃ prāptaṃ sahasā saṃbhramotthitaḥc ājagāma yato vipraḥ sthita ekānta āsane vyādha uvācaa abhivādaye tvā bhagavan svāgataṃ te dvijottamac ahaṃ vyādhas tu bhadraṃ te kiṃ karomi praśādhi māma ekapatnyā yad ukto si gaccha tvaṃ mithilām itic jānāmy etad ahaṃ sarvaṃ yadarthaṃ tvam ihāgataḥ mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa śrutvā tu tasya tad vākyaṃ sa vipro bhṛśaharṣitaḥc dvitīyam idam āścaryam ity acintayata dvijaḥa adeśasthaṃ hi te sthānam iti vyādho bravīd dvijamc gṛhaṃ gacchāva bhagavan yadi rocayase naghaa bāḍham ity eva saṃhṛṣṭo vipro vacanam abravītc agratas tu dvijaṃ kṛtvā sa jagāma gṛhān pratia praviśya ca gṛhaṃ ramyam āsanenābhipūjitaḥb arghyeṇa ca sa vai tena vyādhena dvijasattamaḥc pādyam ācamanīyaṃ ca pratigṛhya dvijottamaḥa tataḥ sukhopaviṣṭas taṃ vyādhaṃ vacanam abravītc karmaitad vai na sadṛśaṃ bhavataḥ pratibhāti mee anutapye bhṛśaṃ tāta tava ghoreṇa karmaṇā vyādha uvācaa kulocitam idaṃ karma pitṛpaitāmahaṃ mamac vartamānasya me dharme sve manyuṃ mā kṛthā dvijaa dhātrā tu vihitaṃ pūrvaṃ karma svaṃ pālayāmy ahamc prayatnāc ca gurū vṛddhau śuśrūṣe haṃ dvijottamaa satyaṃ vade nābhyasūye yathāśakti dadāmi cac devatātithibhṛtyānām avaśiṣṭena vartayea na kutsayāmy ahaṃ kiṃ cin na garhe balavattaramc kṛtam anveti kartāraṃ purā karma dvijottamaa kṛṣigorakṣyavāṇijyam iha lokasya jīvanamc daṇḍanītis trayī vidyā tena lokā bhavanty utaa karma śūdre kṛṣir vaiśye saṃgrāmaḥ kṣatriye smṛtaḥc brahmacaryaṃ tapo mantrāḥ satyaṃ ca brāhmaṇe sadāa rājā praśāsti dharmeṇa svakarmaniratāḥ prajāḥc vikarmāṇaś ca ye ke cit tān yunakti svakarmasua bhetavyaṃ hi sadā rājñāṃ prajānām adhipā hi tec mārayanti vikarmasthaṃ lubdhā mṛgam iveṣubhiḥa janakasyeha viprarṣe vikarmastho na vidyatec svakarmaniratā varṇāś catvāro pi dvijottamaa sa eṣa janako rājā durvṛttam api cet sutamc daṇḍyaṃ daṇḍe nikṣipati tathā na glāti dhārmikama suyuktacāro nṛpatiḥ sarvaṃ dharmeṇa paśyatic śrīś ca rājyaṃ ca daṇḍaś ca kṣatriyāṇāṃ dvijottamaa rājāno hi svadharmeṇa śriyam icchanti bhūyasīmc sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ trātā rājā bhavaty utaa pareṇa hi hatān brahman varāhamahiṣān ahamc na svayaṃ hanmi viprarṣe vikrīṇāmi sadā tv ahama na bhakṣayāmi māṃsāni ṛtugāmī tathā hy ahamc sadopavāsī ca tathā naktabhojī tathā dvijaa aśīlaś cāpi puruṣo bhūtvā bhavati śīlavānc prāṇihiṃsārataś cāpi bhavate dhārmikaḥ punaḥa vyabhicārān narendrāṇāṃ dharmaḥ saṃkīryate mahānc adharmo vardhate cāpi saṃkīryante tathā prajāḥa uruṇḍā vāmanāḥ kubjāḥ sthūlaśīrṣās tathaiva cac klībāś cāndhāś ca jāyante badhirā lambacūcukāḥe pārthivānām adharmatvāt prajānām abhavaḥ sadāa sa eṣa rājā janakaḥ sarvaṃ dharmeṇa paśyatic anugṛhṇan prajāḥ sarvāḥ svadharmaniratāḥ sadād pāty eṣa rājā janakaḥ pitṛvad dvijasattamaa ye caiva māṃ praśaṃsanti ye ca nindanti mānavāḥc sarvān supariṇītena karmaṇā toṣayāmy ahama ye jīvanti svadharmeṇa saṃbhuñjante ca pārthivāḥc na kiṃ cid upajīvanti dakṣā utthānaśīlinaḥd na kiṃ cit phalam āpnoti svadharmasya ca lopanāta śaktyānnadānaṃ satataṃ titikṣā dharmanityatāc yathārhaṃ pratipūjā ca sarvabhūteṣu vai dayāe tyāgān nānyatra martyānāṃ guṇās tiṣṭhanti pūruṣea mṛṣāvādaṃ pariharet kuryāt priyam ayācitaḥc na ca kāmān na saṃrambhān na dveṣād dharmam utsṛjeta priye nātibhṛśaṃ hṛṣyed apriye na ca saṃjvaretc na muhyed arthakṛcchreṣu na ca dharmaṃ parityajeta karma cet kiṃ cid anyat syād itaran na samācaretc yat kalyāṇam abhidhyāyet tatrātmānaṃ niyojayeta na pāpaṃ prati pāpaḥ syāt sādhur eva sadā bhavetc ātmanaiva hataḥ pāpo yaḥ pāpaṃ kartum icchatia karma caitad asādhūnāṃ vṛjinānām asādhuvatc na dharmo stīti manvānāḥ śucīn avahasanti yee aśraddadhānā dharmasya te naśyanti na saṃśayaḥa mahādṛtir ivādhmātaḥ pāpo bhavati nityadāb sādhusannītimān eva sarvatra dvijasattamac mūḍhānām avaliptānām asāraṃ bhāṣitaṃ bhavete darśayaty antarātmānaṃ divā rūpam ivāṃśumāna na loke rājate mūrkhaḥ kevalātmapraśaṃsayāc api ceha mṛjā hīnaḥ kṛtavidyaḥ prakāśatea abruvan kasya cin nindām ātmapūjām avarṇayanc na kaś cid guṇasaṃpannaḥ prakāśo bhuvi dṛśyatea vikarmaṇā tapyamānaḥ pāpād viparimucyatec naitat kuryāṃ punar iti dvitīyāt parimucyated kariṣye dharmam eveti tṛtīyāt parimucyatea karmaṇā yena teneha pāpād dvijavarottamac evaṃ śrutir iyaṃ brahman dharmeṣu paridṛśyatea pāpāny abuddhveha purā kṛtāniprāg dharmaśīlo vinihanti paścātc dharmo brahman nudate pūruṣāṇāṃyat kurvate pāpam iha pramādāta pāpaṃ kṛtvā hi manyeta nāham asmīti pūruṣaḥb taṃ tu devāḥ prapaśyanti svasyaivāntarapūruṣaḥc cikīrṣed eva kalyāṇaṃ śraddadhāno nasūyakaḥa vasanasyeva chidrāṇi sādhūnāṃ vivṛṇoti yaḥb apaśyann ātmano doṣān sa pāpaḥ pretya naśyatic pāpaṃ cet puruṣaḥ kṛtvā kalyāṇam abhipadyatee mucyate sarvapāpebhyo mahābhrair iva candramāḥa yathādityaḥ samudyan vai tamaḥ sarvaṃ vyapohatic evaṃ kalyāṇam ātiṣṭhan sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyatea pāpānāṃ viddhy adhiṣṭhānaṃ lobham eva dvijottamab tasmāt tau viduṣāṃ vipra varjanīyau pradhānataḥc lubdhāḥ pāpaṃ vyavasyanti narā nātibahuśrutāḥe adharmā dharmarūpeṇa tṛṇaiḥ kūpā ivāvṛtāḥa teṣāṃ damaḥ pavitrāṇi pralāpā dharmasaṃśritāḥc sarvaṃ hi vidyate teṣu śiṣṭācāraḥ sudurlabhaḥ mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa sa tu vipro mahāprājño dharmavyādham apṛcchatac śiṣṭācāraṃ katham ahaṃ vidyām iti narottamad etad icchāmi bhadraṃ te śrotuṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varad pañca kāni pavitrāṇi śiṣṭācāreṣu nityadāe etan mahāmate vyādha prabravīhi yathātatham vyādha uvācaa yajño dānaṃ tapo vedāḥ satyaṃ ca dvijasattamac pañcaitāni pavitrāṇi śiṣṭācāreṣu nityadāa kāmakrodhau vaśe kṛtvā dambhaṃ lobham anārjavamc dharma ity eva saṃtuṣṭās te śiṣṭāḥ śiṣṭasaṃmatāḥa na teṣāṃ vidyate vṛttaṃ yajñasvādhyāyaśīlināmc ācārapālanaṃ caiva dvitīyaṃ śiṣṭalakṣaṇama guruśuśrūṣaṇaṃ satyam akrodho dānam eva cac etac catuṣṭayaṃ brahmañ śiṣṭācāreṣu nityadāa śiṣṭācāre manaḥ kṛtvā pratiṣṭhāpya ca sarvaśaḥc yām ayaṃ labhate tuṣṭiṃ sā na śakyā hy ato nyathāa vedasyopaniṣat satyaṃ satyasyopaniṣad damaḥc damasyopaniṣat tyāgaḥ śiṣṭācāreṣu nityadāa ye tu dharmam asūyante buddhimohānvitā narāḥc apathā gacchatāṃ teṣām anuyātāpi pīḍyatea ye tu śiṣṭāḥ suniyatāḥ śrutityāgaparāyaṇāḥb vyādhaḥb etan mahāmate vyādha prabravīhi yathātathamb yajño dānaṃ tapo vedāḥ satyaṃ ca dvijasattamab pañcaitāni pavitrāṇi śiṣṭācāreṣu nityadāc dharmyaṃ panthānam ārūḍhāḥ satyadharmaparāyaṇāḥa niyacchanti parāṃ buddhiṃ śiṣṭācārānvitā narāḥc upādhyāyamate yuktāḥ sthityā dharmārthadarśinaḥa nāstikān bhinnamaryādān krūrān pāpamatau sthitānc tyaja tāñ jñānam āśritya dhārmikān upasevya caa kāmalobhagrahākīrṇāṃ pañcendriyajalāṃ nadīmc nāvaṃ dhṛtimayīṃ kṛtvā janmadurgāṇi saṃtaraa krameṇa saṃcito dharmo buddhiyogamayo mahānc śiṣṭācāre bhavet sādhū rāgaḥ śukleva vāsasia ahiṃsā satyavacanaṃ sarvabhūtahitaṃ paramc ahiṃsā paramo dharmaḥ sa ca satye pratiṣṭhitaḥe satye kṛtvā pratiṣṭhāṃ tu pravartante pravṛttayaḥa satyam eva garīyas tu śiṣṭācāraniṣevitamc ācāraś ca satāṃ dharmaḥ santaś cācāralakṣaṇāḥa yo yathāprakṛtir jantuḥ svāṃ svāṃ prakṛtim aśnutec pāpātmā krodhakāmādīn doṣān āpnoty anātmavāna ārambho nyāyayukto yaḥ sa hi dharma iti smṛtaḥc anācāras tv adharmeti etac chiṣṭānuśāsanama akrudhyanto nasūyanto nirahaṃkāramatsarāḥc ṛjavaḥ śamasaṃpannāḥ śiṣṭācārā bhavanti tea traividyavṛddhāḥ śucayo vṛttavanto manasvinaḥc guruśuśrūṣavo dāntāḥ śiṣṭācārā bhavanty utaa teṣām adīnasattvānāṃ duṣkarācārakarmaṇāmc svaiḥ karmabhiḥ satkṛtānāṃ ghoratvaṃ saṃpraṇaśyatia taṃ sadācāram āścaryaṃ purāṇaṃ śāśvataṃ dhruvamc dharmaṃ dharmeṇa paśyantaḥ svargaṃ yānti manīṣiṇaḥa āstikā mānahīnāś ca dvijātijanapūjakāḥc śrutavṛttopasaṃpannāḥ te santaḥ svargagāminaḥa vedoktaḥ paramo dharmo dharmaśāstreṣu cāparaḥc śiṣṭācīrṇaś ca śiṣṭānāṃ trividhaṃ dharmalakṣaṇama pāraṇaṃ cāpi vidyānāṃ tīrthānām avagāhanamc kṣamā satyārjavaṃ śaucaṃ śiṣṭācāranidarśanama sarvabhūtadayāvanto ahiṃsāniratāḥ sadāc paruṣaṃ na prabhāṣante sadā santo dvijapriyāḥa śubhānām aśubhānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ phalasaṃcayec vipākam abhijānanti te śiṣṭāḥ śiṣṭasaṃmatāḥa nyāyopetā guṇopetāḥ sarvalokahitaiṣiṇaḥc santaḥ svargajitaḥ śuklāḥ saṃniviṣṭāś ca satpathea dātāraḥ saṃvibhaktāro dīnānugrahakāriṇaḥc sarvabhūtadayāvantas te śiṣṭāḥ śiṣṭasaṃmatāḥa sarvapūjyāḥ śrutadhanās tathaiva ca tapasvinaḥc dānanityāḥ sukhāṃl lokān āpnuvantīha ca śriyama pīḍayā ca kalatrasya bhṛtyānāṃ ca samāhitāḥc atiśaktyā prayacchanti santaḥ sadbhiḥ samāgatāḥa lokayātrāṃ ca paśyanto dharmam ātmahitāni cac evaṃ santo vartamānā edhante śāśvatīḥ samāḥa ahiṃsā satyavacanam ānṛśaṃsyam athārjavamc adroho nātimānaś ca hrīs titikṣā damaḥ śamaḥa dhīmanto dhṛtimantaś ca bhūtānām anukampakāḥc akāmadveṣasaṃyuktās te santo lokasatkṛtāḥa trīṇy eva tu padāny āhuḥ satāṃ vṛttam anuttamamc na druhyec caiva dadyāc ca satyaṃ caiva sadā vadeta sarvatra ca dayāvantaḥ santaḥ karuṇavedinaḥc gacchantīha susaṃtuṣṭā dharmyaṃ panthānam uttamame śiṣṭācārā mahātmāno yeṣāṃ dharmaḥ suniścitaḥa anasūyā kṣamā śāntiḥ saṃtoṣaḥ priyavāditāc kāmakrodhaparityāgaḥ śiṣṭācāraniṣevaṇama karmaṇā śrutasaṃpannaṃ satāṃ mārgam anuttamamc śiṣṭācāraṃ niṣevante nityaṃ dharmeṣv atandritāḥa prajñāprāsādam āruhya muhyato mahato janānc prekṣanto lokavṛttāni vividhāni dvijottamae atipuṇyāni pāpāni tāni dvijavarottamaa etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yathāprajñaṃ yathāśrutamc śiṣṭācāraguṇān brahman puraskṛtya dvijarṣabha mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa sa tu vipram athovāca dharmavyādho yudhiṣṭhirac yad ahaṃ hy ācare karma ghoram etad asaṃśayama vidhis tu balavān brahman dustaraṃ hi purākṛtamc purākṛtasya pāpasya karmadoṣo bhavaty ayame doṣasyaitasya vai brahman vighāte yatnavān ahama vidhinā vihite pūrvaṃ nimittaṃ ghātako bhavetc nimittabhūtā hi vayaṃ karmaṇo sya dvijottamaa yeṣāṃ hatānāṃ māṃsāni vikrīṇāmo vayaṃ dvijac teṣām api bhaved dharma upabhogena bhakṣaṇāte devatātithibhṛtyānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ pratipūjanāta oṣadhyo vīrudhaś cāpi paśavo mṛgapakṣiṇaḥc annādyabhūtā lokasya ity api śrūyate śrutiḥa ātmamāṃsapradānena śibir auśīnaro nṛpaḥc svargaṃ sudurlabhaṃ prāptaḥ kṣamāvān dvijasattamaa rājño mahānase pūrvaṃ rantidevasya vai dvijac dve sahasre tu vadhyete paśūnām anvahaṃ tadād ahany ahani vadhyete dve sahasre gavāṃ tathāa samāṃsaṃ dadato hy annaṃ rantidevasya nityaśaḥc atulā kīrtir abhavan nṛpasya dvijasattamae cāturmāsyeṣu paśavo vadhyanta iti nityaśaḥa agnayo māṃsakāmāś ca ity api śrūyate śrutiḥc yajñeṣu paśavo brahman vadhyante satataṃ dvijaiḥe saṃskṛtāḥ kila mantraiś ca te pi svargam avāpnuvana yadi naivāgnayo brahman māṃsakāmābhavan purāc bhakṣyaṃ naiva bhaven māṃsaṃ kasya cid dvijasattamaa atrāpi vidhir uktaś ca munibhir māṃsabhakṣaṇec devatānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca bhuṅkte dattvā tu yaḥ sadāe yathāvidhi yathāśraddhaṃ na sa duṣyati bhakṣaṇāta amāṃsāśī bhavaty evam ity api śrūyate śrutiḥc bhāryāṃ gacchan brahmacārī ṛtau bhavati brāhmaṇaḥa satyānṛte viniścitya atrāpi vidhir ucyatec saudāsena purā rājñā mānuṣā bhakṣitā dvijae śāpābhibhūtena bhṛśam atra kiṃ pratibhāti tea svadharma iti kṛtvā tu na tyajāmi dvijottamac purākṛtam iti jñātvā jīvāmy etena karmaṇāa svakarma tyajato brahmann adharma iha dṛśyatec svakarmanirato yas tu sa dharma iti niścayaḥa pūrvaṃ hi vihitaṃ karma dehinaṃ na vimuñcatic dhātrā vidhir ayaṃ dṛṣṭo bahudhā karmanirṇayea draṣṭavyaṃ tu bhavet prājña krūre karmaṇi vartatāc kathaṃ karma śubhaṃ kuryāṃ kathaṃ mucye parābhavāte karmaṇas tasya ghorasya bahudhā nirṇayo bhaveta dāne ca satyavākye ca guruśuśrūṣaṇe tathāc dvijātipūjane cāhaṃ dharme ca nirataḥ sadāe ativādātimānābhyāṃ nivṛtto smi dvijottamaa kṛṣiṃ sādhv iti manyante tatra hiṃsā parā smṛtāc karṣanto lāṅgalaiḥ puṃso ghnanti bhūmiśayān bahūne jīvān anyāṃś ca bahuśas tatra kiṃ pratibhāti tea dhānyabījāni yāny āhur vrīhy ādīni dvijottamac sarvāṇy etāni jīvāni tatra kiṃ pratibhāti tea adhyākramya paśūṃś cāpi ghnanti vai bhakṣayanti cac vṛkṣān athauṣadhīś caiva chindanti puruṣā dvijaa jīvā hi bahavo brahman vṛkṣeṣu ca phaleṣu cac udake bahavaś cāpi tatra kiṃ pratibhāti tea sarvaṃ vyāptam idaṃ brahman prāṇibhiḥ prāṇijīvanaiḥc matsyā grasante matsyāṃś ca tatra kiṃ pratibhāti tea sattvaiḥ sattvāni jīvanti bahudhā dvijasattamac prāṇino nyonyabhakṣāś ca tatra kiṃ pratibhāti tea caṅkramyamāṇā jīvāṃś ca dharaṇīsaṃśritān bahūnc padbhyāṃ ghnanti narā vipra tatra kiṃ pratibhāti tea upaviṣṭāḥ śayānāś ca ghnanti jīvān anekaśaḥc jñānavijñānavantaś ca tatra kiṃ pratibhāti tea jīvair grastam idaṃ sarvam ākāśaṃ pṛthivī tathāc avijñānāc ca hiṃsanti tatra kiṃ pratibhāti tea ahiṃseti yad uktaṃ hi puruṣair vismitaiḥ purāc ke na hiṃsanti jīvan vai loke smin dvijasattamae bahu saṃcintya iha vai nāsti kaś cid ahiṃsakaḥa ahiṃsāyāṃ tu niratā yatayo dvijasattamac kurvanty eva hi hiṃsāṃ te yatnād alpatarā bhaveta ālakṣyāś caiva puruṣāḥ kule jātā mahāguṇāḥc mahāghorāṇi karmāṇi kṛtvā lajjanti vai na caa suhṛdaḥ suhṛdo nyāṃś ca durhṛdaś cāpi durhṛdaḥc samyak pravṛttān puruṣān na samyag anupaśyataḥa samṛddhaiś ca na nandanti bāndhavā bāndhavair apic gurūṃś caiva vinindanti mūḍhāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥa bahu loke viparyastaṃ dṛśyate dvijasattamac dharmayuktam adharmaṃ ca tatra kiṃ pratibhāti tea vaktuṃ bahuvidhaṃ śakyaṃ dharmādharmeṣu karmasub vedadharmāviruddhaṃ yat pramāṇaiḥ pratitaṃ śubhamc svakarmanirato yo hi sa yaśaḥ prāpnuyān mahat mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa dharmavyādhas tu nipuṇaṃ punar eva yudhiṣṭhirac viprarṣabham uvācedaṃ sarvadharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥa śrutipramāṇo dharmo hi vṛddhānām iti bhāṣitamc sūkṣmā gatir hi dharmasya bahuśākhā hy anantikāa prāṇātyaye vivāhe ca vaktavyam anṛtaṃ bhavetc anṛtaṃ ca bhavet satyaṃ satyaṃ caivānṛtaṃ bhaveta yad bhūtahitam atyantaṃ tat satyam iti dhāraṇāc viparyayakṛto dharmaḥ paśya dharmasya sūkṣmatāmd yat karoty aśubhaṃ karma paśya dharmasya sūkṣmatāma yat karoty aśubhaṃ karma śubhaṃ vā dvijasattamab asya kartur gatiṃ sarvāṃ vakṣyāmi dvijasattamac avaśyaṃ tat samāpnoti puruṣo nātra saṃśayaḥa viṣamāṃ ca daśāṃ prāpya devān garhati vai bhṛśamc ātmanaḥ karmadoṣāṇi na vijānāty apaṇḍitaḥa mūḍho naikṛtikaś cāpi capalaś ca dvijottamac sukhaduḥkhaviparyāso yadā samupapadyatee nainaṃ prajñā sunītaṃ vā trāyate naiva pauruṣamf śubhaṃ badhnāti vai karma puruṣaḥ pāpaniścayaḥa yo yam icched yathā kāmaṃ taṃ taṃ kāmaṃ samaśnuyātc yadi syād aparādhīnaṃ puruṣasya kriyāphalama saṃyatāś cāpi dakṣāś ca matimantaś ca mānavāḥc dṛśyante niṣphalāḥ santaḥ prahīṇāḥ sarvakarmabhiḥa bhūtānām aparaḥ kaś cid dhiṃsāyāṃ satatotthitaḥc vañcanāyāṃ ca lokasya sa sukheneha jīvatia aceṣṭamānam āsīnaṃ śrīḥ kaṃ cid upatiṣṭhatic kaś cit karmāṇi kurvan hi na prāpyam adhigacchatia devān iṣṭvā tapas taptvā kṛpaṇaiḥ putragṛddhibhiḥc daśamāsadhṛtā garbhe jāyante kulapāṃsanāḥa apare dhanadhānyaiś ca bhogaiś ca pitṛsaṃcitaiḥc vipulair abhijāyante labdhās tair eva maṅgalaiḥd na dehajā manuṣyāṇāṃ vyādhayo dvijasattamaa karmajā hi manuṣyāṇāṃ rogā nāsty atra saṃśayaḥc ādhibhiś caiva bādhyante vyādhaiḥ kṣudramṛgā ivaa te cāpi kuśalair vaidyair nipuṇaiḥ saṃbhṛtauṣadhaiḥc vyādhayo vinivāryante mṛgā vyādhair iva dvijaa yeṣām asti ca bhoktavyaṃ grahaṇīdoṣapīḍitāḥc na śaknuvanti te bhoktuṃ paśya dharmabhṛtāṃ varaa apare bāhubalinaḥ kliśyante bahavo janāḥc duḥkhena cādhigacchanti bhojanaṃ dvijasattamaa iti lokam anākrandaṃ mohaśokapariplutamc srotasāsakṛd ākṣiptaṃ hriyamāṇaṃ balīyasāa na mriyeyur na jīryeyuḥ sarve syuḥ sārvakāmikāḥc nāpriyaṃ pratipaśyeyur vaśitvaṃ yadi vai bhaveta upary upari lokasya sarvo gantuṃ samīhatec yatate ca yathāśakti na ca tad vartate tathāa bahavaḥ saṃpradṛśyante tulyanakṣatramaṅgalāḥc mahac ca phalavaiṣamyaṃ dṛśyate karmasaṃdhiṣud vahanti śibikām anye yānty anye śibikāgatāḥa na kaś cid īśate brahman svayaṃgrāhasya sattamac karmaṇāṃ prākṛtānāṃ vai iha siddhiḥ pradṛśyatea yathā śrutir iyaṃ brahmañ jīvaḥ kila sanātanaḥc śarīram adhruvaṃ loke sarveṣāṃ prāṇinām ihaa vadhyamāne śarīre tu dehanāśo bhavaty utac jīvaḥ saṃkramate nyatra karmabandhanibandhanaḥ brāhmaṇa uvācaa kathaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha jīvo bhavati śāśvataḥc etad icchāmy ahaṃ jñātuṃ tattvena vadatāṃ vara vyādha uvācaa na jīvanāśo sti hi dehabhedemithyaitad āhur mriyateti mūḍhāḥc jīvas tu dehāntaritaḥ prayātidaśārdhataivāsya śarīrabhedaḥa anyo hi nāśnāti kṛtaṃ hi karmasa eva kartā sukhaduḥkhabhāgīc yat tena kiṃ cid dhi kṛtaṃ hi karmatad aśnute nāsti kṛtasya nāśaḥa apuṇyaśīlāś ca bhavanti puṇyānarottamāḥ pāpakṛto bhavantic naro nuyātas tv iha karmabhiḥ svaistataḥ samutpadyati bhāvitas taiḥ brāhmaṇa uvācaa kathaṃ saṃbhavate yonau kathaṃ vā puṇyapāpayoḥc jātīḥ puṇyā hy apuṇyāś ca kathaṃ gacchati sattama vyādha uvācaa garbhādhānasamāyuktaṃ karmedaṃ saṃpradṛśyatec samāsena tu te kṣipraṃ pravakṣyāmi dvijottamaa yathā saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ punar eva prajāyatec śubhakṛc chubhayonīṣu pāpakṛt pāpayoniṣua śubhaiḥ prayogair devatvaṃ vyāmiśrair mānuṣo bhavetc mohanīyair viyonīṣu tv adhogāmī ca kilbiṣaiḥa jātimṛtyujarāduḥkhaiḥ satataṃ samabhidrutaḥc saṃsāre pacyamānaś ca doṣair ātmakṛtair naraḥa tiryagyonisahasrāṇi gatvā narakam eva cac jīvāḥ saṃparivartante karmabandhanibandhanāḥa jantus tu karmabhis tais taiḥ svakṛtaiḥ pretya duḥkhitaḥc tadduḥkhapratighātārtham apuṇyāṃ yonim aśnutea tataḥ karma samādatte punar anyan navaṃ bahuc pacyate tu punas tena bhuktvāpathyam ivāturaḥa ajasram eva duḥkhārto duḥkhitaḥ sukhasaṃjñitaḥc tato nivṛttabandhatvāt karmaṇām udayād apie parikrāmati saṃsāre cakravad bahuvedanaḥa sa cen nivṛttabandhas tu viśuddhaś cāpi karmabhiḥb tapoyogasamārambhaṃ kurute dvijasattamab karmabhir bahubhiś cāpi lokān aśnāti mānavaḥc prāpnoti sukṛtāṃl lokān yatra gatvā na śocatia pāpaṃ kurvan pāpavṛttaḥ pāpasyāntaṃ na gacchatib puṇyaṃ kurvan puṇyavṛttaḥ puṇyasyāntaṃ na gacchatic tasmāt puṇyaṃ yatet kartuṃ varjayeta ca pātakama anasūyuḥ kṛtajñaś ca kalyāṇāny eva sevatec sukhāni dharmam arthaṃ ca svargaṃ ca labhate naraḥa saṃskṛtasya hi dāntasya niyatasya yatātmanaḥc prājñasyānantarā vṛttir iha loke paratra caa satāṃ dharmeṇa varteta kriyāṃ śiṣṭavad ācaretc asaṃkleśena lokasya vṛttiṃ lipseta vai dvijaa santi hy āgatavijñānāḥ śiṣṭāḥ śāstravicakṣaṇāḥc svadharmeṇa kriyā loke karmaṇaḥ so py asaṃkaraḥa prājño dharmeṇa ramate dharmaṃ caivopajīvatib dharmeṇa vṛttiṃ kurute dharmaṃ caiva praśaṃsatic tasya dharmād avāpteṣu dhaneṣu dvijasattamae tasyaiva siñcate mūlaṃ guṇān paśyati yatra vaia dharmātmā bhavati hy evaṃ cittaṃ cāsya prasīdatic sa maitrajanasaṃtuṣṭa iha pretya ca nandatia śabdaṃ sparśaṃ tathā rūpaṃ gandhān iṣṭāṃś ca sattamac prabhutvaṃ labhate cāpi dharmasyaitat phalaṃ viduḥa dharmasya ca phalaṃ labdhvā na tṛpyati mahādvijac atṛpyamāṇo nirvedam ādatte jñānacakṣuṣāa prajñācakṣur nara iha doṣaṃ naivānurudhyatec virajyati yathākāmaṃ na ca dharmaṃ vimuñcatia sarvatyāge ca yatate dṛṣṭvā lokaṃ kṣayātmakamc tato mokṣe prayatate nānupāyād upāyataḥa evaṃ nirvedam ādatte pāpaṃ karma jahāti cac dhārmikaś cāpi bhavati mokṣaṃ ca labhate parama tapo niḥśreyasaṃ jantos tasya mūlaṃ śamo damaḥc tena sarvān avāpnoti kāmān yān manasecchatia indriyāṇāṃ nirodhena satyena ca damena cac brahmaṇaḥ padam āpnoti yat paraṃ dvijasattama brāhmaṇa uvācaa indriyāṇi tu yāny āhuḥ kāni tāni yatavratac nigrahaś ca kathaṃ kāryo nigrahasya ca kiṃ phalama kathaṃ ca phalam āpnoti teṣāṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varac etad icchāmi tattvena dharmaṃ jñātuṃ sudhārmika mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa evam uktas tu vipreṇa dharmavyādho yudhiṣṭhirac pratyuvāca yathā vipraṃ tac chṛṇuṣva narādhipa vyādha uvācaa vijñānārthaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ manaḥ pūrvaṃ pravartatec tat prāpya kāmaṃ bhajate krodhaṃ ca dvijasattamaa tatas tadarthaṃ yatate karma cārabhate mahatc iṣṭānāṃ rūpagandhānām abhyāsaṃ ca niṣevatea tato rāgaḥ prabhavati dveṣaś ca tadanantaramc tato lobhaḥ prabhavati mohaś ca tadanantarama tasya lobhābhibhūtasya rāgadveṣahatasya cac na dharme jāyate buddhir vyājād dharmaṃ karoti caa vyājena carate dharmam arthaṃ vyājena rocatec vyājena sidhyamāneṣu dhaneṣu dvijasattamae tatraiva ramate buddhis tataḥ pāpaṃ cikīrṣatia suhṛdbhir vāryamāṇaś ca paṇḍitaiś ca dvijottamac uttaraṃ śrutisaṃbaddhaṃ bravīti śrutiyojitama adharmas trividhas tasya vardhate rāgadoṣataḥc pāpaṃ cintayate cāpi bravīti ca karoti caa tasyādharmapravṛttasya guṇā naśyanti sādhavaḥc ekaśīlāś ca mitratvaṃ bhajante pāpakarmiṇaḥa sa tenāsukham āpnoti paratra ca vihanyatec pāpātmā bhavati hy evaṃ dharmalābhaṃ tu me śṛṇua yas tv etān prajñayā doṣān pūrvam evānupaśyatic kuśalaḥ sukhaduḥkheṣu sādhūṃś cāpy upasevatee tasya sādhusamārambhād buddhir dharmeṣu jāyate brāhmaṇa uvācaa bravīṣi sūnṛtaṃ dharmaṃ yasya vaktā na vidyatec divyaprabhāvaḥ sumahān ṛṣir eva mato si me vyādha uvācaa brāhmaṇā vai mahābhāgāḥ pitaro grabhujaḥ sadāc teṣāṃ sarvātmanā kāryaṃ priyaṃ loke manīṣiṇāa yat teṣāṃ ca priyaṃ tat te vakṣyāmi dvijasattamac namaskṛtvā brāhmaṇebhyo brāhmīṃ vidyāṃ nibodha mea idaṃ viśvaṃ jagat sarvam ajayyaṃ cāpi sarvaśaḥc mahābhūtātmakaṃ brahman nātaḥ parataraṃ bhaveta mahābhūtāni khaṃ vāyur agnir āpas tathā ca bhūḥb vāyur ākāśasaṃyuktaḥ sarvabhūteṣu vartatec śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaś ca tadguṇāḥd tapasā hi samāpnoti yad yad evābhivāñchitamd tad indriyāṇi saṃyamya tapo bhavati nānyathāa teṣām api guṇāḥ sarve guṇavṛttiḥ parasparamc pūrvapūrvaguṇāḥ sarve kramaśo guṇiṣu triṣua ṣaṣṭhas tu cetanā nāma mana ity abhidhīyatec saptamī tu bhaved buddhir ahaṃkāras tataḥ parama indriyāṇi ca pañcaiva rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamas tathāc ity eṣa saptadaśako rāśir avyaktasaṃjñakaḥa sarvair ihendriyārthais tu vyaktāvyaktaiḥ susaṃvṛtaḥc caturviṃśaka ity eṣa vyaktāvyaktamayo guṇaḥe etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ kiṃ bhūyo śrotum icchasi mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa evam uktaḥ sa vipras tu dharmavyādhena bhāratac kathām akathayad bhūyo manasaḥ prītivardhanīm brāhmaṇaa mahābhūtāni yāny āhuḥ pañca dharmavidāṃ varac ekaikasya guṇān samyak pañcānām api me vada vyādha uvācaa bhūmir āpas tathā jyotir vāyur ākāśam eva cac guṇottarāṇi sarvāṇi teṣāṃ vakṣyāmi te guṇāna bhūmiḥ pañcaguṇā brahmann udakaṃ ca caturguṇamc guṇās trayas tejasi ca trayaś cākāśavātayoḥa śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaś ca pañcamaḥc ete guṇāḥ pañca bhūmeḥ sarvebhyo guṇavattarāḥa śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca rasaś cāpi dvijottamac apām ete guṇā brahman kīrtitās tava suvrataa śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca tejaso tha guṇās trayaḥc śabdaḥ sparśaś ca vāyau tu śabda ākāśa eva caa ete pañcadaśa brahman guṇā bhūteṣu pañcasuc vartante sarvabhūteṣu yeṣu lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥe anyonyaṃ nātivartante saṃpac ca bhavati dvijaa yadā tu viṣamībhāvam ācaranti carācarāḥc tadā dehī deham anyaṃ vyatirohati kālataḥa ānupūrvyā vinaśyanti jāyante cānupūrvaśaḥc tatra tatra hi dṛśyante dhātavaḥ pāñcabhautikāḥe yair āvṛtam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamama indriyaiḥ sṛjyate yad yat tat tad vyaktam iti smṛtamc avyaktam iti vijñeyaṃ liṅgagrāhyam atīndriyama yathāsvaṃ grāhakāny eṣāṃ śabdādīnām imāni tuc indriyāṇi yadā dehī dhārayann iha tapyatea loke vitatam ātmānaṃ lokaṃ cātmani paśyatic parāvarajñaḥ saktaḥ san sarvabhūtāni paśyatia paśyataḥ sarvabhūtāni sarvāvasthāsu sarvadāc brahmabhūtasya saṃyogo nāśubhenopapadyatea jñānamūlātmakaṃ kleśam ativṛttasya mohajamc loko buddhiprakāśena jñeyamārgeṇa dṛśyatea anādinidhanaṃ jantum ātmayoniṃ sadāvyayamc anaupamyam amūrtaṃ ca bhagavān āha buddhimāne tapomūlam idaṃ sarvaṃ yan māṃ viprānupṛcchasia indriyāṇy eva tat sarvaṃ yat svarganarakāv ubhauc nigṛhītavisṛṣṭāni svargāya narakāya caa eṣa yogavidhiḥ kṛtsno yāvad indriyadhāraṇamc etan mūlaṃ hi tapasaḥ kṛtsnasya narakasya caa indriyāṇāṃ prasaṅgena doṣam ṛcchaty asaṃśayamc saṃniyamya tu tāny eva tataḥ siddhim avāpnutea ṣaṇṇām ātmani nityānām aiśvaryaṃ yo dhigacchatic na sa pāpaiḥ kuto narthair yujyate vijitendriyaḥa rathaḥ śarīraṃ puruṣasya dṛṣṭamātmā niyantendriyāṇy āhur aśvānc tair apramattaḥ kuśalī sadaśvairdāntaiḥ sukhaṃ yāti rathīva dhīraḥa ṣaṇṇām ātmani nityānām indriyāṇāṃ pramāthināmc yo dhīro dhārayed raśmīn sa syāt paramasārathiḥa indriyāṇāṃ prasṛṣṭānāṃ hayānām iva vartmasuc dhṛtiṃ kurvīta sārathye dhṛtyā tāni jayed dhruvama indriyāṇāṃ hi caratāṃ yan mano nuvidhīyatec tad asya harate buddhiṃ nāvaṃ vāyur ivāmbhasia yeṣu vipratipadyante ṣaṭsu mohāt phalāgamec teṣv adhyavasitādhyāyī vindate dhyānajaṃ phalam mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa evaṃ tu sūkṣme kathite dharmavyādhena bhāratac brāhmaṇaḥ sa punaḥ sūkṣmaṃ papraccha susamāhitaḥ brāhmaṇa uvācaa sattvasya rajasaś caiva tamasaś ca yathātathamc guṇāṃs tattvena me brūhi yathāvad iha pṛcchataḥ vyādha uvācaa hanta te kathayiṣyāmi yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasic eṣāṃ guṇān pṛthaktvena nibodha gadato mamaa mohātmakaṃ tamas teṣāṃ raja eṣāṃ pravartakamc prakāśabahulatvāc ca sattvaṃ jyāya ihocyatea avidyābahulo mūḍhaḥ svapnaśīlo vicetanaḥc durdṛśīkas tamodhvastaḥ sakrodhas tāmaso lasaḥa pravṛttavākyo mantrī ca yo nurāgy abhyasūyakaḥc vivitsamāno viprarṣe stabdho mānī sa rājasaḥa prakāśabahulo dhīro nirvivitso nasūyakaḥc akrodhano naro dhīmān dāntaś caiva sa sāttvikaḥa sāttvikas tv atha saṃbuddho lokavṛttena kliśyatec yadā budhyati boddhavyaṃ lokavṛttaṃ jugupsatea vairāgyasya hi rūpaṃ tu pūrvam mūrdhānam āśrito vahniḥ śarīraṃ paripālayanc prāṇo mūrdhani cāgnau ca vartamāno viceṣṭatee bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca sarvaṃ prāṇe pratiṣṭhitama śreṣṭhaṃ tad eva bhūtānāṃ brahmajyotir upāsmahec sa jantuḥ sarvabhūtātmā puruṣaḥ sa sanātanaḥe mano buddhir ahaṃkāro bhūtānāṃ viṣayaś ca saḥf śarīramadhye nābhiḥ syān nābhyām agniḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥf avyaktaṃ sattvasaṃjñaṃ ca jīvaḥ kālaḥ sa caiva hif prakṛtiḥ puruṣaś caiva prāṇa eva dvijottamaf jāgarti svapnakāle ca svapne svapnāyate ca saḥf jāgratsu balam ādhatte ceṣṭatsu ceṣṭayaty apif tasmin niruddhe viprendra mṛta ity abhidhīyatef tyaktvā śarīraṃ bhūtātmā punar anyat prapadyatea evaṃ tv iha sa sarvatra prāṇena paripālyatec pṛṣṭhatas tu samānena svāṃ svāṃ gatim upāśritaḥa bastimūle gude caiva pāvakaḥ samupāśritaḥc vahan mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ cāpy apānaḥ parivartatea prayatne karmaṇi bale ya ekas triṣu vartatec udāna iti taṃ prāhur adhyātmaviduṣo janāḥa saṃdhau saṃdhau saṃniviṣṭaḥ sarveṣv api tathānilaḥc śarīreṣu manuṣyāṇāṃ vyāna ity upadiṣyated tvaṅmāṃsamedomajjāsthirasaraktāś ca dhātavaḥa dhātuṣv agnis tu vitataḥ sa tu vāyusamīritaḥc rasān dhātūṃś ca doṣāṃś ca vartayan paridhāvatia prāṇānāṃ saṃnipātāt tu saṃnipātaḥ prajāyatec ūṣmā cāgnir iti jñeyo yo nnaṃ pacati dehināma apānodānayor madhye prāṇavyānau samāhitauc samanvitas tv adhiṣṭhānaṃ samyak pacati pāvakaḥa tasyāpi pāyuparyantas tathā syād gudasaṃjñitaḥc srotāṃsi tasmāj jāyante sarvaprāṇeṣu dehināma agnivegavahaḥ prāṇo gudānte pratihanyatec sa ūrdhvam āgamya punaḥ samutkṣipati pāvakama pakvāśayas tv adho nābhyā ūrdhvam āmāśayaḥ sthitaḥc nābhimadhye śarīrasya prāṇāḥ sarve pratiṣṭhitāḥa pravṛttā hṛdayāt sarvās tiryag ūrdhvam adhas tathāc vahanty annarasān nāḍyo daśa prāṇapracoditāḥa yoginām eṣa mārgas tu yena gacchanti tatparamc jitaklamāsanā dhīrā mūrdhany ātmānam ādadhuḥe evaṃ sarveṣu vitatau prāṇāpānau hi dehiṣuf tāv agnisahitau brahman viddhi vai prāṇam ātmania ekādaśavikārātmā kalāsaṃbhārasaṃbhṛtaḥc mūrtimantaṃ hi taṃ viddhi nityaṃ karmajitātmakama tasmin yaḥ saṃsthito hy agnir nityaṃ sthālyām ivāhitaḥc ātmānaṃ taṃ vijānīhi nityaṃ yogajitātmakama devo yaḥ saṃsthitas tasminn abbindur iva puṣkarec kṣetrajñaṃ taṃ vijānīhi nityaṃ tyāgajitātmakama jīvātmakāni jānīhi rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamas tathāc jīvam ātmaguṇaṃ viddhi tathātmānaṃ parātmakama sacetanaṃ jīvaguṇaṃ vadantisa ceṣṭate ceṣṭayate ca sarvamc tataḥ paraṃ kṣetravido vadantiprākalpayad yo bhuvanāni saptaa evaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu bhūtātmā na prakāśatec dṛśyate tv agryayā buddhyā sūkṣmayā jñānavedibhiḥa cittasya hi prasādena hanti karma śubhāśubhamc prasannātmātmani sthitvā sukham ānantyam aśnutea lakṣaṇaṃ tu prasādasya yathā tṛptaḥ sukhaṃ svapetb sukhaduḥkhe hi saṃtyajya nirdvaṃdvo niṣparigrahaḥc nivāte vā yathā dīpo dīpyet kuśaladīpitaḥa pūrvarātre pare caiva yuñjānaḥ satataṃ manaḥc laghvāhāro viśuddhātmā paśyann ātmānam ātmania pradīpteneva dīpena manodīpena paśyatic dṛṣṭvātmānaṃ nirātmānaṃ tadā sa tu vimucyatea sarvopāyais tu lobhasya krodhasya ca vinigrahaḥc etat pavitraṃ yajñānāṃ tapo vai saṃkramo mataḥa nityaṃ krodhāt tapo rakṣec chriyaṃ rakṣeta matsarātc vidyāṃ mānāpamānābhyām ātmānaṃ tu pramādataḥa ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmaḥ kṣamā ca paramaṃ balamc ātmajñānaṃ paraṃ jñānaṃ paraṃ satyavrataṃ vratama satyasya vacanaṃ śreyaḥ satyaṃ jñānaṃ hitaṃ bhavetc yad bhūtahitam atyantaṃ tad vai satyaṃ paraṃ matama yasya sarve samārambhāḥ nirāśīrbandhanāḥ sadāc tyāge yasya hutaṃ sarvaṃ sa tyāgī sa ca buddhimāna yato na gurur apy enaṃ cyāvayed upapādayanc taṃ vidyād brahmaṇo yogaṃ viyogaṃ yogasaṃjñitama na hiṃsyāt sarvabhūtāni maitrāyaṇagataś caretc nedaṃ jīvitam āsādya vairaṃ kurvīta kena cita ākiṃcanyaṃ susaṃtoṣo nirāśitvam acāpalamc etad eva paraṃ jñānaṃ sadātmajñānam uttamama parigrahaṃ parityajya bhava buddhyā yatavrataḥc aśokaṃ sthānam ātiṣṭhen niścalaṃ pretya ceha cad bāhyasparśeṣu saktātmā vindaty ātmani yat sukhamd tad brahmayogayuktātmā sukham akṣayyam aśnutea taponityena dāntena muninā saṃyatātmanāc ajitaṃ jetukāmena bhāvyaṃ saṅgeṣv asaṅgināa guṇāguṇam anāsaṅgam ekakāryam anantaramc etad brāhmaṇa te vṛttam āhur ekapadaṃ sukhama parityajati yo duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ cāpy ubhayaṃ naraḥc brahma prāpnoti so tyantam asaṅgena ca gacchatia yathāśrutam idaṃ sarvaṃ samāsena dvijottamac etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa evaṃ saṃkathite kṛtsne mokṣadharme yudhiṣṭhirac dṛḍhaṃ prītamanā vipro dharmavyādham uvāca haa nyāyayuktam idaṃ sarvaṃ bhavatā parikīrtitamc na te sty aviditaṃ kiṃ cid dharmeṣv iha hi dṛśyate vyādha uvācaa pratyakṣaṃ mama yo dharmas taṃ paśya dvijasattamac yena siddhir iyaṃ prāptā mayā brāhmaṇapuṃgavaa uttiṣṭha bhagavan kṣipraṃ praviśyābhyantaraṃ gṛhamc draṣṭum arhasi dharmajña mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ca med tasya vyādhasya pitarau brāhmaṇaḥ saṃdadarśa ha mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa ity uktaḥ sa praviśyātha dadarśa paramārcitamc saudhaṃ hṛdyaṃ catuḥśālam atīva ca manoharama devatāgṛhasaṃkāśaṃ daivataiś ca supūjitamc śayanāsanasaṃbādhaṃ gandhaiś ca paramair yutama tatra śuklāmbaradharau pitarāv asya pūjitauc kṛtāhārau sutuṣṭau tāv upaviṣṭau varāsanee dharmavyādhas tu tau dṛṣṭvā pādeṣu śirasāpatat vṛddhāv ūcatuḥa uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha dharmajña dharmas tvām abhirakṣatuc prītau svas tava śaucena dīrgham āyur avāpnuhid gatim iṣṭāṃ tathā jñānam evaṃ ca paravān bhavae satputreṇa tvayā putra nityakālaṃ supūjitauf sukham āvāṃ vasāvo tra devalokagatāv ivaa na te nyad daivataṃ kiṃ cid daivateṣv api vartatec prayatatvād dvijātīnāṃ damenāsi samanvitaḥa pituḥ pitāmahā ye ca tathaiva prapitāmahāḥc prītās te satataṃ putra damenāvāṃ ca pūjayāa manasā karmaṇā vācā śuśrūṣā naiva hīyatec na cānyā vitathā buddhir dṛśyate sāṃprataṃ tavaa jāmadagnyena rāmeṇa yathā vṛddhau supūjitauc tathā tvayā kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ tadviśiṣṭaṃ ca putraka mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa tatas taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ tābhyāṃ dharmavyādho nyavedayatc tau svāgatena taṃ vipram arcayām āsatus tadāa pratigṛhya ca tāṃ pūjāṃ dvijaḥ papraccha tāv ubhauc saputrābhyāṃ sabhṛtyābhyāṃ kaccid vāṃ kuśalaṃ gṛhee anāmayaṃ ca vāṃ kaccit sadaiveha śarīrayoḥ vṛddhāv ūcatuḥa kuśalaṃ no gṛhe vipra bhṛtyavarge ca sarvaśaḥc kaccit tvam apy avighnena saṃprāpto bhagavann iha mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa bāḍham ity eva tau vipraḥ pratyuvāca mudānvitaḥc dharmavyādhas tu taṃ vipram arthavad vākyam abravīta pitā mātā ca bhagavann etau me daivataṃ paramc yad daivatebhyaḥ kartavyaṃ tad etābhyāṃ karomy ahama trayastriṃśad yathā devāḥ sarve śakrapurogamāḥc saṃpūjyāḥ sarvalokasya tathā vṛddhāv imau mamaa upahārān āharanto devatānāṃ yathā dvijāḥc kurvate tadvad etābhyāṃ karomy aham atandritaḥa etau me paramaṃ brahman pitā mātā ca daivatamc etau puṣpaiḥ phalai ratnais toṣayāmi sadā dvijaa etāv evāgnayo mahyaṃ yān vadanti manīṣiṇaḥc yajñā vedāś ca catvāraḥ sarvam etau mama dvijaa etadarthaṃ mama prāṇā bhāryā putrāḥ suhṛjjanāḥc saputradāraḥ śuśrūṣāṃ nityam eva karomy ahama svayaṃ ca snāpayāmy etau tathā pādau pradhāvayec āhāraṃ saṃprayacchāmi svayaṃ ca dvijasattamaa anukūlāḥ kathā vacmi vipriyaṃ parivarjayanc adharmeṇāpi saṃyuktaṃ priyam ābhyāṃ karomy ahama dharmam eva guruṃ jñātvā karomi dvijasattamac atandritaḥ sadā vipra śuśrūṣāṃ vai karomy ahama pañcaiva guravo brahman puruṣasya bubhūṣataḥc pitā mātāgnir ātmā ca guruś ca dvijasattamaa eteṣu yas tu varteta samyag eva dvijottamac bhaveyur agnayas tasya paricīrṇās tu nityaśaḥe gārhasthye vartamānasya dharma eṣa sanātanaḥf kathitas te mayā vipra kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa gurū nivedya viprāya tau mātāpitarāv ubhauc punar eva sa dharmātmā vyādho brāhmaṇam abravīta pravṛttacakṣur jāto smi saṃpaśya tapaso balamc yadartham ukto si tayā gacchasva mithilām itia patiśuśrūṣaparayā dāntayā satyaśīlayāc mithilāyāṃ vasan vyādhaḥ sa te dharmān pravakṣyati brāhmaṇa uvācaa pativratāyāḥ satyāyāḥ śīlāḍhyāyā yatavratac saṃsmṛtya vākyaṃ dharmajña guṇavān asi me mataḥ vyādha uvācaa yat tadā tvaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha tayokto māṃ prati prabhoc dṛṣṭam etat tayā samyag ekapatnyā na saṃśayaḥa tvadanugrahabuddhyā tu vipraitad darśitaṃ mayāc vākyaṃ ca śṛṇu me tāta yat te vakṣye hitaṃ dvijaa tvayā vinikṛtā mātā pitā ca dvijasattamac anisṛṣṭo si niṣkrānto gṛhāt tābhyām aninditae vedoccāraṇakāryārtham ayuktaṃ tat tvayā kṛtama tava śokena vṛddhau tāv andhau jātau tapasvinauc tau prasādayituṃ gaccha mā tvā dharmo tyagān mahāna tapasvī tvaṃ mahātmā ca dharme ca nirataḥ sadāc sarvam etad apārthaṃ te kṣipraṃ tau saṃprasādayad tau prasādya dvijaśreṣṭha yac chreyas tad avāpsyasia śraddadhasva mama brahman nānyathā kartum arhasic gamyatām adya viprarṣe śreyas te kathayāmy aham brāhmaṇa uvācaa yad etad uktaṃ bhavatā sarvaṃ satyam asaṃśayamc prīto smi tava dharmajña sādhvācāra guṇānvita vyādha uvācaa daivatapratimo hi tvaṃ yas tvaṃ dharmam anuvrataḥc purāṇaṃ śāśvataṃ divyaṃ duṣprāpam akṛtātmabhiḥd mātāpitroḥ sakāśaṃ hi gatvā tvaṃ dvijasattamaa atandritaḥ kuru kṣipraṃ mātāpitror hi pūjanamc ataḥ param ahaṃ dharmaṃ nānyaṃ paśyāmi kaṃ cana brāhmaṇa uvācaa ihāham āgato diṣṭyā diṣṭyā me saṃgataṃ tvayāc īdṛśā durlabhā loke narā dharmapradarśakāḥa eko narasahasreṣu dharmavid vidyate na vāc prīto smi tava satyena bhadraṃ te puruṣottamaa patamāno hi narake bhavatāsmi samuddhṛtaḥc bhavitavyam athaivaṃ ca yad dṛṣṭo si mayānaghaa rājā yayātir dauhitraiḥ patitas tārito yathāc sadbhiḥ puruṣaśārdūla tathāhaṃ bhavatā tv ihaa mātāpitṛbhyāṃ śuśrūṣāṃ kariṣye vacanāt tavac nākṛtātmā vedayati dharmādharmaviniścayama durjñeyaḥ śāśvato dharmaḥ śūdrayonau hi vartatāc na tvāṃ śūdram ahaṃ manye bhavitavyaṃ hi kāraṇame yena karmavipākena prāpteyaṃ śūdratā tvayāa etad icchāmi vijñātuṃ tattvena hi mahāmatec kāmayā brūhi me tathyaṃ sarvaṃ tvaṃ prayatātmavān vyādha uvācaa anatikramaṇīyā hi brāhmaṇā vai dvijottamac śṛṇu sarvam idaṃ vṛttaṃ pūrvadehe mamānaghaa ahaṃ hi brāhmaṇaḥ pūrvam āsaṃ dvijavarātmajac vedādhyāyī sukuśalo vedāṅgānāṃ ca pāragaḥe ātmadoṣakṛtair brahmann avasthāṃ prāptavān imāma kaś cid rājā mama sakhā dhanurvedaparāyaṇaḥc saṃsargād dhanuṣi śreṣṭhas tato ham abhavaṃ dvijaa etasminn eva kāle tu mṛgayāṃ nirgato nṛpaḥc sahito yodhamukhyaiś ca mantribhiś ca susaṃvṛtaḥe tato bhyahan mṛgāṃs tatra subahūn āśramaṃ pratia atha kṣiptaḥ śaro ghoro mayāpi dvijasattamab tato mṛgān varāhāṃś ca mahiṣāṃś ca mahīpatiḥb jaghāna puruṣavyāghraḥ sa rājā brāhmaṇottamab tato ham api krīḍārthaṃ rājñaḥ priyahite rataḥb varān nighnan varāhāṃś ca śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥb vanadurgeṣu dharmajña samaṃ rājñā mahātmanāb vyacaraṃ dhanur ādāya mṛgahā lubdhako yathāb tatrāśramasamabhyāśe mayā dharmavidāṃ varab mṛgasya vajrasaṃkāśaḥ śaraḥ kṣiptas tadā dvijac tāḍitaś ca munis tena śareṇānataparvaṇāa bhūmau nipatito brahmann uvāca pratinādayanc nāparādhyāmy ahaṃ kiṃ cit kena pāpam idaṃ kṛtama manvānas taṃ mṛgaṃ cāhaṃ saṃprāptaḥ sahasā munimc apaśyaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ viddhaṃ śareṇānataparvaṇāe tam ugratapasaṃ vipraṃ niṣṭanantaṃ mahītalea akāryakaraṇāc cāpi bhṛśaṃ me vyathitaṃ manaḥc ajānatā kṛtam idaṃ mayety atha tam abruvame kṣantum arhasi me brahmann iti cokto mayā muniḥa tataḥ pratyabravīd vākyam ṛṣir māṃ krodhamūrchitaḥc vyādhas tvaṃ bhavitā krūra śūdrayonāv iti dvija vyādha uvācaa evaṃ śapto ham ṛṣiṇā tadā dvijavarottamac abhiprasādayam ṛṣiṃ girā vākyaviśāradama ajānatā mayākāryam idam adya kṛtaṃ munec kṣantum arhasi tat sarvaṃ prasīda bhagavann iti ṛṣir uvācaa nānyathā bhavitā śāpa evam etad asaṃśayamc ānṛśaṃsyād ahaṃ kiṃ cit kartānugraham adya tea śūdrayonau vartamāno dharmajño bhavitā hy asic mātāpitroś ca śuśrūṣāṃ kariṣyasi na saṃśayaḥa tayā śuśrūṣayā siddhiṃ mahatīṃ samavāpsyasic jātismaraś ca bhavitā svargaṃ caiva gamiṣyasid bhūtvā ca dhārmiko vyādhaḥ pitroḥ śuśrūṣaṇe rataḥe śāpakṣayānte nirvṛtte bhavitāsi punar dvijaḥ vyādha uvācaa evaṃ śaptaḥ purā tena ṛṣiṇāsmy ugratejasāc prasādaś ca kṛtas tena mamaivaṃ dvipadāṃ varaa śaraṃ coddhṛtavān asmi tasya vai dvijasattamac āśramaṃ ca mayā nīto na ca prāṇair vyayujyataa etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yathā mama purābhavatc abhitaś cāpi gantavyaṃ mayā svargaṃ dvijottama brāhmaṇa uvācaa evam etāni puruṣā duḥkhāni ca sukhāni cac prāpnuvanti mahābuddhe notkaṇṭhāṃ kartum arhasie duṣkaraṃ hi kṛtaṃ tāta jānatā jātim ātmanaḥf lokavṛttāntatattvajña nityaṃ dharmaparāyaṇaa karmadoṣaś ca vai vidvann ātmajātikṛtena vaic kaṃ cit kālaṃ mṛṣyatāṃ vai tato si bhavitā dvijaḥe sāṃprataṃ ca mato me si brāhmaṇo nātra saṃśayaḥa brāhmaṇaḥ patanīyeṣu vartamāno vikarmasuc dāmbhiko duṣkṛtaprāyaḥ śūdreṇa sadṛśo bhaveta yas tu śūdro dame satye dharme ca satatotthitaḥc taṃ brāhmaṇam ahaṃ manye vṛttena hi bhaved dvijaḥa karmadoṣeṇa viṣamāṃ gatim āpnoti dāruṇāmc kṣīṇadoṣam ahaṃ manye cābhitas tvāṃ narottamaa kartum arhasi notkaṇṭhāṃ tvadvidhā hy aviṣādinaḥc lokavṛttāntavṛttajñā nityaṃ dharmaparāyaṇāḥ vyādha uvācaa prajñayā mānasaṃ duḥkhaṃ hanyāc chārīram auṣadhaiḥc etad vijñānasāmarthyaṃ na bālaiḥ samatāṃ vrajeta aniṣṭasaṃprayogāc ca viprayogāt priyasya cac mānuṣā mānasair duḥkhair yujyante alpabuddhayaḥa guṇair bhūtāni yujyante viyujyante tathaiva cac sarvāṇi naitad ekasya śokasthānaṃ hi vidyatea aniṣṭenānvitaṃ paśyaṃs tathā kṣipraṃ virajyatec tataś ca pratikurvanti yadi paśyanty upakramame śocato na bhavet kiṃ cit kevalaṃ paritapyatea parityajanti ye duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ vāpy ubhayaṃ narāḥc ta eva sukham edhante jñānatṛptā manīṣiṇaḥa asaṃtoṣaparā mūḍhāḥ saṃtoṣaṃ yānti paṇḍitāḥc asaṃtoṣasya nāsty antas tuṣṭis tu paramaṃ sukhame na śocanti gatādhvānaḥ paśyantaḥ paramāṃ gatima na viṣāde manaḥ kāryaṃ viṣādo viṣam uttamamc mārayaty akṛtaprajñaṃ bālaṃ kruddha ivoragaḥa yaṃ viṣādo bhibhavati viṣame samupasthitec tejasā tasya hīnasya puruṣārtho na vidyatea avaśyaṃ kriyamāṇasya karmaṇo dṛśyate phalamc na hi nirvedam āgamya kiṃ cit prāpnoti śobhanama athāpy upāyaṃ paśyeta duḥkhasya parimokṣaṇec aśocann ārabhetaiva yuktaś cāvyasanī bhaveta bhūteṣv abhāvaṃ saṃcintya ye tu buddheḥ paraṃ gatāḥc na śocanti kṛtaprajñāḥ paśyantaḥ paramāṃ gatima na śocāmi ca vai vidvan kālākāṅkṣī sthito smy ahamc etair nidarśanair brahman nāvasīdāmi sattama brāhmaṇa uvācaa kṛtaprajño si medhāvī buddhiś ca vipulā tavac nāhaṃ bhavantaṃ śocāmi jñānatṛpto si dharmavita āpṛcche tvāṃ svasti te stu dharmas tvā parirakṣatuc apramādas tu kartavyo dharme dharmabhṛtāṃ vara mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa bāḍham ity eva taṃ vyādhaḥ kṛtāñjalir uvāca hac pradakṣiṇam atho kṛtvā prasthito dvijasattamaḥa sa tu gatvā dvijaḥ sarvāṃ śuśrūṣāṃ kṛtavāṃs tadāc mātāpitṛbhyāṃ vṛddhābhyāṃ yathānyāyaṃ susaṃśitaḥa etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ nikhilena yudhiṣṭhirac pṛṣṭavān asi yaṃ tāta dharmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varaa pativratāyā māhātmyaṃ brāhmaṇasya ca sattamac mātāpitroś ca śuśrūṣā vyādhe dharmaś ca kīrtitaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa atyadbhutam idaṃ brahman dharmākhyānam anuttamamc sarvadharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha kathitaṃ dvijasattamaa sukhaśravyatayā vidvan muhūrtam iva me gatamc na hi tṛpto smi bhagavañ śṛṇvāno dharmam uttamam vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa śrutvemāṃ dharmasaṃyuktāṃ dharmarājaḥ kathāṃ śubhāmc punaḥ papraccha tam ṛṣiṃ mārkaṇḍeyaṃ tapasvinam yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa katham agnir vanaṃ yātaḥ kathaṃ cāpy aṅgirāḥ purāc naṣṭe gnau havyam avahad agnir bhūtvā mahān ṛṣiḥa agnir yadā tv eka eva bahutvaṃ cāsya karmasuc dṛśyate bhagavan sarvam etad icchāmi vedituma kumāraś ca yathotpanno yathā cāgneḥ suto bhavatc yathā rudrāc ca saṃbhūto gaṅgāyāṃ kṛttikāsu caa etad icchāmy ahaṃ tvattaḥ śrotuṃ bhārgavanandanac kautūhalasamāviṣṭo yathātathyaṃ mahāmuned vaktum arhasi me brahmann itihāsam imaṃ śubham mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc yathā kruddho hutavahas tapas taptuṃ vanaṃ gataḥa yathā ca bhagavān agniḥ svayam evāṅgirābhavatc saṃtāpayan svaprabhayā nāśayaṃs timirāṇi cad purāṅgirā mahābāho cacāra tapa uttamama āśramastho mahābhāgo havyavāhaṃ viśeṣayanc tathā sa bhūtvā tu tadā jagat sarvaṃ prakāśayana tapaś caraṃś ca hutabhuk saṃtaptas tasya tejasāc bhṛśaṃ glānaś ca tejasvī na sa kiṃ cit prajajñivāna atha saṃcintayām āsa bhagavān havyavāhanaḥc anyo gnir iha lokānāṃ brahmaṇā saṃpravartitaḥe agnitvaṃ vipranaṣṭaṃ hi tapyamānasya me tapaḥa katham agniḥ punar ahaṃ bhaveyam iti cintya saḥc apaśyad agnival lokāṃs tāpayantaṃ mahāmunima sopāsarpac chanair bhītas tam uvāca tadāṅgirāḥc śīghram eva bhavasvāgnis tvaṃ punar lokabhāvanaḥe vijñātaś cāsi lokeṣu triṣu saṃsthānacāriṣua tvam agne prathamaḥ sṛṣṭo brahmaṇā timirāpahaḥc svasthānaṃ pratipadyasva śīghram eva tamonuda agnir uvācaa naṣṭakīrtir ahaṃ loke bhavāñ jāto hutāśanaḥc bhavantam eva jñāsyanti pāvakaṃ na tu māṃ janāḥa nikṣipāmy aham agnitvaṃ tvam agniḥ prathamo bhavac bhaviṣyāmi dvitīyo haṃ prājāpatyaka eva ca aṅgirā uvācaa kuru puṇyaṃ prajāsvargyaṃ bhavāgnis timirāpahaḥc māṃ ca deva kuruṣvāgne prathamaṃ putram añjasā mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa tac chrutvāṅgiraso vākyaṃ jātavedās tathākarotc rājan bṛhaspatir nāma tasyāpy aṅgirasaḥ sutaḥa jñātvā prathamajaṃ taṃ tu vahner āṅgirasaṃ sutamc upetya devāḥ papracchuḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra bhārataa sa tu pṛṣṭas tadā devais tataḥ kāraṇam abravītc pratyagṛhṇaṃs tu devāś ca tad vaco ṅgirasas tadāa atra nānāvidhān agnīn pravakṣyāmi mahāprabhānc karmabhir bahubhiḥ khyātān nānātvaṃ brāhmaṇeṣv iha mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa brahmaṇo yas tṛtīyas tu putraḥ kurukulodvahac tasyāpavasutā bhāryā prajās tasyāpi me śṛṇua bṛhajjyotir bṛhatkīrtir bṛhadbrahmā bṛhanmanāḥc bṛhanmantro bṛhadbhāsas tathā rājan bṛhaspatiḥa prajāsu tāsu sarvāsu rūpeṇāpratimābhavatc devī bhānumatī nāma prathamāṅgirasaḥ sutāa bhūtānām eva sarveṣāṃ yasyāṃ rāgas tadābhavatc rāgād rāgeti yām āhur dvitīyāṅgirasaḥ sutāa yāṃ kapardisutām āhur dṛśyādṛśyeti dehinaḥc tanutvāt sā sinīvālī tṛtīyāṅgirasaḥ sutāa paśyaty arciṣmatī bhābhir havirbhiś ca haviṣmatīc ṣaṣṭhīm aṅgirasaḥ kanyāṃ puṇyām āhur haviṣmatīma mahāmakheṣv āṅgirasī dīptimatsu mahāmatīc mahāmatīti vikhyātā saptamī kathyate sutāa yāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā bhagavatīṃ janaḥ kuhukuhāyatec ekānaṃśeti yām āhuḥ kuhūm aṅgirasaḥ sutām mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa bṛhaspateś cāndramasī bhāryābhūd yā yaśasvinīc agnīn sājanayat puṇyān ṣaḍekāṃ cāpi putrikāma āhutiṣv eva yasyāgner haviṣājyaṃ vidhīyatec so gnir bṛhaspateḥ putraḥ śaṃyur nāma mahāprabhaḥa cāturmāsyeṣu yasyeṣṭyām aśvamedhe grajaḥ paśuḥc dīpto jvālair anekābhair agnir eko tha vīryavāna śaṃyor apratimā bhāryā satyā satyā ca dharmajāc agnis tasya suto dīptas tisraḥ kanyāś ca suvratāḥa prathamenājyabhāgena pūjyate yo gnir adhvarec agnis tasya bharadvājaḥ prathamaḥ putra ucyatea paurṇamāsyeṣu sarveṣu haviṣājyaṃ sruvodyatamc bharato nāmataḥ so gnir dvitīyaḥ śaṃyutaḥ sutaḥa tisraḥ kanyā bhavanty anyā yāsāṃ sa bharataḥ patiḥc bharatas tu sutas tasya bharaty ekā ca putrikāa bharato bharatasyāgneḥ pāvakas tu prajāpateḥc mahān atyartham ahitas tathā bharatasattamaa bharadvājasya bhāryā tu vīrā vīraś ca piṇḍadaḥc prāhur ājyena tasyejyāṃ somasyeva dvijāḥ śanaiḥa haviṣā yo dvitīyena somena saha yujyatec rathaprabhū rathadhvānaḥ kumbharetāḥ sa ucyatea sarayvāṃ janayat siddhiṃ bhānuṃ bhābhiḥ samāvṛṇotc āgneyam ānayan nityam āhvāneṣv eṣa kathyatea yas tu na cyavate nityaṃ yaśasā varcasā śriyāc agnir niścyavano nāma pṛthivīṃ stauti kevalama vipāpmā kaluṣair mukto viśuddhaś cārciṣā jvalanc vipāpo gniḥ sutas tasya satyaḥ samayakarmasua ākrośatāṃ hi bhūtānāṃ yaḥ karoti hi niṣkṛtimc agniḥ sa niṣkṛtir nāma śobhayaty abhisevitaḥa anukūjanti yeneha vedanārtāḥ svayaṃ janāḥc tasya putraḥ svano nāma pāvakaḥ sa rujaskaraḥa yas tu viśvasya jagato buddhim ākramya tiṣṭhatic taṃ prāhur adhyātmavido viśvajin nāma pāvakama antarāgniḥ śrito yo hi bhuktaṃ pacati dehināmc sa yajñe viśvabhuṅ nāma sarvalokeṣu bhārataa brahmacārī yatātmā ca satataṃ vipulavrataḥc brāhmaṇāḥ pūjayanty enaṃ pākayajñeṣu pāvakama prathito gopatir nāma nadī yasyābhavat priyāc tasmin sarvāṇi karmāṇi kriyante karmakartṛbhiḥa vaḍavāmukhaḥ pibaty ambho yo sau paramadāruṇaḥc ūrdhvabhāg ūrdhvabhāṅ nāma kaviḥ prāṇāśritas tu saḥa udagdvāraṃ havir yasya gṛhe nityaṃ pradīyatec tataḥ sviṣṭaṃ bhaved ājyaṃ sviṣṭakṛt paramaḥ smṛtaḥa yaḥ praśānteṣu bhūteṣu manyur bhavati pāvakaḥb manyumān nāma bhagavān agnir eva mahābalaḥb āraṇyāni tathā grāmyān yo dahan saṃprakāśateb svayam utpatitaḥ śrīmān vṛddhimān nāma pāvakaḥb krodhaḥ sa tu mahātejā vijñeyaḥ sarvadehiṣuc krodhasya tu raso jajñe manyatī cātha putrikāe svāheti dāruṇā krūrā sarvabhūteṣu tiṣṭhatia tridive yasya sadṛśo nāsti rūpeṇa kaś canac atulyatvāt kṛto devair nāmnā kāmas tu pāvakaḥa saṃharṣād dhārayan krodhaṃ dhanvī sragvī rathe sthitaḥc samare nāśayec chatrūn amogho nāma pāvakaḥa uktho nāma mahābhāga tribhir ukthair abhiṣṭutaḥc mahāvācaṃ tv ajanayat sakāmāśvaṃ hi yaṃ viduḥ mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa kāśyapo hy atha vāsiṣṭhaḥ prāṇaś ca prāṇaputrakaḥc agnir āṅgirasaś caiva cyavanas triṣuvarcakaḥa acaranta tapas tīvraṃ putrārthe bahuvārṣikamc putraṃ labhema dharmiṣṭhaṃ yaśasā brahmaṇā samama mahāvyāhṛtibhir dhyātaḥ pañcabhis tais tadā tv athac jajñe tejomayo rciṣmān pañcavarṇaḥ prabhāvanaḥa samiddho gniḥ śiras tasya bāhū sūryanibhau tathāc tvaṅ netre ca suvarṇābhe kṛṣṇe jaṅghe ca bhārataa pañcavarṇaḥ sa tapasā kṛtas taiḥ pañcabhir janaiḥc pāñcajanyaḥ śruto vede pañcavaṃśakaras tu saḥa daśa varṣasahasrāṇi tapas taptvā mahātapāḥc janayat pāvakaṃ ghoraṃ pitṝṇāṃ sa prajāḥ sṛjana bṛhad rathaṃtaraṃ mūrdhno vaktrāc ca tarasāharauc śivaṃ nābhyāṃ balād indraṃ vāyvagnī prāṇato sṛjata bāhubhyām anudāttau ca viśve bhūtāni caiva hac etān sṛṣṭvā tataḥ pañca pitṝṇām asṛjat sutāna bṛhadūrjasya praṇidhiḥ kāśyapasya bṛhattaraḥc bhānur aṅgiraso vīraḥ putro varcasya saubharaḥa prāṇasya cānudāttaś ca vyākhyātāḥ pañca vaṃśajāḥc devān yajñamuṣaś cānyān sṛjan pañcadaśottarāna abhīmam atibhīmaṃ ca bhīmaṃ bhīmabalābalamc etān yajñamuṣaḥ pañca devān abhyasṛjat tapaḥa sumitraṃ mitravantaṃ ca mitrajñaṃ mitravardhanamc mitradharmāṇam ity etān devān abhyasṛjat tapaḥa surapravīraṃ vīraṃ ca sukeśaṃ ca suvarcasamc surāṇām api hantāraṃ pañcaitān asṛjat tapaḥa trividhaṃ saṃsthitā hy ete pañca pañca pṛthak pṛthakc muṣṇanty atra sthitā hy ete svargato yajñayājinaḥa teṣām iṣṭaṃ haranty ete nighnanti ca mahad bhuvic spardhayā havyavāhānāṃ nighnanty ete haranti caa havir vedyāṃ tad ādānaṃ kuśalaiḥ saṃpravartitamc tad ete nopasarpanti yatra cāgniḥ sthito bhaveta cito gnir udvahan yajñaṃ pakṣābhyāṃ tān prabādhatec mantraiḥ praśamitā hy ete neṣṭaṃ muṣṇanti yajñiyama bṛhadukthatapasyaiva putro bhūmim upāśritaḥc agnihotre hūyamāne pṛthivyāṃ sadbhir ijyatea rathaṃtaraś ca tapasaḥ putro gniḥ paripaṭhyatec mitravindāya vai tasya havir adhvaryavo viduḥd etaiḥ saha mahābhāga tapas tejasvibhir nṛpae mumude paramaprītaḥ saha putrair mahāyaśāḥ mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa gurubhir niyamair yukto bharato nāma pāvakaḥc agniḥ puṣṭimatir nāma tuṣṭaḥ puṣṭiṃ prayacchatie bharaty eṣa prajāḥ sarvās tato bharata ucyatef satataṃ bharataśreṣṭha pāvako vai mahāprabhaḥa agnir yas tu śivo nāma śaktipūjāparaś ca saḥc duḥkhārtānāṃ sa sarveṣāṃ śivakṛt satataṃ śivaḥa tapasas tu phalaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃpravṛddhaṃ tapo mahatc uddhartukāmo matimān putro jajñe puraṃdaraḥa ūṣmā caivoṣmaṇo jajñe so gnir bhūteṣu lakṣyatec agniś cāpi manur nāma prājāpatyam akārayata śaṃbhum agnim atha prāhur brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥc āvasathyaṃ dvijāḥ prāhur dīptam agniṃ mahāprabhama ūrjaskarān havyavāhān suvarṇasadṛśaprabhānc agnis tapo hy ajanayat pañca yajñasutān ihaa praśānte gnir mahābhāga pariśrānto gavāṃpatiḥc asurāñ janayan ghorān martyāṃś caiva pṛthagvidhāna tapasaś ca manuṃ putraṃ bhānuṃ cāpy aṅgirāsṛjatc bṛhadbhānuṃ tu taṃ prāhur brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥa bhānor bhāryā suprajā tu bṛhadbhāsā tu somajāc asṛjetāṃ tu ṣaṭ putrāñ śṛṇu tāsāṃ prajāvidhimc   tadā sā kanyayā sahac bhānor aṅgirasasyāthaa durbalānāṃ tu bhūtānāṃ tanuṃ yaḥ saṃprayacchatic tam agniṃ baladaṃ prāhuḥ prathamaṃ bhānutaḥ sutama yaḥ praśānteṣu bhūteṣu manyur bhavati dāruṇaḥc agniḥ sa manyumān nāma dvitīyo bhānutaḥ sutaḥa darśe ca paurṇamāse ca yasyeha havir ucyatec viṣṇur nāmeha yo gnis tu dhṛtimān nāma so ṅgirāḥa indreṇa sahitaṃ yasya havir āgrayaṇaṃ smṛtamc agnir āgrayaṇo nāma bhānor evānvayas tu saḥa cāturmāsyeṣu nityānāṃ haviṣāṃ yo niragrahaḥc caturbhiḥ sahitaḥ putrair bhānor evānvayas tu saḥa niśāṃ tv ajanayat kanyām agnīṣomāv ubhau tathāc manor evābhavad bhāryā suṣuve pañca pāvakāna pūjyate haviṣāgryeṇa cāturmāsyeṣu pāvakaḥc parjanyasahitaḥ śrīmān agnir vaiśvānaras tu saḥa asya lokasya sarvasya yaḥ patiḥ paripaṭhyatec so gnir viśvapatir nāma dvitīyo vai manoḥ sutaḥe tataḥ sviṣṭaṃ bhaved ājyaṃ sviṣṭakṛt paramaḥ smṛtaḥa kanyā sā rohiṇī nāma hiraṇyakaśipoḥ sutāc karmaṇāsau babhau bhāryā sa vahniḥ sa prajāpatiḥa prāṇam āśritya yo dehaṃ pravartayati dehināmc tasya saṃnihito nāma śabdarūpasya sādhanaḥa śuklakṛṣṇagatir devo yo bibharti hutāśanamc akalmaṣaḥ kalmaṣāṇāṃ kartā krodhāśritas tu saḥa kapilaṃ paramarṣiṃ ca yaṃ prāhur yatayaḥ sadāc agniḥ sa kapilo nāma sāṃkhyayogapravartakaḥa agnir yacchati bhūtāni yena bhūtāni nityadāc karmasv iha vicitreṣu so graṇīr vahnir ucyatea imān anyān samasṛjat pāvakān prathitān bhuvic agnihotrasya duṣṭasya prāyaścittārtham ulbaṇāna saṃspṛśeyur yadānyonyaṃ kathaṃ cid vāyunāgnayaḥc iṣṭir aṣṭākapālena kāryā vai śucaye gnayea dakṣiṇāgnir yadā dvābhyāṃ saṃsṛjeta tadā kilac iṣṭir aṣṭākapālena kāryā vai vītaye gnayea yady agnayo hi spṛśyeyur niveśasthā davāgnināc iṣṭir aṣṭākapālena kāryā tu śucaye gnayea agniṃ rajasvalā cet strī saṃspṛśed agnihotrikamc iṣṭir aṣṭākapālena kāryā dasyumate gnayea mṛtaḥ śrūyeta yo jīvan pareyuḥ paśavo yathāc iṣṭir aṣṭākapālena kartavyābhimate gnayea ārto na juhuyād agniṃ trirātraṃ yas tu brāhmaṇaḥc iṣṭir aṣṭākapālena kāryā syād uttarāgnayea darśaṃ ca paurṇamāsaṃ ca yasya tiṣṭhet pratiṣṭhitamc iṣṭir aṣṭākapālena kāryā pathikṛte gnayea sūtikāgnir yadā cāgniṃ saṃspṛśed agnihotrikamc iṣṭir aṣṭākapālena kāryā cāgnimate gnaye mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa āpasya muditā bhāryā sahasya paramā priyāc bhūpatir bhuvabhartā ca janayat pāvakaṃ parama bhūtānāṃ cāpi sarveṣāṃ yaṃ prāhuḥ pāvakaṃ patimc ātmā bhuvanabharteti sānvayeṣu dvijātiṣua mahatāṃ caiva bhūtānāṃ sarveṣām iha yaḥ patiḥc bhagavān sa mahātejā nityaṃ carati pāvakaḥa agnir gṛhapatir nāma nityaṃ yajñeṣu pūjyatec hutaṃ vahati yo havyam asya lokasya pāvakaḥa apāṃ garbho mahābhāgaḥ sahaputro mahādbhutaḥc bhūpatir bhuvabhartā ca mahataḥ patir ucyatea dahan mṛtāni bhūtāni tasyāgnir bharato bhavatc agniṣṭome ca niyataḥ kratuśreṣṭho bharasya tud sa vanhiḥ prathamo nityaṃ devair anviṣyate prabhuḥa āyāntaṃ niyataṃ dṛṣṭvā praviveśārṇavaṃ bhayātc devās taṃ nādhigacchanti mārgamāṇā yathādiśama dṛṣṭvā tv agnir atharvāṇaṃ tato vacanam abravītc devānāṃ vaha havyaṃ tvam ahaṃ vīra sudurbalaḥe atharvan gaccha madhvakṣaṃ priyam etat kuruṣva mea preṣya cāgnir atharvāṇam anyaṃ deśaṃ tato gamatc matsyās tasya samācakhyuḥ kruddhas tān agnir abravīta bhakṣyā vai vividhair bhāvair bhaviṣyatha śarīriṇāmc atharvāṇaṃ tathā cāpi havyavāho bravīd vacaḥa anunīyamāno pi bhṛśaṃ devavākyād dhi tena saḥc naicchad voḍhuṃ haviḥ sarvaṃ śarīraṃ ca samatyajata sa tac charīraṃ saṃtyajya praviveśa dharāṃ tadāc bhūmiṃ spṛṣṭvāsṛjad dhātūn pṛthak pṛthag atīva hia āsyāt sugandhi tejaś ca asthibhyo devadāru cac śleṣmaṇaḥ sphaṭikaṃ tasya pittān marakataṃ tathāa yakṛt kṛṣṇāyasaṃ tasya tribhir eva babhuḥ prajāḥc nakhās tasyābhrapaṭalaṃ śirājālāni vidrumame śarīrād vividhāś cānye dhātavo syābhavan nṛpaa evaṃ tyaktvā śarīraṃ tu parame tapasi sthitaḥc bhṛgvaṅgirādibhir bhūyas tapasotthāpitas tadāa bhṛśaṃ jajvāla tejasvī tapasāpyāyitaḥ śikhīc dṛṣṭvā ṛṣīn bhayāc cāpi praviveśa mahārṇavama tasmin naṣṭe jagad bhītam atharvāṇam athāśritamc arcayām āsur evainam atharvāṇaṃ surarṣayaḥa atharvā tv asṛjal lokān ātmanālokya pāvakamc miṣatāṃ sarvabhūtānām unmamātha mahārṇavama evam agnir bhagavatā naṣṭaḥ pūrvam atharvaṇāc āhūtaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ havyaṃ vahati sarvadāa evaṃ tv ajanayad dhiṣṇyān vedoktān vibudhān bahūnc vicaran vividhān deśān bhramamāṇas tu tatra vaia sindhuvarjaṃ pañca nadyo devikātha sarasvatīc gaṅgā ca śatakumbhā ca śarayūr gaṇḍasāhvayāa carmaṇvatī mahī caiva medhyā medhātithis tathāc tāmrāvatī vetravatī nadyas tisro tha kauśikīa tamasā narmadā caiva nadī godāvarī tathāc veṇṇā praveṇī bhīmā ca medrathā caiva bhārataa bhāratī suprayogā ca kāverī murmurā tathāc kṛṣṇā ca kṛṣṇaveṇṇā ca kapilā śoṇa eva cae etā nadyas tu dhiṣṇyānāṃ mātaro yāḥ prakīrtitāḥa adbhutasya priyā bhāryā tasyāḥ putro viḍūrathaḥc yāvantaḥ pāvakāḥ proktāḥ somās tāvanta eva caa atreś cāpy anvaye jātā brahmaṇo mānasāḥ prajāḥc atriḥ putrān sraṣṭukāmas tān evātmany adhārayate tasya tad brahmaṇaḥ kāyān nirharanti hutāśanāḥa evam ete mahātmānaḥ kīrtitās te gnayo mayāc aprameyā yathotpannāḥ śrīmantas timirāpahāḥa adbhutasya tu māhātmyaṃ yathā vedeṣu kīrtitamc tādṛśaṃ viddhi sarveṣām eko hy eṣa hutāśanaḥa eka evaiṣa bhagavān vijñeyaḥ prathamo ṅgirāḥc bahudhā niḥsṛtaḥ kāyāj jyotiṣṭomaḥ kratur yathāa ity eṣa vaṃśaḥ sumahān agnīnāṃ kīrtito mayāc pāvito vividhair mantrair havyaṃ vahati dehinām mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa agnīnāṃ vividho vaṃśaḥ kīrtitas te mayānaghac śṛṇu janma tu kauravya kārttikeyasya dhīmataḥd vaiśaṃpāyanaḥd śrutvemāṃ dharmasaṃyuktāṃ dharmarājaḥ kathāṃ śubhāmd yudhiṣṭhiraḥd punaḥ papraccha tam ṛṣiṃ mārkaṇḍeyaṃ tapasvinamd kumāras tu yathā jāto yathā cāgneḥ suto bhavatd yathā rudrāc ca saṃbhūto gaṅgāyāṃ kṛttikāsu cad etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ kautūhalam atīva mea adbhutasyādbhutaṃ putraṃ pravakṣyāmy amitaujasamc jātaṃ saptarṣibhāryābhir brahmaṇyaṃ kīrtivardhanama devāsurāḥ purā yattā vinighnantaḥ parasparamc tatrājayan sadā devān dānavā ghorarūpiṇaḥa vadhyamānaṃ balaṃ dṛṣṭvā bahuśas taiḥ puraṃdaraḥc svasainyanāyakārthāya cintām āpa bhṛśaṃ tadāa devasenāṃ dānavair yo mahāvīryo mahābalaḥa yas tu sarvāṇi bhūtāni tvayā saha vijeṣyatic sa hi me bhavitā bhartā brahmaṇyaḥ kīrtivardhanaḥ mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa indras tasyā vacaḥ śrutvā duḥkhito cintayad bhṛśamc asyā devyāḥ patir nāsti yādṛśaṃ saṃprabhāṣatea athāpaśyat sa udaye bhāskaraṃ bhāskaradyutiḥc somaṃ caiva mahābhāgaṃ viśamānaṃ divākarama amāvāsyāṃ saṃpravṛttaṃ muhūrtaṃ raudram eva cac devāsuraṃ ca saṃgrāmaṃ so paśyad udaye giraua lohitaiś ca ghanair yuktāṃ pūrvāṃ saṃdhyāṃ śatakratuḥc apaśyal lohitodaṃ ca bhagavān varuṇālayama bhṛgubhiś cāṅgirobhiś ca hutaṃ mantraiḥ pṛthagvidhaiḥc havyaṃ gṛhītvā vahniṃ ca ca devatāc eṣa cej janayed garbhaṃ so syā devyāḥ patir bhaveta evaṃ saṃcintya bhagavān brahmalokaṃ tadā gataḥc gṛhītvā devasenāṃ tām avandat sa pitāmahame uvāca cāsyā devyās tvaṃ sādhu śūraṃ patiṃ naitāḥ śakyā mayā draṣṭuṃ spraṣṭuṃ vāpy animittataḥc gārhapatyaṃ samāviśya tasmāt paśyāmy abhīkṣṇaśaḥa saṃspṛśann iva sarvās tāḥ śikhābhiḥ kāñcanaprabhāḥc paśyamānaś ca mumude gārhapatyaṃ samāśritaḥa niruṣya tatra suciram evaṃ vahnir vaśaṃ gataḥc manas tāsu vinikṣipya kāmayāno varāṅganāḥa kāmasaṃtaptahṛdayo dehatyāge suniścitaḥc alābhe brāhmaṇastrīṇām agnir vanam upāgataḥa svāhā taṃ dakṣaduhitā āsa bhāminīa ahaṃ saptarṣipatnīnāṃ kṛtvā rūpāṇi pāvakamc kāmayiṣyāmi kāmārtaṃ tāsāṃ rūpeṇa mohitame evaṃ kṛte prītir asya kāmāvāptiś ca me bhavet mārkaṇḍeya uvācaa śivā bhāryā tv aṅgirasaḥ śīlarūpaguṇānvitāc tasyāḥ sā prathamaṃ rūpaṃ kṛtvā devī janādhipae jagāma pāvakābhyāśaṃ taṃ covāca varāṅganāa mām agne kāmasaṃtaptāṃ tvaṃ kāmayitum arhasic kariṣyasi na ced evaṃ mṛtāṃ mām upadhārayad
